story:
E2 Natural Wave Technology 

I'm David Sullivan, founder and inventor of E2 Performance Technologies, Inc. I invented "E2" which stands for "Earth's Energy" to help humans and their pets fight off "electromagnetic radiation" (EMRs) from cell phones, computers, electrical lines, etc that can disrupt your sleep, cause cancer and pre-mature aging and illnesses.

We are looking for first movers to invest in this technology and help us make our children aware via social media of how dangerous EMRs can be for their health, Specifically I am looking for the following;

  • Pre-sell our sleep bracelet with the E2 technology embedded at a drastic discount prior to retail launch to help you sleep better but more important help you fight the effects of EMRs not only during the night but by also wearing the bracelet during the day.
  • Help me spread the word via social media of how dangerous EMRs are for our children and and our pets on Facebook (E2 Performance).
  • Purchase the sleep bracelet for only $99.99 - that's half off the retail launch price and help me raise my goal of $100,000 or 1,000 bracelets which are now entering production.

 

Your pre-purchase of our sleep bracelet will not only help our company as a startup but will help us spread the word about EMRs and how they are destroying the health of our children. We have successfully launched a mattress protector with E2 Technology at retail which now sells for $300 for a king size protector. Your purchase will not only help you personally but will help us spread the word about EMRs and how E2 can help defend off their effects on balance, strength, flexibility and endurance.

Our biggest challenge right now is to scale the operation to develop more natural frequency generators so we can apply the technology to clothing because more E2 on a person is better. We have a patent pending for the frequency generator # US20110209723A1 which is very strong and should be approved soon.

story:
Short Summary

Well hello world...  We’re Joe, Ricardo and Will 3 engineers from Chicago. Thank you for taking the time to check out Cutback Case. (Click the play button above for a full product description).

Thinking of quitting smoking or know somebody that’s trying?? Cutback Case is your first step in cutting back! We all know the health risks and someone in our lives affected by the severity of smoking. We’re here to help put an end to smoking 1 cigarette at a time.

What We Need & What You Get

We are extremely proud here at Cutback Case to bring this pre-commitment quitting method to you. Pre-Commitment is the notion of committing to a smart choice now, when you know you’ll be tempted by a bad choice later. By supporting us you will be part of something big. Part of helping people master their willpower, curb temptation and finally kick the habit once and for all.

For those of you that didn’t order a Case and choose the BACK IT option, we will donate $1 for every $20 contributed to the American Lung Association. If you’re a backer for our first 2 perks, we will donate $1 to this org. They offer tobacco treatment programs for adults and advocate for lung-friendly health policies that keep tobacco products out of the hands of children. For backers that choose Case Bundle Deal X5 (We will donate $5),  Case Bundle Deal X10 (We will donate $10)!! Then for those you who select the  Case Bundle Deal X15, We will donate $25 to this organization!!!

We aim to raise $70,000.00 through crowdfunding. Funds will go towards...

  • Tooling- $45,000.00
  • Consulting- $8,000.00
  • Attorney -$7,000.00
  • Marketing-$7,000.00
  • Distribution-$3,000.00

 

All 3 of us at Cutback Case are ex smokers, we find this pre commitment approach to quitting smoking extremely valuable to those that struggle with willpower and temptation.

We came up with this idea after several failed “cold turkey “ attempts of our own. So we decided to do something about it, We wanted to create a solution to help ourselves  and other smokers that struggle with temptation and willpower trying to kick the habit. We felt that knowing in the back of our mind that quitting didn’t have to be all or nothing. This pre commitment approach definitely helped ease our mind throughout the quitting process and removed the temptation factor. This concept was like our own personal reward system. Within a few weeks  we went from a pack a day to 1/2 and eventually was able to quit using this system. 

We here at Cutback Case want to change the quitting process by removing the anxiety and stress. Making quitting as easy as possible.

Risks & Challenges

We have devoted the last 2 1/2 years of our life to Cutback Case. Our dedication and commitment to this project has brought us this far. We have overcome many hurdles  throughout the engineering and design process but we’ve persevered and here we are in front of you.

We know that the manufacturing process can have its difficulties  and we’ve hired a manufacturing consultant to help us overcome any obstacles. We are extremely excited to continue the journey and look forward to bringing the Cutback Case to life.

Other Ways You Can Help. 

We would love you to join us as a backer but understand that everybody can not afford to. Helping spread the word on social media, telling colleagues, friends and family about our campaign would mean the world to us. Any support, no matter how great or small is kindly appreciated.

Any suggestions on ways you can help please feel free to email us at Cutbackcase@gmail.com

Case dimensions (inches): 5.19x3.47/0.77 Fits (7) cigarettes all sizes (except 120mm). Cutback Case has a Special Feature! A built in cardholder, so leave the wallet at home.

story:
My name is Mike Cook, I am 33 years old. I have been training in martial arts and fitness since I was 16 years old. I have gained experience in art, innovation and engineering since my early youth from working with my family who owns MRISAR Institute of Science, Art & Robotics (mrisar.org). They are world renowned for having the largest selection of World-class Interactive Robotic Exhibits.

I injured my Rotator Cuff about seven years ago when I got into strength training. Needless to say I was extremely frustrated with the lack of effective ways to  rehabilitate and strengthen my Rotator Cuff. So I decided to design a machine to help me strengthen it. I didn't think it would end up being something that would benefit other people until I researched how common Rotator Cuff injuries were. I spent a lot of time developing the Cyclone to make it as safe, convenient and user friendly as possible.

The Cyclone addresses an important need for athletes, rehabilitation centers, professional and home gyms. The user will be able to conveniently strengthen the Rotator Cuff  resulting in greater shoulder strength, health and longevity. This will greatly reduce the risk of a tear in the Rotator Cuff that could potentially cost thousands in hospital/surgery fees, as well as any lost time from daily jobs and life. 

Facts: There are 4.5 Million Rotator Cuff injuries each year in the United states. Of which 250,000 require surgery with an additional 400,000 surgeries for related tendinitis or partial tears. With shoulder injuries being so common, it's obvious that there is a lack of convenient means to strengthen the Rotator Cuff. By making the Cyclone available to everyone I hope to provide an easy, convenient, non strenuous way to strengthen the Rotator Cuff, thus increasing the longevity of people's joints.

Funding: A fully developed prototype will cost approximately  $15,000. That's not including  the cost of having CAD files produced ($100-$140 per hour) for CNC machining or having parts remade due to adjustments in the design (prototyping is EXPENSIVE. Obviously when it goes into production the price per unit will be far more economical). So to cover those estimated costs I need approximately $25,000 (to be safe).  When you subtract the cost of the perks and Indiegogos' cut, I would need to raise $50,000 to reach my desired $25,000 goal (if my math is right). Unless my goal is met without any perks being purchased (which is unlikely).

Counter weights to off-set the weight of the handle apparatus combined with locking pins for height adjustment allow the user to easily adjust the height of the handle with one hand (in the event the user has one injured shoulder).

Angle adjustment of the main handle allow the user to strengthen the Rotator Cuff above the head for sport/job specific activities or below the waist if the user is trying to rehabilitate an injured shoulder that they can not lift very high.

 

The handle can be used clockwise or counter-clockwise to lift the weights by utilizing a custom ratchet mechanism.

 

The Cyclone provides six isolated exercises: 

  • Internal Rotation of the shoulder
  • External Rotation of the shoulder
  • Supination of the wrist
  • Pronation of the wrist
  • Ulnar Deviation of the wrist
  • Radial Deviation of the wrist

Benefits: 

•    Physical Therapy; From damaged Rotator Cuffs to strained wrists and elbows, the Cyclone provides smooth precision action for any isolated movement. 
•    Sports; Baseball, Football, Tennis etc. Strengthens and increases flexibility of the Rotator Cuff and Wrist, improving and prolonging the career of professional Athletes. 
•    Work; If you have a job that requires continuous, strenuous overhead shoulder movement or use of your forearms such as; mechanics, carpentry, electrical, etc., then strengthening your shoulders and forearms will help prevent injury and prolong your career.
•    Martial Arts; Whether you are breaking grips, executing holds, joint locks or just looking to put a powerful rotation on your strikes, the cyclone will strengthen the rotational force of your arms and to give you the edge over your competition! 
•    Body Building, Olympic Lifting, Power Lifting, Strong man, CrossFit; Any lifter knows that the Rotator Cuff and forearms are two of the most neglected parts of the body and that strengthening the Rotator Cuff can be tricky and dangerous. You would normally use leverage bars, dumbbells and bands which can strain your joints and are generally unstable. The Cyclone eliminates the need for any of those. It is simply a more efficient, effective tool to strengthen the Rotator Cuff and wrists.  

Thank you for you contributions! Please help me share my story. :)

story:
About Cancer Story and CS Diary

Cancer Story is an interactive platform that allows those affected by cancer to reach out to one other and share their experiences. The purpose of this fundraising effort is to create the CS Diary: a tool which will help individual cancer patients  follow their progress by tracking treatments and their effects,  organizing and preparing for  appointments, reviewing trends and summarizing information to be shared with doctor or others. 

The Cancer Story team consists of cancer patients and professionals who believe that for people with cancer there are increasingly more reasons to be proactive about their care. Cancer treatments are complex, they multiply rapidly, and there are now more and more ways to address the same problem. Often, the best treatment choices can be made by closely monitoring treatment effects not just through diagnostic tests, but also by following trends of wellbeing parameters and day-to-day activities. The CS Diary plans to integrate such self-monitoring with the treatment planner, making it the go-to tool throughout the cancer journey. 


The CS Diary: Description

The CS Diary will be a smartphone application which will operate in three functional modes:

  • Daily Survey
  • Plan and Remind
  • Graphic Summary


Daily Survey will allow the user to submit updated information about his/her treatment developments, experiences, events, activities, new appointments, ideas, etc. It will be a self-activating system intended to survey the user at least daily (or as otherwise set) . Its menu will consist of three basic options :

  1. Wellbeing and activity (How did you do today?)
  2. Treatment/diagnostic data (Tell me about your treatment!)
  3. Planner inquiry  (Do we need to make new plans?)
There will be further subdivisions which will unfold consecutively, allowing the user to navigate to the trackable parameter of interest. 

The Daily Survey will also allow the user to proceed directly to his/her preset trackable, parameter questionnaire that will allow a simple selection of the chosen trackables, as well as being easily adjustable and flexible in order to accommodate a wide variety of user interests and usage patterns as they may evolve. Users will be able to record their activities -  exercise, meals, sleep, etc. They will be also able to input in real time recordings of their symptoms, their intensity, as well as their estimates of energy, mood, ability to function, overall happiness or distress, etc. 

It will also provide a link to the Cancer Story main platform where the user will be able to directly communicate to the community of Cancer Story users about what's important to him/her, by posting a question, submitting a story, or reaching out directly to other users who have demonstrated potential knowledge on their topic of interest. 

Plan and Remind will be a calendar-based event planner where the user will be able to enter and review his/her upcoming appointments, set reminders and prepare for any other activities. It will also provide the option of including a description of the pending appointments. 

Visit Planner enables a user to prepare for what needs to be addressed during an upcoming appointment with the doctor or another provider. The Problem List function will allow review of "on the go" notes about issues that need to be addressed, and categorize questions based on whom they are to be asked to: the doctor (e.g., new symptoms, experimental treatments), the nurse (e.g., medication refills, lab results), the social worker (e.g.,copay assistance, transportation), etc. This planner can be used for many other functions, like preparing for support group meetings or educational activities. 

Users will be able to set their Medication Reminder which will signal the time when a medication is due, and will record it as "administered" on the Medication Tracker. 

Graphic Summary will allow for visualization of trends from the collected data on different parameters over time. It will be possible to juxtapose the graphs of trackable parameters in endless combinations, allowing a user to find correlations between them (e.g., dates of chemotherapy treatments vs. symptoms, exercise vs. energy level, etc.) These combinations can then be saved for ongoing monitoring of suspected correlations. The user will be able to prepare snapshots of these graphs to present to the doctor, another user, or anybody else. 

Cancer Story Purpose and Mission

Cancer Story is an online community of people who strongly believe that answers, and even solutions, to many of the problems posed by cancer can be found in the experiences of others.

We believe the exchange of spontaneous and voluntary information, done in a safe and confidential medium, can provide an alternative route around the barriers -- like privacy and ownership concerns -- that have gridlocked the cancer establishment in this regard.

Our mission is to provide a platform where such a free exchange of cancer-related information can take place.


Cancer Story: The Basic Premises


For those people with cancer there are increasingly more reasons to be proactive about their care.

As progress is made in conquering most cancers, for those affected:

  • Cancer is becoming more complex and difficult to understand
  • There is more than one way to address the same problem
  • When making a decision, there are more nuanced facts to be considered
  • Cancer management is becoming a more common-place activity in today’s world

Your doctor alone cannot always know what’s best for you.

While new discoveries on a molecular and genetic level allow us to understand and treat cancer better, there are limits to how helpful they may be:

  • Most studies on which doctors base their knowledge include only a small and highly selective fraction of all cancer patients
  • Many of those studies were likely conducted before much of the new information became available, so often today there are no straightforward, updated answers regarding the best treatment for a particular patient
  • The medical establishment is critical of unproven ideas and conservative in adopting new treatments. Until a sufficient amount of evidence has been accumulated, documented, reviewed and accepted, many patients don’t find out about potential treatment options on a timely basis

Even the best research may not address things that matter to you the most.

Research is focused on solid and objective facts, such as how long patients live or how long their cancer remains controlled, or what side effects they report. These facts, however, don’t say enough about a patient’s real-life experience. Our lives are a combination of multiple factors: physical, spiritual, social, economic, and others. The delicate interplay of these factors is largely lost in the world of objective facts and can only be accounted for using tools that are more closely connected to patients and caregivers.

Cancer can be a very lonely experience - until you discover that some of the issues you think only you experience are very similar to what others go through.

The support of family, friends and caregivers is invaluable, of course.  But even with their support, individuals with cancer often feel alone - alone in their experience.  Cancer Story intends to respond to this loneliness by offering a virtual community of people who are similarly lonely and seeking others who truly understand their experiences. The power of the Internet provides access to the community and support across the country and even the world with an unlimited number of like-minded and similarly experienced individuals in their cancer journey.

The delicate interplay of these factors is largely lost in the world of objective facts and can only be accounted for using tools that are more closely connected to patients and caregivers.
Cancer can be a very lonely experience - until you discover that some of the issues you think only you experience are very similar to what others go through.
The support of family, friends and caregivers is invaluable, of course.  But even with their support, individuals with cancer often feel alone - alone in their experience.  Cancer Story intends to respond to this loneliness by offering a virtual community of people who are similarly lonely and seeking others who truly understand their experiences. The power of the Internet provides access to the community and support across the country and even the world with an unlimited number of like-minded and similarly experienced individuals in their cancer journey.

story:
Las Pelucas son elaboradas por un grupo de mujeres sobrevivientes que llamamos Las Tejedoras, claro, antes necesitaríamos cabello e insumos para poder elaborar una Peluca . El cabello lo recibimos como donación por parte de personas de nuestra región, al recibir este cabello lo clasificamos y almacenamos y luego cuando recibimos una solicitud, las Tejedoras elaboran una peluca de acuerdo a las necesidades de la paciente. Cuando una peluca  ha sido elaborada, esta es donada a la paciente a manera de préstamo, para que cuando ya no la necesite, la peluca pueda seguir con su ciclo solidario.

The oncologic wigs are made by a group of survivors women called “Las Tejedoras” , of course, before we would need hair and supplies  to fabricate an oncologic  wig . Hair is received as a donation from people in our region,once we get the hair, we classify it and store it. Then, when a request is received, “Las Tejedoras” produce ​​a wig according to the patient’s needs. When a great oncologic wig has been prepared, it is donated to the patient as a loan, so then when the wig is no longer needed, it can continue its solidarity cycle.

 

 

Las integrantes del Banco de Pelucas (Voluntarias) son mujeres, en su mayoría sobrevivientes de cáncer o que actualmente presentan el diagnóstico. Ellas realizan actualmente el tejido de manera manual, sin embargo se espera mejorar el proceso para realizarlo en máquina de coser.

The members of the Bank Wigs ( Volunteers ) are women , most of them are cancer survivors or currently have a diagnosis. They performed the wigs manually, however it is expected to improve the making process by using sewing machines.

Con TU Aporte, buscamos abrir la primera sede del Banco Solidario de Pelucas Oncológicas, también hacer que esta sea una opción laboral para mujeres sobrevivientes, y así poder brindar este servicio a un mayor número de pacientes en nuestra región, y porque no, en nuestro país.

With your contribution , we seek to open the first solidary bank seat of Cancer Wig , also we are hoping to make this work an option for survivors women, thus provide this service to a bigger number of patients in our region , and why not, in our country.

En Colombia toda mujer de cualquier edad que padezca diagnóstico de cualquier tipo de cáncer, no importa la entidad de salud a la que se encuentre afiliada puede adquirir una peluca oncológica donada.

In Colombia every woman of any age who suffer diagnosis of any type of cancer , no matter the health entity to which it is affiliated, can purchase a oncology wig donated.

En este momento necesitamos mayores ingresos para poder llegar a capacitar mas personas y conseguir mas insumos, y asi poder llegar a elaborar muchas mas pelucas oncológicas. Tambien necesitamos hacernos mas conocidos a nivel nacional, para que asi mas personas conozcan sobre este proyecto y puedan solictar una peluca oncológica.

In this moment we need more income to reach and teach more people to weave , so we can reach elaborate more oncology wigs . We also need to become better known nationally, so that more people know about this project and to quotation request an oncology wig.We also invite you to share this campaign on your Facebook and twitter , the more people become aware of our campaign and how they can help more people we can help .

 

¿QUÉ ES FUNCANCER?

Somos una fundación sin ánimo de lucro, que se ha dedicado a ayudar a las personas (adult@s y niñ@s) con cáncer, de bajos recursos socioeconómicos de todo el suroccidente colombiano.

Tambien te invitamos a compartir esta campaña en tu Facebook y twitter, Entre mas personas se den cuenta de nuestra campaña y como pueden ayudar, A mas personas podremos ayudar.

Compartir tambien es ayudar.

Share is also Helping .

story:
My Drive

As a kid I suffered from Asthma for over six years without having a clue of what caused my constant difficulty in breathing. Being from an African background where almost everything was linked to having a diabolical cause, no one bothered taking me to see a doctor, and this was influenced heavily by the financial status of my family; we just couldn't afford paying to see a doctor. My then suffering all would have been avoided or reduced if I had the luxury of seeking medical counsel.

Our First Trial

With my knowledge of the Tech world and having two sisters who are doctors, I decided to take up the challenge and I built a simple website that allowed users seek medical advice from my two doctor sisters via LiveChat, Audio and Video call.

This website was up for two months before my both doctor sisters had to leave the firm for a "real job", because the site was 100% user and Ad Free therefore, was generating zero $ in revenue. During this period, we had over three thousand users / visitors. This result was gotten with zero Advertising / Publicity.

What does DOCTANCY Need?

  • The major challenge we had during the two month period of functionality was insufficient and unavailability of consultants. The website was not monetized and we couldn't pay the doctors on ground and they had to leave. Getting medical doctors/consultants on the DOCTANCY team is one major area funds received from this campaign will be directed to.
  • A well developed and easy to use Mobile App will be developed and building an upgrade of the previous web version is priority too.
  • We plan on gradually expanding into building hospitals around the world, but this a long term goal. For the start, some of the funds from this campaign will go into building one or two small DOCTANCY clinics in two countries.

Why You Should Back DOCTANCY

Being a Backer of this innovation is both an investment and also an act of charity.  You will help reduce the number of preventable deaths that happens around the world. 

Backing DOCTANCY means you really want to see an improvement in health care systems, especially with people who can't afford paying a doctor's consultation fee and people who are very busy that they can't create time from their busy schedule to see a doctor.

We want everyone to get on this, that is why we have our perks starting off at very affordable levels.

You get real value for your money with our unbeatable perks. 

DOCTANCY WILL

Affiliate with hospitals and make referrals. After consultation, depending on the severity of the case, DOCTANCY doctors will refer patients to nearby hospitals for further check ups. We will get hospitals to sign up with us and refer patients to them.

Ambulance services especially in African countries are almost in extinction. DOCTANCY plans on having our doctors mobile with emergency ambulance services in two countries.

Other Ways You Can Help

SPREAD THE WORD! Tell someone about DOCTANCY 

 

INVEST IN DOCTANCY! HELP IMPROVE HEALTH CARE  TODAY!

story:
PipyFlash is a Pulsating light cockroach repellent. Prevent cockroaches from infesting your home!

Use PipyFlash in your sink, wash basin, bidet, bath, shower floor, air vents, and any kind of drainage.

Through the ingenious and effective system to light button, PipyFlash intimidates cockroaches discouraging them from back pipes of homes.

PipyFlash does not use chemicals, it’s easily installed and is used as a drainage standard plug for drainage

Shower/Drainage adaptor

The Shower/Drainage adaptor can be used in most of the drains with openings larger than 3.0mm

                   



Stiff adaptor

The stiff adaptor can be used in case the central part of the drain is covered by objects such as filters and/or pins

                    

 

Soft adaptor

The soft adaptor can be used in most of the plugs’ pins thanks to its flexible mounting holes

            


Screw adaptors

Screw adaptors (provided in two different sizes) allow PipyFlash to be directly installed onto the plug, as a replacement of the central screw

             


Optical Fiber Probe

The optical fiber probe can be used on virtually all drains, ducts and crevices that have openings larger than 5.0mm. Safe for both indoor and outdoor use

           


For your sink, bathtub, or shower.

For bathroom and kitchen drains alike, no matter their shape.Thanks to the smart optical fiber probe, PipyFlash can be fitted to virtually all household drain pipes including non-conventional indoor or outdoor drainage configurations, even crevices or cracks

           




“Cockroaches are among the most common pests in many homes and other buildings.

Cock- roaches can sometimes play a role as carriers of intestinal diseases, such as diarrhoea, dysentery, typhoid fever, cholera and viral diseases

In addition, they carry the eggs of parasitic worms and may cause allergic reactions, including dermatitis, itching, swelling of the eyelids and more serious respiratory conditions

At night they search for food in kitchens, food storage places, rubbish bins, sewers and drains”

World Healthcare Organization
Cockroaches
Unhygienic scavengers in human settlements

Cockroaches are nocturnal insects, notoriously adverse to light. Illuminating access routes to the home can therefore act as an effective repellent.

Cockroaches are extremely intelligent, agile, and have a very short reproductive cycle.

Once inside….well … at that point only chemicals can  exterminate them. Disinfectants, insecticides, bleach and other poisons.

It is much better to take preventative measures and stop them from entering the home in the first place!

How do Cockroaches react to light? And how to check it?
Behavioural tests have sorted very encouraging results.
Here is THE ARENA!


PipyFlash: How cockroach react to light - Initial Test


PipyFlash: How cockroach react to light - Vertical crawling test


PipyFlash: How cockroach react to light - Horizontal crawling test

PipyFlash: How cockroach react to light - Front view test


PipyFlash uses the finest materials. Finished in soft touch, equipped with a micro PCB, waterproofing rubber seal, and alkaline batteries with months of life





What is PipyFlash?

PipyFlash is the first cockroach repellent that uses a pulsating light and entirely chemical free.

Why do cockroaches like our home?

Because they have adapted to our habitat and our homes offer them a wonderful living environment. Food is readily available and pipes give them access to come and go as they please.

Will PipyFlash kill the cockroaches?

No, PipyFlash will not kill the cockroach, rather using a pulsating light will act on the cockroaches visual system and force them to find another home to dwell in. Cockroaches are nocturnal insects, notoriously adverse to light. Illuminating access routes to the home can therefore be an effective repellent.

Will PipyFlash also function on other kinds of insects?

No, it is specially designed to act on the cockroaches visual system.

Will PipyFlash cause any issues when used with my drains?

No, PipyFlash will not obstruct the drainage nor damage it in anyway. PipyFlash has been designed to fit most drainage systems with a waterproof lens housing to ensure it works every time. It can be used as a normal plug or can be attached to most commercial plugs. PipyFlash kit comes with 5 versatile adaptors that help you fit to any configuration.

Is it safe to use PipyFlash?

Yes, it is sustainable and environmentally friendly and completely chemically free.

When will you ship and from where?

Shipping from Hong Kong will begin in October, 2016 by EMS surface mail.

How do I get in touch with your team?

You can message us here or email us at enquiry@pastoso.com

I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?

Email support@indiegogo.com

I would like a refund. How do I do this?

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

story:
Reasons To Support This Project: 

  • CryoSculptor is more than just a Cold Adaption or Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT) activation tool, which just shrinks fat cells
  • Ours is a DIY cryolysis system similar to "Cool Sculpting" which destroys stubborn fat cells permanently
  • CrySculptor sculpts your Waist, Back, Thighs, Ankles, Arms, Chin or anywhere else you apply the bands
  • Our complete system is a fraction of the cost of just one "Cool Sculpting" session (multiple sessions are typically needed for successful results)
  • We use a special Cryo Gel in our ice packs to get maximum results and longer cold transference times
  • Heavy duty velcro loop material is used on the pouches for maximum adjustment and to eliminate shifting
  • Our bands are made of a thick 3mm premium neoprene U-Loop material (which has excellent insulate properties) and finished sides and edges 
  • We offer the FIRST and ONLY Chin sculptor for home use
  • CryoSculptor is the absolute best Value for the money
  • A cooling vest add-on option for your waist belt (which will give you the option to do cold adapt training at any time) is already in the works
  • All of our belts can be used for sports injuries and/or aching muscles with maximum insulation
  • CryoSculptor is being offered at a lower price and will work more effectively than piecing your own DIY belt together
  • Our belts are made 100% locally in the Seattle Washington area so your contribution will help support American businesses
  • Our Complete Deluxe System is Only $189 for the first 25 contributors
  • Waist belt alone is only $49 for the first 25 contributors. 

             

It comes down to science. Fat cells freeze at higher temperatures than other surrounding tissues. The cryolysis technique safely delivers cooling to gently and effectively target the fat cells underneath the skin. 
The treated fat cells are crystallized (frozen), and then die. Over time, your body naturally processes the fat and flushes these dead cells, leaving a more toned and sculpted you.
There is a distinct difference between cold adaptation which activates brown adipose tissue (BAT) and cryolysis. 

When you increase cold exposure to your body you will activate brown cells as an energy source to stay warm and shrink white fat cells as their source of cellular fuel. But when you stop the cold exposure the brown fat cells are no longer active. And when you eat again the white fat cells will just "plump" right back to their original size.  

So now you have this yo-yo effect, just like with most diets. And unless you are willing to always feel cold, it is not going to give you the results you are looking for. 

Science shows how we will continue to burn calories for a period after cold exposure due to the body's attempt to regulate the core temperature. But it does not continue burning white fat cells days later when you have been keeping yourself toasty and warm. 

This is just common sense. After all, we don't stay nice and thin weeks after a skiing trip. One has to be in the cold continually in order for brown fat to stay activated.

Cryolysis works completely different than any other fat removal system. Your white fat cells are completely destroyed and removed from your body over a few weeks time. GONE permanently, not shrunken down waiting to plump up again when the cold exposure is gone. 

With cryolysis the cells are removed naturally and as long as you do not exceed the calories needed to maintain your body weight, then you will not create more white fat cells. 

Independent of ongoing cold exposure, the fat is gone because you froze it off naturally without invasive surgery or high out of pocket expense.

This is why we are so excited to bring the first complete DIY cryolysis system to crowdfunding. People now have the opportunity to literally save thousands of dollars on removing unwanted fat, and can do it in the comfort of their own homes.   


        

There are multiple benefits to cold conditioning including boosting your immune system, improving circulation, decreasing pain, increasing testosterone and sperm levels and aiding with depression and weight loss. 

It's usually recommended to take a cold shower, go for a winter walk, or lay in the snow to become cold adapted. The CryoSculptor system is far more tolerable and can be done indoors all year round. 

One CryoSculptor user commented that "it begins to feel like you have a buffer around your body as if you are covered with a double paned layer of glass." 

Becoming more cold adapted also leads to a more active lifestyle during the cold winter months. Athletes can use the belts during training to lean up, burn calories and become cold adapted for sports that are performed in cooler temperatures.

       

In an interview with NBC Sports, Phelps was quoted as saying that he ate approximately 12,000 calories per day during the 2008 Summer Olympics. "This included a breakfast of three fried egg sandwiches, a five-egg omelet, three pieces of french toast, three pancakes and grits. Lunch was typically a pound of pasta and two sandwiches. For dinner, he would eat an entire large pizza and a pound of pasta".

The reason he could eat so much and stay so lean?  Besides the obvious, burning calories while swimming, he was in water that was below his core body temperature of 98.6 degrees. We naturally burn more calories trying to keep our bodies warm and the cold temperatures cause our bodies to create more brown fat cells.

Unlike white fat cells which store calories, brown fat burns energy and produces heat. 
Unfortunately, most of us do not have much brown fat. Babies actually have more brown fat than adults, which is why they are able to stay warm without much natural insulation. 
Most of our brown fat is lost by the time we reach adulthood and women tend to have more brown fat then men. People with lower BMI's (Body Mass Indexes) also tend to have more brown fat. 
Brown fat is activated by cold and scientists are now finding that our bodies can produce more brown fat cells the more we are subjected to colder temperatures.
Please understand this could take a long time and REQUIRES you to be cold for months in order to possibly create any brown adipose tissue, not hours, days or weeks as they might have you believe and even then there is no guarantee you will ever be able to create brown fat cells.  
We want happy customers and will not tell you something unless we know it to be completely true.  We believe in complete honesty and transparency to ensure the long term growth of any business.
They are even trying to formulate a drug that will convert white fat cells into what they are calling beige fat cells. But then what? You have to stay cold to get any benefits.  Remove the cold and you get no results. 

Cold adaptation has a lot of benefits, but it will NOT eliminate white fat cells permanently the way cryolysis does:

        

It is a proven fact that children have developed dimples from eating popsicles. The term is called popsicle panniculitis, which is "inflammation of the subcutaneous fat after prolonged exposure to cold". 

It was this discovery that led to the idea of cryolysis. If children can permanently freeze away the fat in their cheeks, then it stood to reason that by applying cold to fat in other areas of the body we could also eliminate the fat in those areas. And we have created a system to do just that, freeze away the fat permanently!

Until now, the most commonly used treatment for permanent fat reduction has been liposuction, an invasive procedure that costs thousands of dollars and has significant risks and side effects. 
Another increasingly popular option is called "Cool Sculpting", which is essentially an in-office cryolysis treatment. This procedure has fewer risks, but equally or more expensive than liposuction. Here are some typical examples:  

AND HERE IS WHAT WE HAVE TO OFFER YOU!:

The cost above indicates retail pricing. We are offering smaller packages in our perks section. Find out how you can support this campaign and get a significant discount off of retail pricing.

           

Aside from eliminating unwanted fat, the CryoSculptor belts have other great benefits. You can use them for sports injuries, to keep you cool in the hot summer months, or reduce swelling from diabetes or other medical conditions. 

Because of the flexible design of our cool packs, the cold is distributed evenly around the applied area. We have designed the belts to fit targeted areas where most of us store unwanted fat, but they can be used anywhere on the body (i.e. criss-crossed around the chest, the back of the neck, arms, knees, elbows, etc).

EARLY PROTOTYPE DESIGNS:

   FINAL PROTOTYPES:

  

                           

     



First I would like to congratulate all of the previous cold application crowd funding campaigns that have come before us.

A little about how the CryoSculptor came about....

I started working on this project back in 2012, and I thought that maybe I had missed my opportunity to successfully launch this product. 

I knew that I had a great product, but had to put things on hold for over a year while our family dealt with a personal loss. I watched as other campaigns marketed the brown fat and cold adapt benefits. 

My belts covered those benefits and more. I also began working on prototyping a vest attachment (criss-cross pattern) shoulder belt that would connect to our CrySculptor waist belt to provide more cold exposure. 

Eventually this will provide the best system possible, but we will still retain the smaller CryoSculptor belts for the arms, ankles, thighs, chin and such.

When I looked at how I had personally been using the belts and what my lifestyle was like, I realized that people might be a little let down with their results. 

The reason is this, activating what ever brown fat cells we may have would burn calories, But you have to be COLD, to the point of shivering in order to get MAXIMUM results. Many people, including myself, will NOT continue this ongoing and will likely be disappointed with just BAT activation alone.

The reality is that we will continue to develop more white fat cells as long as we eat unhealthy and not exercise. 

Just like liposuction, the fat is gone, but we can easily produce more. This is why it is so important to not only become cold adapted, but to continue to use the belts as needed. This is what I have done for over a year and I'm still toned. I don't have to be cold all the time and neither will you.

Again, cryolysis causes cell death. Cold adaptation and brown fat activation do NOT!

What if you could first rid yourself of the fat deposits around your waist, back, arms, ankles and chin?...

Then if and when you decide to continue with cold adaptation training and Brown Adipose Tissue activation, you now have even less white fat to burn so you will stay leaner with even less effort.

Remember, there is a BIG difference between burning fat cells and destroying them permanently.

When I finally got rid of that belly fat I noticed that I then started to lose all of the fat along my ribs and obliques. My back was getting more toned as well.

I also started to wear more ice packs around my lower back and sides or what some people refer to as "muffin top".

I wanted to destroy the fat cells not just burn them.

What's the difference?

When you burn fat cells you just shrink them down, you don't remove them in any way. They just get smaller until you fill them back up and unless you change your diet and/or exercise, you will gain some of the fat back.

If you destroy the cell, then it is gone permanently!

"Honey I Shrunk The Fat Cell" down, but don't feed it after midnight because it will turn back into a fat gremlin cell!

Seriously, I hope this makes sense to you. Since I started using the belts I genuinely eat what I want (usually up until right before I go to bed). I have friends and family who can all attest to my eating habits as well as their astonishment as to how I remain in great shape.

I have not exercised much over the last few years because of a shoulder injury and just dealing with the ups and downs of every day life. I continue to eat whatever I want and manage to stay lean as ever. I seldom wear the belt anymore and yet I stay lean.

It's highly possible that when I create a new fat cell because of my diet or overeating, my body consumes it, burns it, then shrivels it down like a raisin. 

Every so often I will wear the belt again and destroy those shriveled up fat cells permanently!

Once you start to see results and how easily you attained them, you will become more motivated to eat better and lead a healthier lifestyle.

I have become highly cold adapted from the CryoSculptor belts and am usually seen without a shirt well into the fall/winter months here in Washington. I enjoy feeling the sun on my skin when ever it's out!

Become what you envision and you will develop the habits to maintain that reality!

             

             (Paul Galaviz, age 52, Founder of the CryoSculptor, November, 2015)

It was never this easy for me to lose that belly fat and see the muscle definition that was hidden underneath. My partner, Cristina, is also seeing similar great results:

              

       (Cristina Leveque, age 47, CryoSculptor Artistic Director, November, 2015)

The CryoSculptor belts also function as high-quality cold compresses. Unlike plastic bags, they do not leak. They will also stay in place and can be applied directly to the skin since the pouches add a protective layer.

You will find that the best part about using the CryoSculptor belts is knowing that you're removing any unwanted fat that you may have put on over the years with little to no effort.  

Sure, I eat unhealthy sometimes, but I'm in great shape for a 52 year old! After all of the years of crazy diets and workout routines, I was never able to lose that stubborn fat. Now it's gone, simply by applying gel ice packs to my waist. It's that easy!  Plus I saved thousands of dollars in the process.

The Free Dictionary-Cryolysis

Wikipedia-Cryolipolysis

Scientific American-Supercharging Brown Fat
The New England Journal of Medicine-Cold Activated BAT in Healthy Men
Canadian Journal of Physiology and Pharmacology-Nonshivering Thermogenesis in Rats
PubMed.gov-Cryolipolysis for Reduction of Excess Adipose Tissue
PubMed.gov-Cryolipolysis for Subcutaneous Fat Layer Reduction
PubMed.Gov-Cryolipolysis for Noninvasive Fat Cell Destruction: Initial Results from a Pig Model
Wiley.com-Selective Cryolysis: A Novel Method of Non-Invasive Fat Removal

Campaign Updates:

CoolSculpting Review By Dr. OZ


Keep in mind our belts will do the same thing and you can do your entire stomach and love handles, plus lower back all at the same time in one hour, not multiple visits like cool sculpting requires.  Plus, cool sculpting costs start at $750 per area for just one treatment.

Remember if you gain fat back down the road, it will cost you another $750 to do the area again!  With CryoSculptor, it's a one time investment. The waist belt is only $49 for the first 25 supporters!

Here Is Another New Video On CoolSculpting
story_txt:
Reasons To Support This Project: 

CryoSculptor is more than just a Cold Adaption or Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT) activation tool, which just shrinks fat cells
Ours is a DIY cryolysis system similar to "Cool Sculpting" which destroys stubborn fat cells permanently
CrySculptor sculpts your Waist, Back, Thighs, Ankles, Arms, Chin or anywhere else you apply the bands
Our complete system is a fraction of the cost of just one "Cool Sculpting" session (multiple sessions are typically needed for successful results)
We use a special Cryo Gel in our ice packs to get maximum results and longer cold transference times
Heavy duty velcro loop material is used on the pouches for maximum adjustment and to eliminate shifting
Our bands are made of a thick 3mm premium neoprene U-Loop material (which has excellent insulate properties) and finished sides and edges 
We offer the FIRST and ONLY Chin sculptor for home use
CryoSculptor is the absolute best Value for the money
A cooling vest add-on option for your waist belt (which will give you the option to do cold adapt training at any time) is already in the works
All of our belts can be used for sports injuries and/or aching muscles with maximum insulation
CryoSculptor is being offered at a lower price and will work more effectively than piecing your own DIY belt together
Our belts are made 100% locally in the Seattle Washington area so your contribution will help support American businesses
Our Complete Deluxe System is Only $189 for the first 25 contributors
Waist belt alone is only $49 for the first 25 contributors. 





             
It comes down to science. Fat cells freeze at higher temperatures than other surrounding tissues. The cryolysis technique safely delivers cooling to gently and effectively target the fat cells underneath the skin. The treated fat cells are crystallized (frozen), and then die. Over time, your body naturally processes the fat and flushes these dead cells, leaving a more toned and sculpted you.There is a distinct difference between cold adaptation which activates brown adipose tissue (BAT) and cryolysis. 
When you increase cold exposure to your body you will activate brown cells as an energy source to stay warm and shrink white fat cells as their source of cellular fuel. But when you stop the cold exposure the brown fat cells are no longer active. And when you eat again the white fat cells will just "plump" right back to their original size.  
So now you have this yo-yo effect, just like with most diets. And unless you are willing to always feel cold, it is not going to give you the results you are looking for. 
Science shows how we will continue to burn calories for a period after cold exposure due to the body's attempt to regulate the core temperature. But it does not continue burning white fat cells days later when you have been keeping yourself toasty and warm. 
This is just common sense. After all, we don't stay nice and thin weeks after a skiing trip. One has to be in the cold continually in order for brown fat to stay activated.
Cryolysis works completely different than any other fat removal system. Your white fat cells are completely destroyed and removed from your body over a few weeks time. GONE permanently, not shrunken down waiting to plump up again when the cold exposure is gone. 
With cryolysis the cells are removed naturally and as long as you do not exceed the calories needed to maintain your body weight, then you will not create more white fat cells. 
Independent of ongoing cold exposure, the fat is gone because you froze it off naturally without invasive surgery or high out of pocket expense.
This is why we are so excited to bring the first complete DIY cryolysis system to crowdfunding. People now have the opportunity to literally save thousands of dollars on removing unwanted fat, and can do it in the comfort of their own homes.   

        

There are multiple benefits to cold conditioning including boosting your immune system, improving circulation, decreasing pain, increasing testosterone and sperm levels and aiding with depression and weight loss. 
It's usually recommended to take a cold shower, go for a winter walk, or lay in the snow to become cold adapted. The CryoSculptor system is far more tolerable and can be done indoors all year round. 

One CryoSculptor user commented that "it begins to feel like you have a buffer around your body as if you are covered with a double paned layer of glass." 
Becoming more cold adapted also leads to a more active lifestyle during the cold winter months. Athletes can use the belts during training to lean up, burn calories and become cold adapted for sports that are performed in cooler temperatures.






       

In an interview with NBC Sports, Phelps was quoted as saying that he ate approximately 12,000 calories per day during the 2008 Summer Olympics. "This included a breakfast of three fried egg sandwiches, a five-egg omelet, three pieces of french toast, three pancakes and grits. Lunch was typically a pound of pasta and two sandwiches. For dinner, he would eat an entire large pizza and a pound of pasta".
The reason he could eat so much and stay so lean?  Besides the obvious, burning calories while swimming, he was in water that was below his core body temperature of 98.6 degrees. We naturally burn more calories trying to keep our bodies warm and the cold temperatures cause our bodies to create more brown fat cells.


Unlike white fat cells which store calories, brown fat burns energy and produces heat. 
Unfortunately, most of us do not have much brown fat. Babies actually have more brown fat than adults, which is why they are able to stay warm without much natural insulation. 
Most of our brown fat is lost by the time we reach adulthood and women tend to have more brown fat then men. People with lower BMI's (Body Mass Indexes) also tend to have more brown fat. 
Brown fat is activated by cold and scientists are now finding that our bodies can produce more brown fat cells the more we are subjected to colder temperatures.
Please understand this could take a long time and REQUIRES you to be cold for months in order to possibly create any brown adipose tissue, not hours, days or weeks as they might have you believe and even then there is no guarantee you will ever be able to create brown fat cells.  
We want happy customers and will not tell you something unless we know it to be completely true.  We believe in complete honesty and transparency to ensure the long term growth of any business.
They are even trying to formulate a drug that will convert white fat cells into what they are calling beige fat cells. But then what? You have to stay cold to get any benefits.  Remove the cold and you get no results. 


Cold adaptation has a lot of benefits, but it will NOT eliminate white fat cells permanently the way cryolysis does:










        
It is a proven fact that children have developed dimples from eating popsicles. The term is called popsicle panniculitis, which is "inflammation of the subcutaneous fat after prolonged exposure to cold". 
It was this discovery that led to the idea of cryolysis. If children can permanently freeze away the fat in their cheeks, then it stood to reason that by applying cold to fat in other areas of the body we could also eliminate the fat in those areas. And we have created a system to do just that, freeze away the fat permanently!

Because of the flexible design of our cool packs, the cold is distributed evenly around the applied area. We have designed the belts to fit targeted areas where most of us store unwanted fat, but they can be used anywhere on the body (i.e. criss-crossed around the chest, the back of the neck, arms, knees, elbows, etc).

story:
Who are you?

Biohacker alias "Mad Scientist".  I do not represent any company or organization.
This is a nonprofit project open for everyone to be able to use and craft at home.
Reason to ask funding was to pay any debt generated for any kind of material I used plus to support and fund other active projects that I been developing in the recent years.
Your contribution will make me Release a video showing you how to craft and of course the ingredients to craft too. 

Do you have the Cure?

Yes, we have how to:
a) Prevent it
b) Stop it
c) Start to cure it
d) Cure it


Why that much Expensive?
Yes, I know it and thats the problem.  The main objective allow people to craft the cure at home to save money, but to prepare and develop a process like that took time and money.
We finish this last step and your funds now will help me in other projects.

This are other of our projects  :
> Full Dive Virtual Reality
> Cure for HIV ( we have already a treatment )
> Lowering Weight without hurting your body or nature (10 to 30kg )
> How to Grow a Strong, Healthy and Superior Child ( from pregnacy ) ( includes the most natural treatment ever made... almost)

So what do I get if I support you?
You will be able to craft your own prevention or cure for cancer. We will make it public all the ways to craft when we reach our Goal or at least 75%. You can support with your social media too. 
If you are interested in other of my projects, send me a private message.

I do not have money to contribute, What can I do?
Pretty simple, make noise, tweet it, share this in fb, tell people about us.
Remember maybe there is other people wanting, waiting or even needing it.
Use all your tools and do not forget to leave a comment here to cheer.
If you do have family or know someone with cancer and no money then share maybe someone with money will donate and at the end everyone will get the cure so your effort works for you.

#curecancernow
#preventcancernow
#saveusfromcancer
#savetheworld
#curetheworldcancer


Risks & Challenges

We do not have any risk. we already know it works.

Our only challenge is to find the way for all people to make it at home. *solved*

UPDATE:  We got several pm's about perks prizes and after talking it we will tell how to do it in your home. Still we hope you can donate while we work in a way to make you able to craft your own cure for your cancer from home. 

UPDATE 2: Last process have been developed. From Medine (drug)  to Sumplement and from Suplement to Homemade. 

Hope you can help us to Help you.

story:
(MSRP $99 USD)

Indie is about self-representation, highlighting your uniqueness and following your own compass.

This pipe comes in two colours; teal & black or burnt orange & black, both with a stainless steel band. The first 100 Indie pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).

 

 

(MSRP $139 USD)

A word commonly used in Australasia for a person who musters or rounds up livestock. Our Musterer pipe is reflective of the stories and characters of the New Zealand High Country.

The Musterer unites our highly engineered internal mechanism with our ergonomically shaped pipe housing.   The first 100 Musterer pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).

 

(MSRP $249 USD)

Pappy pipe is in homage to my grandfathers and made with a traditional wooden bowl. While we don't endorse tobacco pipe smoking, we do love the nostalgia of time spent with extended family and some of the rituals from earlier times.

The Pappy pipe bowl housing is CNC engineered and then hand-finished so that each wooden pipe has its own individuality.  The wood is high-quality podocarp hardwood, sourced in New Zealand (read more in our environmental section below).  The first 100 Pappy pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).

 

This image shows my Grandfather on the left and my Great Grandfather centre right, with pipe prominently on display! Photo taken early 1940's England.

 

(MSRP $45 USD)

After several years of investigation and trialing, our aroma solutions have been designed to give you a pleasurable aromatic experience. We know how amazing the olfactory glands in your nose can be for detecting low, medium and high scented variations. Smell memory also plays an important role in linking to our past experiences and influencing our mood in the present. 

With this in mind, our aroma solutions have been developed to include high-grade natural food extracts, combined with essential oils and natural carrier oils to achieve the desired result. Calm Pipe gives you a wonderful pipe experience without fear or guilt.

We offer two aroma packs:

Our Manuka wood chips have anti-microbial properties, making them a perfect way to carry aromas in the pipe bowl. With every Indiegogo Aroma Pack we provide a complementary tin of Manuka chips and filter pads. 

Using the pipe encourages the act of deep steady breathing, helping to provide relief during times of stress. 

Calm Pipe combines the elements of mindfulness and meditation, acting as a physical cue to remind people to take stock of their day and assisting them to centre body and mind.
 

Calm Pipe uses the power of your own breathing action to drive duel air turbines inside the pipe bowl. It works by drawing fresh air through the pipe into your lungs, while sending a smaller, targeted flow of aromatic air into your nose.  

Calm Pipe is a well-being innovation designed to provide a healthy and rewarding experience for adults across all genders.    

Calm Pipe is not an electronic vaporisation or heated device of any kind. The lack of smoke/vapour, nicotine and avoidance of addictive substances, sets this pipe apart from others.  We deliberately leave our aromatic solutions at room temperature, as super-heating can change the chemical constitution, damaging good properties and creating harmful ones, such as aldehydes. 

 You never need to worry about batteries or charging making Calm Pipe the perfect choice when hiking, traveling or away from a power source for any length of time.  The aromas are personalised to the user, which means the pipe is suitable for use in a variety of situations such as your morning commute,  cafés, movie theatres and restaurants.

Our Family - filming the Calm Pipe Video
 

Kia ora and Hello,

My name is Scott and I’m the inventor and founder of Calm Pipe™. 

The original concept for this idea came from a desire to help smokers find a substitute to tobacco addiction. After several initial designs, I saw the wider potential for helping myself and others to breath well and relax, by targeting aromas into the nose rather than the lungs.

This approach merged with my nostalgic appreciation of tobacco pipes and gave rise to the name Calm Pipe™. 

The internal pipe mechanism was first patented in 2013, with further patents awarded through the International Patent Treaty process. In recent years, a number of design iterations have been created and tested using 3D rapid prototyping, to make an efficient and portable pipe; with assistance from a product designer and former aviation engineer. 

We've received some excellent feedback from a wide range of people to improve the form and function of the pipes and our aromas.  We have completed our final prototypes and are now entering the production stage. 

New Zealand's natural environment has also provided a positive influence during the development of this innovation. 

I believe Calm Pipe will foster improved breathing and relaxing, while encouraging calmer clearer thinking...bringing back the best of the past and breathing in the new. 

Your support will be a vital part in making this happen.

Thanks,

Scott   

New Zealand Southern Alps

 

Pappy, our wooden pipe is CNC engineered and then hand-finished. Due to the additional finishing work for each Pappy pipe, we have limited the number of wooden pipe rewards in our first production run. 

Calm Pipe is made up of 41 high-quality components. We've produced multiple working prototypes and have carefully selected our manufacturing suppliers, so that each pipe can be delivered with confidence.

Throughout the manufacturing process, we will keep all of our awesome backers up to date with regular posts so that everyone can be part of the project and feel the excitement.

The pipe is designed with a split-shell so the internal mechanism and components can be accessed for maintenance or cleaning. Each pipe will include a product booklet with product care instructions.

We are following the recommended food industry safety standards for our use of natural food flavours, as well as the large body of research/guidance on selecting essential oils and their respective concentrations.

Each 25 ml bottle, at a rate of two applications/day, is estimated to last about 20 to 30 days.

Calm Pipe is serious about ensuring its products and their life cycles have limited impact on the environment. We plan to offset some of the energy and resources we use as a business. Assuming our campaign reaches the pledge target, we will adopt the initiatives stated in the environmental commitments section, as our starting point towards being part of a circular rather than linear economy.   

Long-lasting design

We have used high-quality components and materials in order to achieve accuracy and efficiency for the device, and to provide a longer product life span. This raises the overall cost of our pipes when compared to cheaper options, but aligns with our philosophy of delivering a high quality product that will last. The injection moulded parts in our pipes will be food safe and BPA free and enable extended durability. If 3D printing of the more technical parts is required, we will use only "tough standard" resins which are both durable and low emitting.

Reusability and recyclability

For now, we will stay as much as possible with recyclable food grade plastic, but going forward we intend to focus our R&D around bio-based plastics, so that long-term our products will breakdown a lot faster when exposed to natural composting processes. In the meantime, our customers will be supplied with a long-lasting pipe with instructions on recycling.

Sustainable materials

We have explored the options currently available for bio-based plastic; however, the plastics industry is currently stuck between existing recyclable plastic and emerging bio-based (corn starch etc) plastics which most often will only breakdown in a less accessible "commercial composter" and actually contaminate regular recyclable plastic. Please let us know if you have any other ideas on sustainable plastic options.

Our Manuka wood chips are sustainably harvested and kiln treated (without chemicals), making them suitable to add to your household compost.  Our filter pads are also made from a non-bleached compostable material. 

Environmentally friendly factories

We want to run an environmentally conscious and ethical business and for this reason we have focused our manufacturing in New Zealand. We will use high quality suppliers for our injection moulding, CNC engineering and many other supply services, even though the related costs may be higher than larger producing nations. We shall still purchase some specialty parts offshore, but want to develop a productive business, that looks after its work team and gives back to the environment and the community. 

Sustainable fulfillment and distribution

We are making sure our packaging is minimal, using recyclable and natural materials where possible and plan to use packaging bags made from compostable corn starch.

Our decision to use New Zealand podocarp hardwood for the bowl of our Pappy pipe, is not just for the fantastic quality of this timber, but because we want to create an inter-generational value for these magnificent trees and know exactly where the wood is coming from. In New Zealand, many podocarp forests were clear-felled both pre and post-European colonisation, extending right up until the 1980s, for lower value purposes; unfortunately the same pattern still continues across the world.

For Calm Pipe, if sustainably harvested supplies of the hardwoods are not available, our approach will be to source selected sections from self-fallen trees in appropriate areas, given we can make many pipes from a relatively small amount of timber. This approach is better for the environment, our economy and for future generations, creating the long term incentive to plant more trees.

We need your help to make some noise and get this innovation off the ground.

  • Please share with your friends.
  • We'd love to know what you think ?  Share your ideas by commenting on our social media pages.
story_txt:
(MSRP $99 USD)
Indie is about self-representation, highlighting your uniqueness and following your own compass.
This pipe comes in two colours; teal & black or burnt orange & black, both with a stainless steel band. The first 100 Indie pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).

 

 

(MSRP $139 USD)
A word commonly used in Australasia for a person who musters or rounds up livestock. Our Musterer pipe is reflective of the stories and characters of the New Zealand High Country.
The Musterer unites our highly engineered internal mechanism with our ergonomically shaped pipe housing.   The first 100 Musterer pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).
 


(MSRP $249 USD)
Pappy pipe is in homage to my grandfathers and made with a traditional wooden bowl. While we don't endorse tobacco pipe smoking, we do love the nostalgia of time spent with extended family and some of the rituals from earlier times.
The Pappy pipe bowl housing is CNC engineered and then hand-finished so that each wooden pipe has its own individuality.  The wood is high-quality podocarp hardwood, sourced in New Zealand (read more in our environmental section below).  The first 100 Pappy pipes sold will come with a certificate signed by the inventor to mark the global launch of Calm Pipe (1/100).
 

This image shows my Grandfather on the left and my Great Grandfather centre right, with pipe prominently on display! Photo taken early 1940's England.
 




(MSRP $45 USD)
After several years of investigation and trialing, our aroma solutions have been designed to give you a pleasurable aromatic experience. We know how amazing the olfactory glands in your nose can be for detecting low, medium and high scented variations. Smell memory also plays an important role in linking to our past experiences and influencing our mood in the present. 
With this in mind, our aroma solutions have been developed to include high-grade natural food extracts, combined with essential oils and natural carrier oils to achieve the desired result. Calm Pipe gives you a wonderful pipe experience without fear or guilt.
We offer two aroma packs:




Our Manuka wood chips have anti-microbial properties, making them a perfect way to carry aromas in the pipe bowl. With every Indiegogo Aroma Pack we provide a complementary tin of Manuka chips and filter pads. 





Using the pipe encourages the act of deep steady breathing, helping to provide relief during times of stress. 

Calm Pipe combines the elements of mindfulness and meditation, acting as a physical cue to remind people to take stock of their day and assisting them to centre body and mind.

 
Calm Pipe uses the power of your own breathing action to drive duel air turbines inside the pipe bowl. It works by drawing fresh air through the pipe into your lungs, while sending a smaller, targeted flow of aromatic air into your nose.  

Calm Pipe is a well-being innovation designed to provide a healthy and rewarding experience for adults across all genders.    

Calm Pipe is not an electronic vaporisation or heated device of any kind. The lack of smoke/vapour, nicotine and avoidance of addictive substances, sets this pipe apart from others.  We deliberately leave our aromatic solutions at room temperature, as super-heating can change the chemical constitution, damaging good properties and creating harmful ones, such as aldehydes. 


 You never need to worry about batteries or charging making Calm Pipe the perfect choice when hiking, traveling or away from a power source for any length of time.  The aromas are personalised to the user, which means the pipe is suitable for use in a variety of situations such as your morning commute,  cafés, movie theatres and restaurants.


Our Family - filming the Calm Pipe Video
 
Kia ora and Hello,
My name is Scott and I’m the inventor and founder of Calm Pipe™. 
The original concept for this idea came from a desire to help smokers find a substitute to tobacco addiction. After several initial designs, I saw the wider potential for helping myself and others to breath well and relax, by targeting aromas into the nose rather than the lungs.
This approach merged with my nostalgic appreciation of tobacco pipes and gave rise to the name Calm Pipe™. 

The internal pipe mechanism was first patented in 2013, with further patents awarded through the International Patent Treaty process. In recent years, a number of design iterations have been created and tested using 3D rapid prototyping, to make an efficient and portable pipe; with assistance from a product designer and former aviation engineer. 
We've received some excellent feedback from a wide range of people to improve the form and function of the pipes and our aromas.  We have completed our final prototypes and are now entering the production stage. 
New Zealand's natural environment has also provided a positive influence during the development of this innovation. 
I believe Calm Pipe will foster improved breathing and relaxing, while encouraging calmer clearer thinking...bringing back the best of the past and breathing in the new. 
Your support will be a vital part in making this happen.
Thanks,
Scott   

New Zealand Southern Alps
 




Pappy, our wooden pipe is CNC engineered and then hand-finished. Due to the additional finishing work for each Pappy pipe, we have limited the number of wooden pipe rewards in our first production run. 
Calm Pipe is made up of 41 high-quality components. We've produced multiple working prototypes and have carefully selected our manufacturing suppliers, so that each pipe can be delivered with confidence.

story:
Please receive our distinguished wishes for health, prosperity and success in everything you do!

     Your courtesy and gratitude ask you to solve together a vital issue for everything that a woman (daughter, wife, grandmother, sister, aunt, and any other woman) can contact accidentally or through a bad intent -voice, a virus whose destruction in the woman's body is often the end of the woman's death, is Human Papilloma Virus (HPV).

       In order to understand the reality and usefulness of our approach, we will focus on some of the official information that shows the dramatic situation of HPV infection among women around the world.



About HUMAN PAPILOMA VIRUS (HPV)

       Official Satatistics shows , every two minutes, a woman dies of cervical cancer and in each year shall be discovered a half million new cases in the world. In Romania, the cervical cancer is the third cause of death by cancer in women, after lung cancer and the breast cancer
     Cervical cancer, caused for the most part of the human Papilloma virus (HPV), is located in the EU in second place, after breast cancer, in statistical neoplasms ,affecting women with 18-45 years old .  In the EU is recorded approximately 33,000 new cases in each year, the number of deaths due to this type of cancer rising to 15,000.
    The statistical informations shows that this type of cancer affect 3 times more women than ovarian cancer. Infection with HPV appears frequently to young women, sexually active, the incidence of cervical cancer be greater but to persons over 35 years, raising the problem of slow progress of viral infection by cancer. According to statistical data, over 66% of the new cases of cancer found in 2005 appear to women between the ages of 35 and 55 years  and approximately 70 percent of the deaths caused by cervical cancer is recorded at women between the ages of 45 and 70 years.

     The Science comes in support of this problem with an anti-HPV vaccine, which is addressed to both women and men aged between 12-25 years old, and which assumes the role to provide prevention in the cervical cancer problem. Appropriate use of this type of prevention might bring in the next few years a significant decline in the incidence of this type of cancer. In the USA, this vaccine has been introduced in the scheme of compulsory vaccination at the age group between 9-12 years.
     The immense drama is that, in the raw material treatment of women, who already have already been infected with the virus HPV , with the stem carcinogenic, the current medicine still doesn't have reasonable solutions. In most cases, the treatment shall be reduced to the surgical intervention of the total histerectomie, which means a a real  psychic and physical trauma, for the woman in question, to her family and for the society.

Epidemiological studies, the clinical and laboratory examinations, have demonstrated while the existence of a causal association between human direct papilomavirusurile (HPV) and cervical cancer in the 99,7% of the cases. In fact, the infection with HPV oncogen required" is "cause of cervical cancer. The progression of the cervical cancer is slow, this type of cancer being preceded by the lesions which can be identified from the time the routine of gynecology.
There are 15 types of HPV which may cause the appearance of a cervical cancer, the most common being types 16, 18, 45, 31, 33, 52, 58, 35, 59, etc. worldwide, 70% of the cases of cervical cancer are based on the infection with the types of HPV 16 and 18.

Most cases of cervical cancer are caused by Human Papiloma Virus infection, and medical statistics show that almost all the adults active from the point of view of sexual contact at least one type of  HPV throughout their lives.
There are more than 150 strains of the virus found, but most do not life threatening. The strains 16 and 18 are responsible, but, with up to 70% of the cases diagnosed cervical cancer.

 

Who we are and what we want


      We are a group of people with various specializations : medicine, social services , technical engineering , legal assistance  which we have international legal and registered a total technology , absolutely non-invasive, which can respond by use, to carry out the complete treatment therapy and implicitly of the virus HPV, so we eliminate  source total cervical cancer.
To achieve this, we want to perform clinical studies, on groups of women as large, infected with strains of  HPV 16 and 18, respecting all international standards in the field of clinical studies and demostrare the effectiveness of therapies and treatments, with technology that we have. Through these studies, at the end , will be able to demonstrate effective clinical technology on which the raw material we have, in the total destruction of the virus, hpv strains 16 and 18, the generating most cervical cancer, toggled by placing at the disposal of all the persons concerned, mode of treatment and the default solution for the treatment with maximum efficiency, with this type of virus.The result of this study will be one designed to resolve this problem of total major level, the life of the women of today, giving them the chance to a new normal life, with family and loved ones, rescuing them from death.

 

How can you help us


We achieved technology and we have gone through all the stages of the international registration.
The costs of the clinical trial, for this type of virus strains HPV with 16 and 18 generators most cervical cancer, exceed 400,000 euros, the amount of which we need imperative to achieve this objective extremely important for the life of the woman.

At this time, we need your financial support that allows us to achieve this clinical study and conduit for joy and peace in the souls of women who have been traumatizate of infestation with this virus, and their famiilor by default.
Your support will be known all over the world,  together with the publication of the outcome of the clinical  study

Please give us your help, for that all have major chance, anytime , to save ours wives, daughters, mothers, aunts and any woman infected with HPV or with predisposition  to the cervical cancer!

Attached to this Letter, you will find our official documents that confirm the existence of an internationally registered technology with which we will make the Study presented.
 

Thank you for your kindness studying this letter and eventual support in achieving a vital goal for your new loved ones.

 

PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL DEVICES TEAM

Below you can find our contact data:

 

PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL DEVICES

Bucuresti-Romania

CUI RO 32767240

COD EUID ROONRC J40/1465/2014

Cont IBAN:

RO 92 INGB 0000 9999 0414 3192   (RON))

RO 12 INGB 0000 9999 0521 8907 (EUR)

 RO 86 INGB 0000 9999 0566 8528 (USD)

SWIFT(BIC) : INGBROBU

Banca : ING BANK

E-mail: professional.medicaldevices@yahoo.ro

              doina_2014@yahoo.com

Tel: 0040724507766 ;     0040723208846
