story:
A 21st-Century Indoor/outdoor environmentally-friendly heating system? It's about time!


Enfin un système de chauffage outdoor et indoor écologique du 21 ème siècle!



Thank you for making the MURCHO the biggest “Pleasure of Living” success of all time on INDIEGOGO!

Merci de faire de MURCHO le plus grand succès du plaisir de vivre de tous les temps sur INDIEGOGO!


An indoor/outdoor environmentally-friendly solar heating system!

Un système solaire de chauffage outdoor et indoor écologique!


Have you ever felt cold…

  • On a restaurant terrace?
  • In your garage/workshop?
  • On your patio?
  • In your open-concept office?
  • At an event in a tent?
  • On the beach at night?
  • In a train or bus station?
  • At a camp ground?
  • At the cottage?

N'avez-vous jamais eu froid...

  • Sur la terrasse d'un restaurant?
  • Dans votre atelier mécanique?
  • Sur votre terrasse à la maison?
  • Dans votre bureau open space?
  • Lors de fêtes dans les tentes?
  • Le soir à la plage?
  • A la gare routière ou celle des trains?
  • Au camping?
  • Dans votre maison de campagne?

Indoor/outdoor heating systems are often expensive, dependent on the main power grid, and harmful to the environment—not to mention difficult to carry around with you!

Tous les systèmes de chauffage outdoor et indoor sont coûteux, dépendants du réseau électrique, sont polluants, non écologiques.... et surtout ils ne sont pas tous transportables pour vos loisirs !


The Murcho is a solar-powered radiant wall. In addition to keeping you warm, it’s an attractive addition to your patio or deck. You can leave it on, day and night, all winter and summer long. As soon as you feel a little cold, turn on your MURCHO to create some heat, effectively and safely.

Murcho fonctionne grâce à la chaleur du soleil! C'est un mur radiant. Il vous chauffera le corps pour votre bien-être. Il est beau et esthétique sur votre terrasse. Vous pouvez le laisser fonctionner jour et nuit, hiver et été. Dès que vous aurez froid, allumez votre MURCHO et vous serez au chaud et sans danger.



  1. Sun warms the solar heating panels
  2. Cold liquid flows to the panels
  3. Heated liquid flows to the MURCHO
  4. The MURCHO heats the environment through radiation
  5. The MURCHO does not create air movement, but uses infrared radiation to transmit heat directly to the body, regardless of the ambient temperature
  6. The cooled liquid flows back into the boiler tank
  7. The liquid is heated by the sun and flows back into the boiler tank


You can place the MURCHO wherever you are unable to install indoor or outdoor heating. The MURCHO can also act as a light source, and even repel bugs (lighting and bug-repellent system also available)!

MURCHO se place partout où il n'y a pas la possibilité de mettre un chauffage à l'intérieur où à l'extérieur. MURCHO peut aussi éclairer et éloigner les insectes nuisibles (système d'éclairage et de repousse insectes nuisibles en supplément)!

WHO CAN USE THE MURCHO?

A QUI EST DESTINE MURCHO?


On restaurant terraces/Sur la terrasse d'un restaurant


On your patio/Sur votre terrasse à la maison


In your open-concept office/Dans votre bureau open space


For animals/Pour les animaux


At an event in a tent/Lors de fêtes dans des tentes

In your garage-workshop/Dans votre atelier mécanique


At the cottage/Dans votre maison de campagne

At the campground/Au camping


At the train or bus station/A la station des bus ou celle des trains


Upon request, we can convert your MURCHO heating system into a MURCHO cooling system in the summer!

Sur demande, on peut en été intervertir votre système MURCHO de chauffage en système de MURCHO de refroidissement!




Retail price/Prix de vente

Features/Caractéristiques


Environmentally-friendly: Energy Class "AA"

Ecologique : classe énergétique "AA"

Cost-efficient: Reduces energy costs by 80%

Economique : réduit vos factures d’énergie de près de 80%

Setup: Designed to be mounted on the ground or wall without assistance

Mise en oeuvre : peut être monté sans spécialiste au sol ou contre un mur

Versatility: Allows you to keep your existing heating system

Adaptabilité : permet de conserver son installation de chauffage existante

Installation: Can be easily installed anywhere, without special tools

Construction : facile a poser, partout sans infrastructure particulière

Easy to use: No maintenance required

Facilité : pas entretien

Well-being: Protects your health, runs quietly, does not cause air movement

Bien-être : protège votre santé, silencieux, sans brassage d’air

Hot/Cold: Acts as a heating or cooling system

Chaleur/fraîcheur  : permet de produire du chaud ou du froid




Timeline/Calendrier





Perks/Contreparties


Each perk allows to order one MURCHO. It is not possible to cumulate perks to order one single MURCHO.

Chaque contrepartie permet de commander un MURCHO. Il est impossible de cumuler les avantages pour un même MURCHO.



Team/L'équipe





Daniele Oppizzi, CEO
  • Solar Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires
  • Solar Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés solaires
  • Renewable Energy Specialist/Architecte spécialiste en habitation solaires.
  • Director University of Neuchâtel (Science Ecology development)/Chargé de cours à l'Université de Neuchâtel
  • Biologist and Geologist, Specialist in Land Management/Biologiste et géologue spécialisé en gestion du territoire
  • MBA in Public Administration and Development of  Sustainable Development/MBA en administration publique et en développement durable

Jean-Philippe Goutte, CTO

  • Solar Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires
  • Solar Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés solaires
  • Electro mecanical engineer/Ingénieur en électricité mécanique
  • Lecturer to technical high schools/Chargé de cours dans les écoles techniques supérieures
  • Senior Internet manager/Gestionnaire senior en informatique

Alain Van Ranst, Global Development

  • Renewable Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires
  • Technological Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés technologiques
  • International business developper/Développeur d'affaires internationales
  • Electro mecanical engineer/Ingénieur en électricité mécanique
  • Senior technico commercial manager/Senior manager technico commercial
  • Senior export manager/Senior manager import-export




FAQ

How can I order a MURCHO? Comment commander un MURCHO?

  • Go to www.iland-sustainability.com and fill the form, we will send you a customized quotation.
  • Allez sur www.iland-durabilite.com et remplissez le formulaire, nous vous enverrons une offre personalisée.


Can I pick a color when I order? Puis-je choisir une couleur à la commande?

  • Yes! We will comunicate available colors as soon as possible.
  • Oui! Nous allons communiquer les couleurs disponibles prochainement.

What are the dimensions and weight? Quelles sont les dimensions et le poids?

  • Dimensions : 60in x 40in. MURCHO weight : approx. 18lbs, heating system weight : approx. 55 lbs. 
  • Oui! Dimensions : 150cm x 100cm. Poids MURCHO : approx. 8kg, système de chauffage : approx. 25kg.


Is there a warranty for damaged parts?

  • 2 years except connectors.
  • 2 ans excepté les connecteurs.

Can you include a solar panel?

  • Yes.
  • Oui.


Are you going to make a bigger/smaller MURCHO?

  • Yes, different sizes are planned.
  • Oui, différetes dimensions sont prévues.
story_txt:
A 21st-Century
Indoor/outdoor environmentally-friendly heating system? It's about time!


Enfin un système de
chauffage outdoor et indoor écologique du 21 ème siècle!


Thank you for making the
MURCHO the biggest “Pleasure of Living” success of all time on INDIEGOGO!

Merci de faire de MURCHO le plus grand succès du plaisir de vivre de
tous les temps sur INDIEGOGO! 


An indoor/outdoor
environmentally-friendly solar heating system! 
Un système solaire de
chauffage outdoor et indoor écologique!

Have you ever felt cold…


On a restaurant terrace?

In your garage/workshop?

On your patio?

In your open-concept office?

At an event in a tent?

On the beach at night?

In a train or bus station?

At a camp ground?
At the cottage?
N'avez-vous jamais eu froid...

 Sur la
terrasse d'un restaurant?

Dans
votre atelier mécanique?

Sur votre terrasse
à la maison?

Dans votre bureau open space?

Lors de fêtes dans les tentes?


Le soir à la plage?

A la gare routière ou celle des trains?

Au camping?

Dans
votre maison de campagne?


Indoor/outdoor heating
systems are often expensive, dependent on the main power grid, and harmful to
the environment—not to mention difficult to carry around with you! 
Tous les systèmes de chauffage outdoor et indoor sont coûteux,
dépendants du réseau électrique, sont polluants, non écologiques.... et surtout
ils ne sont pas tous transportables pour vos loisirs !
The Murcho is a
solar-powered radiant wall. In addition to keeping you warm, it’s an attractive
addition to your patio or deck. You can leave it on, day and night, all winter
and summer long. As soon as you feel a little cold, turn on your MURCHO to
create some heat, effectively and safely.
Murcho fonctionne grâce à la chaleur du soleil! C'est un mur radiant. Il
vous chauffera le corps pour votre bien-être. Il est beau et esthétique sur
votre terrasse. Vous pouvez le laisser fonctionner jour et nuit, hiver et été.
Dès que vous aurez froid, allumez votre MURCHO et vous serez au chaud et sans
danger.


Sun warms the solar
heating panels
Cold liquid flows to the
panels
Heated liquid flows to
the MURCHO
The MURCHO heats the
environment through radiation
The MURCHO does not
create air movement, but uses infrared radiation to transmit heat directly to
the body, regardless of the ambient temperature 
The cooled liquid flows
back into the boiler tank


The liquid is heated by the sun and flows back into the boiler tank



You can
place the MURCHO wherever you are unable to install indoor or outdoor heating. The MURCHO can also act as
a light source, and even repel bugs (lighting and bug-repellent system also
available)!
MURCHO se place partout où il n'y a pas la possibilité
de mettre un chauffage à l'intérieur où à l'extérieur. MURCHO peut aussi éclairer et éloigner les insectes nuisibles (système
d'éclairage et de repousse insectes nuisibles en supplément)!


WHO CAN USE THE MURCHO?
A QUI EST
DESTINE MURCHO?

On
restaurant terraces/Sur
la terrasse d'un restaurant On your
patio/Sur votre terrasse à la maison


In your open-concept office/Dans votre bureau open
space

For animals/Pour les animauxAt an event in a tent/Lors de fêtes dans des tentes
In your
garage-workshop/Dans votre atelier mécanique


At the
cottage/Dans votre maison de campagne
At the campground/Au camping

At the train or bus station/A la station des bus ou celle des trains

Upon request, we can
convert your MURCHO heating system into a MURCHO cooling system in the summer!
Sur demande, on peut en été intervertir votre système MURCHO de
chauffage en système de MURCHO de refroidissement!


Retail price/Prix de vente

Features/Caractéristiques
Environmentally-friendly: Energy
Class "AA"Ecologique : classe énergétique
"AA"Cost-efficient: Reduces energy costs
by 80%Economique : réduit vos factures
d’énergie de près de 80%Setup: Designed to be mounted on the
ground or wall without assistance

Mise en oeuvre : peut être
monté sans spécialiste au sol ou contre un murVersatility: Allows you to keep your
existing heating systemAdaptabilité : permet de conserver
son installation de chauffage existanteInstallation: Can be easily
installed anywhere, without special toolsConstruction : facile a poser,
partout sans infrastructure particulièreEasy to use: No maintenance requiredFacilité : pas entretienWell-being: Protects your health,
runs quietly, does not cause air movementBien-être : protège votre santé,
silencieux, sans brassage d’airHot/Cold: Acts as a heating or
cooling systemChaleur/fraîcheur  : permet de produire du chaud ou du froid

Timeline/CalendrierPerks/Contreparties
Each perk allows to order one MURCHO. It is not possible to cumulate perks to order one single MURCHO.Chaque contrepartie permet de commander un MURCHO. Il est impossible de cumuler les avantages pour un même MURCHO.Team/L'équipeDaniele Oppizzi, CEO

Solar Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires


Solar Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés solaires

Renewable Energy Specialist/Architecte spécialiste en habitation solaires.

Director University of Neuchâtel (Science Ecology development)/Chargé de cours à l'Université de Neuchâtel

Biologist and Geologist, Specialist in Land Management/Biologiste et géologue spécialisé en gestion du territoire

MBA in Public Administration and Development of  Sustainable Development/MBA en administration publique et en développement durable


Jean-Philippe Goutte, CTO
Solar Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires

Solar Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés solaires

Electro mecanical engineer/Ingénieur en électricité mécanique

Lecturer to technical high schools/Chargé de cours dans les écoles techniques supérieures

Senior Internet manager/Gestionnaire senior en informatique

Alain Van Ranst, Global Development
Renewable Technologies Developer/Développeur de technologies solaires
Technological Company Founder/Créateur de sociétés technologiques

International business developper/Développeur d'affaires internationales

story:
Featured in media

My name is Sachin. I am here to ask for your kind support and help to solve a problem that everyone of us either experienced or will surly experience in our life. Lets use power of crowdfunding and web technology to save millions to die and millions to go bankrupt.

There are thousands of blogs and website where people wrote about the problems they experienced while getting medical treatment and they are not only in asia but in developed countries of Europe too. USA also have uncountable victims of unfair medical billing and unskilled medical professionals.

See how hospitals do unfair billing

Example of Medical negligence (Unskilled medical professionals and hospital staff)

Another example of unfair medical billing and problems that one will have to face to deal with them.

Unprofessional medical billing

Problem

Health care is very crucial need for a human since the start of the mankind. From birth to death we often need medical professionals and services such as doctor, nurse, hospitals, ambulance, pathology, medicine stores etc to be healthy, stay healthy and heal our pain. With time health industry have became one of the biggest industry in the world. 

Health care is expensive but it's also common to be overcharged for it. Insurance coverage gaps and billing errors also play a part in high health care costs but the little known practice of unfair medical billing.

                         


It's a terrible feeling to open a bill and find a balance that's way higher than you expected. But it's even worse when you are recovering from an illness or injury that landed you in the hospital - something you didn't plan and now can't afford.

                  


Today, medical costs have spiraled out of control for the average consumer. On top of this, doctors continue to recommend unnecessary procedures and tests, arguably to increase their own profits, and wide pricing discrepancies exist between physicians who offer the same services. Despite these trends, medical costs remains a taboo subject (one that consumers are hesitant to discuss openly), and talk of price research and cost comparison remains limited. 

people spend all their savings, their kids education fund even take loan to get over of medical debts. It's something that completely change their financial situation even when they have medical insurance.

Apart from unfair billing we have to deal with several other annoying problems when we are trying to get medical treatment.

When you are seeking for healthcare usually those are the problems you might have to face.

  1. Searching Correct Doctor, Hospital, Pathology etc : Usually when we are sick and we don't have a family doctor or we face a health issue that we never faced before it become hard to choose a correct doctor because a dentist can't heal your heart and an cardiologist can't heal your teeth Same like a bone excerpt can advice you for fever but it will be just an advice not an specialist advice. Finding the right doctor isn't easy—and it shouldn't be. When you put your life in someone else's hands, you need to feel confident that this is an individual with enough smartness, qualifications, and skills to give you the treatment you deserve. To find the correct medical professional we are usually dependent on advice of friends, relatives, neighbors or not so reliable information on internet or medical directory. it makes our options limited and we have to hope that the doctor we are going to believe is actually good enough to heal us or our loved ones.
  2. Unfair billing : It could happen to anyone at anytime. A trip to the emergency room or bad news from your doctor could result in thousands of dollars in medical bills. Even with medical insurance, you may end up with catastrophic debt as a result of your illness. To make matters worse, many health care providers have unfair billing practices that only add to the financial issues faced by patients. Except for a few billionaires, every American and European (let alone the third world people) is just one major illness away from bankruptcy.

                          


  3. Overpriced medicine : How you will be sure that the money you going to pay for the medicines are fair price for that? you can never be sure as even medics get confused by the fancy names of medicines. All you can do is to believe on the pharmacist and pay him the asked amount. This price is often unfair because commission for doctor and sales person involve in price you pay for medicines.
  4. Rude hospital staff : You might be expecting some sympathy and good behavior from hospital staff because you have paid or you will pay a big amount to the hospital but it's not new that we face rude behavior from hospital staff.
  5. Mismatch of appointments: you must be very lucky if you never had to wait for your turn to see doctor even when you have confirm appointment because most of the people have to waste hours in the clinic just to show them self to doctor face to face. Hours that they could spend doing something else.
  6. Medical papers management: It's very hard to manage all the medical documents like medical reports, prescriptions, x-ray etc. its usual we don't find required medical documents at the time we need them because these documents are very easy to lose.

Solution

To Deal with medical treatment problems including all the problems mentioned above what we have to face while searching for affordable medical treatment we have come up with a product called Rocktor or Rocking doctor.

The concept is simple yet unique. If you aren't fair patients will know about your unfair acts and you won't get any business again. it will not only work like an alarm and review system for patients but will solve problems mentioned above.


Rocktor would be an online platform where people will be able to search nearby doctors, hospitals and other kind of medical services. All they have to do is type what they need in search box, the platform will grab their location automatically and will show them result of nearby locations. Patients will be able to compare options (search results) and choose best suitable doctor or hospital by reading almost every single details such as consultation fee, education, rating by previous patients, success record etc about them. Ones they decide which doctor they want they can book an appointment online by using our one of a kind online appointment booking system.

Users will be able to store their medical documents such as prescriptions, x-ray, medical reports, receipts etc on our highly secured servers in digital format so they won't have to worry about losing their important medical documents. To make the work easy flawless for medical professionals rocktor will offer a handful of services to doctors and hospitals too.

rocktor will be useful for both patients and doctors.

For patients it will have these functions.

  1. Searching of medical professional : By using our unique medical search engine users will be able to search every single available doctor, hospital, medical store, pathology etc in nearest locations. all they will have to do is type their desired medical profile such as Dentist, Heart specialist, cardiologist etc and hit the search button.
  2. See information: Ones they hit search button they will have list of professionals as search result where they will be able to see detailed information about every single search result (doctor/hospital) like their address, qualification, experience, number of cases handled, consultation fee etc.


  3. Profile: On the basis of little information ones you decide there is someone who might be suitable for you but you aren't sure enough..... no problem, just click on the photo to reach the profile page of doctor or hospital. On profile page you will be able to see detailed information such as address, age, qualification, consultation fee, contact number, awards, number of cases handled, successful cases plus reviews from previous patients.
  4. Booking online appointment: Ones user decide which doctor or service provider they want they can directly book appointment by using our unique appointment booking system. 


  5. Keep documents: Patients or user can store digital copy of their medical documents such as x-ray reports, prescriptions, medical reports, photos of injury etc. on our secured servers so they can access their medical documents whenever required from any part of the world. No need to worry of losing them because they will be secure and safe on our server digitally forever.


  6. Wide list of medicine: Rocktor will have detailed list of widely and common used  medicines so users can know if they bought the medicine on fair price or not.


  7. Easy Access:- Access Rocktor from the ease of your computer, TAB or your smartphone.

                        

                         

  8. ID number: Every patient will have a unique rocktor id number. this number will be associated to patient's medical profile that will be accessible only either to doctor or to patient himself. suppose if you live in London and find a good doctor for your problem in new york so instead of going to new york you only need to give your id number to doctor from new york and by using this id number doctor can find out about your recently discovered medical problems and about your medical treatment history, He can see your xrays, medical reports etc so he can consult you right from new york. you don't have to do expensive and painful travel unless until it's not necessary. 


For Doctors Rocktor will offer following things.

  1. Maximum visibility to patients: By using rocktor medical search engine doctors and hospitals will be in reach of unlimited patient. regardless the location everyone will be able to search right doctor and hospital for them so medical service providers will have reach to almost every user of rocktor doesn't mater from which part of the world they are searching you.
  2. Easy appointment management: Doctors will have their own dashboard where where they can manage all their appointments like they can find out how many people booked appointments with them and how many people didn't show, they can change appointment timing as per their comfort etc.

  3. Details of patients: Doctors will have access to the details of those people who book appointment with them. details such as patient's treatment history, contact details, medical information about patient etc. every patient will be provided with a unique rocktor id number by using this number every doctor can have a look of all the medical information about their patient.
  4. Profile: Doctor and hospital will be able to create their profile where they can briefly write about their education, experience, consultation fee, awards, their blogs, articles etc. It will help them to prove them self reliable and worthy to new patients.


  5. Reports and Analytic : Doctors will have statics where the can see growth and degrowth of their business for example number of new appointments, cancelled appointments, revenue generated, total appointments year, month, week, day wise. They will have access of graphs it will make statics easy to understand for them.

                          


  6. Billing: Doctors and hospitals can generate and print automatic bills or send an e bill directly to the email id of patient.
  7. Reminders: Create special relationship with patients and other important persons by remembering their birthdays. rocktor will notify you when they have birthdays, marriage anniversary etc. it will also send you sms notification about appointments and other important events, occasions and changes.


    So basically rocktor will be an online platform where People would be able to search nearby doctor, hospital, ambulance service, pathology, medicine store etc.

    They will be able to compare multiple doctors, hospitals etc on the basis of their location, consultancy fee, years of experience, number of cases handled and success record etc. Ones they decided which which doctor, hospital or other medical service is suitable for them they can simply book the appointment online by using their credit/debit card.

    This simple process will not only give them ease to choose a reliable and trustworthy skilled medical professional or service but it will allow them to book appointment online too this is why they won't have to waste their time in the clinic waiting for their term, for example if they booked an appointment on 5pm they just need to reach the clinic on 4.45 pm and after 15 min. as appointment is scheduled they will be front of doctor.


    The Goal


    We plan to bring 20000 individual doctors and at least 5000 hospitals on board first year. We aim to have at least 1 million appointments every month via rocktor with 100% growth every month.




    With the unique concept of rocktor and aggressive marketing strategies we are aiming 5 million users first year all over the world plus 100% growth in the number of users from next year.



    Future growth

    No great idea survive without funds we just need your help to start it. For future requirements of funding rocktor will have it's own revenue generation model. An online platform with millions of serious visitors every month have high potential to generate revenue. we plan to generate revenue by those ways.

    1. Advertisement sales: who won't like to market their products on a website which have millions of hits by serious paints every day. Our primary target will be medicines brands, health supplements, health food restaurants, medical equipment brands, health clubs, medical insurance providers etc.
    2. Premium membership: We will offer premium memberships to doctors and hospitals. By subscribing premium membership they might get some vital favor to help boost their visibility on our search results.

    What We Need

    We are seeking for funds to have this revaluation in health sector. We are looking for 100000 USD. This amount sounds big but its nothing to start a google or facebook of health area and to provide something to those who suffer in lake of a medical guidance system.

    The funds will be spend to :- 

    1. Create Website: Yes we have an idea and passion to make it come true but none of our team member is a developer. we need to hire a web developing firm to develop rocktor website and app. We have already contacted few top web developing firms and the most suitable package they offer is about 20000USD for developing website and app (both Android and iOS).  We can choose a cheaper one but cheap packages will not provide us enough speed, web space, cutting edge visuals and SEO.
    2. Legalization: We will need around 1000 USD to legalize the platform. To from a company, it's registration and enrollment etc.
    3. Marketing and Promotions: Does't mater how awesome rocktor would be it will be nothing but a sitting duck if no body knows about it, this is why we will have a aggressive paid marketing campaign on social media such as facebook, twitter, whatsapp etc and on search engines like Google and yahoo too. We will publish advertisements in big news papers and magazines, We will spread pamphlets, posters as well. Since we strongly believe the primary objective is to introduce rocktor to those who really need it and it's not possible without aggressive marketing so this is going to be the biggest expenditure it will require about 40000 USD.
    4. Equipment: We will require some equipment like 4 computers (5000usd) Printer (150 USD) other logistical equipment (850usd)
    5. Rent office space: Every business/organization or a startup needs a place to operate we have already watched a suitable convenient office space for rocktor, it's cheap yet easy to reach. (1000*6=6000)
    6. Other office expenses: Such as stationery, Phone bills, electricity bills, Internet bills etc. (3000usd)
    7. Hire staff: We will need following staff to maintain the platform and achieve our goals
    • Developers: Though we will outsource the website from web developing firm but still we will need at least two developers to maintain and keep website and apps of rocktor up to date plus we can not be dependent on web developing firm forever this is why we will need our own team for future developments and updates. it will take 1000usd each developer for at least next six months until we will start having enough visitors. (1000*2*6=12000)
    • Marketing Personal: We will need 3 marketing personals at the beginning one for contacting doctors inside the city (500*6=3000) one for contacting doctors online (500*6=3000) and another one to oprate a marketing campaign on social media such as facebook, twitter, whatsapp etc (500*6=3000) .
    • Accountant: We will need an accountant to maintain fair accounts about every income and expenditure so we don't feel any complication from the government. (500*6=3000)

      The Impact

      By helping us you are going to give big foundation to rocktor so in a way you will be changing the medical world forever.  Billions will be benefited every year by your contribution. You will save millions to go in medical debts. You will be saving those lifes which have to end because they couldn't find a perfect doctor for them.

      You will give smiles to billions of faces, you will save many families to go bankrupt, you will make sure medical treatment does't become another disease for billions.

      What You Get

      Every donation means alot to us. we count on you and for helping us we will reward you with amazing perks. We’re offering some incredible perks to friends in the Indiegogo community who support our campaign, with anything from $1 to $10000.

      Please check "Perks" for more details.

      Risks & Challenges

      Every new initiative face challenges and rocktor is not an exception. Here are few biggest challenges we will probably have and how we will solve them.

      1. Already Existing platforms: There are few platforms already working in the same field but instead of providing solutions to people they became a part of this nexus. 

      Solution: Because these platforms include their profit in the treatment cost it's not beneficial for patient. we will not charge anything to patients our main source of income would be advertisement and membership fee from doctors. "Patient first" going to be our strategy so we are going to keep medical cost as low as possible. This strategy will not only beat the other platform so fast but it will make rocktor popular between patients in no time.

      2. Making rocktor popular: Though rocktor going to be a game changing tool in medical world still it is going to be a big challenge to make it popular between patients from the beginning.

      Solution: To counter this problem we going to take help of a aggressive marketing campaign thanks to our contributors we will already have funds for this marketing campaign. Low cost medical cost also going to play a major role to make rocktor popular by mouth publicity. We probably will have a referral mechanism so people who benefited by rocktor can easily tell about it to their friends and family.

      3.Future funding: As described above no business can sustain without proper and continues funding. rocktor going to have same problem too.

      Solution: For future funding needs rocktor will have it's own revenue model to generate revenue for future development and operational requirements. Our revenue model will be based on advertisement and membership fee so it will not be a burden on those who are already having trouble with money. For more details please check revenue model section.

      4. Competitors: Yes rocktor is an unique idea but there are some players already working with somehow similar concept like medical directory etc. they tied up with hospital and make the problem even worse.

      Solution: with cheap and cost effective medical treatment rocktor will deal with those money hungry competitors itself but if it couldn't do it we have some good strategies to deal with them.

      Apart from those we are very much aware of possible problems aret visible at the moment. we will face many problems that we haven't count yet but we believe our team and strategies are fully capable to deal with any problem.


      What if we doest reach the goal

      Honestly this 100000 is not our goal, The goal way higher. This amount is just a startup amount but we believe our unique revenue model will fulfill our future need of funding but still if we couldn't reach our goal i will not let this project die. team members will take loan and sale everything what we have to ensure rocktor become a reality. Rockter is not only a project but its a dream for all of us and we will make sure this dream come true at any cost.

      Five reasons Rocktor going to be a success

      1. Unique concept: Rockter is unique concept yes there are are many medical directory available on internet but none of them allow you to compare, rate, review and book online.
      2. Solution of problem: Rockter going to solve many big problems for both patient and doctors everyone will love it.
      3. Win Win for all: Rocktor doest harm anyone it's good for honest medical services, its good for patients and good for the operators as well.
      4. Positive reviews: We have already discussed limited version of rocktor to hundreds of medical professionals and almost every one gave enthusiastic reviews.
      5. Strategies: we have made our strategies these will make rocktor popular between people in no time.
      6. Easy access: Rocktor is easily accessible for everyone from everywhere. you can access it by your phone, computer or tablet.


      Other Ways You Can Help

      We believe you want to help us but we understand it's not easy for everyone to help with money but still if you want you can help us by sharing this campaign on your social networking profiles and ask your friends to share this on their page or websites. if you are a developer and interested to join the team we would be more than happy to welcome you or if you have some advice/suggestion please feel free to let us know it might be very valuable for us to achieve our goal.

      Please share this link with your friends and family.

      http://igg.me/at/rocktor/x/5143776

      Thankyou.

bad news from your doctor could result in thousands of dollars in 
medical bills. Even with medical insurance, you may end up with 
catastrophic debt as a result of your illness. To make matters worse, 
many health care providers have unfair billing practices that only add 
to the financial issues faced by patients. Except for a few 
billionaires, every American and European (let alone the third world people) is just one major illness away from 
bankruptcy.                        



Overpriced medicine : How you will be sure that the money you going to pay for the medicines are fair price for that? you can never be sure as even medics get confused by the fancy names of medicines. All you can do is to believe on the pharmacist and pay him the asked amount. This price is often unfair because commission for doctor and sales person involve in price you pay for medicines.

Rude hospital staff : You might be expecting some sympathy and good behavior from hospital staff because you have paid or you will pay a big amount to the hospital but it's not new that we face rude behavior from hospital staff.

Mismatch of appointments: you must be very lucky if you never had to wait for your turn to see doctor even when you have confirm appointment because most of the people have to waste hours in the clinic just to show them self to doctor face to face. Hours that they could spend doing something else.

Medical papers management: It's very hard to manage all the medical documents like medical reports, prescriptions, x-ray etc. its usual we don't find required medical documents at the time we need them because these documents are very easy to lose.



Solution

To Deal with medical treatment problems including all the problems mentioned above what we have to face while searching for affordable medical treatment we have come up with a product called Rocktor or Rocking doctor. 


The concept is simple yet unique. If you aren't fair patients will know about your unfair acts and you won't get any business again. it will not only work like an alarm and review system for patients but will solve problems mentioned above.

Rocktor would be an online platform where people will be able to search nearby doctors, hospitals and other kind of medical services. All they have to do is type what they need in search box, the platform will grab their location automatically and will show them result of nearby locations. Patients will be able to compare options (search results) and choose best suitable doctor or hospital by reading almost every single details such as consultation fee, education, rating by previous patients, success record etc about them. Ones they decide which doctor they want they can book an appointment online by using our one of a kind online appointment booking system. 
Users will be able to store their medical documents such as prescriptions, x-ray, medical reports, receipts etc on our highly secured servers in digital format so they won't have to worry about losing their important medical documents. To make the work easy flawless for medical professionals rocktor will offer a handful of services to doctors and hospitals too.rocktor will be useful for both patients and doctors.For patients it will have these functions.



Searching of medical professional : By using our unique medical search engine users will be able to search every single available doctor, hospital, medical store, pathology etc in nearest locations. all they will have to do is type their desired medical profile such as Dentist, Heart specialist, cardiologist etc and hit the search button.


See information: Ones they hit search button they will have list of professionals as search result where they will be able to see detailed information about every single search result (doctor/hospital) like their address, qualification, experience, number of cases handled, consultation fee etc. 



Profile: On the basis of little information ones you decide there is someone who might be suitable for you but you aren't sure enough..... no problem, just click on the photo to reach the profile page of doctor or hospital. On profile page you will be able to see detailed information such as address, age, qualification, consultation fee, contact number, awards, number of cases handled, successful cases plus reviews from previous patients.


Booking online appointment: Ones user decide which doctor or service provider they want they can directly book appointment by using our unique appointment booking system. 



Keep documents: Patients or user can store digital copy of their medical documents such as x-ray reports, prescriptions, medical reports, photos of injury etc. on our secured servers so they can access their medical documents whenever required from any part of the world. No need to worry of losing them because they will be secure and safe on our server digitally forever. 



Wide list of medicine: Rocktor will have detailed list of widely and common used  medicines so users can know if they bought the medicine on fair price or not. 



Easy Access:- Access Rocktor from the ease of your computer, TAB or your smartphone.                      
                      


ID number: Every patient will have a unique rocktor id number. this number will be associated to patient's medical profile that will be accessible only either to doctor or to patient himself. suppose if you live in London and find a good doctor for your problem in new york so instead of going to new york you only need to give your id number to doctor from new york and by using this id number doctor can find out about your recently discovered medical problems and about your medical treatment history, He can see your xrays, medical reports etc so he can consult you right from new york. you don't have to do expensive and painful travel unless until it's not necessary. 






For Doctors Rocktor will offer following things.



Maximum visibility to patients: By using rocktor medical search 
engine doctors and hospitals will be in reach of unlimited patient.
 regardless the location everyone will be able to search right doctor 
and hospital for them so medical service providers will have reach to 
almost every user of rocktor doesn't mater from which part of the world they are searching you.

Easy appointment management: Doctors will have their own 
dashboard where where they can manage all their appointments like they 
can find out how many people booked appointments with them and how many 
people didn't show, they can change appointment timing as per their 
comfort etc. 


Details of patients: Doctors will have access to the details of 
those people who book appointment with them. details such as patient's 
treatment history, contact details, medical information about patient 
etc. every patient will be provided with a unique rocktor id number by 
using this number every doctor can have a look of all the medical 
information about their 
patient.

Profile: Doctor and hospital will be able to create their profile
 where they can briefly write about their education, experience, 
consultation fee, awards, their blogs, articles etc. It will help them to prove 
them self reliable and worthy to new patients. 




Reports and Analytic : Doctors will have statics where the can see growth and 
degrowth of their business for example number of new appointments, 
cancelled appointments, revenue generated, total appointments year, 
month, week, day wise. They will have access of graphs it will make 
statics easy to understand for them.                        



Billing: Doctors and hospitals can generate and print automatic bills or send an e bill directly to the email id of patient.


Reminders: Create special relationship with patients and other 
important persons by remembering their birthdays. rocktor will notify you 
when they have birthdays, marriage anniversary etc. it will also send you sms notification about 
appointments and other important events, occasions and changes.





So basically rocktor will be an online platform where People would be 
able to search nearby doctor, hospital, ambulance service, pathology, 
medicine store etc.
They will be able to compare multiple doctors, hospitals etc on the 
basis of their location, consultancy fee, years of experience, number of
 cases handled and success record etc. Ones they decided which which 
doctor, hospital or other medical service is suitable for them they can simply book the appointment online by using their 
credit/debit card. 

This simple process will not only give them ease to choose a reliable
 and trustworthy skilled medical professional or service but it will allow them to book 
appointment online too this is why they won't have to waste their time 
in the clinic waiting for their term, for example if they booked an 
appointment on 5pm they just need to reach the clinic on 4.45 pm and 
after 15 min. as appointment is scheduled they will be front of doctor. 


The Goal


We plan to bring 20000 individual doctors and at least 5000 hospitals on board first year. We aim to have at least 1 million appointments every month via rocktor with 100% growth every month.





With the unique concept of rocktor and aggressive marketing strategies we are aiming 5 million users first year all over the world plus 100% growth in the number of users from next year.




Future growth

No great idea survive without funds we just need your help to start it. For future requirements of funding rocktor will have it's own revenue generation model. An online platform with millions of serious visitors every month have high potential to generate revenue. we plan to generate revenue by those ways.


Advertisement sales: who won't like to market their products on a website which have millions of hits by serious paints every day. Our primary target will be medicines brands, health supplements, health food restaurants, medical equipment brands, health clubs, medical insurance providers etc.

Premium membership: We will offer premium memberships to doctors and hospitals. By subscribing premium membership they might get some vital favor to help boost their visibility on our search results. 



  What We Need

We are seeking for funds to have this revaluation in health sector. We are looking for 100000 USD. This amount sounds big but its nothing to start a google or facebook of health area and to provide something to those who suffer in lake of a medical guidance system.
The funds will be spend to :- 



Create Website: Yes we have an idea and passion to make it come true but none of our team member is a developer. we need to hire a web developing firm to develop rocktor website and app. We have already contacted few top web developing firms and the most suitable package they offer is about 20000USD for developing website and app (both Android and iOS).  We can choose a cheaper one but cheap packages will not provide us enough speed, web space, cutting edge visuals and SEO. 


Legalization: We will need around 1000 USD to legalize the platform. To from a company, it's registration and enrollment etc.

Marketing and Promotions: Does't mater how awesome rocktor would be it will be nothing but a sitting duck if no body knows about it, this is why we will have a aggressive paid marketing campaign on social media such as facebook, twitter, whatsapp etc and on search engines like Google and yahoo too. We will publish advertisements in big news papers and magazines, We will spread pamphlets, posters as well. Since we strongly believe the primary objective is to introduce rocktor to those who really need it and it's not possible without aggressive marketing so this is going to be the biggest expenditure  it will require about 40000 USD.

Equipment: We will require some equipment like 4 computers (5000usd) Printer (150 USD) other logistical equipment (850usd)

Rent office space: Every business/organization or a startup needs a place to operate we have already watched a suitable convenient office space for rocktor, it's cheap yet easy to reach. (1000*6=6000)

Other office expenses: Such as stationery, Phone bills, electricity bills, Internet bills etc. (3000usd) 


Hire staff: We will need following staff to maintain the platform and achieve our goals



Developers: Though we will outsource the website from web developing firm but still we will need at least two developers to maintain and keep website and apps of rocktor up to date plus we can not be dependent on web developing firm forever this is why we will need our own team for future developments and updates. it will take 1000usd each developer for at least next six months until we will start having enough visitors. (1000*2*6=12000)

Marketing Personal: We will need 3 marketing personals at the beginning one for contacting doctors inside the city (500*6=3000) one for contacting doctors online (500*6=3000) and another one to oprate a marketing campaign on social media such as facebook, twitter, whatsapp etc (500*6=3000) .

Accountant: We will need an accountant to maintain fair accounts about every income and expenditure so we don't feel any complication from the government. (500*6=3000)


The Impact

By helping us you are going to give big foundation to rocktor so in a 
way you will be changing the medical world forever.  Billions will be 
benefited every year by your contribution. You will save millions to go 
in medical debts. You will be saving those lifes which have to end 
because they couldn't find a perfect doctor for them. 

You will give smiles to billions of faces, you will save many 
families to go bankrupt, you will make sure medical treatment does't 
become another disease for billions.

What You Get
Every donation means alot to us. we count on you and for helping us we will reward you with amazing perks. We’re offering some incredible perks to friends in the Indiegogo 
community who support our campaign, with anything from $1 to $10000. 
Please check "Perks" for more details.
 Risks & Challenges

Every new initiative face challenges and rocktor is not an exception. Here are few biggest challenges we will probably have and how we will solve them.
1. Already Existing platforms: There are few platforms already working in the same field but instead of providing solutions to people they became a part of this nexus. 
Solution: Because these platforms include their profit in the treatment cost it's not beneficial for patient. we will not charge anything to patients our main source of income would be advertisement and membership fee from doctors. "Patient first" going to be our strategy so we are going to keep medical cost as low as possible. This strategy will not only beat the other platform so fast but it will make rocktor popular between patients in no time.
2. Making rocktor popular: Though rocktor going to be a game changing tool in medical world still it is going to be a big challenge to make it popular between patients from the beginning.
Solution: To counter this problem we going to take help of a aggressive marketing campaign thanks to our contributors we will already have funds for this marketing campaign. Low cost medical cost also going to play a major role to make rocktor popular by mouth publicity. We probably will have a referral mechanism so people who benefited by rocktor can easily tell about it to their friends and family.
3.Future funding: As described above no business can sustain without proper and continues funding. rocktor going to have same problem too.
Solution: For future funding needs rocktor will have it's own revenue model to generate revenue for future development and operational requirements. Our revenue model will be based on advertisement and membership fee so it will not be a burden on those who are already having trouble with money. For more details please check revenue model section. 
4. Competitors: Yes rocktor is an unique idea but there are some players already working with somehow similar concept like medical directory etc. they tied up with hospital and make the problem even worse.
Solution: with cheap and cost effective medical treatment rocktor will deal with those money hungry competitors itself but if it couldn't do it we have some good strategies to deal with them.Apart from those we are very much aware of possible problems aret visible at the moment. we will face many problems that we haven't count yet but we believe our team and strategies are fully capable to deal with any problem.

What if we doest reach the goal

Honestly this 100000 is not our goal, The goal way higher. This amount is just a startup amount but we believe our unique revenue model will fulfill our future need of funding but still if we couldn't reach our goal i will not let this project die. team members will take loan and sale everything what we have to ensure rocktor become a reality. Rockter is not only a project but its a dream for all of us and we will make sure this dream come true at any cost.
Five reasons Rocktor going to be a success



Unique concept: Rockter is unique concept yes there are are many medical directory available on internet but none of them allow you to compare, rate, review and book online.

Solution of problem: Rockter going to solve many big problems for both patient and doctors everyone will love it.

Win Win for all: Rocktor doest harm anyone it's good for honest medical services, its good for patients and good for the operators as well.

Positive reviews: We have already discussed limited version of rocktor to hundreds of medical professionals and almost every one gave enthusiastic reviews.

Strategies: we have made our strategies these will make rocktor popular between people in no time.

Easy access: Rocktor is easily accessible for everyone from everywhere. you can access it by your phone, computer or tablet. 



    Other Ways You Can Help

We believe you want to help us but we understand it's not easy for everyone to help with money but still if you want you can help us by sharing this campaign on your social networking profiles and ask your friends to share this on their page or websites. if you are a developer and interested to join the team we would be more than happy to welcome you or if you have some advice/suggestion please feel free to let us know it might be very valuable for us to achieve our goal.
Please share this link with your friends and family.
http://igg.me/at/rocktor/x/5143776
Thankyou.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
