story:
MonkeyBall™ Sports 

What if you could have your brand character and signature on thousands of golf balls produced and paid for by somebody else?

MonkeyBall™ Sports is a serious golf ball business startup with a vision to be the 1st golf ball company that crowd manages its brand character and charitable donations- while promoting fun, golf, and the pursuit of goodness.

By contributing to our launch at the $1, $35 or even $15,000 level, you are building a new business, but more so, a new way of managing a business that you can participate in once you have made a contribution. How will you participate? Our community forum at MonkeyBallSports.com is set up so that you can vote on and send in your own ideas, drawings, sketches etc on what you think our brand character should be. Simply go to our website and click on "Monkey Around".

And the pursuit of Goodness is specifically, fighting cancer under your direction by donating 10% of our golf ball profits to legitimate cancer charities you choose. While of course, making a profit and working to make a difference for men with testicular cancer, the most common cancer in men aged 15-35. 

Our goal is to help you

“SLAP YOUR MONKEYBALL™!!!”

Get it? This is about more than golf. We want to create a profitable, fun business by selling golf balls, while engaging our community to raise money to help slap the testicular cancer monkey.

Get Our Balls, Get Involved
…and a Few Laughs


The Hilarious MonkeyBall™ Ad That Is Going Viral!




And Will Make a Difference In the Fight Against Testicular Cancer


 How Did We Get Here


We've got what we think is a good idea - launch MonkeyBall™ Sports via crowdfunding AND be the 1st golf ball company that crowd manages its brand character and charitable donations - while promoting fun, golf, and the pursuit of goodness (see above!). Simply put, this is a business that combines

►Sales of Golf Products  (Phase 1) & Other Sports Products
►A Brand Character Managed by Our Consumers
►A Lot of Fun & A Lot of Good Humor
►Helping You Fight Cancer While Having Fun!

To start our story, the fun began on the golf course when I was having an awful game, losing balls left and right until my bag was empty. When it was my turn to tee off on the 15th hole it was obvious to friends I had no more balls. A witty friend was quick to respond, tossed me a ball and told me “Why don’t you slap this monkey, that’s about all your good at.” And the branding idea for a golf ball was born. A golf ball called “MonkeyBall™” and a catchy phrase “Slap Your Monkey™”

MonkeyBall Sports captures the spirit of playing golf with friends - friends that you can cut up with and enjoy the times you have when you can let loose on the course and have a few laughs. It's about enjoying that same experience in a larger online community that contributes to choosing and experiencing our brand while enjoying a social media experience with people that love golf, a good sense of humor, and helping others.

Why We Feel So Strongly About Doing This

Every hour on the hour, a man is diagnosed with testicular cancer which is the leading form of cancer in men ages 15-35 but can hit at any age. Yet testicular cancer awareness and education is lacking in our society when ironically early detection leads to survivability in 95% of cases. And testicular cancer is a monkey on the back of every man that suffers with it. That is why we believe "Slap Your Monkey"™ can take on a whole new meaning in the cancer community (who would'a thought "Save the Tatas???) .

We want to make a difference by donating 10% of the profits for each MonkeyBall® golf ball sale to non-profits working to end testicular cancer. We think we can start with golf balls and branch out into tennis balls, basketballs, t-shirts, koozies etc, as we grow and succeed.

 The Fun Part of the Story

Yes I trademarked both MonkeyBall™ and “Slap Your Monkey™”. I am proud to have my name go down in history as the person who trademarked “Slap Your Monkey™” for all things balls. But it was fun, and it got A LOT of laughs. We played around with the idea for what must have been a couple of years, until finally I ran into my friend, Hunter Cressall, who loved the idea and cut this video for me for free to bring the fun to life and encouraged me to donate to a humanitarian cause along the way.


Hunter Cressall, Co-Founder

Hopefully you are chuckling by now and engaged in what we are about to share regarding the business. It’s a lot less humorous, but I think you will find it intriguing and quite ballsy.

 The Business Side of the Story

When I got serious about brand marketing a golf ball called “MonkeyBall™, I decided I had to stop asking friends about the idea as friends tend to tell you what you want to hear. So I ventured out to a few golf stores in Birmingham Alabama where I live (I'm a Georgia transplant) and see if I could get a rise out of anyone with the catchy phrase “Slap Your Monkey™”. I decided Dick’s Sporting Goods might be a good place to start to conduct some ad-hoc questionnaires about the brand. A few minutes at Dick’s and I blew over to another sporting goods store, and again and again until I was sure I had cracked this nut. It turns out that all the guys I approached (I was too chicken to ask any ladies) loved the idea and consistently asked me where they could get a case of MonkeyBalls™”.

It wasn’t much longer after that I spent a couple of hundred bucks to test the water and conducted a survey with survata.com . The results were phenomenal – basically 60% of all polled indicated they felt strongly they would buy the ball, they believed others would buy the ball, and they even believed others would buy the ball for a friend!

So we cut this video to explain it (warning – a bit more serious than the one above!):


Scot Hanley, Co-Founder

and yes - donations are part of our business!

 We’re Not Monkeying Around 

We think this startup has huge potential. We want to start with golf balls and golf products t(hats, tees, shirts etc.) with an initial laser like focus on golf balls as we believe this is the most promising market segment in terms of demand, acceptance of the brand, prospective profit margins, and ease of entry. Why do we believe this?

►Golfers love a good joke on the course, there is demand (see survey results below)
►Our survey results show huge promise with a 4% margin of error
►Risk of market entry is low – this is a tested and huge market
►Manufacturing and Distribution Channels are readily available
►Startup Costs are Low and our crowdfunding campaign is realistic


Check Out Our Survey Results ▶︎


 Our MonkeyBall™ Product

Our plan is to roll out USGA Conforming  two core golf balls in phase 1 and assuming success, roll out three core USGA Conforming golf balls in phase 2. All MonkeyBall™ golf balls will be emblazoned with our logo “Slap Your Monkey™” and a corresponding mascot (or character) to attend the logo based on your input in our community. We will seek input from our supporters and community on the design of our character each business quarter to engage consumers in our digital strategy (see digital strategy below) and believe we will be the 1st golf ball company to do so.

Standard Two Core USGA Conforming Ball

Standard Three Core USGA Conforming Ball

All manufacturing will be done by a trusted third party while quality, marketing, distribution, and back office operations will be conducted in house, by our company MonkeyBall™ Sports. We believe quality control to be imperative in our operations and will dedicate capital to compression testing, core testing, dimple adherence, and quality of printed logos. The end result is we want a high quality ball that will go the distance and perform like any other high quality USGA conforming golf ball.

 Our Digital Marketing Strategy

We think the key to our success is consumer engagement combined with our brand in way that draws in customers and engages them in our online community. And we would like to be the 1st golf ball company to market golf balls with logos picked by our consumer online community. Think of it as a place where people have fun submitting their ideas for our character logo which are in turn voted on by the community. The MonkeyBall™ Community member who receives the most community support (votes) gets their MonkeyBall™ character and signature on thousands of our golf balls for one quarter! 
Additionally, they will receive several cases of their winning golf ball version to share as they see fit. For this launch phase & beyond, our plan is to create an online community where our customers are asked to participate in a fun and zany contest where they submit ideas for our quarterly rendition of our monkey mascot that will go on the golf ball with our logo. Players will even submit rough sketches of their logo with their idea (if they like). The community will vote on the ideas for mascots and the winner who gets the most votes wins the following:

►Their rendition of our monkey mascot on our ball for one business quarter
►A signed case of MonkeyBall™ Golf Balls by our founder, and additional cases to share
►Choice of Testicular Cancer non-profit for 10% of profit donation from us for one quarter
►Personalized (phone, email etc.) updates from the founder 

In subsequent phases, we have digital marketing plan that includes the following contests & technology:

►An Online Novel About Our Mascot that is Completed in Phases by Our Community
►An Online Naming Contest for the Name of Our Mascot
►A Smartphone App that (Phase 1) that Combines Golf with Donations for Testicular Cancer
►Smartphone App (future phases) for Golf that Provides Real Updates for all types of Charitable Golf Tournaments and other functionality that contributes to the success of the Tourney

►Public Online Posts of Our Audited Financials (3rd Party) Since We Are Donating to Charities




 The Charitable Part of the Story

Testicular cancer is the leading form of cancer in men ages 15 to 39, yet it has a 90% success rate when it is detected early. Sadly, testicular cancer has been considered a socially taboo subject for too long and awareness of the disease has been governed by social morays. Just as breast cancer has “Save the TaTas'”, we believe testicular cancer needs a catchy and long lasting slogan like “Slap Your Monkey” in communicating that testicular cancer is a monkey on the back of all affected men. We think this business has tremendous potential to make a difference in building awareness and contributing real money to the fight against this disease. Our plan is:

►Donate 10% of our profits from all golf ball business to verified 501c3’s fighting testicular cancer
►Placement of the violet ribbon testicular cancer on our golf balls and packaging to build awareness
►Contributions of our product to golf tournaments hosted by verified 501c3s fighting testicular cancer
►A Smartphone App that Combines Golf with Donations for Testicular Cancer
►Online Promotion of Testicular Cancer and Charities Fighting Against it on Our Website

Here are a few of the 501(c)3’s fighting cancer that we plan on researching to ensure financial due diligence. Our plan is that once research is complete, charities get “on our list” for eligible selection by our community for charitable donations.  Our community will be able to contribute charities for our review to go on “the list”.

A few of the things we would look at in an eligible charity would be overhead vs. giving, transparency in accounting practices (use of external audits), longevity, and management team. This is obviously a significant work item for us and will cost time and money.

 The Management Team

Scot Hanley and Hunter Cressall are seasoned professionals in their fields with extensive management experience in IT Project, Program, and Product Management as well as Entertainment mediums including video, sound, graphics and all forms of digital art production.

Scot Hanley was named International Project Manager of the Year by IIL and PMI in 2008 for his work on global divestitures. He has over 25 years of experience in Program and Product Management with Fortune 500 firms, as well as non-profit experience as founder of Virtual Ministries and former President of the Humane Society of Harris County. He is an inventor including a patent pending technique in project management  “Project Behavioral Coaching”™, and a pragmatic creative that believes getting the job done successfully depends upon a realistic plan to make it happen. Scot has a deep founded love of golf and nonprofits with an unfaltering dedication to changing the world, no matter his latest project. He has served at the Executive Officer level at two Fortune 500 Companies responsible for millions of dollars in budget and high visibility, highly complex business and technology projects. He is a  recognized innovator and has been invited to speak at numerous conferences on project management and his  patented technique. He seeks to achieve a “work life balance” where he can freely employ his sense of humor, his nature to create and have fun, and his drive to help others.

Hunter Cressall has been a professional in the motion picture, television and communications industry for over twenty years. Hunter began is career in 1983 working at WXTX, a local UHF television station in Columbus Georgia. A few years later, Hunter moved to Los Angeles and quickly began a career in feature films. From 1990 to 1999, Hunter Cressall worked on commercials, television shows and over thirty feature films as prop master, Art Director and Production Designer and marked the beginning of Hunter’s work with multimedia and lifelong dedication to emerging media technologies. Today Hunter Cressall produces custom instructional content, news releases and promotional video for a wide number of clients. He also consults for internal media and communication departments, assisting his clients in achieving communication objectives with clarity and efficiency. Hunter continues to be a vanguard of emerging digital media and continues to be a pioneer of new applications for existing technologies. And despite his best efforts, his Mac Switch Parody continues to find new viewers.

Check Out More About Scot Hanley ▶︎

Check Out More About Hunter Cressall▶︎


 What We Need To Do

We’re at a point now where we are ready to get funding. We have a marketing plan, a digital strategy that includes consumer engagement and a brand experience. We’ve completed the market research and understand the distribution channels we want to pursue. Also, we’ve done some things to protect the brand like trademarking and we set up a corporation called MonkeyBall™ Sports registered in Alabama as a DBA. Most importantly we know what our prospective customer looks like and the costs to get into the market that we need to fund. They include:

►Costs to prototype and test our product before our 1st run
►Costs for purchase order on 1st run and shipping cost (from and to), and warehousing
►Ongoing technology costs, product development & testing costs
►Backoffice and Legal Costs to include Non-Profit Research
►Digital strategy / medium costs & software costs

Also, we believe we need to do face to face marketing at various amateur and professional golf events and would like to invest in a "booth" including a golf simulator so we can pass out free balls to prospective customers and ask them to come over and try "Slapping their Monkey" while following up on the spot case sales. We believe a marketing approach similar to the "Hooters Restaurant"  model will make the biggest splash with ladies passing out the free balls. We will display Testicular Cancer posters and information on Testicular Cancer (TC) Prevention as well as charities involved in the fight against this cancer and our hope is to be invited to TC Golf Tourneys.

Our timeline reflected below includes a work breakdown structure for our use.

The Path Ahead:


You Get What You Contribute

We’re proposing the following giving levels with corresponding products/items for your giving levels (assuming we hit our goal):

$1 - Get a MonkeyBall Sports Decal for Your Car or Truck. Tell the world how you feel - We all want to "Slap our Monkey™"!


$5 – MonkeyBall™ Sports Sock Monkey with MonkeyBall™ Sports Logo


$5 - MonkeyBall™ Sports Koozie with Logo

$10 – Get a 3 Ball Sleeve of MonkeyBalls™ with our Logo

$25 – Get a 3 Ball Sleeve of MonkeyBalls™ 


$25 – Get a MonkeyBalls™ Brand T-Shirt & $5 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit

$50 – Case of MonkeyBall™ Brand Golf Balls, Personal Updates from Our Founders & $15 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit

$65 – Case of MonkeyBall™ Brand Golf Balls, T-Shirt, Personal Updates from Our Founders & $15 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit

$100 Case of MonkeyBall™ Brand Golf Balls, 2 Koozies, T-Shirt & $10 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit. PLUS – Behind the scenes updates from our founders.

 

$1200 – Two Club Tickets to PGA Tour Championship, East Lake Golf Club
Atlanta, Ga Sept 22 – 25 2016, $100 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit, Everything from the $100 Contribution Level & Meet with the Founders at the Tournament.

$5000 – Two Club Tickets to PGA Tour Championship, East Lake Golf Club
Atlanta, Ga Sept 22 – 25 2016, 4 Nights at the Buckhead Hyatt (Grand Club King), $500 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit, Everything from the $100 Contribution Level & Dinner Saturday Night, the 24th with the Founders at the Tournament.

  

$15,000 – Everything from the $5000 Contribution Level, Round Trip 1st Class Tickets (in the continental US), All Inclusive Meals and Drinks (at hotel & tourney), Limo to and from Airport & to and from Tourney (Saturday only), Membership in MonkeyBall™ Sports Founders Club, Recognition at Saturday Dinner, the 24th with Award, $1000 Donation to Testicular Cancer Non-Profit.
story_txt:
MonkeyBall™ Sports 

What if you could have your brand character and signature on thousands of golf balls produced and paid for by somebody else?

MonkeyBall™ Sports is a serious golf ball business startup with a vision to be the 1st golf ball company that crowd manages its brand character and charitable donations- while promoting fun, golf, and the pursuit of goodness.
By contributing to our launch at the $1, $35 or even $15,000 level, you are building a new business, but more so, a new way of managing a business that you can participate in once you have made a contribution. How will you participate? Our community forum at MonkeyBallSports.com is set up so that you can vote on and send in your own ideas, drawings, sketches etc on what you think our brand character should be. Simply go to our website and click on "Monkey Around".
And the pursuit of Goodness is specifically, fighting cancer under your direction by donating 10% of our golf ball profits to legitimate cancer charities you choose. While of course, making a profit and working to make a difference for men with testicular cancer, the most common cancer in men aged 15-35. 
 Our goal is to help you

“SLAP YOUR MONKEYBALL™!!!”
Get it? This is about more than golf. We want to create a profitable, fun business by selling golf balls, while engaging our community to raise money to help slap the testicular cancer monkey.

Get Our Balls, Get Involved…and a Few Laughs



The Hilarious MonkeyBall™ Ad That Is Going Viral!





And Will Make a Difference In the Fight Against Testicular Cancer



 How Did We Get Here

   
We've got what we think is a good idea - launch MonkeyBall™ Sports via crowdfunding AND be the 1st golf ball company that crowd manages its brand character and charitable donations - while promoting fun, golf, and the pursuit of goodness (see above!). Simply put, this is a business that combines
►Sales of Golf Products  (Phase 1) & Other Sports Products►A Brand Character Managed by Our Consumers►A Lot of Fun & A Lot of Good Humor►Helping You Fight Cancer While Having Fun!
To start our story, the fun began on the golf course when I was having an awful game, losing balls left and right until my bag was empty. When it was my turn to tee off on the 15th hole it was obvious to friends I had no more balls. A witty friend was quick to respond, tossed me a ball and told me “Why don’t you slap this monkey, that’s about all your good at.” And the branding idea for a golf ball was born. A golf ball called “MonkeyBall™” and a catchy phrase “Slap Your Monkey™”
MonkeyBall Sports captures the spirit of playing golf with friends - friends that you can cut up with and enjoy the times you have when you can let loose on the course and have a few laughs. It's about enjoying that same experience in a larger online community that contributes to choosing and experiencing our brand while enjoying a social media experience with people that love golf, a good sense of humor, and helping others.
Why We Feel So Strongly About Doing This Every hour on the hour, a man is diagnosed with testicular cancer which is the leading form of cancer in men ages 15-35 but can hit at any age. Yet testicular cancer awareness and education is lacking in our society when ironically early detection leads to survivability in 95% of cases. And testicular cancer is a monkey on the back of every man that suffers with it. That is why we believe "Slap Your Monkey"™ can take on a whole new meaning in the cancer community (who would'a thought "Save the Tatas???) .
We want to make a difference by donating 10% of the profits for each MonkeyBall® golf ball sale to non-profits working to end testicular cancer. We think we can start with golf balls and branch out into tennis balls, basketballs, t-shirts, koozies etc, as we grow and succeed.


 The Fun Part of the Story
Yes I trademarked both MonkeyBall™ and “Slap Your Monkey™”. I am proud to have my name go down in history as the person who trademarked “Slap Your Monkey™” for all things balls. But it was fun, and it got A LOT of laughs. We played around with the idea for what must have been a couple of years, until finally I ran into my friend, Hunter Cressall, who loved the idea and cut this video for me for free to bring the fun to life and encouraged me to donate to a humanitarian cause along the way.




Hunter Cressall, Co-Founder
Hopefully you are chuckling by now and engaged in what we are about to share regarding the business. It’s a lot less humorous, but I think you will find it intriguing and quite ballsy.

 The Business Side of the Story
When I got serious about brand marketing a golf ball called “MonkeyBall™, I decided I had to stop asking friends about the idea as friends tend to tell you what you want to hear. So I ventured out to a few golf stores in Birmingham Alabama where I live (I'm a Georgia transplant) and see if I could get a rise out of anyone with the catchy phrase “Slap Your Monkey™”. I decided Dick’s Sporting Goods might be a good place to start to conduct some ad-hoc questionnaires about the brand. A few minutes at Dick’s and I blew over to another sporting goods store, and again and again until I was sure I had cracked this nut. It turns out that all the guys I approached (I was too chicken to ask any ladies) loved the idea and consistently asked me where they could get a case of MonkeyBalls™”.

It wasn’t much longer after that I spent a couple of hundred bucks to test the water and conducted a survey with survata.com . The results were phenomenal – basically 60% of all polled indicated they felt strongly they would buy the ball, they believed others would buy the ball, and they even believed others would buy the ball for a friend!
So we cut this video to explain it (warning – a bit more serious than the one above!):


Scot Hanley, Co-Founder
and yes - donations are part of our business!

 We’re Not Monkeying Around 
We think this startup has huge potential. We want to start with golf balls and golf products t(hats, tees, shirts etc.) with an initial laser like focus on golf balls as we believe this is the most promising market segment in terms of demand, acceptance of the brand, prospective profit margins, and ease of entry. Why do we believe this?
►Golfers love a good joke on the course, there is demand (see survey results below)►Our survey results show huge promise with a 4% margin of error►Risk of market entry is low – this is a tested and huge market►Manufacturing and Distribution Channels are readily available►Startup Costs are Low and our crowdfunding campaign is realistic



Check Out Our Survey Results ▶︎


 Our MonkeyBall™ Product
Our plan is to roll out USGA Conforming  two core golf balls in phase 1 and assuming success, roll out three core USGA Conforming golf balls in phase 2. All MonkeyBall™ golf balls will be emblazoned with our logo “Slap Your Monkey™” and a corresponding mascot (or character) to attend the logo based on your input in our community. We will seek input from our supporters and community on the design of our character each business quarter to engage consumers in our digital strategy (see digital strategy below) and believe we will be the 1st golf ball company to do so.
Standard Two Core USGA Conforming Ball




Standard Three Core USGA Conforming Ball

All manufacturing will be done by a trusted third party while quality, marketing, distribution, and back office operations will be conducted in house, by our company MonkeyBall™ Sports. We believe quality control to be imperative in our operations and will dedicate capital to compression testing, core testing, dimple adherence, and quality of printed logos. The end result is we want a high quality ball that will go the distance and perform like any other high quality USGA conforming golf ball.

 Our Digital Marketing Strategy

We think the key to our success is consumer engagement combined with our brand in way that draws in customers and engages them in our online community. And we would like to be the 1st golf ball company to market golf balls with logos picked by our consumer online community. Think of it as a place where people have fun submitting their ideas for our character logo which are in turn voted on by the community. The MonkeyBall™ Community member who receives the most community support (votes) gets their MonkeyBall™ character and signature on thousands of our golf balls for one quarter! 
Additionally, they will receive several cases of their winning golf ball version to share as they see fit. For this launch phase & beyond, our plan is to create an online community where our customers are asked to participate in a fun and zany contest where they submit ideas for our quarterly rendition of our monkey mascot that will go on the golf ball with our logo. Players will even submit rough sketches of their logo with their idea (if they like). The community will vote on the ideas for mascots and the winner who gets the most votes wins the following:


►Their rendition of our monkey mascot on our ball for one business quarter►A signed case of MonkeyBall™ Golf Balls by our founder, and additional cases to share►Choice of Testicular Cancer non-profit for 10% of profit donation from us for one quarter►Personalized (phone, email etc.) updates from the founder 



In subsequent phases, we have digital marketing plan that includes the following contests & technology:
►An Online Novel About Our Mascot that is Completed in Phases by Our Community►An Online Naming Contest for the Name of Our Mascot►A Smartphone App that (Phase 1) that Combines Golf with Donations for Testicular Cancer►Smartphone App (future phases) for Golf that Provides Real Updates for all types of Charitable Golf Tournaments and other functionality that contributes to the success of the Tourney►Public Online Posts of Our Audited Financials (3rd Party) Since We Are Donating to Charities





 The Charitable Part of the Story
Testicular cancer is the leading form of cancer in men ages 15 to 39, yet it has a 90% success rate when it is detected early. Sadly, testicular cancer has been considered a socially taboo subject for too long and awareness of the disease has been governed by social morays. Just as breast cancer has “Save the TaTas'”, we believe testicular cancer needs a catchy and long lasting slogan like “Slap Your Monkey” in communicating that testicular cancer is a monkey on the back of all affected men. We think this business has tremendous potential to make a difference in building awareness and contributing real money to the fight against this disease. Our plan is:
►Donate 10% of our profits from all golf ball business to verified 501c3’s fighting testicular cancer►Placement of the violet ribbon testicular cancer on our golf balls and packaging to build awareness►Contributions of our product to golf tournaments hosted by verified 501c3s fighting testicular cancer►A Smartphone App that Combines Golf with Donations for Testicular Cancer►Online Promotion of Testicular Cancer and Charities Fighting Against it on Our Website

Here are a few of the 501(c)3’s fighting cancer that we plan on researching to ensure financial due diligence. Our plan is that once research is complete, charities get “on our list” for eligible selection by our community for charitable donations.  Our community will be able to contribute charities for our review to go on “the list”.


A few of the things we would look at in an eligible charity would be overhead vs. giving, transparency in accounting practices (use of external audits), longevity, and management team. This is obviously a significant work item for us and will cost time and money.

 The Management Team
Scot Hanley and Hunter Cressall are seasoned professionals in their fields with extensive management experience in IT Project, Program, and Product Management as well as Entertainment mediums including video, sound, graphics and all forms of digital art production.

Scot Hanley was named International Project Manager of the Year by IIL and PMI in 2008 for his work on global divestitures. He has over 25 years of experience in Program and Product Management with Fortune 500 firms, as well as non-profit experience as founder of Virtual Ministries and former President of the Humane Society of Harris County. He is an inventor including a patent pending technique in project management  “Project Behavioral Coaching”™, and a pragmatic creative that believes getting the job done successfully depends upon a realistic plan to make it happen. Scot has a deep founded love of golf and nonprofits with an unfaltering dedication to changing the world, no matter his latest project. He has served at the Executive Officer level at two Fortune 500 Companies responsible for millions of dollars in budget and high visibility, highly complex business and technology projects. He is a  recognized innovator and has been invited to speak at numerous conferences on project management and his  patented technique. He seeks to achieve a “work life balance” where he can freely employ his sense of humor, his nature to create and have fun, and his drive to help others.

Hunter Cressall has been a professional in the motion picture, television and communications industry for over twenty years. Hunter began is career in 1983 working at WXTX, a local UHF television station in Columbus Georgia. A few years later, Hunter moved to Los Angeles and quickly began a career in feature films. From 1990 to 1999, Hunter Cressall worked on commercials, television shows and over thirty feature films as prop master, Art Director and Production Designer and marked the beginning of Hunter’s work with multimedia and lifelong dedication to emerging media technologies. Today Hunter Cressall produces custom instructional content, news releases and promotional video for a wide number of clients. He also consults for internal media and communication departments, assisting his clients in achieving communication objectives with clarity and efficiency. Hunter continues to be a vanguard of emerging digital media and continues to be a pioneer of new applications for existing technologies. And despite his best efforts, his Mac Switch Parody continues to find new viewers.


Check Out More About Scot Hanley ▶︎


Check Out More About Hunter Cressall▶︎

We’ve completed the market research and understand the distribution channels we want to pursue. Also, we’ve done some things to protect the brand like trademarking and we set up a corporation called MonkeyBall™ Sports registered in Alabama as a DBA. Also, we believe we need to do face to face marketing at various amateur and professional golf events and would like to invest in a "booth" including a golf simulator so we can pass out free balls to prospective customers and ask them to come over and try "Slapping their Monkey" while following up on the spot case sales. We will display Testicular Cancer posters and information on Testicular Cancer (TC) Prevention as well as charities involved in the fight against this cancer and our hope is to be invited to TC Golf Tourneys.

story:
We are the ownership group who recently purchased the rights for the world famous Pillow Fight League that ceased operation in 2011.  We are looking for your help to bring the PFL back - and be  bigger, better, and more bad ass than ever.  This time, we are bringing the PFL's rabid fans into the fold by giving them the chance to support the League from the ground up, as we resurrect the world renowned Pillow Fight League with a fierce new roster of fighters.


The PFL's Origin Story

The PFL ran from 2006 through 2011 hosting 66 events throughout North America. Because of the league's unique offering of professional women's pillow fights,  the PFL was able to capture media attention from all over the world including Fox, ESPN, Good Morning America, Inside Edition, ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX, MTV, VH1, Sports Illustrated, Reader's Digest, The New York Times, Washington Post, Boston Herald, National Enquirer Maxim and many others.  Check out this rave review of the PFL from ESPN.com in 2010.

Make no mistake, this has always been a sport. This isn't an entertainment entity with a predetermined outcome, as you might find in professional wrestling. Our fighters are real fighters, not spokesmodels. We match up dedicated athletes, each vying to become the best Pillow Fighter in the world. 


What it takes to stage a professional Pillow Fight

There are substantial costs to the start-up, running and daily operations of a professional sports league. To ensure that all athletes and support staff are compensated fairly and able to provide a world class production, we ask for your support.

Funds will be allocated in the following categories: 

  • Procuring original rights
  • Athlete compensation and bonus
  • In-venue production
  • Set and Combat Structure
  • Insurance
  • Advertising and promotion
  • Training
  • Video / web production
  • Production staff
  • Perk Fulfilment


Now is the time to bring back the PFL

Our ownership purchased the rights for the PFL over 6 months ago and have been working steadily since then to launch this campaign.
For the last 6 months we have been talking with some of the original fighters and fans as well as potential future PFL stars and they all say the same thing - WE WANT THE PFL BACK!  Everyone is incredibly excited about the possible return of the PFL - not only because Pillow Fighting is awesome (it is) but because we feel that in 2015 it is time for a Women's only professional sports league. 

Women have made great strides recently in spectator sports and the PFL is just one more reason that watching women compete is awesome.  So please help us bring back the greatest combat sport in history and let us do what we love - PILLOW FIGHT!


How Can You Help

  • Well obviously help us spread the word about our Indiegogo Campaign
  • Join our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter page and look out for upcoming announcements on open try-outs and the first live event in almost five years.
  • If you live in the Toronto, Ontario  and you are interested in helping out with the greatest combat sports league in the world, check out jointhepfl.com for current opportunities within the League.
  • If you think you are keen to fight then the first step is filling out our questionnaire at jointhepfl.com and our director of talent relations will be in contact with you shortly about the tryout process.

story:
Hi,

My name is Jazz Dhillon.

I’m an independent inventor and in the last year I’ve been developing Covid-19 protection products. I thought long and hard about this problem, and how the virus spreads primarily in an airborne manner, and I’ve managed to design some brand new, totally unknown and novel technologies to defeat Covid-19. These are still at the concept stage. Please understand this, the concepts we’re currently working on have proved to be 100% effective in halting and arresting the spread of all variants of Covid-19 through our preliminary mock up tests. These concepts are based on the use of proven and existing techniques and technologies, but are utilized or employed in a much more function appropriate manner. They have proven highly effective in this new and novel format.

They provide close to 100% protection against airborne transmission from the Covid-19 virus for school children attending classes, patrons frequenting various types of businesses, including restaurants, bars, hairdressers, beauty salons, dermatologists, dental offices and general offices. The CDC has established that the primary method of Covid-19 transmission is primarily through accumulation of airborne particles.

 We’re now looking to further develop these products through prototypes culminating with a final design. We’re also looking to patent these designs as the concept has already been proven This is what you are supporting. This is wholly where the funds raised through this campaign will be used.

I’m currently at the point where I need to establish patents on these products in order to roll them out. I’m going to need to employ a prototyping firm for my prototypes and a Patent Attorney/Firm to write my patents quickly. This is where I need financial help to pay the prototyping firm and the Attorneys.

The prototypes and patents are going to cost $250K. The patents will be filed with USPTO (United States Patent & Trademark Office).

Naturally, I don’t need to stress the urgency of meeting this goal expeditiously, as we all understand that the sooner, we can reach full deployment of these technologies, the more lives we can save and bring an early end to this deadly scourge.

I believe it’s a highly worthwhile endeavor if we can help the school kids and save the struggling businesses.

The funds raised will cover the costs of the prototyping and the patents (the essential next step). I’m hoping to expedite these next two stages.

Your support is crucial in ensuring that products get out expeditiously to have an immediate and profound impact in the lives of millions of people. 

Thank you in advance for your generosity and support. I appreciate all your help. Your donations will help me get closer to reaching my goal. I can’t do this without you.

It’s ok if you don’t have the finances available to help us or donate, we understand that. We would also ask for your prayers, as we understand, that prayer is very powerful and lead to miracles. So, therefore, we can still all come together and be a participant in making this happen with whatever we are able to donate.

Prayers and funding are both welcome. We thank you in advance for your participation and help as we can’t do this alone.

Thank you and please share the link.

Please share this with everyone you know.

 
TO ELABORATE:

These Products Will:

·       Enable children to go back to school safely and full-time.

·       Free up parents to go back to work and move our economy along.

·       Enable businesses to stay open.

·       Keep variants suppressed.

·       Will safely allow indoor dining.

·       Allow personal grooming services to be done safely.

·       Allow a degree of normality in society.

 

 

 I can’t really talk too much detail about the internal working of these conceptual products for obvious reasons, but I am able to share some concept drawings and have provided them for more transparency.
 

 I’m hoping to release the school products into the schools asap, as the new school year starts August 9th.

I will need to do final designs, manufacturing and production which will all be done in the USA (keeping money and creating new jobs here).

Please help me in this endeavor. We need to protect our children, their future, their emotional and mental well-being.

The sooner we can get these products up and running and out into the communities, the more lives we can save, and the sooner we can bring an end to this pandemic.

Let’s make a difference together in this Covid-19 war.

What I was Engaged in Before the Pandemic Hit:

A primary product I had prototyped, completed and tested was Toothsaver. This product is a non-invasive, tooth infection zapping technology that is 100% effective in completely eliminating the bacterial infection, whilst avoiding the use of antibiotics. So that we are able to keep the full antibiotics efficacy for future generations and avoid the birth of new superbugs. Overuse of antibiotics has led to resistant strains of bacteria known as superbugs. The CDC and WHO have warned of this over prescribing trend.

Shockingly, even today, people in rural parts of third world countries still die from tooth infections as septicemia sets in. However, I digress, we currently have bigger problems that we’re going to need to solve first, namely, the current pandemic.

It is highly unfortunate that when it was time to patent and produce the Toothsaver product en masse, Covid-19 hit and changed everything.

 MORE INFORMATION:

I believe that the correct technologies deployed strategically can make a world of difference to the spread of the infection rate. We do still have the global threat from variants, and it is of course, totally unknown as to which variant may escape the control of our vaccines and cause another surge.

Yes, we are all deeply impacted by the Covid-19 pandemic and yes, it’s a very difficult problem to solve overnight. This isn’t a battle for one man, or one president, but needs to be not only a community effort, but indeed, a global effort.  It has to be a long-term sustained effort that requires engagement with the enemy on many fronts. I was quite surprised to find that there are technologies available to us, that we haven’t currently engaged. It is clear that they can make a huge difference in the battle and reduce the infection and death rates significantly once we have deployed this equipment en masse.

Yes, some states are doing quite well with Covid-19 case numbers, whilst others are seeing a surge once again. Some states are wearing masks, whilst some have dropped masks completely. I fully expect that we will quickly reach a point where all states drop the mandatory mask wearing orders.

The key is to get these products into restaurants, schools and businesses in a timely and expeditious manner. Such that even if we get to a point where mask wearing is completely dropped and no longer mandatory, schools, dining indoors and our service businesses are still kept safe from the invasion of variants through the use of these strategically placed technologies.

This equipment will continue to protect against the threat of variants, even after the mask mandates have been lifted, and we begin to enjoy the full freedom of normality. The equipment will act as a sentinel whilst offering full and unencumbered freedom.

It’s amazing how long simple tasks can take when you’re underfunded. I believe this effort and this program can quickly be taken to the next level of implementation with your help. So, I would sincerely urge you to join my effort and let’s make a difference to school children, the businesses, create jobs in the economy and preserve the mental health of our great nation.

 Please help me get these technologies launched as I can’t do it alone.

 1.    The good news is that the preliminary mock up tests work 100% as expected.

2.    I need to get complete the prototype and get the patents in place.

3.    I may need to do final development.

4.    I may need help setting up a production facility.

5.    I may need to establish contracts with school districts and businesses around the country.

 

GOALS

Immediate Goal:

·       Get prototypes and patents secured.

Short Term Goals:

·       Liaise with and establish contracts with manufacturing and production facilities.

·       Establish distribution channels of Covid-19 products to US school districts and to beneficiary US businesses.

Long Term Goals:

·       Donate products to impoverished countries that can’t afford the equipment.

Please help me, and know that your donations and help will have a profound impact on the future generations, our economy and our country. It’s ok if you don’t have the finances available to help us or donate, we understand that. We would also ask for your prayers, as we understand, that prayer is very powerful and lead to miracles. So, therefore, we can still all come together and be a participant in making this happen with whatever we are able to donate.

Prayers and funding are both welcome. We thank you in advance for your participation and help as we can’t do this alone.

Thank you and please share the link.

God Bless You and God Bless America.

Please share this as this needs to be expedited.

 
BACKGROUND:

I spent my early life and adulthood getting my education in the U.K. I’ve worked for numerous companies over the time period, but started to develop my own products independently in 2019. I did have some products in the pipeline in 2019 but was unable to see a successful launch as the pandemic hit and disrupted everything.

That’s when I started to focus on and develop these current Covid-19 products. It really therefore was through necessity that these products were born.

Please keep donating, spreading the word and sharing. Your support for these Covid-19 products is crucial to our success! This won’t be possible without your support. Thank you for all that you have done so far!
story_txt: Hi,My name is Jazz Dhillon.I’m an independent inventor and in the last year I’ve been developing Covid-19 protection products. I thought long and hard about this problem, and how the virus spreads primarily in an airborne manner, and I’ve managed to design some brand new, totally unknown and novel technologies to defeat Covid-19. These are still at the concept stage. Please understand this, the concepts we’re currently working on have proved to be 100% effective in halting and arresting the spread of all variants of Covid-19 through our preliminary mock up tests. These concepts are based on the use of proven and existing techniques and technologies, but are utilized or employed in a much more function appropriate manner. They have proven highly effective in this new and novel format.They provide close to 100% protection against airborne transmission from the Covid-19 virus for school children attending classes, patrons frequenting various types of businesses, including restaurants, bars, hairdressers, beauty salons, dermatologists, dental offices and general offices. The CDC has established that the primary method of Covid-19 transmission is primarily through accumulation of airborne particles. We’re now looking to further develop these products through prototypes culminating with a final design. We’re also looking to patent these designs as the concept has already been proven This is what you are supporting. This is wholly where the funds raised through this campaign will be used.I’m currently at the point where I need to establish patents on these products in order to roll them out. I’m going to need to employ a prototyping firm for my prototypes and a Patent Attorney/Firm to write my patents quickly. This is where I need financial help to pay the prototyping firm and the Attorneys.The prototypes and patents are going to cost $250K. The patents will be filed with USPTO (United States Patent & Trademark Office).Naturally, I don’t need to stress the urgency of meeting this goal expeditiously, as we all understand that the sooner, we can reach full deployment of these technologies, the more lives we can save and bring an early end to this deadly scourge.I believe it’s a highly worthwhile endeavor if we can help the school kids and save the struggling businesses.The funds raised will cover the costs of the prototyping and the patents (the essential next step). I’m hoping to expedite these next two stages.Your support is crucial in ensuring that products get out expeditiously to have an immediate and profound impact in the lives of millions of people. Thank you in advance for your generosity and support. I appreciate all your help. Your donations will help me get closer to reaching my goal. I can’t do this without you.It’s ok if you don’t have the finances available to help us or donate, we understand that. We would also ask for your prayers, as we understand, that prayer is very powerful and lead to miracles. So, therefore, we can still all come together and be a participant in making this happen with whatever we are able to donate.Prayers and funding are both welcome. We need to protect our children, their future, their emotional and mental well-being.The sooner we can get these products up and running and out into the communities, the more lives we can save, and the sooner we can bring an end to this pandemic.Let’s make a difference together in this Covid-19 war.What I was Engaged in Before the Pandemic Hit:A primary product I had prototyped, completed and tested was Toothsaver. This product is a non-invasive, tooth infection zapping technology that is 100% effective in completely eliminating the bacterial infection, whilst avoiding the use of antibiotics. So that we are able to keep the full antibiotics efficacy for future generations and avoid the birth of new superbugs. Overuse of antibiotics has led to resistant strains of bacteria known as superbugs. The CDC and WHO have warned of this over prescribing trend.Shockingly, even today, people in rural parts of third world countries still die from tooth infections as septicemia sets in. However, I digress, we currently have bigger problems that we’re going to need to solve first, namely, the current pandemic.It is highly unfortunate that when it was time to patent and produce the Toothsaver product en masse, Covid-19 hit and changed everything. MORE INFORMATION:I believe that the correct technologies deployed strategically can make a world of difference to the spread of the infection rate. story:
Short Summary

Gary Pride, inventor of the Lorica Smart Fitness Vest has been in the fitness industry for 35 years, serving as Personal Trainer to more than 2500 clients. During his time training clients, Gary was focused on ways to improve “the perfect push-up”, because being able to do 200 in a row just was not enough. This “dilemma” was no match for his passion for invention and engineering, and it birthed the initial prototype, which ultimately became the Lorica Smart Fitness Vest.

The Lorica Smart Fitness Vest is our flagship product, born out of a dedication to creating the most efficient and technologically advanced workout products in the world, allowing for untethered, unbound and unconstrained exercise from anywhere.

The Lorica Smart Fitness Vest is a revolutionary and patent-pending, lightweight, compact and portable personal fitness system with state-of-the-art tension resistance, packaged into a scientific and ergonomic design that weighs under 6lbs and delivers more than 250+ combinations of exercises.

The Lorica Smart Fitness Vest strengthens every muscle group in the body via the easily adapted resistance training design. All upper body, lower body and core are delivered a gym-quality workout using one exquisitely designed device.

Whether you are a fitness enthusiast, weekend warrior, professional athlete, rehabilitating an injury, first responder, military personnel or senior, you don't have to do it alone. Join the Lorica Fitness online community. Lorica Smart Fitness Vest sensor technology and our team of certified trainers will be available to ensure that you get in shape while tracking your fitness journey.

 

KEY VEST SPECIFICATIONS

Sizes

-  Women:  XS / SM / M / L / XL / 2XL / 3XL  

-  Men - SM / M / L / XL / 2XL / 3XL / 4XL

*  Weighs under 6lbs

*  Lightweight, portable and compact

*  Stretchable, breathable and washable Lycra interior

*  Delivers muscle confusion and core body conditioning

*  Variety of interchangeable accessories providing the ultimate full body workout

*  Adjustable resistance up to 100lbs

*  Ability to withstand a minimum of 2500lbs of force

*  Bluetooth compatible, sensor and AI technology

*  Real time analysis of workouts, heart rate, BMI, pulse... 

 

SMALL SAMPLE of EXERCISES

UPPER BODY                                                                        
chest press~push ups~pullover~ single arm press~chest fly~high crossover~bent over fly~bicep curls~triceps extension~fit bar raise~single arm raise (side)~single arm raise (front)~military press~bent over press~overhead carry (hold)~More...

 
 

LOWER BODY                                                                        
squats~jump squats~squat & reach~elbow plank donkey kick~warrior 3~leg balance warrior 3~lunges~alternate side lunge~reverse lunge and kick~split leg jumps~lunge skips~single leg bridge lift~elevated split squat~lying flute lifts~side kicks~More...

 

 

CORE                                                                       
bicycles (laying on your back)~plank~ panther shoulder tap~ butterfly sit up~tabletop leg press~half kneeling wood chop~high boat to low boat~body saw~side bend~jackknife~single leg jackknife~hollow hold to jackknife~hip dip~wheelbarrow~leg raise~More...

 

 

ENDURANCE                                                                      
boxing exercises (jabs, uppercuts, hooks...)~scarecrows~walking lunges~lightweight pushups (:60 sec burns)~burpees w/pushups~burpees w/mountain climbers~tuck jumps~bear crawl~prone walkout~ski jumps~rope climb crunches~squat hold~pushup hold~split squat hold~ tempo pike pushup~More...

 

 

REHABILITATION & SPORT SPECIFIC EXERCISES
-  Baseball, Basketball, Boxing, Football, Golf, Mixed Martial Arts, Soccer, Swimming, Tennis...

 

- Rehabilitation: COMING SOON!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our $25,000 goal will go towards finalizing a manufacture-ready prototype and developing the mobile and web platforms.

 

STAGE A.  FINAL DESIGN & ENGINEERING

Final R&D and Product Improvements ~ Product Features and Functional Specification Determined ~ Technical Design and Feasibility & Mechanical Engineering ~ Industrial Design Concepting and Sketches ~ Ergonomic and Aesthetic Design ~ Materials Selection ~ 2D drawings and 3D Solidworks Modeling ~ Final Design Renderings

DELIVERABLE:  Final product design

 

STAGE B.  MANUFACTURE-READY PROTOTYPING 

Develop and Build Functional Manufacture-Ready Prototype ~ Test, Evaluate and Modify

DELIVERABLE:  Fully functional demonstration grade manufacture-ready prototype to scale and product specification

 

STAGE C.  MANUFACTURING PACKAGE

Manufacturing Package ~ Final Design + Engineering Drawings and Manufacturing Specifications ~ Comprehensive Bill of Material (BOM)

 

WEBSITE and APP DEVELOPMENT

Development Breakdown:  Planning ~ Functions and Features ~ UI/UX Design ~ Front-end Development ~ Backend Development ~ Testing ~ Beta App ~ Final App Build Test

HIGHLIGHTED FEATURES:

~  User Login

~  Push Notifications

~  Navigation

~  Chat/Messaging

~  In-App Purchases

~  Payments Integration

~  Synchronization Between Devices

~  Streaming

~  Search

~  Data Encryption

 

 

JOIN THE LORICAFIT COMMUNITY!

story:
What it can do

You can use Senzor to monitor your home, office, vacation home, even your hotel room when you are traveling or your tent when you are in the outdoors. 

Senzors will let you know if someone tries to break in, if your place is flooded or catches fire, or anything else unexpected happens.

Senzor can detect fire, water, noise, vibration, movement and light. So you can apply a Senzor on each door and window in your home so you can receive alerts if someone tries to enter or breaks a window or something else happens, like for example a fire.


Senzor is so precise that it's able to detect if someone knocks at your door, and send you a push notification as soon as it happens, so if you are not at home or if you're in a different part of the house and can't hear the door, having a Senzor on your door will help.

You can also use Senzors to locate lost items, pets, keys, purses, backpacks, stolen bicycles, or to quickly find your car in a parking lot.

Simply stick a Senzor to whatever you want to track and get a reading on its location on your mobile if up to 500 feet, or view its location on a map if it's farther away.


Shake a Senzor three times to locate your smartphone. This works even if you don't have the app installed or running in the background - Senzor is smart enough to detect that, and our cloud platform will give you an automated call through the phone network.

You can also use Senzor as a personal alarm device. Share your Senzors with your family and if you ever get in trouble simply tap the Senzor three times and everyone in your circle will get an alert along with your exact position, so they can provide help when needed. We are also in process of securing a deal with a very popular fashion designer to integrate Senzor into some very nice bracelets, purses, necklaces, we expect the first products to hit the market in spring 2017.

You can also use Senzors to monitor your servers or cabinets within a datacenter. Stick a Senzor on each server or on the cabinet door and collect temperature, vibration and access data in real time through our real time API.  

When attached to a server, Senzor is even able to detect malfunctioning magnetic drives (technology currently pending patent) and fans thanks to their vibration profiles, and you will be notified as soon as a drive or fan becomes likely to fail.

And if you have an older car that's not equipped with an alarm system you can stick a Senzor somewhere on the inside (usually behind the rear view mirror) and it will send you an alert if someone tries to break in or move your car.

Senzor is smart enough not to send false alarms. Using advanced predictive technology, depending on your location, when you are nearby it gradually lowers sensor sensitivity and/or turns itself off so you don't get annoyed by pointless notifications. 


Why is this product such a big deal

  • It is the world's smallest and lightest tracking device;
  • It also works as an alarm system for your home;
  • Costs less than any other alarm system or tracking device;
  • You get excellent coverage, Senzor just works anywhere;
  • Thanks to our recent advancement in super capacitor technology, is the first similar product in the world to work without batteries, wires or recharging;
  • It is the dawn of a new era for the Internet of Things;
  • Excellent integration with so many 3rd party platforms;
  • Virtually limitless applications.


Why you should care

Imagine: if we manage to lower these numbers by only 0.1% we will save thousands of lives and save people millions of dollars every year.


How does it work?

Senzors are small, self-powered devices that contain an advanced integrated circuit that detects movement, vibration, sound, fire, water, light.

Whenever a Senzor is triggered by any event, it will send a notification to your smartphone through bridges, other nearby Senzors, or other nearby smartphones.

When not in your direct Bluetooth range (which is about 500 feet/150 meters), the Senzor can be located using our mesh and crowd GPS network with accuracy down to about 50 meters, from anywhere in the world.

When within range you can find it using our new, patent-pending 3D tracking technology that shows you its exact position relative to yours.


How is it powered?

Senzor is the first device of its kind not to use any batteries, wires or recharging. It is the dawn of a new age of self-powered devices that harvest their energy from the environment. It is also the first device of its kind in the world to use super capacitors for energy storage. 

Thanks to 2 years of research and hard work, we were able to design a super capacitor that has twice the capacity of similar sized products and the ability to withstand about 10 million charge/discharge cycles.

This new amazing technology is currently generating multiple patents and will likely find thousands of other applications by the end of the decade.


Technical details

Senzor is built on top of a custom module we have designed around a Cortex M0 microcontroller, an energy harvesting IC, a suite of sensors and on-board Bluetooth and antenna. It also contains a super capacitor that can store up to 30 Farads in real life conditions, and delivers outstanding performance for up to 10 million cycles - that's over 1000 years of continuous functioning. The entire circuit is assembled on an ultra-thin flexible board that allows the Senzor to bend to a certain degree and also makes it up to 5 millimeters thinner than any other similar device currently on the market. 

Our design is solid, tested and currently pending multiple patents within the USA, the EU and several Asian countries.

The Senzor is cast into a special polymer resin that ensures the Senzor stays waterproof, does not crack or break when dropped, bent, sat on, and also provides excellent heat and vibration conductivity so the energy harvesting component works under almost any conditions. Forget sandblasted aluminum and plastic, Senzors are more durable and also look and feel much, much better.

The Senzor has no moving parts or connectors. All its features are gesture-controlled - taps or shakes. There are no buttons that break in time, or openings that would allow for water and dust to get inside.

We are able to provide Senzors in 6 base colors (black, white, blue, green, yellow, orange) and 24 different combinations of colors and gloss levels. 

We even designed a custom, unique perfume to give Senzors a very nice scent, more information about this particular feature will be available very soon through our website. Let's call it a surprise for now.

Senzors connect to the internet through: 

  • other Senzors nearby that can relay communication (basically, a mesh network);
  • the Senzor app installed on any Bluetooth-enabled smartphone in range;
  • WiFi and 3G/4G bridges that we will provide to an increasing number of locations worldwide;
  • other open networks that provide open Bluetooth connectivity.

Senzor's radio chipset is currently pending FCC and CE certifications, we expect our paperwork to come out within the following 6 weeks, so there will be no delays.

Senzors connect through SSL-encrypted channels to our global cloud network that keeps track of each individual Senzor and its status and location in real time, and delivers instant notifications to the account owners or through APIs and any of the integrations below.

Senzor integrates with...

API and SDK available for...

 If required by a specific application, Senzors can be re-programmed through the Arduino IDE and over-the-air programming. You will also need a Bluetooth dongle and sample source code from our upcoming Github repo. Note that we do not offer replacement under warranty for bricked Senzors.
Timeline

At this time we have a functional prototype and all suppliers and manufacturers lined up. 

On our end we would like to improve the UI design on the mobile apps so we can get them published before the first Senzors ship out.

Senzors will be ready and shipped to backers in December 2016.


Use of funds
  • finalize packaging (promise: no plastic clamshells);
  • build a first batch of as many Senzors as possible;
  • build and deploy as many Wifi/3G bridges to as many locations as possible;
  • improve UI design for the free apps (iOs and Android);
  • publish 3rd party integrations and code samples.


Why is this on Indiegogo?

We are a bootstrapped, self funded company operating since 2003 and we had success with our other products without ever looking for VC or crowdfunding. Senzor is a by-product and falls slightly outside of our core business area. Two years ago when we came up with the idea for Senzor we thought it can help a lot of people, however we are not in a position to further invest into this product at this time. If our crowdfunding campaign is successful the product will hit the market, otherwise it will end up in another box in our archive room.


Risks & Challenges

With any project there may be some risks and challenges, however this is not the case with Senzor. It is an amazingly simple, fail-proof system that just can’t fail. At this point we have fully tested and functional prototypes, the entire cloud infrastructure set up, all apps and APIs, and we are about to apply some final UI improvements and start producing Senzors at scale.

Since we already have working relationships in place with component suppliers, manufacturing and assembly plants, packaging and shipping companies, we won’t be facing any difficulties getting the job done on time.

Please note: because Senzors require heat and/or light and/or vibration in order to function, if you live in a state or country such as Alaska or Northern Norway or Finland where it's cold and dark for more than 3-4 months in a row each year, Senzor may not work properly for you, so please contact us before backing the project so we can confirm if you can use the product.


Our team

We are a seasoned team of developers and engineers currently operating in the online gaming sector. We love creating all sorts of gadgets, mobile apps, high performance software and cloud-based solutions.
To date we have built games, websites, security solutions, a dating website and app, sports applications, solutions for the gaming industry as well as all sorts of miniature, low power electronic gadgets.
We are currently incorporated in 7 countries including the US and UK.
Learn more about our company and team on our website Supersenzor.com.


Questions?

Please drop us a line - we always appreciate fresh ideas!  

To reach us by e-mail: 

General inquiries: info@supersenzor.com

Press: media@supersenzor.com

Resellers: sales@supersenzor.com

You can also say hi on Twitter  @supersenzor or on our Facebook page Senzor.

To learn more about the Senzor team: www.supersenzor.com
story_txt:
What it can do

You can use Senzor to monitor your home, office, vacation home, even your hotel room when you are traveling or your tent when you are in the outdoors. 
Senzors will let you know if someone tries to break in, if your place is flooded or catches fire, or anything else unexpected happens.

Senzor can detect fire, water, noise, vibration, movement and light. So you can apply a Senzor on each door and window in your home so you can receive alerts if someone tries to enter or breaks a window or something else happens, like for example a fire.

Senzor is so precise that it's able to detect if someone knocks at your door, and send you a push notification as soon as it happens, so if you are not at home or if you're in a different part of the house and can't hear the door, having a Senzor on your door will help.

You can also use Senzors to locate lost items, pets, keys, purses, backpacks, stolen bicycles, or to quickly find your car in a parking lot.
Simply stick a Senzor to whatever you want to track and get a reading on its location on your mobile if up to 500 feet, or view its location on a map if it's farther away.



Shake a Senzor three times to locate your smartphone. This works even if you don't have the app installed or running in the background - Senzor is smart enough to detect that, and our cloud platform will give you an automated call through the phone network.
You can also use Senzor as a personal alarm device. Share your Senzors with your family and if you ever get in trouble simply tap the Senzor three times and everyone in your circle will get an alert along with your exact position, so they can provide help when needed. We are also in process of securing a deal with a very popular fashion designer to integrate Senzor into some very nice bracelets, purses, necklaces, we expect the first products to hit the market in spring 2017.
You can also use Senzors to monitor your servers or cabinets within a datacenter. Stick a Senzor on each server or on the cabinet door and collect temperature, vibration and access data in real time through our real time API.  
When attached to a server, Senzor is even able to detect malfunctioning magnetic drives (technology currently pending patent) and fans thanks to their vibration profiles, and you will be notified as soon as a drive or fan becomes likely to fail.
And if you have an older car that's not equipped with an alarm system you can stick a Senzor somewhere on the inside (usually behind the rear view mirror) and it will send you an alert if someone tries to break in or move your car.
Senzor is smart enough not to send false alarms. Using advanced predictive technology, depending on your location, when you are nearby it gradually lowers sensor sensitivity and/or turns itself off so you don't get annoyed by pointless notifications. 


Why is this product such a big deal

It is the world's smallest and lightest tracking device;
It also works as an alarm system for your home;
Costs less than any other alarm system or tracking device;
You get excellent coverage, Senzor just works anywhere;
Thanks to our recent advancement in super capacitor technology, is the first similar product in the world to work without batteries, wires or recharging;
It is the dawn of a new era for the Internet of Things;
Excellent integration with so many 3rd party platforms;
Virtually limitless applications.


Why you should care



Imagine: if we manage to lower these numbers by only 0.1% we will save thousands of lives and save people millions of dollars every year.




How does it work?
Senzors are small, self-powered devices that contain an advanced integrated circuit that detects movement, vibration, sound, fire, water, light.
Whenever a Senzor is triggered by any event, it will send a notification to your smartphone through bridges, other nearby Senzors, or other nearby smartphones.
When not in your direct Bluetooth range (which is about 500 feet/150 meters), the Senzor can be located using our mesh and crowd GPS network with accuracy down to about 50 meters, from anywhere in the world.
When within range you can find it using our new, patent-pending 3D tracking technology that shows you its exact position relative to yours.


How is it powered?

Senzor is the first device of its kind not to use any batteries, wires or recharging. It is the dawn of a new age of self-powered devices that harvest their energy from the environment. It is also the first device of its kind in the world to use super capacitors for energy storage. 
Thanks to 2 years of research and hard work, we were able to design a super capacitor that has twice the capacity of similar sized products and the ability to withstand about 10 million charge/discharge cycles.
This new amazing technology is currently generating multiple patents and will likely find thousands of other applications by the end of the decade.


Technical details

Senzor is built on top of a custom module we have designed around a Cortex M0 microcontroller, an energy harvesting IC, a suite of sensors and on-board Bluetooth and antenna. It also contains a super capacitor that can store up to 30 Farads in real life conditions, and delivers outstanding performance for up to 10 million cycles - that's over 1000 years of continuous functioning. The entire circuit is assembled on an ultra-thin flexible board that allows the Senzor to bend to a certain degree and also makes it up to 5 millimeters thinner than any other similar device currently on the market. 
Our design is solid, tested and currently pending multiple patents within the USA, the EU and several Asian countries.
The Senzor is cast into a special polymer resin that ensures the Senzor stays waterproof, does not crack or break when dropped, bent, sat on, and also provides excellent heat and vibration conductivity so the energy harvesting component works under almost any conditions. Forget sandblasted aluminum and plastic, Senzors are more durable and also look and feel much, much better.
The Senzor has no moving parts or connectors. All its features are gesture-controlled - taps or shakes. There are no buttons that break in time, or openings that would allow for water and dust to get inside.
We are able to provide Senzors in 6 base colors (black, white, blue, green, yellow, orange) and 24 different combinations of colors and gloss levels. 
We even designed a custom, unique perfume to give Senzors a very nice scent, more information about this particular feature will be available very soon through our website. Let's call it a surprise for now.
Senzors connect to the internet through: 

other Senzors nearby that can relay communication (basically, a mesh network);
the Senzor app installed on any Bluetooth-enabled smartphone in range;
WiFi and 3G/4G bridges that we will provide to an increasing number of locations worldwide;
other open networks that provide open Bluetooth connectivity.

Senzor's radio chipset is currently pending FCC and CE certifications, we expect our paperwork to come out within the following 6 weeks, so there will be no delays.
Senzors connect through SSL-encrypted channels to our global cloud network that keeps track of each individual Senzor and its status and location in real time, and delivers instant notifications to the account owners or through APIs and any of the integrations below.
Senzor integrates with...


API and SDK available for...

 If required by a specific application, Senzors can be re-programmed through the Arduino IDE and over-the-air programming. You will also need a Bluetooth dongle and sample source code from our upcoming Github repo. Note that we do not offer replacement under warranty for bricked Senzors.

Timeline
At this time we have a functional prototype and all suppliers and manufacturers lined up. 
On our end we would like to improve the UI design on the mobile apps so we can get them published before the first Senzors ship out.
Senzors will be ready and shipped to backers in December 2016.

Use of funds


finalize packaging (promise: no plastic clamshells);
build a first batch of as many Senzors as possible;
build and deploy as many Wifi/3G bridges to as many locations as possible;
improve UI design for the free apps (iOs and Android);
publish 3rd party integrations and code samples.





Why is this on Indiegogo?
We are a bootstrapped, self funded company operating since 2003 and we had success with our other products without ever looking for VC or crowdfunding. Senzor is a by-product and falls slightly outside of our core business area. Two years ago when we came up with the idea for Senzor we thought it can help a lot of people, however we are not in a position to further invest into this product at this time. If our crowdfunding campaign is successful the product will hit the market, otherwise it will end up in another box in our archive room.

With any project there may be some risks and challenges, however this is not the case with Senzor. It is an amazingly simple, fail-proof system that just can’t fail. At this point we have fully tested and functional prototypes, the entire cloud infrastructure set up, all apps and APIs, and we are about to apply some final UI improvements and start producing Senzors at scale.
Since we already have working relationships in place with component suppliers, manufacturing and assembly plants, packaging and shipping companies, we won’t be facing any difficulties getting the job done on time.

Our team
We are a seasoned team of developers and engineers currently operating in the online gaming sector. We love creating all sorts of gadgets, mobile apps, high performance software and cloud-based solutions.
To date we have built games, websites, security solutions, a dating website and app, sports applications, solutions for the gaming industry as well as all sorts of miniature, low power electronic gadgets.
We are currently incorporated in 7 countries including the US and UK.
Learn more about our company and team on our website Supersenzor.com.
