story:
ChiaraMail--The Only Consumer-ready Solution to Securing Your E-mail. 

The End of Spying. 

The End of Spoofing and Phishing. 

And much more.

PRIVACY AND SAFETY ARE FUNDAMENTAL RIGHTS. Everyone in the world has the right to keep their communications private. Just as a piece of physical mail between two parties is private, so should be electronic mail. Likewise, everyone is entitled to protection from predators seeking to steal their property or their identities through spoofing and phishing attacks.

Two of the biggest dangers on the Internet are threats to our e-mail privacy and spoofing. Governments, both foreign and domestic, not to mention well-known tech companies, browse our mail on a regular basis, often without our knowledge or consent. Every week, it seems, brings new revelations of outrageous acts of surveillance. And cyber-terrorists, both state sponsored and others, are obtaining sensitive information, such as bank credentials, Social Security numbers and driver license numbers, through well-orchestrated phishing attacks initiated by e-mail spoofs. Even mail purportedly from a friend is suspect and reading it risks installing a worm or virus on our computers which could compromise security and lead to disastrous financial and data losses.

No government, mail provider, or any other person should have the ability to read your e-mail without your permission, period. You need to stand up for your rights and take action because today your e-mail IS being hacked.

Solutions to the threat of e-mail security generally take the form of end-to-end encryption, a complicated, inelegant process and one that is impractical for consumer use. As for spoofing detection and prevention, up until now, there has been no totally effective solution.

An Elegant Solution--Envelope-Content Splitting

These are issues that we at ChiaraMail have been working on for years. How do we keep your communications private without the hassle and weaknesses of encryption? How can we prevent phishing attacks arising from spoofing and originating anywhere? We invented a simple and elegant solution that we now want to bring to the world that not only secures all of your communications and restores your fundamental right to privacy, but that also protects you from all phishing attacks arising from e-mail address spoofing.

ChiaraMail is based on Envelope-Content Splitting, or ECS, a technology that can provide a highly-effective defense against both e-mail spying and phishing attacks. ECS works by removing, or splitting off, the message content from the mail headers and sending the content, via a secure link, to a content server. Thus, since the content is no longer part of the message, your mail service provider's servers do not have access to your content and end-to-end encryption becomes unnecessary. Furthermore, by using an innovative authentication process, would-be spoofers are stopped in their tracks, unable to deliver the mail content or files they need for a successful phishing attack. 



The ChiaraMail content server--More Secure than Google and ProtonMail

Qualys  SSL Labs is an independent company providing online server vulnerability testing. As part of their evaluation, Google received a security rating of "B", while the ChiaraMail servers received "A+". This validation of our server security by one of the top Internet security firms in the world is a result of our meticulous work at hardening the content server and we hope it assures our users and customers of the safety of their e-mail content.

As for ProtonMail, their security solution requires JavaScript and is inherently insecure (as pointed out in a review by BestVPN and by others). As ProtonMail themselves put it, 

"If you are Edward Snowden, or the next Edward Snowden, and have a life and death situation that requires privacy, we would not recommend using ProtonMail."

Something to think about.

ECS works with ALL your e-mail addresses

Some e-mail security solutions don't work with your usual e-mail addresses and make you use a special one for secure mail and your normal address for other types of messages. Not ChiaraMail. You can use ECS with any e-mail address that supports IMAP and SMTP: Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Microsoft, AOL... Just configure your mail accounts with an ECS-enabled mail client as you would with an ordinary e-mail program and begin immediately to enjoy all the benefits of this technology.

But there’s more…

Besides keeping your e-mail safe from eavesdroppers and thieves and protecting you from spoofing, ECS also enables you to keep control of your e-mail after you've sent it: change your content, delete it, even make it disappear several seconds after it had been read. Want to send large attachments directly to your recipients, without the hassle of first uploading them to a third-party cloud storage service, such as Dropbox or Google Drive? Yep, ECS lets you do that, too.

ChiaraMail for Android, available right now

ChiaraMail currently offers ECS via an Android client, which you can download for free from Google Play. ChiaraMail for Android is an easy-to-use, full-function, ECS-enabled mobile client and is intended to be the first weapon in our assault against cyber-terrorists and others bent on robbing you of your property and privacy. 

ECS Support for iOS, Windows, Mac OS and Beyond

With your help, we will be able to continue our work in making the Internet safe and secure for everyone. Your contribution will help pay for network costs, continued software development for other platforms and e-mail clients, including iOS, Mac OS, Windows, Mozilla Thunderbird and MS Outlook and enable us to get the word out to the rest of the world that the end has come for spoofers and privacy intrusion by governments and businesses. From people who are fighting for basic liberties to average citizens wishing to preserve their e-mail privacy and protect themselves from Internet scammers -- ChiaraMail is for you. For everyone. Help us bring e-mail into the 21st Century.

story:
This journey of Health, Hope, Healing started in 1983. We have been here long enough to earn your trust.
You have helped us make difference in the lives of those who had lost all hope.
You showed your support after the 2005 earthquake and we were able to send truck loads of household and edible items to hard-to-reach areas.
You showed support at the times of 2010 floods and we were able to again help them build their lives again.
You continuously send your donations which help us organize free medical camps.

Why stop here?

Why not continue to give your Zakat/Sadaqah/charities towards causes like
Educate a child
Teach Skills to young people
Provide free medical help
Pay for life saving surgeries
Pay for the needs of orphans

And the list goes on....

Please check out our website www.townmedicalservices.org for all our campaigns and where your contributions go.

By donating, you are helping your fellow countrymen make a living for themselves and support their families. You are helping towards our goal of eliminating begging. You are helping your fellow countrymen become responsible citizens. You are bringing back their trust in humanity.

Your support will create the ripple effect we need at this time. In return they will help and support others and become self sufficient. We owe this to our societies.

Making donation is not the only way you can help. You can help us get the word out and make some noise about OUR campaign. 

You can also volunteer with us. The young people you see in pictures are all volunteers! Hats off to them and a big THANK YOU!

Please share this to all your friends and family!

We are all in it TOGETHER!

story:
STEMS Robotics is a high tech company specializing in development of UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle) or drones. Our goal is to further advance UAV's hardware and software in order to improve existing applications and create new ones. Our team consists of highly experienced software and hardware engineers, mathematicians and programmers.

Currently, our team is on the final stages of developing public cloud based UAV flight control platform. In other words, through our platform you can control  your or our UAV on your browser from anywhere in the world through our website www.stems-robotics.com.

Stems Robotics is introducing a new concept of tourism,  REAL TIME VIRTUAL TOURISM (V-Tourism) using our STEMS Drones.  We will offer you visual experience of world’s most popular tourist attractions such as Great White Wall, Pyramids, Eiffel Tower from convenience of your home.

Just imagine, experiencing the world by controlling the flight of STEMS Drone as easy as playing video games on your PC with simple command buttons and clear interface.

___________________________________________________________________________

Main Advantages:

____________________________________________________________________________

User Interface Features:

____________________________________________________________________________
Hardware:
    • Our original software, STEMS GT Platform,  is developed specifically to control STEMS Drones for our application and uniquely autonomous
    • We utilize specially modified high capacity drones which have long flight time and equipped with HD cameras for superior video and photo shots
    • User interface with highly advanced algorithms and mathematical models which can be expanded to be used in other applications in various industries
    • In-house developed Raspberry Pi shield board with sensors, GPS, 3G, 4G/LTE modem, and high speed video transmission modules.

      _____________________________________________________________________________

      _____________________________________________________________________________

      Selection #1 of Landmarks:

      For the first stage of the journey, our team will take you to the most popular landmarks of Mongolia, homeland of the Great mongol, Genghis Khan who was the one that lead a nation which established the biggest empire in human history.

      Landmark 1 -Stature of Genghis Khan

      40 meter (or 131 ft) tall at Tsonjin Boldog (54 km or 33.55 mi) east of  UB

                        


      Landmark 2 - Gandan Tegchlen Monastery

      Gandan Tegchlen Monastery is the biggest Buddhist Monastery in Mongolia, which dates back to 18th century. The monastery houses one of the biggest stature of Buddha which stands 26.5m high.

       

      Landmark 3 -  Nomadic lifestyle of ancient Mongolia


      ____________________________________________________________________________

      Stretch Goals-$500,000

      ·  Cover all Mongolian natural wonders and celebrations

      ·  Develop image processing and visual recognition technology

      ·  Fully automatic battery swap technology (on-land battery station) research and development

      ·  Obstacle sense and avoid technology

      Stretch Goals-$1,000,000 and more

      • Deploy our infrastructure globally
      • Artificial intelligence research and development.

      _____________________________________________________________________________

      Our Team:

story:
Nani Premium HydraSmart Thermal Bottle:

Smart Drinking On-the-go 

Nani Premium HydraSmart Thermal Bottle aims to make drinking safe and enjoyable for everyone.

Savor each delectable sip 

At Nani, we know how important it is to keep your favorite drink at the perfect temperature to last the day. With the latest HydraSmart temperature-sensing technology, the Nani bottle monitors the temperature of your beverage and displays it conveniently on a LED indicator. 

Achieve Your Hydration Goals

Nani HydraSmart Thermal Bottle allows you to achieve your hydration goals and support a healthy lifestyle. 

Key Functions:

Keep yourself well-hydrated on the go, anywhere

Set your daily hydration goal and timely reminders using our app. 

The HydraSmart App

Enjoy your favorite beverage at your desired temperature anytime on the go. With the Smart app, you can set timely reminders to keep yourself well-hydrated throughout the day. 

- Product Description -

- Our Story -

Prototypes of the Nani have already been manufactured and they have been keeping us hydrated and keeping our drinks at the hot and cold temperature for 24 hours! Our next step is to perfect the design and functionality even further. Our suppliers and partners are in place and ready to produce quality parts at our desired quantity, then the Nani Smart Thermal Tumbler can go into mass production.

We all know life isn’t predictable no matter how much planning we do. With this in mind, we are fully prepared for any eventualities and will tackle any problems we face head on.

We will be sure to keep you updated throughout the campaign and into the distant future! Please ask us as many questions as you like and feel free to leave any feedback you have about the Nani Premium HydraSmart Thermal Bottle.

With your support we can make Nani happen!

Timeline

-FAQ-

1. Which mobile devices is Nani compatible with?
Nani has its own mobile app that is compatible with both IOS and Android phones which have Bluetooth 4.0 or later.

2. What languages does Nani support?
Nani currently supports both English and Chinese.

3.  What type of materials will my drinks be in contact with?
You will only come into contact with food-grade stainless steel and BPA free plastics.

4. How do I wash Nani?
Nani's waterproof design of IPX7 is compatible with hand-washing. As Nani is an electronic device it shouldn’t be put in the microwave or the dishwasher.

5. Who is responsible for additional taxes, duties or VAT?
The backer is responsible for these costs.

6. When will you arrange shipment of Nani?
Once we receive the funds from Indiegogo, we will send out the Nani within 10 days. We will track the shipping information and keep you notified of any changes.

Thank you! 

Referral's SURE-WIN Perks

From Nani's Team

story:
ULTRO: The Ultimate Edge in Gaming and Sports

Gamers and those who participate in high-speed sports are always looking for an edge. Gamers upgrade internet connections, processors, RAM, graphic cards; sports enthusiasts change their shoes, clothing, rackets or clubs... even if the advantages over your opponent are minimal. While we can tweak and re-tweak, ULTRO edges your most critical component: your brain. 

ULTRO uses proprietary sound technology to accelerate your brain’s internal clock. By giving your brain a brief burst of speed, ULTRO can increase your reaction times by up to 10%. With ULTRO, you perceive your opponent in slower motion, giving you more time to predict their reactions.

The ULTRO effect is well documented. Professional competitors of high-speed racquet sports report the same comparable effect you can achieve with ULTRO, that of being "in the zone." Similarly, ULTRO produces what the military commonly calls "bullet-time", where soldiers involved in firefights report that time seems to slow down.

The result? ULTRO delivers faster reactions in gameplay, allowing you to better predict your opponent's moves.

The science behind ULTRO

ULTRO is based on the successful application of scalar timing, or scalar expectancy theory (SET), the concept that humans possess an arousal-sensitive internal clock used to perform timing tasks. Exposing the brain to repetitive stimulation, particularly in the form of periodic sounds, will almost always increase the subjective duration of any stimulation it precedes or accompanies. Phew!

 

            

The ULTRO app

With your support, we will complete and launch the ULTRO app that will deliver the ULTRO experience. 

To "pop an ULTRO" you will open the app and tap. You hear a 5-second ULTRO, then you're good to go! You can pop as many ULTRO's as you want, and rate your last ULTRO (recommended) so that our algorithm can continuously improve your performance.

Click here to pop an ULTRO

What We Have, What We Need and What You Get

What we have:

  • The proprietary ULTRO algorithms to deliver an optimum ULTRO experience.
  • Over 8 million unique and proprietary ULTRO's.
  • Implemented the system to manage the ULTRO assets and user experience.
  • The ULTRO app UI template.

We need your support:

  • To create the user-facing ULTRO app for iOS and Android, and an Apple Watch version. With your support, we can complete, test and launch the ULTRO app.
  • Once the app is in beta, complete a new study using the beta ULTRO app and our App Beta Testers (see below), then use the results to further tweak the algorithms and UI, prior to release.
  • App Beta Testers:  only available to Originators, who will be invited to beta the ULTRO app.

What you get:

  • Become one of the first to benefit from the ULTRO edge to boost your gaming or sporting experience, ahead of your opponents.
  • One year subscription to the ULTRO app from $39, a 60% discount (see Perks.) At launch, the ULTRO app will be available to the public as a monthly subscription @ $11.99, or annually @ $99. 

Risks & Challenges

The science is proven and the assets in place, but any project has risks and challenges:

  • There may be technical issues with the app development that could set back the launch date.  
  • Combined results from the study and beta testers, which may trigger a delay in launch to incorporate any welcome improvements to the algorithm, UI or user experience.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we appreciate it if you can please get the word out and make some noise about the ULTRO campaign using the Indiegogo share tools! You can also follow us on Instagram @ultro.app

story:
Y-I-M-FAT.com

My name is Jeff Savitz & I am an Ivy League trained professor of research. I fought the fat gene all my life both physically & psychologically & finally won after I developed the program that I am sharing with you. It all started when I was 6 years old & over the years my weight rose & fell reaching a maximum of 290 lbs. 

None of the weight loss programs I have tried worked because they presume that overweight & obese people can eat in moderation. Wrong! This program enables users to look up the lbs associated with whatever they eat (with a database of nearly 100,000 foods and beverages) & drop a handful to achieve their goals for the long haul.  For example, one 20 oz soda daily means 27 lbs a year, 4 oz of steak/day is 32 lbs/year, & 2 slices of pepperoni pizza/day is 64 lbs/year! In addition the program features a training video every week for the first year. A certified trainer trains me & I pledge to lose 24 more lbs in the first year. Additionally, I will act as people's role model & coach so they can meet their goals too. No overweight person really likes to do exercise so I’ve made the videos fun.  In fact, I dance at the end of each video!!! I hope to make America healthy starting with you & your family and friends if you need it!

I would like to raise $250,000 to further develop the app, hire & train the right people for the company, produce top grade exercise videos & promote the app on social media with a significant advertising budget. 

The retail price for the app is going to be $20 for the year. I would like to offer donors a year subscription for $15. For any contributions made above that, half of the money will be donated to organizations dedicated to conquering diabetes. For example, if you donate $35, $10 will go to conquer diabetes. For anyone who donates $5 or more but less than $15, we will acknowledge their name for helping develop the app. The app is free for limited use to all people. Currently it enables window shoppers the option for 10 free food & activity lookups & one training video. 

The program is a means for which Americans can finally get healthy once & for all.

You can help us by keeping up-to-date with us on social media & helping us share our campaign! Follow me, the founder, on Twitter (@ProfessorSavitz), Y-I-M-FAT on Instagram (yimfat) and Y-I-M-FAT on Facebook. 

Whether you can contribute or not please share this app with your friends & family & help them to live a healthier & longer life.

Remember the initial use is free!

Sincerely,

Jeff

story:
What is Goldkind.Pro?

Goldkind.Pro is the simplest solution to protect a baby or infant against pulse-modulated radiation. There is no cheaper alternative to achieve this protection. 

Goldkind.pro comes in two different versions, as a complete crib with integrated radiation protection or as retrofitting radiation protection canopy.

Goldkind.Pro is a complete solution which makes it possible to reduce the radiation by up to 99.999%, which is emitted day and night by more and more Wi-Fi capable devices, cordless telephones, mobile phones, etc. Goldkind.Pro fabric provides an attenuation of the electromagnetic radiation of up to 55 dB.

In combination with the Goldkind.Pro radiation protection underlay, which also reliably eliminates high frequency electromagnetic radiation from below, your child will have a very comfortable, calming break from the influences of the technological world.

 

Features & technical data:

  • Shielding against high frequency electromagnetic radiation
  • Dermatologically tested
  • Made in Germany
  • Attenuation (dB): up to 55 dB
  • Attenuation (%): up to 99,999 %
  • Frequency range: 100 MHz to 18 GHz
  • Complete solution
  • Air permeable
  • Highly transparent
  • Antibacterial, fungicidal (reduces bacteria, odour, etc.)
  • Shielding material: Silver
  • Thickness: 0,2 mm
  • Small packing size
  • Easy handling, easy set-up

 

What will be better with Goldkind.Pro?

You need considerable specialised knowledge and highly complex technology (power circuit breakers, measuring devices, etc.) to shield yourself from high frequency electromagnetic radiation, which all in all is very expensive. Goldkind.Pro is the best and easiest way to protect your child from high frequency electromagnetic radiation where it spends most of the day.

 

How does the Goldkind radiation protection work?

The special surface of the Goldkind.Pro fabric absorbs the impacting electromagnetic radiation. The encapsulating from all sides creates an effective radiation protection for your child.

 
 

What is so special about Goldkind.Pro?

Goldkind.Pro has been specially developed for the radiation protection of infants and children. The Goldkind.Pro fabric is manufactured exclusively for this application. Not only the effective shielding against high frequency radiation, but also the dermatological compatibility were at the centre of the development of the fabric. The Goldkind.Pro fabric has been dermatologically tested and meets the strict criteria of the Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex for baby items. Goldkind.Pro is completely manufactured in Germany. When choosing the materials, we proceed with the utmost care.

 
 

Timeline

 
 

Campaign goal

We want to make a valuable contribution to future generations, to protect against unforeseen consequences of high frequency electromagnetic radiation during the sensitive early childhood development.

We need your support to enable a serial manufacturing of high quality radiation protection cribs and canopies.

 

 

Our motivation 

Even the German Federal Office for Radiation Protection advises: "Especially important is the minimization of radiation exposure for children. They are still in development and could therefore be more sensitive to health ."

We want to create a solution to minimize the radiation exposure for infants and children without giving up all the technology at home. 

 

The Team

Starting left: Dipl.-Ing. (TH) Dietmar Heimes, CEO; Nikola Huckestein, practitioner; Kathrin Rameil, practitioner; Jutta Kohzer, practitioner; Sabine Hessmann, practitioner; Guido Falke, production; Stephan Becker, Development

 

Spread the word!

Even if you don't need a radiation protection crib, please help us make the world a little better:

  • Share the link to our campaign with your friends: www.goldkind.pro
  • Like us on Facebook

 

Refer friends and save money

For every successful referral we will give you back 10% of the purchase price of your Goldkind.pro product. To earn your refund it is important to use your personal link. You will receive detailed instructions when purchasing a perk.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Deutsch

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

Was ist Goldkind.pro?

Goldkind.pro ist die einfachste Lösung um ein Baby oder Kleinkind vor impulsmodulierter Strahlung zu schützen. Es gibt keine günstigere Alternative um diesen Schutz zu erreichen.

Goldkind.pro gibt es als vollständiges Kinderbett mit integriertem Strahlenschutzbaldachin oder als Strahlenschutzbaldachin zum Nachrüsten.

Goldkind.pro ist eine Komplettlösung die es ermöglicht, bis zu 99,999% der Strahlen zu reduzieren, die durch immer mehr WLAN-fähige Geräte, Schnurlostelefone, Mobilfunktelefone, etc. Tag und Nacht auf uns wirken. Das Goldkind.pro Gewebe bietet eine Dämpfung der elektromagnetischen Strahlen von bis zu 55 dB.

In Kombination mit dem Goldkind.pro Bettbezug, der auch von unten zuverlässig hochfrequente elektromagnetische Strahlen nahezu vollständig eliminiert, findet Ihr Kind in seinem Bettchen eine beruhigende Pause vor den Einflüssen der technisierten Welt.

 

Eigenschaften & Technische Daten:

  • Abschirmung gegen hochfrequente, elektromagnetische Strahlung
  • Dermatologisch getestet
  • Made in Germany
  • Dämpfung (dB): bis zu 55 dB
  • Dämpfung (%): bis zu 99,999 %
  • Frequenzbereich: 100 MHz bis 18 GHz
  • Komplettlösung
  • Sehr luftdurchlässig
  • Hochtransparent
  • Antibakteriell, Fungizid (reduziert Bakterien, Geruch usw.)
  • Abschirmmaterial: Silber
  • Dicke: 0,2 mm
  • Kleine Verpackungsgröße
  • Leichte Handhabung, leichter Aufbau

 

Was wird durch Goldkind.Pro besser?

Man benötigt viel Spezialwissen und hochkomplexe Technik (Stromfreischalter, Messgeräte, etc.), um sich von hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung abzuschirmen, was in Summe sehr teuer ist. Goldkind.pro ist die beste und einfachste Möglichkeit, um Ihr Kind vor hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung dort zu schützen, wo es die meiste Zeit des Tages verbringt.

 

Wie funktioniert der Goldkind Strahlenschutz?

Die Spezialoberfläche des Goldkind.pro-Gewebes absorbiert die auftreffende elektromagnetische Einstrahlung. Durch die Umhüllung von allen Seiten entsteht so ein wirksamer Strahlenschutz für Ihr Kind.

 
 

Was ist das besondere an Goldkind.pro?

Goldkind.pro ist speziell für den Strahlenschutz von Säuglingen und Kindern entwickelt worden. Das Goldkind.pro-Gewebe wird exklusiv für diese Anwendung gefertigt. Nicht nur die wirksame Abschirmung gegen hochfrequente Strahlung, sondern auch die dermatologische Verträglichkeit standen im Mittelpunkt bei der Entwicklung des Gewebes. Das Goldkind.pro Gewebe ist dermatologisch getestet und erfüllt die strengen Kriterien des Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex für Babyartikel. Goldkind.Pro wird vollständig in Deutschland hergestellt. Bei der Auswahl der Materialien gehen wir mit größter Sorgfalt vor. 

 
 

Timeline

 
 

Kampagnenziel

Wir wollen einen wertvollen Beitrag für kommende Generationen leisten, zum Schutz vor unabsehbaren Folgen von hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung in der empfindlichen frühkindlichen Entwicklung.

Wir benötigen Eure Unterstützung, um eine Serienmanufaktur für hochwertige Strahlenschutz-Kinderbetten und -Baldachine zu ermöglichen.

 

Was uns bewegt 

Sogar das Bundesamt für Strahlenschutz rät: „Ganz besonders wichtig ist die Minimierung der Strahlenbelastung für Kinder. Sie befinden sich noch in der Entwicklung und könnten deshalb gesundheitlich empfindlicher reagieren.“

Wir möchten eine Lösung schaffen um die Strahlenbelastung für Säuglinge und Kinder zu minimieren ohne auf sämtliche Technik im Haushalt verzichten zu müssen. 

 

Das Team

Von links nach rechts: Dipl.-Ing. (TH) Dietmar Heimes, Geschäftsführer; Nikola Huckestein, HP; Kathrin Rameil, HP; Jutta Kohzer, HP; Sabine Hessmann, HP; Guido Falke, Produktion; Stephan Becker, Entwicklung

  

Sag es weiter!

Auch wenn Du selbst kein Strahlenschutzkinderbett benötigst, kannst du uns helfen die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen:

  • Teile den Link zur Kampagne mit deinen Freunden: www.goldkind.pro
  • Like uns auf Facebook

 

Empfehle Goldkind.pro und spare Geld

Für jede erfolgreiche Empfehlung geben wir dir 10% vom Kaufpreis deines Goldkind.pro Produktes zurück. Wichtig ist dabei, dass du deinen persönlichen Link verwendest um Goldkind.pro weiterzuempfehlen. Eine genaue Anleitung erhälst du beim Kauf eines Perks.

Deutsch
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
Was ist Goldkind.pro?
Goldkind.pro ist die einfachste Lösung um ein Baby oder Kleinkind vor impulsmodulierter Strahlung zu schützen. Es gibt keine günstigere Alternative um diesen Schutz zu erreichen.

Goldkind.pro gibt es als vollständiges Kinderbett mit integriertem Strahlenschutzbaldachin oder als Strahlenschutzbaldachin zum Nachrüsten.
Goldkind.pro ist eine Komplettlösung die es ermöglicht, bis zu 99,999% der Strahlen zu reduzieren, die durch immer mehr WLAN-fähige Geräte, Schnurlostelefone, Mobilfunktelefone, etc. Tag und Nacht auf uns wirken. Das Goldkind.pro Gewebe bietet eine Dämpfung der elektromagnetischen Strahlen von bis zu 55 dB.
In Kombination mit dem Goldkind.pro Bettbezug, der auch von unten zuverlässig hochfrequente elektromagnetische Strahlen nahezu vollständig eliminiert, findet Ihr Kind in seinem Bettchen eine beruhigende Pause vor den Einflüssen der technisierten Welt.
 
Eigenschaften & Technische Daten:



Abschirmung gegen hochfrequente, elektromagnetische Strahlung
Dermatologisch getestet
Made in Germany

Dämpfung (dB): bis zu 55 dB

Dämpfung (%): bis zu 99,999 %

Frequenzbereich: 100 MHz bis 18 GHz
Komplettlösung
Sehr luftdurchlässig
Hochtransparent

Antibakteriell, Fungizid (reduziert Bakterien, Geruch usw.)

Abschirmmaterial: Silber

Dicke: 0,2 mm
Kleine Verpackungsgröße
Leichte Handhabung, leichter Aufbau

 
Was wird durch Goldkind.Pro besser?
Man benötigt viel Spezialwissen und hochkomplexe Technik (Stromfreischalter, Messgeräte, etc.), um sich von hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung abzuschirmen, was in Summe sehr teuer ist. Goldkind.pro ist die beste und einfachste Möglichkeit, um Ihr Kind vor hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung dort zu schützen, wo es die meiste Zeit des Tages verbringt.
 
Wie funktioniert der Goldkind Strahlenschutz?Die Spezialoberfläche des Goldkind.pro-Gewebes absorbiert die auftreffende elektromagnetische Einstrahlung. Durch die Umhüllung von allen Seiten entsteht so ein wirksamer Strahlenschutz für Ihr Kind.  Was ist das besondere an Goldkind.pro?Goldkind.pro ist speziell für den Strahlenschutz von Säuglingen und Kindern entwickelt worden. Das Goldkind.pro-Gewebe wird exklusiv für diese Anwendung gefertigt. Nicht nur die wirksame Abschirmung gegen hochfrequente Strahlung, sondern auch die dermatologische Verträglichkeit standen im Mittelpunkt bei der Entwicklung des Gewebes. Das Goldkind.pro Gewebe ist dermatologisch getestet und erfüllt die strengen Kriterien des Standard 100 by Oeko-Tex für Babyartikel. Goldkind.Pro wird vollständig in Deutschland hergestellt. Bei der Auswahl der Materialien gehen wir mit größter Sorgfalt vor.   Timeline  KampagnenzielWir wollen einen wertvollen Beitrag für kommende Generationen leisten, zum Schutz vor unabsehbaren Folgen von hochfrequenter elektromagnetischer Strahlung in der empfindlichen frühkindlichen Entwicklung.Wir benötigen Eure Unterstützung, um eine Serienmanufaktur für hochwertige Strahlenschutz-Kinderbetten und -Baldachine zu ermöglichen. Was uns bewegt 

Sogar das Bundesamt für Strahlenschutz rät: „Ganz besonders wichtig ist die Minimierung der Strahlenbelastung für Kinder. Sie befinden sich noch in der Entwicklung und könnten deshalb gesundheitlich empfindlicher reagieren.“Wir möchten eine Lösung schaffen um die Strahlenbelastung für Säuglinge und Kinder zu minimieren ohne auf sämtliche Technik im Haushalt verzichten zu müssen.  Das TeamVon links nach rechts: Dipl.-Ing. (TH) Dietmar Heimes, Geschäftsführer; Nikola Huckestein, HP; Kathrin Rameil, HP; Jutta Kohzer, HP; Sabine Hessmann, HP; Guido Falke, Produktion; Stephan Becker, Entwicklung  
Sag es weiter!
Auch wenn Du selbst kein Strahlenschutzkinderbett benötigst, kannst du uns helfen die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen:

Teile den Link zur Kampagne mit deinen Freunden: www.goldkind.pro

Like uns auf Facebook


 Empfehle Goldkind.pro und spare GeldFür jede erfolgreiche Empfehlung geben wir dir 10% vom Kaufpreis deines Goldkind.pro Produktes zurück. Wichtig ist dabei, dass du deinen persönlichen Link verwendest um Goldkind.pro weiterzuempfehlen. Eine genaue Anleitung erhälst du beim Kauf eines Perks.

story:
Introducing Elanso!

  For many people, finding a shoe that fits properly can be a frustrating and time-consuming process. Because many people have subtle abnormalities of their feet, the process of finding a proper fitting shoe can be very difficult, but not anymore because now you have ELANSO Smartshoes.

ELANSO Smartshoes  is a family project that combines handmade leather shoes with technology.

ELANSO Smartshoes are made of genuine leather imported from Italy and Morocco and the soles are Vibram,  that are made of rubber very light and time resistance.

You have problems with your feet and everything you wear it’s causing you pain? ELANSO Smartshoes is the answer for you. They are so comfortable, you don’t even feel them on!

ELANSO Smartshoes models are unique and can be customized.

But wait! Now comes the best part!

ELANSO Smartshoes have sensors and microelectronics integrated into the inner sole that measure your weight, body fat percentage, heart rate, number of steps taken in a certain time, calories burned and also incorrect foot position.

The system comprise of GPS sensors that capture the distance travelled as well it alerts you when you move away more than 5 meters from your phone and transmit the data  to the wearers smarthphone .Both the shoes and the app have sounds alert , functioning also as an anti-theft system.

The sound is 150 db and the battery is kinetic charging.

The ELANSO app evaluates the data and gives the wearer feedback on the daily activity: number of steps taken, if you lost or gain weight and alerts you when you have incorrect foot position.

ELANSO SMART SHOES are equipped with vibrations. When your feet are at the same level with your phone, the shoes begin to vibrate (vibromassage) so you can have a moment to relax and enjoy a nice foot massage.

ELANSO Smartshoes system is waterproof and scratchproof.

The high-tech shoes are available for you and for your entire family so you can check where they are in real time with the help of the GPS and the smartphone app.

The ELANSO Smartshoes are made for men, women and also for children.

You can connect to your smartphone more then one pair of ELANSO Smartshoes.

ELANSO Smartshoes are suitable for persons who suffer with Azheimer,if you connect their shoes to your smartphone and is easy to keep them safe,also for your children you see in real time where are they if they left school without telling you or they left the safe zone.

If you feel you are in danger you just have to kick your heels twice between them and the ELANSO app users will receive an alert with your current location in real time and with the direction that you going.

 
The difference between ELANSO Smartshoes and the GPS bracelets or other GPS gagets is that you can’t lose them or forget them home.You have them on your feet. You don’t go out bear feet right?:)

ELANSO Smartshoes are extremely comfortable, the feet does not sweat in Elanso, and are very easy to clean being washing machine friendly.

  Our journey started in 2014 with an ambitious idea: i always had problems with my feet and i was in pain when i had shoes on. Then i thought why not to design and make my own shoes. I start doing handmaid leather shoes for myself and for my close ones and after we started a small business selling local.

In 2016 we came up with and even greater idea. why not to make our shoes become smart shoes and share them world wide. 

Elanso is everything i need when i go outside. I feel comfortable, i feel safe and they look good on me .;)

What our campaign is offering:

We make shoes for men, woman and also children in more than 18 colors and combinations.At the end of our campaign all our backers will recieve via e-mail an survey with the size chart, models of shoes and colors that we have so you can customize your pair of shoes.

 

Production and Timeline:

We are almost lined up for first-run production, but we need help to get this off the ground. With the money we raise on Indiegogo, we will finalize the electronics, get FCC approval, and place our first order.

From there, the sky’s the limit. If this campaign is a success, we hope to quickly expand our product offering and add more new designs to our collection, as we continue to make you feel good in your shoes. 

Our future plan:

 We want a full line of different types and styled smartshoes that always stay at an affordable cost. So join with us on this journey and be a part of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning this dream into a reality.  We are super excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for Elanso!

Our plan goes like this:

  • November 2017 Finalize Electronics
  • December 2017 get Fcc Approval
  • March 2018 Place First Order
  • April 2018 Start Delivery

 

Frequently asked questions:

What phones does it work with?

Elanso app works on Android phones (version 4.3 and up) and iPhone. It doesn't work yet on Windows Phones.

How many phones can be connected to the same Elanso smartshoes?

One pair of Elanso smartshoes can be connected to multiple phones so, for instance, both you and your spouse can simultaneously locate your kid for instance. 

How many items can be tracked?

Elanso app allows you to track as many items as you like.

When do you plan the shipping of the finalized product (not prototype)?

We plan to ship Elanso smartshoes at the end of September 2017.

How do I choose the color of my devices?

Choosing the color is done after the purchase. We will contact you via email to ask you for the color(s),combinations of colors and models you would like your Elanso(s) to have.

 

FAQ'S

I Just Placed An Order. Can I Add On To It? 

Unfortunately we cannot add anything to an existing order. Please place a new order for the new item.
 

Where Can I Find My Confirmation?  

As soon as your order ships, you will receive an email confirmation to the email address you entered on your order. If for some reason, you did not receive an email, please check your spam folder and add smartshoes@elanso.com to your safe sender list.

My Order Won't Go Through, What Should I Do?

If you're still receiving an error message after reviewing your credit card information, billing and shipping address, make sure you're using the latest version of your web browser.

Please only click the “Place Order” button once to avoid multiple authorizations.

If you continue to receive error messages, please contact Indiegogo Customer Support 
 

Is It Possible To Change Something On My Order After It Has Been Placed?

Once you place an order you will have to contact Indiegogo before the campaign time ends.
 

Is It Possible For My Card To Be Charged Twice?

Your credit card will only be charged once.

Please contact Indiegogo for any further problems

Please only click the "Submit" button once to avoid multiple authorizations.
 

I Keep Getting An Error Message During My Checkout. 

If you are receiving an error message, there may be a problem with your credit card information, billing or shipping address. The billing address should match exactly what your bank has on file. It is most likely an issue with your billing zip/postal code. Please review all information closely and look for any typos.
shipped. You should contact your customs office for specific amounts and percentages.
 

What Is The Return Policy?

Any unworn product can be returned or exchanged for store credit within 60 days of delivery. We offer free returns and easy returns for all customers. Please make sure you include your order number along with contacting smartshoes@elanso.com to schedule the return. Expedited shipping charges are non-refundable.  
 

How Long Does It Take To Process My Return?

Once you notify us that you would like a return, we will email you a pre-paid return label within 3-5 business days. Once we have received your package, your refund will be processed within 7 business days. You will be notified via email at the address listed on your account when this transaction has taken place. After we have issued the refund, it will take up to 3 business days for the funds to be placed back on your credit card or Paypal account.

story:
QiziQ

The new QiziQ gym weights are MADE OUT OF METAL just like the traditional weights around the gyms of the world. 

QiziQ weights are then coated with a color resin to suit different customer tastes.

QiziQ weights are not plastic

  • QiziQ was born from a simple question: Current weights are a one size fits all, what if there were new gym weights that are easier to use and save space around the home while giving me the color and design that inspires me to work out more?.
  • On that kitchen table, a year ago, an idea was born to create a nature inspired home workout system, which you will see in our journey to My QiziQ !
  • QiziQ now needs your help to make it to the store shelves and online stores of the world. We want to engage the best manufacturer to bring a totally new product to the world. My son was battling with his weight and weighed 16 stone at the age of 12. He didn't want to leave home and join others at the local community centers and gyms. I was left with the option to find him a complete home workout which would provide him with the exercises he needed. My partner was also shy to be seen out there displaying a not so toned body and needed help with their confidence. QiziQ became the solution that would work in the home, or can be ordered with breakfast at a hotel and would be delivered on a trolley and could be something my son could take with him to college without baggage difficulty!
  • With your contribution I can now give QiziQ to the world.
  • I would like to give home based fitness to every home in the world by providing just 2 gym weights that transform into 4 gym weights for multiple workouts. Through the QiziQ system, one only needs to switch handles to get a full set of Gym weights that include the Barbell, The Dumbbell, The Cable Weight and the Kettle-bell. Its an incredible combination that saves all homes, money and space!

  • I would like to engage a manufacturer and start delivering QiziQ to the world and I need you help to achieve this

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • QiziQ wants to engage an identified manufacturer to create the various molds that will allow QiziQ to manufacture its unique click-and-connect handle as well as produce the customized versions to suit your choice of gym weights equipment. We want to save you money and space around the home and we will also let you in on the unique gym station that is hot on the heels of QiziQ. Watch this space for the QiziQ Trym but, right now, we need you help to bring QiziQ to market.
  • Never before has a brand new gym idea generated so much excitement as QiziQ has created . See our rewards page and make sure you look at the sneak preview of the QiziQ Trym. 
  • In the unlikely event that we fail to hit our tooling and manufacturing target, QiziQ will invest in delivering the basic stock lines and may not be able to offer the customized versions like grandma's quilt. We will, however, invest anything we receive into creating a fresh campaign to deliver the full QiziQ experience including The Trym.
  • We are passionate about changing the entire sport and fitness industry and will not stop at the first hurdle. 

QiziQ Impact

For more than a century, the gym weights have been daddy's domain because he was allowed out of the house after 6 p.m. Mum stayed at home and made the meals and understandably sampled most of them for taste and ensuring she had put enough love into her dinner creations, resulting in the unavoidable weight gain.

In ,modern times, it has become unsafe for the teenager to leave home while a game is on with their online "friends" The result has been some generous addition of girth around the waist ...But, the old weights belong to Daddy and the garage is basically a no-go area! 

They are serious looking, black, grey menacing and intimidating..... until QiziQ!

 

  • QiziQ came from a simple question. Can I and Will I work out better if I loved what was doing and if it didn't feel like a punishment or after-school detention?
  • The family that was around the dinner table that evening started a  journey which culminated in..QIZIQ.
  • A fully customizable gym weight system that will match any budget, suit your taste your fetishes, save you space and above all persuade you work with it!

Risks & Challenges

During the QiziQ journey we faced many hurdles but I am glad had the best product designers who believed in the product and came up with the most inspiring solutions to the concept. Their years of experience came in very useful combined with their invaluable links to global manufacturers. This gave me access to world quality expertise but off-course this does not remove the risks associated with the launch of any new product.

QiziQ is a total re-invention of the gym weights industry and it's capability to enter the home, the hotel, the school and all other domains makes it unique and therefore susceptible to various challenges.

QiziQ faces the unique challenge of not being able to deliver promises due to inadequate funding which will cause it to fail on certain molds while delivering on the standard version without any issues. 

BUT, with your support we know that these are purely transient hurdles and we will engage them head on to create the same mold that delivers all those brilliantly personalized QiziQ cradles and weights.

We are confident of our ability to fully customize our weights to those that request this service.

We are committed to dispatching our stock range within 24 hours of order.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to QiziQ, please make some noise about us around the world. Use the various  Indiegogo share tools and spread the word

The Team

Sacha Robinson and Andrew Aylesbury

 

 

 

 

The Story

It all began around the kitchen table and led to the production of our first visual. The question that was asked that night was: What if I could have gym weights that look exactly the way I want them to look based on a fruit that I like...would that encourage more people to work out around the home?

Thus began the journey which has been carefully entered in our diary below:

The QiziQ Diary

Duku Design April 2016

We engaged a top UK design company to transform our doodles and sketches into a commercial product.

Progress May 2016

The QiziQ weights begin to take shape following our design inspiration from nature. 

June 2016 The new weights get a name !

The birth of the name QiziQ 

After several days of brainstorming we landed on a name for the new gym weights

QUISQUE    - Latin name for fitness, and for ease of pronunciation it became  QIZIQ

 

Further thoughts during 2016

This is a home kit and must be space saving. The video above gives a good indication of the workout routines that are achievable. We recognized that a fully-fledged gym would not be easy within a small flat or hotel room. QiziQ is our solution to a daily toning workout, to kick up a good sweat and repeat again. Its flexible handle allows the user to save space and increase portability of the whole set from room to room and even when going away from home, QiziQ can be easily taken with you.

Further Inspiration and the invention of the QiziQ Cradle system

 

The Journey Continues

 

The QiziQ Cradle is born …

The spherical shape of the cradle and central axis mean different weight slices can be added in pairs and the center of mass remains constant (i.e. it won’t make the weight want to twist in the user’s hands).

QiziQ became a  multipurpose design, with a versatile connector handle system as well as a first ever - drop-in cradle loading system. After desired weights are loaded the user simply clicks the handle on and begins their workout. 

 

QiziQ reaches maturity 

The segments stack inside the cradle to give a complete range of weight combinations, they have a central metal core to provide the weight and rigidity with a rubber over-mold which can be textured/ colored and so on to give a variety of finishes.

QiziQ Final Product

  • Multi colored finishes - fully customizable to client's taste
  • Anti-roll faceted faces
  • Multiple connector handle to allow switching between Dumbbell, Barbell, Cable Weight and Barbell

  

The journey continues with help from friends on Indiegogo

We want to save you money and space around the home and we will also let you in on the unique gym station that is hot on the heels of QiziQ. Watch this space for the QiziQ Trym but, right now, we need you help to bring QiziQ to market.
Never before has a brand new gym idea generated so much excitement as QiziQ has created . See our rewards page and make sure you look at the sneak preview of the QiziQ Trym. 
In the unlikely event that we fail to hit our tooling and manufacturing target, QiziQ will invest in delivering the basic stock lines and may not be able to offer the customized versions like grandma's quilt. We will, however, invest anything we receive into creating a fresh campaign to deliver the full QiziQ experience including The Trym.
We are passionate about changing the entire sport and fitness industry and will not stop at the first hurdle. 



QiziQ Impact
For more than a century, the gym weights have been daddy's domain because he was allowed out of the house after 6 p.m. Mum stayed at home and made the meals and understandably sampled most of them for taste and ensuring she had put enough love into her dinner creations, resulting in the unavoidable weight gain.
In ,modern times, it has become unsafe for the teenager to leave home while a game is on with their online "friends" The result has been some generous addition of girth around the waist ...But, the old weights belong to Daddy and the garage is basically a no-go area! 
They are serious looking, black, grey menacing and intimidating..... until QiziQ!

 

QiziQ came from a simple question. Can I and Will I work out better if I loved what was doing and if it didn't feel like a punishment or after-school detention?
The family that was around the dinner table that evening started a  journey which culminated in..QIZIQ.
A fully customizable gym weight system that will match any budget, suit your taste your fetishes, save you space and above all persuade you work with it!




Risks & Challenges
During the QiziQ journey we faced many hurdles but I am glad had the best product designers who believed in the product and came up with the most inspiring solutions to the concept. Their years of experience came in very useful combined with their invaluable links to global manufacturers. This gave me access to world quality expertise but off-course this does not remove the risks associated with the launch of any new product.
QiziQ is a total re-invention of the gym weights industry and it's capability to enter the home, the hotel, the school and all other domains makes it unique and therefore susceptible to various challenges.
QiziQ faces the unique challenge of not being able to deliver promises due to inadequate funding which will cause it to fail on certain molds while delivering on the standard version without any issues. 

BUT, with your support we know that these are purely transient hurdles and we will engage them head on to create the same mold that delivers all those brilliantly personalized QiziQ cradles and weights.
We are confident of our ability to fully customize our weights to those that request this service.

We are committed to dispatching our stock range within 24 hours of order.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to QiziQ, please make some noise about us around the world. Use the various  Indiegogo share tools and spread the word
The Team
Sacha Robinson and Andrew Aylesbury
 
 

 
 
The Story

It all began around the kitchen table and led to the production of our first visual. The question that was asked that night was: What if I could have gym weights that look exactly the way I want them to look based on a fruit that I like...would that encourage more people to work out around the home?
Thus began the journey which has been carefully entered in our diary below:
The QiziQ Diary
Duku Design April 2016
We engaged a top UK design company to transform our doodles and sketches into a commercial product.
Progress May 2016 
The QiziQ weights begin to take shape following our design inspiration from nature. 

June 2016 The new weights get a name !
The birth of the name QiziQ 
After several days of brainstorming we landed on a name for the new gym weights
QUISQUE    - Latin name for fitness, and for ease of pronunciation it became  QIZIQ
 
Further thoughts during 2016
This is a home kit and must be space saving. The video above gives a good indication of the workout routines that are achievable. We recognized that a fully-fledged gym would not be easy within a small flat or hotel room. QiziQ is our solution to a daily toning workout, to kick up a good sweat and repeat again. Its flexible handle allows the user to save space and increase portability of the whole set from room to room and even when going away from home, QiziQ can be easily taken with you.
Further Inspiration and the invention of the QiziQ Cradle system


 
The Journey Continues
 
The QiziQ Cradle is born …
The spherical shape of the cradle and central axis mean different weight slices can be added in pairs and the center of mass remains constant (i.e. it won’t make the weight want to twist in the user’s hands).
QiziQ became a  multipurpose design, with a versatile connector handle system as well as a first ever - drop-in cradle loading system. After desired weights are loaded the user simply clicks the handle on and begins their workout. 

 
QiziQ reaches maturity 
The segments stack inside the cradle to give a complete range of weight combinations, they have a central metal core to provide the weight and rigidity with a rubber over-mold which can be textured/ colored and so on to give a variety of finishes.
QiziQ Final Product

Multi colored finishes - fully customizable to client's taste
Anti-roll faceted faces
Multiple connector handle to allow switching between Dumbbell, Barbell, Cable Weight and Barbell

  
The journey continues with help from friends on Indiegogo

story:
OUR TEAM

Our co-founders include, Developer, 2 Medical Research Scientists, CAD Engineer and CEO/CFO specializing in manufacturing, the Regional Director for The CFO Center (Michael Meyer, https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelmeyer50 )  original investor brings over 30 years of experience as a CEO/CFO, whose experience in manufacturing will ensure we eliminate as many pitfalls as possible and ensure our success. The rest of our team all bring different strengths to the table and are excited to contribute to our success. 

WHAT WE DEVELOPED

A portable pain relieving device (patent pending 15/339,351) that uses a very specific type of vibration that has been proven through scientific research to disrupt the pain signal from the nerves to the brain. Please see links to research papers below for more detailed scientific explanations). 

WHY

 I have personally suffered with chronic pain from Fibromyalgia (nerve pain throughout the body) and Migraines.  Most of the medications that are prescribed for nerve pain are ineffective and have undesirable side effects.  Other conditions that have been proven to benefit from this type of vibration are; amputees with phantom limb pain, diabetics with hand and foot nerve pain (neuropathy), injuries that cause nerve pain, arthritis sufferers and stroke patients with upper limb spasticity.  Stroke patients had multiple benefits; reduction in pain, improved grip and muscle strength as well as a decrease in spasticity.

The Surgeon General has issued a warning to doctors about the narcotic addiction problem in the U.S. and in the foreseeable future we will see more restrictions on prescribing these drugs, making it even more important to give people an alternative that works.

PLAN

To raise funds for injection molds, FDA registration, materials for production

BUDGET

Injection Molds                              $26,000

REGISTRATION WITH FDA        $8,000

MATERIALS  COSTS FOR PRODUCTION       $14,000

TOTAL   $48,000

We would like to raise more than the $48,000 minimum we need to start production.   If we are able to  raise an additional $20,000 we would be able to get injection molds that produce multiples of each part, which would greatly lower the cost of production.

Summary 

People have gotten a lot of relief after using our device. We hope that if you suffer from chronic pain or know someone that does, you will be motivated to help us with funding so we may start the manufacturing process.  If you can not personally help fund us, please share with friends, family and co-workers on social media.  Thank you for your help!

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/?term=short... 

http://bja.oxfordjournals.org/content/87/1/107....

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21339076

Fitness community 

 

the first 25% App is ready for Google Play

menu

 

The application will include basic stuff such as user profile, sending messages to users, fitness centers and the followings:


Photo of the transformation

 

- Maybe good inspiration to start workout, changing your attitude to  life and doing something for
your body and soul
- Be able to update your transformation photos
- People can encourage / motivate you by their comments

 

Training plan

 

- thanks to the App, you can create your own plan for the whole week
- if you are a beginner, you can see your training plan in the library , and add them to your
favorite exercise plan
- you can find a personal trainer who can advise you and make a training plan to you

 

Food
 

- Thanks to the table, you will be able to calculate the value of the calories you need to take, and you can create a meal for each day
- Ready-made meals for the whole day, recipes can be found in the library  who u can add to
your menu.
- you can also find a personal trainer who can advise you and make a diet plan to you

 


Drinking mode


 

 

Drinking mode can not be underestimated! Everyone should drink plenty of pure water during the day,
which has a positive impact on the functioning of the body.  In the App, you will be able to turn  on / off the notice about regular drink intake

 


Sparring partner

 

- Do not have anyone to go to work out, run or something else with you? In our App you will find people
from the neighborhood who have the same problem .. you can find and know many interesting people

story:
Who We Are <3

Julie's Fudge & Gourmet Nummies has been selling fudge and baked goods online and locally in Las Vegas for over a decade. We are embarking on a new adventure with Indulge Fudge, our CBD infused fudge flavors, and couldn't be happier!

Owner and founder Julie Danner, aka The Fudge Queen, has been creating unique, beautiful, and delicious fudge flavors here in Las Vegas since 2008.

Owner and Marketing Manager Jim Danner brought all his many talents to the business in 2013 when the two met and fell in love. Now they work this artisanal fudge business together, and are excited to bring Indulge Fudge to the world.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Indulge Fudge is seeking investments to total $25,000. This funding would provide us with the ability to expand our fudge flavor base, acquire new, streamlined packaging, and most importantly, scale up our production capabilities. This funding will also provide us with the ability to secure our business legally, guarding against copycat makers.
  • Check out our perks! We will blast a HOORAY out to the world for contributions of $5 or more, and send you our AMAZING full spectrum CBD fudge with every other perk you qualify for! Woohoooo!
  • If our goal isn't met 100%, whatever funding we have raised will go toward business development in all areas mentioned above, and we will keep working harder and harder on our own to make it all happen! 

Helping Us Means Helping Others...

Your contribution will not only help us build our business exponentially, but in turn, we will be able to help many others with our products. We already have dozens of customers who use our product to help with their aches, pains, anxiety, and so much more. We already offer them special pricing due to the financial challenges their afflictions cause. We would be able to expand our patient database, offering low cost products, delivery, and free samples of new flavors. 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk or challenge we face currently is protecting our brand, and making sure copycats don't steal our concept. We have dealt with copycats and brand thieves throughout the almost 12 years in business with Julie's Fudge & Gourmet Nummies, and have prevailed as the one true delectable fudge that keeps our fans coming back time and again. The CBD industry is growing exponentially, and it's potential is endless. Our product is top of the line, and our CBD source is impeccable. We have partnered with NuLeaf Naturals who will be providing our full spectrum CBD oil for our fudgies. 

Sharing is Caring!

Whether or not you can financially contribute, a share on your social media to spread the word would be amazing and mean so much to us! Thank you SO much for your support!

story:
Our Story

Introduction

We are carrying out a plan to create a healthier population!  Our firm is using a multi-patent-pending combination of technology, hardware and people to solve the tremendous societal problem associated with medication mismanagement.

In spite of the staggering impact medication nonadherence has on society, it rarely makes headlines in the media.  In 2016, the annual cost to the health care industry was approximately $528 billion (1).  The problems it creates for individuals’ health and their family members’ peace of mind goes beyond a monetary calculation.  The impact goes much deeper.  

Hello, my name is Bruce Pitcher.  I am a 25-year health care industry veteran and the president of MedSensible. I have extensive, first-hand experience with the challenges of medication management.  After the sudden death of my mom’s husband in 2010, I had the honor of helping her live the final seven years of her life with dignity.  Since my mom suffered from dementia and was on multiple medications, one of the biggest challenges was ensuring her proper medication management, administration and adherence. The formidable problems I encountered helping her are the same ones millions of people and their families experience every day. 

One of the main reasons why medication mismanagement plagues society can be traced back to typical physician protocol.  They write prescriptions, but very rarely provide their patients any method, system or device to manage the prescriptions.  Patients are on their own!  So, my team and I set out to create a comprehensive system that could overcome everyday medication management challenges and pitfalls. MedSensible and its corresponding products are the outcome of this significant undertaking, and it is an honor to share them with you.

Products

General Information

A person’s medication assistance needs are very individualized.  There is certainly no one-size-fits-all solution.  MedSensible is different because we use a combination of technology, hardware and human support to create individualized solutions.  The comprehensive assistance delivered by our three separate products enables MedSensible to customize a plan for individuals with even the most challenging needs.

 

Pending Patents and Business Models

There are multiple patents pending for the three products.  Also, each product has its own distinct business model and accompanying revenue source. So, each product can be used in a stand-alone capacity or be combined with the others to become what we feel is the most complete medication management offering available.

Product Descriptions

The Medication Manager

  

 

Our flagship technology system is The Medication Manager.  It is an easy-to-use, state-of-the-art system that automates almost every aspect of medication administration.  It was uniquely designed to also help those with no computer skills or smart phone expertise, which is unbelievably helpful to the senior population. 

The system’s collaboration platform is second to none and allows for real time interaction between patients, their physicians and their family members, regardless of their geographic location.  We call this the Support Team feature.  It’s a fine example of how the “power of numbers” can make a difference in medication compliance. 

 

My Medication Station

  

 

 

Our second product is a smart, electronic medication dispenser known as My Medication Station.  The first prototype has been completed and it is in beta testing. 

My Medication Station eliminates the confusion of multiple pill bottles and organizes medications into a single location.  It’s an easy-to-operate device that houses a week’s supply of medication.

The video below provides you an animated view of My Medication Station's components.

 
Below is a video of our current prototype in action.  Note that the day of the week, Thursday, has all three compartments illuminated to distinguish it as the current day.  When the medication reminder triggers, the video screen changes to display the medication to be taken; the bin where the medication is located starts to flash; and the audio notification can be heard.  
 

 

Here are some additional photos of our prototype.  The final design will be updated to include a larger video screen.  Additionally, the materials that will be used for final manufacturing, and the device's color combination, will be modified to closely resemble the graphic rendering found in the My Medication Station introductory video above.

The dispenser’s technology is truly impressive.  It has both audio and touch-screen capability.  It’s also directly linked with The Medication Manager, thus allowing the combination of the two systems to deliver amazing features.  One of them is real-time notifications.  This is truly peace of mind for people who are concerned about an out-of-town loved one meeting their medication needs.  The dispenser can promptly notify them of a list of important situations: such as their loved one missing a medication intake or when a medication count is low and it is time for a refill.

 

Mobile MedNurse

    

 

Our third product is Mobile MedNurse.  It fosters one-on-one, at-home service for individuals that require extra help with their medication needs.

The Mobile MedNurse platform is essentially technology that delivers three important components to its users:

  • First, it is an introductory forum where individuals seeking medication support can meet providers who deliver service in their area.

 

  • Second, through its proprietary field technology mobile app called All-Link, it provides uniform visit delivery standards and guidance to ensure exemplary interaction protocols are achieved and documented.  It also brings an individual’s physicians into the picture for superior collaboration. 

 

  • Third, also derived from All-Link, it supplies the parties an efficient and effective billing and compensation forum.

 

With its one-on-one interaction model, Mobile MedNurse is the ultimate in personal medication management advocacy. Visits can be established on a recurring basis or on an as-needed basis.  Further, its distinctive business model makes it a value-oriented program, with pricing approximately 50 percent below typical private-duty home care fees.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our Funding Needs

The MedSensible offering consists of three products.  Two of the three are completed.  We are seeking $20,000 to finish the third product and to conduct the initial marketing launch of our complete offering in the Tampa Bay area.

Funding Program and Allocation

We have chosen a Flexible funding program.  All funds that are received will first be appropriated to the completion of My Medication Station.  Thereafter, the funding will be used to build inventory of the devices.  Finally, the balance will be appropriated toward the marketing roll out in Florida.  Funds that we receive over our campaign goal will be used to expand our offering on a national basis.

Perks

We are proud to offer everyone that supports us with a $25.00 donation a subscription to the base model of our flagship technology system, The Medication Manager.  The subscription also comes with a valuable discount card we call the Patient Appreciation Lifestyle Reward.  The discounts are available for travel, meals, concerts and much more.  Some of the participating retailers are Hilton and Best Buy.  The discount reward is immediately sent to the email address used to create the account at The Medication Manager.

For those individuals who contribute $250 to us, we are pleased to reward the generous support with our smart medication dispenser, My Medication Station. That is approximately 50 percent below our retail price of $495.00.   

 

The Impact

It was an unbelievably challenging experience for me to help my mom through her final years.  As I looked back on that time, I came up with a saying that will resonate with almost everyone at some point in his or her life.  The statement is as follows:

“If you live long enough, and your parents live long enough, you WILL become your parents’ parent.”

The vision is to make life better for people taking medication and their family members.  I do not want people to struggle with medication management like I did. MedSensible’s offering overcomes the pitfalls that I encountered, and many, many more.  It paves a much smoother path for those who will, at some point, walk in my shoes.   

We are right on the cusp of delivering a comprehensive medication management solution that society has needed for a long time.  We can change lives with MedSensible.  So, I would like to respectfully ask you join us in our quest by becoming a backer.  You can be assured your financial support of MedSensible is an investment in both health and humanity.

 

Risks & Challenges

The market for solving the medication management dilemma is very fragmented.  There are a lot of companies that produce one tool or another aimed at overcoming the problem. Our plan employs three distinctive components to separate us from the competition.

Risks

There are risks associated with our offering.  Most of the risks are inherent in any new company’s path to success.  Accordingly, the biggest risk we face is a competitor with sizeable market share expanding their offering to mirror our pricing structure and comprehensive approach. 

There are three barriers to entry a competitor will face is they decide to challenge us on these fronts.  The first is time.  It will take a competitor a sizeable amount of time to build what we have created.  During that window, we fully expect to be able to build market share and product loyalty.

Another barrier a competitor faces is the pending patents associated with our products.  These patents provide a formidable obstacle for duplication of the MedSensible offering. We are prepared to defend the intellectual property associated with the patients.

The third barrier a competitor must overcome is our pricing structure.  Because of our technology, the unique business models of our offering’s products and our company’s low overhead, we have been able to establish price points well below the majority of our competitors.  We can maintain our current pricing structure and achieve solid profit margins.  Our competitors typically do not enjoy this positioning, and therefore, would cease to be profitable if they chose to compete with us on pricing.      

Challenges

The biggest challenge we have right now is our financial condition.  We need to raise money to complete My Medication Station and roll out our offering in Florida.  We anticipate overcoming our financial constraints in July 2020.

The second challenge we face is technology related.  It is no secret that technology can have bugs and malfunctions.  Although our systems have been beta tested and some are currently operational in the field, we fully expect to find there are minor flaws in our technology.  We are fully prepared to promptly address and repair any system defects.

A third noteworthy challenge we face is our lack of notoriety.  The MedSensible name is new to the health care industry.  Hence, we must create awareness for the company and its corresponding offering of products.  We are very optimistic that the implementation of our Territory Ownership Program will generate the notoriety we need to capture market share.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a position where you can provide us financial support, you can still be a part of the solution to society’s medication management quandary.  First, we encourage you to enroll for a free subscription to The Medication Manager and download its mobile app from iTunes or Google Play.  You can then begin using its tremendous features for your medication administration or that of any family member.

Second, simply tell your friends and family about MedSensible and your experience with The Medication Manager.  Helping them become aware of our offering’s wide range of solutions to medication management problems will foster our grass-roots effort to create a healthier population.

Thank you very much for your consideration!

 

(1) Pharmacy Times. Does Nonadherence Really Cost the Health Care System $300 Billion Annually? Aungst, Timothy. 6/1/18.
