My Medication Station
  
 

 
Our second product is a smart, electronic medication dispenser known as My Medication Station.  The first prototype has been completed and it is in beta testing. 
My Medication Station eliminates the confusion of multiple pill bottles and organizes medications into a single location.  It’s an easy-to-operate device that houses a week’s supply of medication.
The video below provides you an animated view of My Medication Station's components.

 
Below is a video of our current prototype in action.  Note that the day of the week, Thursday, has all three compartments illuminated to distinguish it as the current day.  When the medication reminder triggers, the video screen changes to display the medication to be taken; the bin where the medication is located starts to flash; and the audio notification can be heard.  
 

 
Here are some additional photos of our prototype.  The final design will be updated to include a larger video screen.  Additionally, the materials that will be used for final manufacturing, and the device's color combination, will be modified to closely resemble the graphic rendering found in the My Medication Station introductory video above.

The dispenser’s technology is truly impressive.  It has both audio and touch-screen capability.  It’s also directly linked with The Medication Manager, thus allowing the combination of the two systems to deliver amazing features.  One of them is real-time notifications.  This is truly peace of mind for people who are concerned about an out-of-town loved one meeting their medication needs.  The dispenser can promptly notify them of a list of important situations: such as their loved one missing a medication intake or when a medication count is low and it is time for a refill.
 
Mobile MedNurse
    

 
Our third product is Mobile MedNurse.  It fosters one-on-one, at-home service for individuals that require extra help with their medication needs.
The Mobile MedNurse platform is essentially technology that delivers three important components to its users:
First, it is an introductory forum where individuals seeking medication support can meet providers who deliver service in their area.
 
Second, through its proprietary field technology mobile app called All-Link, it provides uniform visit delivery standards and guidance to ensure exemplary interaction protocols are achieved and documented.  It also brings an individual’s physicians into the picture for superior collaboration. 
 
Third, also derived from All-Link, it supplies the parties an efficient and effective billing and compensation forum.
 
With its one-on-one interaction model, Mobile MedNurse is the ultimate in personal medication management advocacy. Visits can be established on a recurring basis or on an as-needed basis.  Further, its distinctive business model makes it a value-oriented program, with pricing approximately 50 percent below typical private-duty home care fees.
 

What We Need & What You Get
Our Funding Needs
The MedSensible offering consists of three products.  Two of the three are completed.  We are seeking $20,000 to finish the third product and to conduct the initial marketing launch of our complete offering in the Tampa Bay area.
Funding Program and Allocation
We have chosen a Flexible funding program.  All funds that are received will first be appropriated to the completion of My Medication Station.  Thereafter, the funding will be used to build inventory of the devices.  Finally, the balance will be appropriated toward the marketing roll out in Florida.  Funds that we receive over our campaign goal will be used to expand our offering on a national basis.

Perks
We are proud to offer everyone that supports us with a $25.00 donation a subscription to the base model of our flagship technology system, The Medication Manager.  The subscription also comes with a valuable discount card we call the Patient Appreciation Lifestyle Reward.  The discounts are available for travel, meals, concerts and much more.  Some of the participating retailers are Hilton and Best Buy.  The discount reward is immediately sent to the email address used to create the account at The Medication Manager.
For those individuals who contribute $250 to us, we are pleased to reward the generous support with our smart medication dispenser, My Medication Station. That is approximately 50 percent below our retail price of $495.00.   
 
The Impact
It was an unbelievably challenging experience for me to help my mom through her final years.  As I looked back on that time, I came up with a saying that will resonate with almost everyone at some point in his or her life.  The statement is as follows:

“If you live long enough, and your parents live long enough, you WILL become your parents’ parent.”

The vision is to make life better for people taking medication and their family members.  I do not want people to struggle with medication management like I did. MedSensible’s offering overcomes the pitfalls that I encountered, and many, many more.  It paves a much smoother path for those who will, at some point, walk in my shoes.   
We are right on the cusp of delivering a comprehensive medication management solution that society has needed for a long time.  We can change lives with MedSensible.  So, I would like to respectfully ask you join us in our quest by becoming a backer.  You can be assured your financial support of MedSensible is an investment in both health and humanity.

 
Risks & Challenges
The market for solving the medication management dilemma is very fragmented.  There are a lot of companies that produce one tool or another aimed at overcoming the problem. Our plan employs three distinctive components to separate us from the competition. 

Risks
There are risks associated with our offering.  Most of the risks are inherent in any new company’s path to success.  Accordingly, the biggest risk we face is a competitor with sizeable market share expanding their offering to mirror our pricing structure and comprehensive approach. 
There are three barriers to entry a competitor will face is they decide to challenge us on these fronts.  The first is time.  It will take a competitor a sizeable amount of time to build what we have created.  During that window, we fully expect to be able to build market share and product loyalty.

Another barrier a competitor faces is the pending patents associated with our products.  These patents provide a formidable obstacle for duplication of the MedSensible offering. We are prepared to defend the intellectual property associated with the patients.
The third barrier a competitor must overcome is our pricing structure.  Because of our technology, the unique business models of our offering’s products and our company’s low overhead, we have been able to establish price points well below the majority of our competitors.  We can maintain our current pricing structure and achieve solid profit margins.  Our competitors typically do not enjoy this positioning, and therefore, would cease to be profitable if they chose to compete with us on pricing.      
Challenges
The biggest challenge we have right now is our financial condition.  We need to raise money to complete My Medication Station and roll out our offering in Florida.  We anticipate overcoming our financial constraints in July 2020.
The second challenge we face is technology related.  It is no secret that technology can have bugs and malfunctions.  Although our systems have been beta tested and some are currently operational in the field, we fully expect to find there are minor flaws in our technology.  We are fully prepared to promptly address and repair any system defects.
A third noteworthy challenge we face is our lack of notoriety.  The MedSensible name is new to the health care industry.  Hence, we must create awareness for the company and its corresponding offering of products.  We are very optimistic that the implementation of our Territory Ownership Program will generate the notoriety we need to capture market share.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not in a position where you can provide us financial support, you can still be a part of the solution to society’s medication management quandary.  First, we encourage you to enroll for a free subscription to The Medication Manager and download its mobile app from iTunes or Google Play.  You can then begin using its tremendous features for your medication administration or that of any family member.
Second, simply tell your friends and family about MedSensible and your experience with The Medication Manager.  Helping them become aware of our offering’s wide range of solutions to medication management problems will foster our grass-roots effort to create a healthier population.
Thank you very much for your consideration! (1) Pharmacy Times. Does Nonadherence Really Cost the Health Care System $300 Billion Annually? Aungst, Timothy. 6/1/18.

story:
The New Standard of Protection

There is no more need to keep buying and throwing away masks after every use. Be a survivor, protect your loved ones and quickly adapt to the new normal with Healthbot Care's Reusable and Washable N95 Protective Masks, made in America to help the world cope up with the changing times.

In an age of lockdowns caused by worldwide pandemics like the coronavirus, massive wildfires in Australia, and dropping air quality in every environment, you never know what can happen or change in an instant. Be a survivor and quickly adapt to unexpected breathing hazards with Healthbot Care's Reusable and Washable N95 Protective Masks.

Virtually compact and well-designed to be fit for use wherever you go, these all-in-one N95 face masks can easily defend against 95 percent of non-oil-based airborne particles. Durable Elastic Earband straps adjust to every wearer of all ages for a tightly secured particle-blocking fit one can smoothly transition to whether you’re a civilian or a healthcare worker.

Efficiently crafted to provide full cough and droplet protection coverage, these reusable N95 masks prevent obstruction of the eyes, leaving room for glasses, shades or whichever eye-wear you prefer without any compromise. Get long-lasting protection by adapting to your environment using Healthbot Care's N95 Protective Masks.

What We Need & What You Get

Efficiently crafted to provide full cough and droplet protection coverage, these reusable N95 masks prevent obstruction of the eyes, leaving room for glasses, shades or whichever eye-wear you prefer without any compromise. Get long-lasting protection by adapting to your environment using Healthbot Care's N95 Protective Masks.

We have the necessary equipment but we're in need of support to fund:

- The materials needed to start manufacturing.
- Expenses for all certifications required by law.
- Packaging and shipping.

With around $10,000 we can immediately start with all these and go from there. We just need your help to get started. 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk, like with any other project, is not reaching our fund goals but we are offering very fair pre-sale prices and fully support those who wish to be resellers of our masks (we can take out the HC logo so you can customize it based on your brand), we're confident this won't be an issue. The most important thing is that we all do our part in the war against the COVID-19 pandemic by providing more protective masks to everyone.

Another challenge would be to finish manufacturing and ship on time to anyone, anywhere in the world in need of N95 masks as we can only start after receiving funding and it would take approximately 8-10 weeks before we can ship our first batch as we would still have to get all certifications required by law for the safety and quality assurance of our masks.

Overall, we wish for our future supporters to understand these risks and challenges first before pledging as we aim to be 100% transparent about everything, but we still cannot do this without their help.

Without YOUR help.

If you believe in an American-made mask protecting people all over the world against COVID-19 and other air pollutants or viruses that may yet come,

If you believe in a no-waste policy where people don't have to keep buying disposable, less efficient masks,

...Please pledge and help us make this a reality.

Once Healthbot Care's production is up and running, we also pledge to set aside and donate masks to hospitals and health workers who are in desperate need of sustainable, reusable and cost-efficient protection, starting with the ones nearby in Los Angeles, then to the rest of of the United States, then to the rest of the world.

story:
Short Summary

Growing up here in Olathe I always knew I wanted to give back to my community. As a student athlete that also worked almost full time, I never paid much attention to what I was doing to my body, always on the go I’d stop in to whatever fast food place sounded good at the time, I wasn’t phased by it one bit. Fast forward 12 years and 4 kids later, I have realized the importance of living a healthy lifestyle. Not only does that include what I eat, but my physical activities as well.

As Head Cheerleading coach at Olathe North, it became apparent to me that our youth is still under the same intense schedule as I once was with little time to truly focus on providing their body with the proper nutrients or even having an understanding of what that actually looks like.

With those things in mind Pulse Nutrition & Fitness was created. Truly Olathe owned, with every one of you in mind. The purpose of Pulse Nutrition is to promote Health and Wellness in the community by providing the tools and resources needed for effective nutrition planning and physical exercise.

Pulse was created to help guide and inspire our friends, family, customer and clients through their personal, health, and wealth journey. Everything we do is done with the intention to INSPIRE CHANGE AND OFFER GUIDANCE. Every person has a journey they’re on, we want to be there for through each of them. We truly believe in creating not just healthy bodies but healthy lifestyles.

What We Need

I am so excited about this opportunity. 60% of the total startup amount will be funded with contributions from the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, 40% owners capital and all of the funding will be used on the final build out of our business location,  supplies,  inventory, insurance, and signage.

I am asking for contributions in the amount of  $10 or more if possible,  anything is greatly appreciated! Even if monetary contributions aren't an option right now, a share with your friends and family could make all the difference.   

What if we don't reach our goal you ask. Not to worry, we will adjust our design concept within the club to fit within our means. The great thing about our club is, no matter what it looks like on the inside,  everyone will always feel welcome and at home

What You Get For Making This Possible!

Contributions of $10 will receive a voucher for a Healthy Meal at Vibe(our home club until we open) as well as a Healthy Meal at Pulse when we open.

Contributions of $20-$50 Vouchers for Healthy Meals + a  Pulse branded t-shirt

Contributions of $50-$200 Each of the two gifts above and a product of your choice(from a select group of items)

Contributions of $200+ Each of the gifts above and an invite to the private sponsor party

In hopes that we can make this happen I would like for Pulse to be able to match donations up to $1500 to a donate to an Olathe School District program TBD at a later date. 

How You'll Make A Difference

  • With Covid-19 on the rise, now more than ever it is so important to get healthy and stay healthy.
  • Youth and Adults alike sometimes struggle with knowing what the right things are they should be doing to keep them moving day to day. At Pulse we'll be able to help, coach and mentor everyone through this process.
  • Being an Olathe native, I know how proud this community is and want to be able to do as much as I can to give back, through serving everyone at the club as well as being able to support the community in ways like I mentioned above.
  • My vision is that Pulse will be the spot you bring your friends and family, that you never want to leave! Friday night's after football games could look way different. Giving our teens a safe place to go, with all the healthy options they need, to chill, relax and recharge.

Risks & Challenges

  • The biggest risk we face is not having the funding to put the necessities in we are required to have. We know it is possible with your help! And when we open be sure to swing by say hi and grab a shake or tea, you'll fall in love just like I did.   

Other Ways You Can Help

  •  Please share, share, share. Get the word out and make some noise about Olathe's newest hang out!
  • Not sure how to share, no worries just click the share button right here in the campaign and Indiegogo will do the rest!

Being an Olathe native, I know how proud this community is and want to be able to do as much as I can to give back, through serving everyone at the club as well as being able to support the community in ways like I mentioned above.
My vision is that Pulse will be the spot you bring your friends and family, that you never want to leave! Friday night's after football games could look way different. Giving our teens a safe place to go, with all the healthy options they need, to chill, relax and recharge.


Risks & Challenges
The biggest risk we face is not having the funding to put the necessities in we are required to have. We know it is possible with your help! And when we open be sure to swing by say hi and grab a shake or tea, you'll fall in love just like I did.   

Other Ways You Can Help

 Please share, share, share. Get the word out and make some noise about Olathe's newest hang out!
Not sure how to share, no worries just click the share button right here in the campaign and Indiegogo will do the rest!

story:
WHO ARE WE?

We are a colourful group of talented people in the field of health and wellbeing.
With Jouni and his awesome vision we have set up a company called Inner Alchemy Oy.

 

THE PROBLEM

The whole humankind is in a desperate situation. Our selfish way of life has driven us to self-destructive way of living.  We are also polluting our home planet and causing endless amount of suffering to other living beings with that. 

We have enough resources for everyone to live satisfying life and we also have all the technology needed to save the planet but we are lacking kindness, compassion and understanding towards one another. We need to start cooperate with Mother Earth in all the ways possible so that every life form could thrive on this planet together.

 

OUR SOLUTION

We want to help Mother Earth and the whole human race in all the ways possible. Our team thought that the best way for us to help is to share our knowledge and expertise on human health and wellness. The most effective way to do so is to give the best tools possible for everyone so they can become their own healer in need. We are designing a Alchemy pipe and programming a software to help everyone in need to start their personal healing journey.

CALM YOUR NERVES! WITH OUR PRODUCTS YOU HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO GET INSTANT RELIEF AND MAKE YOUR TOMORROW BETTER  ❤️

We have designed a complete program for you to assist you in your own healing process. With our Alchemy pipe and the upcoming software you can become the best version of yourself.

                                                  

 

The basic version of the Alchemy pipe is designed to give the perfect air resistance to support deep breathing and to communicate with our software to give instant feedback when doing breathwork. The basic version consist of two separate parts; Mouthpiece which is easy to keep clean and 3-d pentagon that holds the electric parts (processor, bluetooth connector, air sensor and rechargeable battery).

                                                           

 

 

 
                  

 

Alchemist app includes

  • Alchemist breathwork sessions to alter the state of nervous system

    We want to give you a sample of what our breathworks in the App will be like, here is one for you to enjoy. Wake Up breathwork is designed to give you a quick cup of coffee-like boost for your day. 
                                                                     

 

  • Wide selection of workouts designed by real-life superhero Jori Kota-aho. 
                
 
 
  • Transforming yoga which combines powerful breathing techniques with Yin-yoga.

                                  

 

  • Challenging and new types of meditations to support you in your healing process

 

  • Dance therapy for releasing and get in touch with your suppressed feelings
                                                                   

          

 

The software will also include a Virtual Trainer based on artificial intelligence. The whole team will put knowledge and expertise into the AI. The AI will guide the user with the help of various devices that we’ve developed which  keeps  the virtual trainer connected with the user. First device is the Alchemy pipe and the next is going to be a customised web camera that will work with the AI to correct postures and adjust tempo of the movement.
 

ALCHEMIST IN ACTION


We have already been able to testify how  Alchemist breathworks can change peoples lives and  make a huge difference on their way of thinking. Here are some testimonials that we have received from people who have benefit from Alchemist Method:

"With Alchemist Method exercises I'm able to be more in my body, I can concentrate better and I get more energy to my day. I like the Alchemist Method  because I feel balanced and calm after doing the exercises. Exercises are easy to follow and well guided. I like that there is a good balance and variability in this method, ie. food, yoga and breathing. I like also that it takes in to account that what time of the day it is. There is a big focus on breathing exercises (what I like) and I feel that these exercises help me to be more focused and get more from my day."
-Juuso Kangas, experienced breathworker and self developer

 



"In my first Inner Alchemist  method session I learned breathing techniques that took my regular breathing exercise to a deeper level, permanently. It is life changing to breathe in a way you can never forget."
-Merika Sofi Enne, experienced breathworker

                   

               

 

AFTER THE CAMPAIGN 

We are searching funding to begin the production of the Alchemy pipes.Karhumuovi Oy will produce the plastic parts of the pipe by injection moulding.

 

If we don't reach our campaign goal, we will use the campaign money to enhance the content of Alchemist App.

story:
GET TO KNOW ME!!

Who I am     

Hi, my name is Donald Williams. I am a family man who is devoted to serving others in any and every way I can. Many of you will remember the earthquake that devastated Haiti back in 2010. The opportunity to help presented itself to me and it was one opportunity I could not deny nor will I ever forget. During my time supporting the relief effort in Haiti, I experienced something that changed my life forever. A fire was set in my soul to make a difference for those who are less fortunate, and to provide a resource that would give those the ability to conduct the most rudimentary hygiene activities/needs. The job I speak of is the ability to clean one’s teeth.

​The Beginning

Several years ago, I had an idea for a dental product that could be used anytime and anywhere without needing or having access to water. After my time in Haiti I asked myself, “How do people get water to brush their teeth when their local water isn't potable or if they don't have ANY ACCESS to water?"  Finally I then wondered,  "How is this unfortunate event being corrected?"  I expanded on this question with an idea and fast forward to 2015 when it finally became a reality.

The Product

RipTube Toothpowder. The original single serving Tooth Powder on the market. RipTube is lightweight, easy to carry and easy to use. Best of all you don't need water to use it. RipTube is currently available in a minty flavor and with the funds I aim to raise, more refreshing and exciting new flavors will be added!

How you use it

Just rip the end of the tube (stick pack), and pour the powder in your mouth (or on your toothbrush). The powder reacts to your saliva causing a complete foaming effect that cleanses every inch of your mouth. From there, you brush how you would regularly, or you can swish it around like mouthwash. Then spit it out! Simple, right?

Contributions

 The potential areas where RipTube can provide great and constant dental health are endless. There are 7 billion people in the world, all with one thing in common – we all need dental hygiene to maintain proper oral health. Imagine all the people who will be able to effectively take care of their teeth, people that currently do not have the resources or opportunity to do so.

  • Area One: 2.5 billion people don't have access to adequate sanitation and over 783 million people don't have access to clean water. This is just one of the areas of our world that will be greatly impacted by a product like RipTube.
  • Area Two: The homeless! This is a rising epidemic.  There are currently 500,000 homeless people in the United States and 125,000 of those are children. Not to mention the millions more across the world. Think about refugees.
  • Area Three: It can be placed in care packages for all military personnel and in food rations for all humanitarian relief efforts during times of natural disasters. 
    • According to the Center for Research on the Epidemiology of Disasters, over 218 Million people have been impacted by natural disasters over the last 20 years. From 1994 to 2013 there were 6,873 natural disasters world wide. THINK about the impact here if RipTube was put in the care packages to assist all these people! 
  • Area Four: RipTube can help assist the elderly with teeth cleaning when basic motor functions fail to work.
  • Area Five: Our toothpowder can be utilized in Hospitals all over the world for emergency rooms and to help assist with cleaning, sanitizing, and treating mouth wounds.

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Down to the nitty gritty (What we need)

 We need to raise $90,000 to make RipTube happen in all planned aspects! This means we will be able to finalize the Research and Development with our chemist on standby  ($35,000), Acquisition and Production of the final ingredients upon chemist approval ($25,000), Distribution of RipTube ($15,000), and Marketing to include a website design ($5,000 to $10,000). If this doesn’t make any sense, we need the money to streamline the product to put it in stores and provide it to those who are less fortunate.

(This is the second round of funding).

So, what does this mean

With the first round of funding we took what was an idea and brought it to life through extensive R&D within the market. The previous round helped with creating a functional product that became tangible and was distributed to interested businesses for sampling. It also assisted with Trademarks and Patents as well as Designs for packaging and squaring away the logistics once the product is finalized (with your help of course)!!!After much deliberation, requests and suggestions were made and that has brought us to HERE & NOW.

  • Although, the product cleans your teeth effectively, it does not taste too pleasant to most that have tried it. That is where the funding comes in. Some of the money will go directly to an FDA certified chemist who can transform the current product into a better effective and tasty formula. We are doing this based off feedback we received from our customers and businesses nationwide, "You spoke and we listened". The chemist will also create a few unique flavor lines for RipTube. This includes 3 different flavors that allow RipTube Tooth Powder to be more appealing to more people (everybody's taste buds are different). The rest of the money will go toward acquisition of ingredients, distribution and pushing this product in front of more organizations and businesses in the dental hygiene field that showed previous interest. This will help us grow tremendously! There is currently a decent sized company (roughly 100 stores in the U.S) that is intrigued in giving RipTube a test run once the final product is complete. 

WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU??? 

What you get

 I don't know where to begin! There will be a good amount of tier leveled perks available.

  • Well first off just by donating anything, this means that you believe in what RipTube stands for. "Helping us change the way the people of the world brush their teeth, one mouth at a time." We want to reach those individuals that do not have the current capabilities to perform the rudimentary task of brushing their teeth. Thanks for taking the journey with us.
  • Secondly, it takes guts and faith to go out on a limb and support such a new and useful cause/product as this. Kudos to you!!!

TANGIBLE & COMMEMORATIVE  ITEMS!!! 

  •  We are going to be giving out RipTube EVERYTHING. You have to click through the perks on the right to find out which one is right for you. In general, we are going to be giving away:
    •  Limited Edition Hoodie Sweaters,Hats, Shirts, Tooth Powder Products (Both Original and Revamped Flavors created by the Chemist), Bottle Opener Challenge Coins, Coffee Mugs, Opportunities to Cameo in a commercial and the chance to have your photographic talent used for our new packaging. On top of that, you will be able to be apart of a true humanitarian outreach with the RipTube team. Keep reading below for more thorough info!!!
      • We will be making advertisements and you could star in the upcoming RipTube commercials. This is huge because it isn't every day that you get to be an actor or actress let alone a cameo in an advertisement for a product you backed with donations and believe in.
      • You could also choose one of the next flavors for RipTube.
      • To top it off, you will have the opportunity to do some modeling for our next product box design. This means your mug could be on the newest RipTube box being sold in stores and you will be the first thing that Big Businesses will see when looking at our product. What an awesome trophy to put on your shelf!  
      • RipTube can be taken and used ANYWHERE so you might just end up in Tahiti (or downtown Miami/Orlando/Tampa/Daytona) on a photo shoot for the next box designs, who knows!!
      • Do you have a great photographic eye? Your picture could be used for our next box design. There are certain criteria for the photographs we are looking for. Check out the perk for more info.
      • At RipTube we want to always pay it forward. You could have the opportunity to travel with US and a Humanitarian organization to a place where people are in need. While you are there, you will be handing out RipTube to those who really need some dental hygiene help! What a way to give back. TEAMWORK MAKES THE DREAM WORK!!!

Please read every perk/pledge because they are all unique in their own way!

IF WE DON'T MAKE THE MARK!!

(Fingers crossed that we do!!)

  • ​If the full funding is not met, whatever is raised will go directly to the FDA certified chemist. This person is the ONLY thing currently standing in our way to push forward with businesses,  hospitals, the less fortunate, third world countries, and the like. The reason behind this is because we need a fully sound product that not only is effective with cleaning your teeth, but it needs to be palatable for the majority. The money left over will be used to order ingredients and materials to push the product out. After that, the money will be used to fulfill all the donors who wonderfully supported the RipTube cause. Eventually no matter what happens, success is our mindset and we will not stop until RipTube can make an impact all over the world. 

DONATIONS

If this project achieves successful funding, then 2% of every pledge will be donated to:

  • https://www.toysfortots.org/
  • http://metromin.org/
  • http://familypromise.org/

THE IMPACT

Business

Think about this, you are in between a business meeting and must maintain fresh breath or you will scare the potential client away with your breath. You do not have time to brush your teeth because you are (at work). Tic Tac's and gum just won’t cut it because

  1. It is rude and unprofessional to chew on stuff when you are trying to give a business presentation.
  2. Tic Tac's and gum only mask the problem, they don't eliminate it.

Luckily you have a small pack of RipTube Toothpowder in your pocket. Soooo, you go to your office, rip the pack, and pour the powder in your mouth. Instantly, it foams up and cleans your entire mouth which gives you not only an exceptional clean but it also gives you the fresh breath that you desired. Finally, you spit the product out and go on your way. You may even have earned a raise because your breath was pleasant! (Cue the Music, "Thanks RipTube!!")

Travel

 RipTube is virtually a weightless product that can and will pass all TSA regulations to be sold at Airports. It can easily go anywhere you go.

  • Take it hiking on Mt. Everest where toothpaste tubes have been known to freeze 
  • Take it on an excursion in the desert where toothpaste tubes have been known to burst.
  • Bring it to your hotel when you travel. You don't ever have to worry about forgetting the essentials.
  • Bring it on a date.
  • Take it on a ski trip in the cold mountains. Tooth paste tubes have been known to freeze.

No matter where it goes, RipTube will prove to be the most versatile method to brushing your teeth on the go or at home!

Pleasure

Everyone has heard the saying "Time is money". When it comes to saving time, RipTube is the ultimate in convenience. You can literally maintain a healthy smile always, conveniently. If you think about it, the foaming aspect of RipTube Toothpowder is better than traditional paste that you spread around on your teeth. The powder foams itself and covers your entire mouth for an invigorating cleanse. Talk about a happy mouth!!

 Medical

We have big plans to put our product on the Map. More importantly, we have planned future R&D towards implementing our product in the E.R. in Hospitals nationwide. This product can work hands free which is a first for the market of dental hygiene.

Lodging

 RipTube hopefully will become a licensing product for all Hotels, Resorts, and Lodging across the United States. We would also like to reach out to the major toothpaste companies and lisence it there as well.

Humanitarian Outreach

We would love this product to be one that is able to make a difference across the world. There are literally millions of people every day that go without this luxury we call "brushing our teeth". RipTube wants to change that and implement our product into the care packages, health packages and (Meals-Ready-to-Eat) M.R.E that the U.S. Government hands out for aid when natural disasters strike. Someone somewhere WILL benefit from all our efforts.

Think about all the lives that will be changed from this product. The opportunities are endless and the outreach is only as successful as we allow it to be.

HONESTLY FOLKS, THIS PRODUCTS VERSATILITY ON WHERE IT COULD GO AND WHAT IT CAN DO IS ENDLESS!!!! 

YOU COULD BE APART OF THE RIPTUBE JOURNEY!!

PLEASE HELP SPREAD THE WORD ABOUT THIS AMAZING OPPORTUNITY AND PRODUCT THAT IS MADE TO HELP LITERALLY MILLIONS OF PEOPLE!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Challenges

The only challenge we currently have is the outcome of not making our mark to have the funds to further the business. We will not stop until successful. IT IS NOT POSSIBLE WITHOUT YOU!! 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If donating is not for you, AT LEAST spread the word about this campaign and product to as many people as you can. Most people have over 25 to 50 friends and those people have the same thing. If one person can pass on this info to as many people as possible, then it will spread like wildfire. Five dollars spread between 10,000 people makes $50,000 EVERY TIME! Tell your family, friends, and co-workers so that they too can be apart of something BIGGER!!

Thank you so much for believing in RipTube!!!

We look forward to making the mark with you and changing the way that the people of the world brush their teeth, one mouth at a time!!

story:
If the answer is yes, then you need the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer.

 

 

 

It has long been established that sitting for prolonged periods of time is detrimental to spinal health and conditions related to poor posture, primarily because the sitting position is viewed as being "inactive" with regards to movement and efficient postural activity.

 

Poor postural activity whilst sitting, such as slouching or hunched over, leaning forward, or leaning to one side cause among other things, back pain, neck pain, tension, imbalances in muscular activity, compromised breathing patterns, restricted movements, poor circulation, headaches, poor sleep, reduced energy levels and a reduced ability to concentrate. 

 

Musculoskeletal disorders or MSDs have cost US employers up to $54 billion in 2019 and account for 34% of all lost workdays.

In the UK in 2017/18, 6.6 million working days were lost due to MSDs, costing the employers £4.5 billion . MSDs represent 30% of all UK cases of work-related ill health (excluding cancer and other long-latency illnesses).

In the EU there are over 25 million MSD affected workers costing €290 billion each year.

The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer is a unique product. The posture corrector that you do not have to wear.  

The solution provided by the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer,  addresses the worldwide problem that increasingly affects millions of people each year. Poor postural activity during prolonged periods of sitting. 

Over time, repetitive periods of poor postural activity can develop into chronic pain conditions that ultimately have a negative impact on quality of life at work, at home and place restrictions on the ability to enjoy leisure activities.

The top layer is constructed from black neoprene which is comfortable under foot and easy to keep clean. The middle layer contains the sensors and the base layer is constructed from laminated rubber which has excellent non-slip properties.  All three layers are bonded together and have a practical sealed edge.  The mat can be rolled and stored in its bag.

"Over the years I have been inundated with cases of musculoskeletal and postural issues from people who spend their days at a desk. The simple advice has always been to plant the feet firmly on the floor while sitting, pressing them into the floor with sufficient pressure to feel a reaction of uprighting in the spine. I found that the majority of people try with the best of intentions to do so, but soon forget and drift back into old habits. I wanted to design a product that would provide a constant reinforcement and a reminder to maintain good floor contact and pressure through the feet. And so the idea of the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer was born."

www.rehabps.com

 

As a client of Karl White’s, Paul was immobilised  before he underwent treatment. He knows first-hand the remarkable results achievable through DNS rehabilitation.  He shares Karl’s passion for and belief in The Sit Straigt Active Posture Trainer.

With his experience in managing Major Incident Rooms and the presentation of complex evidential issues in high profile murder cases, he is well acquainted with the use of media platforms to accurately convey information and ideas.

The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer is different to existing posture correction devices....

Postural activity in any position is simply a learned reaction within the body to direction and amount of pressure against points of support and cannot be correctly improved by simply strapping on a support or brace that pulls your shoulders back and down for example.

The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer fits discreetly under your desk or workstation. On first use, a short calibration process is completed and saved for individual users in the event that the computer or workstation is a shared resource.

Data from sensors in the mat is sent by wireless connection to your computer or workstation and will be displayed in a transparent window in the corner of your screen on top of any other open windows.

Through on screen prompts, the user will learn how to establish the optimal ground force contact necessary, to train and maintain an active postural musculature during prolonged sitting periods.

This will facilitate natural involuntary reflex responses in the deep spinal and the core stabilization muscle layers responsible for controlling postural activity.

The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer will constantly monitor pressure input from the user with realtime constant feedback and on screen prompts.  A timer can be set for 30 second intervals within a range of 1 minute up to 15 minutes.  Using for just 5 minutes in each hour is sufficient to re-establish and train to maintain,  optimal postural activity throughout the working day.

 

 

 

By subconsciously reinforcing optimal postural activity during prolonged sitting periods, overall spinal health will quickly improve.  Proper postural function will be restored and all manner of poor posture related issues will be addressed, ultimately not only reducing pain,

But also,...

easing tension, improving mobility, improving sleep, improving concentration, improving respiratory function, improving circulation and digestion. Â The longer term benefits are renewed energy levels and a new lease of life for the individual user. 

 

Benefits to Employers

UK Employers must protect the health and safety of their workers, including home workers, under the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992.  Similar legislation is in force in Europe, USA and many other countries.  Employers must carry out workstation assessments and introduce control measures in respect of identified risks. They must also consider making ‘Reasonable adjustments’ to address issues raised by workers regarding their working environment.  A wise employer will record the action taken to deal with these matters including which control measures or reasonable adjustments were introduced and their rationale for why they were introduced or rejected.  Such records may be invaluable to prove or defend an employer's actions at any employment tribunal or other legal proceedings brought by a worker or the Health & Safety Executive.

The following guidance on the law is taken from the UK Health and Safety Executive publication, “Managing upper limb disorders in the workplace” :

“As an employer, you need to protect your workers from the risk of injury and ill health from upper limb disorders (ULDs) in the workplace.  ULDs include aches and pains in the shoulders, arms, wrists,hands and fingers, as well as in the neck. They are widespread across a range of industries and jobs, for example on assembly lines, in construction, in meat or poultry processing, and in work with computers. They can be caused or made worse by work”. 

“What does the law say"? 

You have general duties under the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992 to assess, control and manage the risks associated with work-related ULDs. If workers are using display screen equipment such as PCs, laptops, tablets and smartphones, employers should comply with the requirements of the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992”.

Risks and controls

Risks to look for                       

These include moving the arm, wrist and fingers into an awkward or uncomfortable position, eg working above shoulder or head height, working with a very bent elbow, or holding the upper limb in the same place for long periods.

Ways of reducing the risk of injury

  1. Design workplaces and equipment so that workers do not have to adopt awkward postures. 
  2. Arrange the position, height and layout of the workstation so it is comfortable to reach and appropriate for the work. 
  3. Consider providing adjustable chairs and footrests, and suitable tools.

The following is taken from the UK Health and Safety Executive publication, “Working with display screen equipment (DSE)” :
“Some workers may experience fatigue, eye strain, upper limb problems and backache from overuse or improper use of DSE. These problems can also be experienced from poorly designed workstations or work environments.  The causes may not always be obvious and can be due to a combination of factors”.

“If you employ many users of DSE, it may help to appoint an assessor to: 

  1. identify who is covered by the Regulations; 
  2. assess workstation risks and put control measures in place; 
  3. provide training”.

“it may be useful for assessors to consider the following: 

  1. investigate all reports of aches and pains from users; 
  2. try to identify the causes of risk by looking at all potential causes. For example, poor posture may be due to bad seating, or sitting awkwardly to avoid glare on the screen, or leaning forward to use the keyboard… “.

The provision of the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer may be an effective control measure to prevent fatigue, eye strain, upper limb problems and backache or an effective ‘Reasonable adjustment’ to an existing issue.  It is a powerful tool to reduce or eradicate such problems within a workforce and consequently reduce related sickness absence.  It is also a cost-effective and efficient measure which employers can use to illustrate their commitment to comply with health and safety legislation and to meet the needs of their workers.

 

 

TAKING THE PAIN AWAY FROM SITTING ALL DAY

 

Risks and challenges

The main challenge is to obtain market share for the product. The risk is that the growth of the venture will be stunted relative to a failure to achieve that market share. The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer will achieve its market share in the posture correctors industry by aggressively pursuing visibility with its target customers. Our market penetration strategy is based on ensuring people know what our product is able to do and making the right products and services available to the right audience at the right price. The strategy conveys quality in every picture, promotion, and publication including online web-based marketing and social media advertising campaigns. The risk of failure to achieve sufficient market share is to be managed through monitoring of analytical data provided by our website host and social media feedback. Critical analysis of this data will identify which areas need to be addressed to promote our product and meet the needs of our customers and which areas of our strategy are performing well.
story_txt:
If the answer is yes, then you need the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer.   It has long been established that sitting for prolonged periods of time is detrimental to spinal health and conditions related to poor posture, primarily because the sitting position is viewed as being "inactive" with regards to movement and efficient postural activity. Poor postural activity whilst sitting, such as slouching or hunched over, leaning forward, or leaning to one side cause among other things, back pain, neck pain, tension, imbalances in muscular activity, compromised breathing patterns, restricted movements, poor circulation, headaches, poor sleep, reduced energy levels and a reduced ability to concentrate.  Musculoskeletal disorders or MSDs have cost US employers up to $54 billion in 2019 and account for 34% of all lost workdays.In the UK in 2017/18, 6.6 million working days were lost due to MSDs, costing the employers £4.5 billion . MSDs represent 30% of all UK cases of work-related ill health (excluding cancer and other long-latency illnesses).In the EU there are over 25 million MSD affected workers costing €290 billion each year.The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer is a unique product. The posture corrector that you do not have to wear.  The solution provided by the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer,  addresses the worldwide problem that increasingly affects millions of people each year. Poor postural activity during prolonged periods of sitting. Over time, repetitive periods of poor postural activity can develop into chronic pain conditions that ultimately have a negative impact on quality of life at work, at home and place restrictions on the ability to enjoy leisure activities.The top layer is constructed from black neoprene which is comfortable under foot and easy to keep clean. The middle layer contains the sensors and the base layer is constructed from laminated rubber which has excellent non-slip properties.  All three layers are bonded together and have a practical sealed edge.  The mat can be rolled and stored in its bag."Over the years I have been inundated with cases of musculoskeletal and postural issues from people who spend their days at a desk. The simple advice has always been to plant the feet firmly on the floor while sitting, pressing them into the floor with sufficient pressure to feel a reaction of uprighting in the spine. I found that the majority of people try with the best of intentions to do so, but soon forget and drift back into old habits. I wanted to design a product that would provide a constant reinforcement and a reminder to maintain good floor contact and pressure through the feet. And so the idea of the Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer was born."www.rehabps.com As a client of Karl White’s, Paul was immobilised  before he underwent treatment. He knows first-hand the remarkable results achievable through DNS rehabilitation.  He shares Karl’s passion for and belief in The Sit Straigt Active Posture Trainer.With his experience in managing Major Incident Rooms and the presentation of complex evidential issues in high profile murder cases, he is well acquainted with the use of media platforms to accurately convey information and ideas.The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer is different to existing posture correction devices....Postural activity in any position is simply a learned reaction within the body to direction and amount of pressure against points of support and cannot be correctly improved by simply strapping on a support or brace that pulls your shoulders back and down for example.The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer fits discreetly under your desk or workstation. On first use, a short calibration process is completed and saved for individual users in the event that the computer or workstation is a shared resource.Data from sensors in the mat is sent by wireless connection to your computer or workstation and will be displayed in a transparent window in the corner of your screen on top of any other open windows.Through on screen prompts, the user will learn how to establish the optimal ground force contact necessary, to train and maintain an active postural musculature during prolonged sitting periods.This will facilitate natural involuntary reflex responses in the deep spinal and the core stabilization muscle layers responsible for controlling postural activity.The Sit Straight Active Posture Trainer will constantly monitor pressure input from the user with realtime constant feedback and on screen prompts.  A timer can be set for 30 second intervals within a range of 1 minute up to 15 minutes.  Using for just 5 minutes in each hour is sufficient to re-establish and train to maintain,  optimal postural activity throughout the working day. 

 
 By subconsciously reinforcing optimal postural activity during prolonged sitting periods, overall spinal health will quickly improve.  Proper postural function will be restored and all manner of poor posture related issues will be addressed, ultimately not only reducing pain,But also,...easing tension, improving mobility, improving sleep, improving concentration, improving respiratory function, improving circulation and digestion. Â The longer term benefits are renewed energy levels and a new lease of life for the individual user.  Benefits to EmployersUK Employers must protect the health and safety of their workers, including home workers, under the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992.  Similar legislation is in force in Europe, USA and many other countries.  Employers must carry out workstation assessments and introduce control measures in respect of identified risks. They must also consider making ‘Reasonable adjustments’ to address issues raised by workers regarding their working environment.  A wise employer will record the action taken to deal with these matters including which control measures or reasonable adjustments were introduced and their rationale for why they were introduced or rejected.  Such records may be invaluable to prove or defend an employer's actions at any employment tribunal or other legal proceedings brought by a worker or the Health & Safety Executive.The following guidance on the law is taken from the UK Health and Safety Executive publication, “Managing upper limb disorders in the workplace” :“As an employer, you need to protect your workers from the risk of injury and ill health from upper limb disorders (ULDs) in the workplace.  ULDs include aches and pains in the shoulders, arms, wrists,hands and fingers, as well as in the neck. They are widespread across a range of industries and jobs, for example on assembly lines, in construction, in meat or poultry processing, and in work with computers. They can be caused or made worse by work”. “What does the law say"? You have general duties under the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992 to assess, control and manage the risks associated with work-related ULDs. If workers are using display screen equipment such as PCs, laptops, tablets and smartphones, employers should comply with the requirements of the Health and Safety (Display Screen Equipment) Regulations 1992”.Risks and controlsRisks to look for                       These include moving the arm, wrist and fingers into an awkward or uncomfortable position, eg working above shoulder or head height, working with a very bent elbow, or holding the upper limb in the same place for long periods.Ways of reducing the risk of injury

assess workstation risks and put control measures in place; 
provide training”.
“it may be useful for assessors to consider the following: 
investigate all reports of aches and pains from users; 
try to identify the causes of risk by looking at all potential causes. For example, poor posture may be due to bad seating, or sitting awkwardly to avoid glare on the screen, or leaning forward to use the keyboard… “.

story:
The Ryzor Pen is a 4-in-1 hyper-portable hair trimmer and mustache shaper. It's used to remove stray nostril hairs, ear hairs, and unibrows with extreme precision in under 2 minutes!

This badass shaver is designed to look modern, minimalist, and discreet: the ultimate shaving gadget for the modern man.

Still using your beard trimmer to remove that unibrow or using sharp scissors to cut nostril hairs? Ryzor Pen is made for ultra-precision trimming.

Ryzor Pen was born to get rid of those unwanted hairs without having to make barber appointments, or without having to struggle for an hour in your own bathroom with razors, tweezers, and scissors!

With Micro Precision Technology & Guard Safety, we’ve created a product that can compete head-to-head with the most advanced razors and trimmers in the world, while allowing our customers to carry around their little Ryzor Pens on-the-go.

story:
A life worth living

MC Charity Foundation was founded by Kristina and Marius Čiuželiai whose daughter was born premature 5 years ago. When the family happily got back home after several months spent in the hospital they made a promise to return "with something" and the Foundation was started. It aims to improve overall nursing conditions, introduce innovations in the field of nursing and invest in modern and long-term nursing techniques and advanced technology. 
The vision of MC Charity Foundation is to create better nursing conditions for those who cannot take care of themselves. We believe everybody deserves a life worth living.

What we aim for and Why it is so important

Having our daughter born premature we realized premature babies are incredibly fragile and what we do during the first few weeks of life has great relevance. The first step in a healthy preterm baby’s life is nutrition.

Newborns and their mothers are unprepared for a premature arrival into the world. Like we were. Mothers may have difficulty producing milk. Preterm babies with their tiny digestive systems can only take in small feeds. Human milk must therefore have the best nutritional quality to ensure growth, with preferably an individual plan for each baby. Because at this stage, every drop counts.
Neonatal medicine has made great strides in the care of preterm babies. Thanks to a better understanding of nutrition we now know that human milk gives preterm babies the best start in life. There is a technology which helps to measure the macro-nutrient composition of human milk contributing to a better outcome for the baby, the family and the clinic.
Miris Human Milk Analyzer (HMA) provides a fast and simple way to uphold human milk as the primary source of nutrition for preterm infants during the first challenging weeks of life. The technology is fast and simple to use. With the minimum of time and fuss, the analyzer gives energy, fat, carbohydrate, and protein content in human milk. This allows hospital staff to focus on the necessary intervention and supervision.
Every year in Lithuania ~2000 premature babies are born, however, there is no single hospital having such an analyzer while in Holland, as an example, there is no hospital which does not have the one. MC Charity foundation initiates this project and aims to raise $25,000 for Miris HMA to be granted to Children's Hospital Neonatal Center of Lithuania. 

Our Challenge

MC Charity Foundation was set up a half a year ago only. Despite the fact this is our second project already, we are newcomers to online community for fundraising. However, we believe no one has ever become poor by giving and with all your help and support we hope to be able to make everyday's life at Neonatal Center a lot easier.

How can you help

We kindly ask you to make any of the below:

  • directly contributing
  • spreading our message

Because at this stage, every drop counts. Every little helps. Thank you.

story:
Dictito SpeechBox is the device which will help you present better, through detailed analysis of your rehearsals and monitoring of your real-time presentations to help you understand how you can improve your presentation skills. 
 

Presentations can be a nightmare for a lot of people, and most people suffer sub-optimal performances due to a variety of reasons, such as insufficient and poor preparation beforehand. With Dictito SpeechBox, you can now better prepare yourself for a presentation, by understanding which performance metric you are under-performing in, such as pitch or volume. Our post-rehearsal analysis report will help you focus on your poorer aspects, allowing you to target your weaknesses and improve more efficiently, becoming a better presenter and speaker.

Dictito SpeechBox can also be deployed during the actual presentation itself, allowing you to monitor your presentation in real-time, and keep track of your performance metrics through an intuitive and visually simple user interface. 

 

Although a good presentation consists more than just speaking well and eloquently, we at Dictito believe that strong foundations in speaking and articulating are essential and will go a long way to helping you grow as a presenter and speaker. It is only after mastering the basics of speech that you will be able to tackle other aspects of a presentation, such as content curation. 

Our research showed us that the fundamental tenets of a presentation revolves around certain speech metrics, and we have consolidated them to help you understand how you can improve better. Certain preset settings have been programmed into the device in the default state, which will help you kick start your journey of improvement, and as you grow as a speaker and presenter, you can tweak these settings to your desired levels so that the device can help you keep track of them in real-time. 

Rehearsal Mode

Monitor your practice in a private space without having to depend on friends. Receive a post-rehearsal feedback report, with data and analysis on the various presentation metrics to help you improve as a presenter. 

As part of our commitment to help you improve as a speaker, the device also comes with an online support in the form of a feedback report. Using data analytics and tracking, along with a well-presented report template, we can help you understand which aspects of your rehearsal requires attention on, so that you can better focus on the essential parts. The report will be generated after each rehearsal conducted in "Rehearsal Mode", and will be sent to your personal email for your viewing. 

Presentation Mode

Receive real time feedback during the presentation and adapt your delivery on the go.

In "Presentation Mode", the user interface is able to convey real-time feedback to you as you present, through the 3 meters on the interface and its background. 

Time Remaining: The background will start off as a full single color, and it will gradually fade to black downwards as time elapses during the presentation, eventually turning the entire background of the UI black, signalling to you that the presentation time is up.

Pitch: The first meter from the left represents your pitch variation, and it will contract or expand vertically according to the range of pitch that you are displaying. It will take reference from data collected in the last 10 seconds from the current time, to ensure that the meter is constantly updating to reflect the current situation. The wider the range of variation, the better your presentation will sound.

Volume: The middle meter represents your volume, and it will fluctuate vertically from the center based on your volume projected. The optimal position to be in is the center of the meter, and you will be able to swiftly identify whether you are too loud or too soft depending on the tracker's distance and position from the optimal point, allowing you to adjust your volume accordingly.

Words Per Minute: The last meter from the left represents your words per minute, or WPM for short. Same as volume, the optimal position to be in is the center of the meter, and you will be able to swiftly identify whether you are speaking too fast or slow depending on the tracker's distance and position from the optimal point, allowing you to slow down or speed up accordingly.

We have gathered some encouraging validation and words from people we have conducted our early prototype user tests with:

“Dictito helps me realize what’s wrong with my speed and tone. Not only can Dictito spot these points, it can also help me to correct them. I feel much more confident when doing my pitch with Dictito.” - Hong Vãn, Student, SMU

“I think it will be helpful to have a device like Dictito that can monitor my presentation performance metrics especially when I rehearse alone, since I tend to memorize my script when preparing for presentations.” - Wen Wei, Student, SMU

“Dictito is just like a personal speech coach. Easy and simple to understand, it has boosted my skills in speech and confidence before each presentation. I will definitely recommend this to anyone who needs help in public speaking in any form” - Yin Jie, Student, SUTD

 

 

We know we are in the very early stages and our product requires a lot of work. We are committed in delivering a speech feedback device that people will find personable and useful. We are also aware that there are many potential problems that may surface given the nature of our product, and we want to make sure that our backers know that we are aware of these risks. 

1) Supply chain issues. As with most hardware products, the supply chain will determine whether we are able to meet deadlines and timings, as well as quality control. Supplies are affected by resources available and demands, and we will try our best to ensure that the suppliers are able to provide us with consistent support. Should this problem surface, we would expect delays and increased lead-times for our products, which will naturally spillover to our customers and backers.

2) Certifications issues. We are aware that there is a need for our product to be certified locally and internationally to be sold worldwide, and we will definitely engage in the relevant board testings to ensure that our product is certified safe and commercially viable, such as the FCC and CE.

3) Manufacturing issues. Dictito pledges to uphold a high standard of quality control during all phases of manufacturing, but unforeseen issues can arise during production and installation, which may slip through our control. Hence, it is possible that certain batches of the product may end up with flaws that will compromise the entire product. In that scenario, we are committed to ensure that you will receive a direct exchange of the product, and we will cover all relevant costs that may be incurred as a direct result of our mistake, subject to review on a case by case basis.

Our target market largely comprises university students and business employees who need to give formal presentations, or just anyone who wants to become a better speaker!

In the next year: production-ready with a concrete value chain.

In the next 3 years: add additional features such as Virtual Reality (VR) audience setting, expansion into other market segments such as keynote speakers and thought leaders.

Where does Dictito ship?

The Dictito SpeechBox ships worldwide. The time to ship may vary depending on certification.

When does Dictito start shipping?

Our pre-orders (open now) will start to be fulfilled and delivered by around October 2017, based on a first-come, first-serve basis. The Dictito team will keep you updated of our progress and inform you of firmer delivery details closer to the date of delivery.

Does the SpeechBox operate with a battery? What is the battery life?

The SpeechBox currently operates with a plugged-in micro USB cable. We are currently working to release a battery-operated version soon that allows it to be powered for ~5 hours of continuous use.

Why are the components and materials of the SpeechBox subject to change?

We are committed to bringing you guys the best possible version of the SpeechBox, and we are still running tests to revise and modify the device. As such, certain materials and components may be switched and changed depending on the needs of the device. The device will still be delivered at the same price as promised if you back us, and if there are significant cost savings, we will include additional peripherals to compensate accordingly. 

What are the dimensions of the SpeechBox?

We are still working on improving the SpeechBox, and the dimensions will definitely change from the current size once it is finalized. We will update you guys with more details once we have confirmed everything.

How will the post-rehearsal feedback report look like?

We are currently in the midst of finalizing the visual template and details for the report, and we will update you guys with more details and pictures once it is ready.

Are there any stretch-goals planned for the campaign?

We are looking into possible enhancements and peripherals that can be integrated into the current SpeechBox, such as different materials for the box itself, and we will definitely be considering to release it as a stretch-goal in the near future. 

How can I reach your team if I have further questions? 

Contact us via our contact form at www.dictito.com.

2) Certifications issues. We are aware that there is a need for our product to be certified locally and internationally to be sold worldwide, and we will definitely engage in the relevant board testings to ensure that our product is certified safe and commercially viable, such as the FCC and CE.
3) Manufacturing issues. Dictito pledges to uphold a high standard of quality control during all phases of manufacturing, but unforeseen issues can arise during production and installation, which may slip through our control. Hence, it is possible that certain batches of the product may end up with flaws that will compromise the entire product. In that scenario, we are committed to ensure that you will receive a direct exchange of the product, and we will cover all relevant costs that may be incurred as a direct result of our mistake, subject to review on a case by case basis.

Our target market largely comprises university students and business employees who need to give formal presentations, or just anyone who wants to become a better speaker!
In the next year: production-ready with a concrete value chain.
In the next 3 years: add additional features such as Virtual Reality (VR) audience setting, expansion into other market segments such as keynote speakers and thought leaders.

Where does Dictito ship?
The Dictito SpeechBox ships worldwide. The time to ship may vary depending on certification.
When does Dictito start shipping?
Our pre-orders (open now) will start to be fulfilled and delivered by around October 2017, based on a first-come, first-serve basis. The Dictito team will keep you updated of our progress and inform you of firmer delivery details closer to the date of delivery.
Does the SpeechBox operate with a battery? What is the battery life?
The SpeechBox currently operates with a plugged-in micro USB cable. We are currently working to release a battery-operated version soon that allows it to be powered for ~5 hours of continuous use.
Why are the components and materials of the SpeechBox subject to change?
We are committed to bringing you guys the best possible version of the SpeechBox, and we are still running tests to revise and modify the device. As such, certain materials and components may be switched and changed depending on the needs of the device. The device will still be delivered at the same price as promised if you back us, and if there are significant cost savings, we will include additional peripherals to compensate accordingly. 
What are the dimensions of the SpeechBox?
We are still working on improving the SpeechBox, and the dimensions will definitely change from the current size once it is finalized. We will update you guys with more details once we have confirmed everything.
How will the post-rehearsal feedback report look like?
We are currently in the midst of finalizing the visual template and details for the report, and we will update you guys with more details and pictures once it is ready.
Are there any stretch-goals planned for the campaign?
We are looking into possible enhancements and peripherals that can be integrated into the current SpeechBox, such as different materials for the box itself, and we will definitely be considering to release it as a stretch-goal in the near future. 

How can I reach your team if I have further questions? 
Contact us via our contact form at www.dictito.com.

story:
Keep your baby safe with Cutetok [Cutey-tok]

 

It will be delivered during the July!

 

 

 

If it fits, it will be clean

Sanitize your baby product anywhere you go

 

 

It's small and light enough to take anywhere you go.

Now you can sterilize your baby stuff on the go!

 

 

How Cutetok works?

 

1. Open the lid and put your product inside.

2. Close the lid

3. Twist the lid and start the sterilization.

4. Twist the lid to the left put out your stuff.

 

 

In the car

 

At the Picnic

 

Even when you're @ home

 

 

 

Kill the 99.9% of germs

with UV lamp in 4 minutes!

 

 

Cutetok is certified product that

approved by Korean government.

 

 

It Last a month with a set of AA batteries

 

 

 

Features of Cutetok!

 

Check out the unique feature of Cutetok.

 

 

 

 

Specification

Cutetok Red, Blue and Purple is available right now

(The color is provided at random.)

 

 

compatible with almost every infant product in market.

 

 

 

Say goodbye to the old way to clean your baby product

 

 

 

 

 

 

Specialized High Density UV lamp
will terminate the 99.9 of the germ

 

 

 

This prototype GIF shows the inside of Cutetok that filled with UV ray inside.

 

Perks

 

To appreciate for your support. we will send you the Cutetok from Korea (Delivery charge will be paid from us!) We would support and patronage for this campaign. We’re going to put your name on our wall on our wall of fame page on our Facebook page.

 

 

 

 

Letter from the Korea

 

Our company kimsliving is specializing in baby disinfectors. Each of our product developers has worked in the baby product industry for over 5 years and we constructed this firm on the idea of “product development with creative innovation added to the essence.” Our firm promise to impress our supporter and backers and to be responsible for your trust by developing an innovative idea and eco-friendly product that make your parenting experience better.

For this product Cutetok, we have utilized our knowledge and wisdom to resolve a problem when we faced to raise our kid… Sanitizing the baby product that my kids dropped down when we were out with our babies.

Our goal is to deliver the Cutetok to the parents who want to keep their baby product clean and tidy while they are on the go with their babies. And to build up a new brand of baby sterilizing product line in Korea.

Support us and be a part of our project to make every mom and baby can enjoy the clean and happy life♡

 
 
 
 
 
 

Timeline

 

Kimsliving is a company specializing in baby disinfectors, founded on the idea of “product

development with creative innovation added to the essence.” We promise to impress our

Customers and to be responsible for your trust by maximizing the creative thinking, reasonable

Judgement and ability of each of our employees.

 

 

 

 

 

Cutetok is getting ready!
Speed is all about delivery!

 

 

 

How do we make Cutetok?

 

 
 

 

 

 

FAQS

 

1. Is it too small to sanitize my baby product perfectly?

With High Density UV lamp, Cutetok can terminate 99.9% of germ. Also the floor part has made of stainless steel that reflects the UV ray to cover the inside of Cutetok.

 

2. When should I replace the UV lamp?

Our UV lamp is specialized and it last for at least ten years, so you can use Cutetok semi-permanently.

 

3. How long does Cutetok to sanitize?

Close and twist the lid and wait for 4 minutes!

 

4. Can I use Cutetok even when my pacifier is wet?

Due to nature of the UltraViolet lamp, watery texture will degrade the sterilizing power. Please dry your pacifier before you put into the Cutetok.

 

5. How should I clean the Cutetok?

Please don't wash the UV lamp or stainless steel reflector with water, use a cotton swab or dry fabric to wipe out and that's it! Upper case can be washed by water but make sure to dry perfectly!

 

6. How can I check that this thing works?

After you close and twist the lid, the indicator on the bottom of the cutetok will be shining! That means your baby product is getting cleaned!

 

7. Is heat generated during operation of the Cutetok?

Does have no heat because we are using UV(Ultraviolet) lamp.

 

8. Can I sanatize two pacifiers in one time?

Cutetok is designed to sterilize a single product at one time.

 

9. I dropped the Cutetok! Is this okay?

The water drop shaped design of Cutetok has been tested from the developent stage to withstand the impact even when it falling from 3.9ft

 

10. Can I sanitize the bottle nipple with hood together? Or should I dissemble from the hood?

You can simply just put your bottle nipple with hood. The inside of Cutetok is pretty wide.

 

11. Can I sanitize other baby product that fits inside of Cutetok?

Every baby product that fits into the cutetok can be cleaned!

 

12. How long does it take after you inset the pair of battery

A set of AA size batteries can be used for one month when used five times a day.

 

13. How can I check the battery?

You can check the LED indicator at the bottom of the Cutetok.

 

14. Is it heavy? I mean it's portable right?

It's only 0.3 pound that can fit in your bag!

 

15. Why did you use stainless steel inside of Cutetok?

Stainless reflector can spread the UV ray to cover the dirty stuff and is much more hygenic than plastic

 

16. What is UV?

Everyone would have had an experience of peeling off your skin when your playing at the beach in hot summer. This is the phenomenon that the UV rays contained in the sunshine break down the DNA in the Cell, and the dead cell leaves the skin tissue. Thus, UV light has the physio-chemical energy to destroy the micro-sized cell or bacteria, and that applies same in the Cutetok.

 

17. Why do you use UV ray to eliminate the germ?

The light emiited from the UV lamp of Cutetok is UV(UV-C) light included in the sunlight and as we explained the way of UV break down the cell in article 16. In addition, UV light can inhibit the growth of bacteria and viruses.

 

18. Does Cutetok waterproof?

No, Cutetok isn't waterproof.

 

19. Does this sound during while operating?

No! Babies respond sensitively to small sounds, so they do not sound.

 

20. Does Cutetok generate the ozone during the disinfection?

Cutetok has a special-designed UV lamp that reduces harmful ozone emissions by up to 90%. No worry for you and your baby about silicon corrosion!

 

21. Does battery has contained in your package?

The battery is not included.

 

22. Won't there be a lot of electromagnetic waves?

Cutetok hates eletromagnetic waves!

 

23. How did you make Cutetok

When I raised the baby, I went out with my baby a lot but there is no way to keep my baby product clean. So I decided to develop the portable sterilizer for baby product and here we have Cutetok now.

 

24. How will you plan to do anything with this money we invested to you?

Thank you for your concern and we will develop a newly developed milk bottle for baby!

 

25. How long is the warranty for the Cutetok?

6 months after purchase (Consumer nergligence and damaged goods are excluded)

 

26. What's the general selling price after the end of the campaign

45000KRW and 45USD

 

 

http://www.cutetok.com/eng/

Facebook Fan page https://www.facebook.com/Kimslivng/
