story:
It’s hard coping with stress, whether it’s work or personal life that’s putting pressure on us. Stress can make us irritated, anxious and disconnected from our coworkers, family members, friends and even ourselves. This is quite natural – it’s our mind’s way of defending itself.

We at Awareness Recreated wanted to create an exciting way for anyone to learn about these mechanisms. Our goal was to design a game that is both fun and interesting to play, but can also help to understand how psychological defense mechanisms affect our daily lives. 

We’ve created a demo version to test the first level of the game, where you can interview three different characters and discover their defenses. Next, we need your help to complete the game, as it is still missing two important stages:

On the second level you practice making your clients’ known defence mechanisms visible and helping the characters accept them.

On the third level you try to rewire the feelings and reactions that trigger the characters’ defenses, and help them find other ways of coping with stress.

Your contribution will help us complete all three levels, and get the game ready for you, the players!

 

With Couch Talk you can:

  •  learn to recognise common psychological defence mechanisms
  •  discover ways to steer yourself and others away from harmful defences
  •  learn healthy and productive ways of coping with stressful situations
  •  improve the wellbeing of yourself and others in social environments like workplace and home
  •  gradually reduce stress and anxiety
  •  learn to better know and understand yourself and others

 

Further development of Couch Talk

To complete the game and to provide it to people who want to learn more about themselves or struggle with stress, we reach for funding of 60 000€.

Here’s what we’ll need the funding for:

  •  Game Design to ensure an enjoyable and fun experience
  •  Programming to bring the new game levels into existence
  •  Writing both fascinating and educational conversation options for the new levels
  •  Including more researchers and mental health specialists in the content development to make the game as impactful as possible


Defense mechanisms: Both useful and problematic

Unconscious defense mechanisms can help our minds cope with stress and pressure, but they can be harmful as well. They can put a strain on our relationships with our colleagues, friends, families and significant others.

These kinds of mechanisms are often reactive ways of coping with stressful circumstances: they arise in situations where one feels threatened, pressured or uncomfortable in one way or the other, for example on occasions, when we get irritated and end up snapping at someone, or when we feel sad or tired but act energetic and happy instead. They’re called “defense mechanisms” for a reason: their job is to protect our consciousness from difficult thoughts and situations, and they work so fast our conscious mind has difficulty with catching them before they affect our behaviour.

You’ve probably heard about some common defense mechanisms, such as passive aggression, denial, acting out or projection. But not all defense mechanisms are problematic! We can learn to defend our minds in difficult situations with for example such defenses as humor and assertiveness.

By learning to take note of these reactions and gently bringing them to attention, we have a better chance of being in control of these situations, and steering them in a more productive direction.


Learn how to deal with stressful situations in a healthier way

Through the game you can learn to spot how a stressful situation triggers these mechanisms, and steer yourself away from those reactions and feelings of anxiety, towards healthier ways of dealing with the problem at hand.


Goal: to make a research-based, life-changing and fun game

Our goal is to help ease the everyday lives of people, reduce stress and anxiety, and help build smoother relationships at home and at work. 

However, it’s also important to us that the game is interesting and fun to play. We’re not making a textbook or a lecture, but instead an interactive, enjoyable experience, that can also make a difference and improve people’s well-being.

We have a great team working on game design and development, and our founder has a wide knowledge in psychology, but we want to be careful to base our game in the latest research. Already we have worked with experts in the field of psychology. With your help, we will develop the game further with mental wellbeing and psychology professionals and researchers in order to really have an impact on people’s lives in the most positive way!


Help us by sharing the campaign and follow us on social media!

You can also help us by sharing this campaign in social media or introducing it to your friends and family! 

Follow our journey via our social media channels and join the community! 

Facebook: Awareness Recreated Oy

Instagram: awarenessrecreated

LinkedIn: Awareness Recreated Oy

Twitter: Awareness Recreated

story:
Hello! My name is Tamara Brown, the proud owner of JAK's Essentials all natural all handmade skincare company. I started this amazing company after having three children who suffered from severe skin conditions such as hyper sensitive, eczema, and acne. We went to doctor after doctor searching for solutions and remedies that only provided temporary relief and often times caused more harsh reactions. I knew there had to be a better way. I educated myself and studied endlessly on natural solutions. I began trying them out and some worked okay but nothing gave us what we needed. I began formulating my own products with nourishment, healing, protection, and prevention as my foundation for formulation and JAK's Essentials was born. JAK's Essentials stands for Jalen, Ashod, & Kay'Leigh my three amazing children. 

Our campaign is extremely essential in our next step. By opening the very first all natural all handmade skincare bar it will allow us to not only have a location for our customers to shop face to face but give our customers the opportunity to have skincare crafted just for them. Imagine walking into a skincare store that features an actual bar set up but instead of libations the bar would be fully stocked with natural and raw butters, oils, herbs, and additives. Customers will be able to CHOOSE what goes into their skincare and our "bartenders" who will be trained on each ingredient, its benefits and how it will work with the formulation,  will assist customers in their selection. 

We need to get the first one open and have plans to expand to other areas. Depending on the location we will include a full service spa (skin, massage, mani & pedi). We want to change the way people think and feel about skincare. We want people to feel amazing in their skin and even more amazing about what goes on it. 

By running this campaign we are giving our customers, future customers, and supporters an opportunity to be apart of something amazing. When we get the skin bar up and running, for every purchase over $30.00 we will donate personal care products to families that are less fortunate. We believe personal care is extremely important for mental and physical health. 

 

We are trying to raise a total of $25,000.00 in order to open our skin bar. This money would secure the location, utilities, renovations, marketing and staffing. We have faith that we will achieve this goal. If for some reason we do not the money will go into the JAK's Essentials saving until the goal is reached. No funds will be spent until we are fully funded and ready to open. 

 
When any business choose to expand there are always risks involved. I have been in retail management for over 15 years. This gives me an advantage that a lot of small businesses do not have. By having this background it will allow me to hire the best qualified staff, choose the perfect location, plan events ( sales, grand openings, etc) and keep accurate profit and loss statements. I know who my competitors are, their price points, and marketing strategy. I have watched the trends and behaviors of my target market and know exactly how to reach them. 
 
We know everyone can not contribute monetarily, but there are many ways you can help contribute to our goal:
1. Share our campaign with your friends and family
2. Follow us on social media (Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr) and share share share!!
3. If you are a current customer, share your experience and stories on our social media and tag us! We love to hear from you!
 
This is an exciting time for JAK's Essentials!! Two years ago this was all a dream in my head and now here we are just steps from the total vision. So join us in loving all skin from birth!

We are trying to raise a total of $25,000.00 in order to open our skin bar. This money would secure the location, utilities, renovations, marketing and staffing. We have faith that we will achieve this goal. If for some reason we do not the money will go into the JAK's Essentials saving until the goal is reached. No funds will be spent until we are fully funded and ready to open. 
 When any business choose to expand there are always risks involved. I have been in retail management for over 15 years. This gives me an advantage that a lot of small businesses do not have. By having this background it will allow me to hire the best qualified staff, choose the perfect location, plan events ( sales, grand openings, etc) and keep accurate profit and loss statements. I know who my competitors are, their price points, and marketing strategy. I have watched the trends and behaviors of my target market and know exactly how to reach them.  We know everyone can not contribute monetarily, but there are many ways you can help contribute to our goal:1. Share our campaign with your friends and family2. Follow us on social media (Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr) and share share share!!3. If you are a current customer, share your experience and stories on our social media and tag us! We love to hear from you! This is an exciting time for JAK's Essentials!! Two years ago this was all a dream in my head and now here we are just steps from the total vision. So join us in loving all skin from birth!

story:
English language

  
   

Český jazyk

  

 

English language

WE ARE INTRODUCING A REVOLUTIONARY

miomove CONCEPT

 

 

Our concept is based on a unique technology of carbon nanosensors that has been successfully completed after several years of development, in cooperation with our partner:

 

 

Thanks to their nanocomposite layer structure, these sensors have an exclusive ability to respond almost linearly to the slight changes in the forces they exert.

 

Our next task is to create truly unique and functional prototypes of running, cycling and football smart shoes with your support!

Our sensors will provide maximally important information about various sports activities.

 

Our sensors are specially engineered for an integration into both the insole and the vamp. This will allow us to evaluate not only the footprint but also the other forces within the shoe.

 

 

This technology is suitable not only for running, performance evaluation or the right cycling technique,

but will also accurately evaluate the kick technique with the soccer ball, which will be beneficial for junior football players and their coaches.

 

The development of the sensors themselves was really challenging and now we also need your support.

Come with us to complete the miomove Smart Shoe. Its revolutionary technology can obtain information about the technique and effectiveness of your physical activity.

 

We want to help people with active lifestyle, athletes, handicapped people and last but not least patients who have to learn to walk again.

 

Our sensors can gather as accurate information about footprints as medical equipment worth hundreds of thousand dollars.

Unique smart shoe technology can also provide the right development of the baby's foot.

Healthy foot

 

Flat foot

 

Video

 

Then, with your help we will be also able to insert this technology into the shoe.

 

Every donation takes this project a step forward. 

It does not matter whether you are running, cycling, playing tennis or football.

It is important that you do the exercise properly and at the same time improve yourself in what you are doing.

 

Each and every wrong technique may have a negative impact on your performance, whether it's exhaustion, spinal pain or excessive muscular system wear off.

With the help of specialists, the miomove team develops its own 3D anatomy enabling us to better visualize not only the accuracy of your physical exercise but also to present you various studies and lectures.

 
 

 

We mean it seriously and because this concept is truly unique, we have prepared an exclusive gifts for you for your contribution. Simultaneously with the development of sensors, we are developing a sports mobile application and 3D anatomy developed by a team of experienced programmers and graphics.

Versions of the miomove application.

 

BASIC

 

PRO

 

PREMIUM ACCOUNT

 

Support this project with us

 

Back to top

 

 

Český jazyk

 

PŘEDSTAVUJEME VÁM REVOLUČNÍ KONCEPT

miomove:​

 

 

Tento koncept je založený na unikátní technologii speciálních uhlíkových nanosenzorů, které se nám po několika letech vývoje podařilo úspěšně dokončit, a to ve spolupráci s našim partnerem, kterým je:

 

 

Tyto senzory mají díky své struktuře nanokompozitních vrstev, exklusivní schopnost téměř lineárně reagovat i na nepatrné změny sil, které na ně působí​:

 

Našim dalším úkolem bude s vaší pomocí vytvořit opravdu unikátní a funkční prototypy běžeckých, cyklistických a fotbalových chytrých bot!

Senzory budou poté poskytovat maximálně hodnotné informace o různých sportovních aktivitách:

 

Naše senzory jsou speciálně technologicky uzpůsobené pro integraci jak do stélky, tak i do svršku boty. Díky tomu budeme moci vyhodnotit nejenom došlap, ale i ostatní síly uvnitř boty:

 

 

Tato technologie poté bude vhodná nejen pro běh nebo k vyhodnocení výkonu a správné techniky šlapání na kole:

ale taky přesně vyhodnotí techniku kopu do fotbalového míče, což bude přínosem i pro juniorské fotbalisty a jejich trenéry:

 

Vývoj samotných senzorů byl opravdu náročný a nyní potřebujeme i vaši pomoc.

Pojďte s námi dokončit miomove Smart Shoe. Její revoluční technologie dokáže získat informace o technice a efektivitě vaší pohybové aktivity.

 

Chceme pomoci lidem s aktivním životním stylem, atletům, handicapovaným lidem a v neposlední řadě i pacientům, kteří se musejí znovu učit chodit.

Naše senzory mohou díky svým unikátním vlastnostem získávat stejně přesné informace o došlapu, jako zdravotnické zařízení v hodnotě milionů korun.

 

Tato unikátní technologie může také podchytit správný vývoj dětského chodidla:

Zdravá noha

 

Plochá noha

 

Video

 

A tuto technologii můžeme s vaší pomocí nyní dostat i do boty:

 

Každý váš příspěvek posune tento projekt o kus dál.

Nezáleží na tom, jestli běháte, jezdíte na kole, hrajete tenis nebo fotbal, důležité je, abyste pohybovou aktivitu prováděli správně a zároveň se tak zlepšovali v tom, co děláte.

 

Každá nesprávná technika může mít negativní dopad na Váš výkon, ať už je to únava, bolesti páteře nebo nadměrné opotřebení  pohybové soustavy.

Tým miomove proto s pomocí odborných lékařů vyvíjí i vlastní 3D anatomii, pomocí které například budeme schopni nejenom lépe vizualizovat správnost techniky vaší pohybové aktivity, ale i vám představit různé odborné studie a přednášky. 

 
 

 

 

Myslíme to vážně, a protože je náš koncept jedinečný a vaše pomoc opravdu důležitá, chceme vám nabídnout i hodnotné dárky. Společně s vývojem senzorů vyvíjí náš tým zkušených programátorů a grafiků i sportovní mobilní aplikaci a 3D anatomii.

Aplikace miomove bude dostupná ve verzi:

BASIC

 

PRO

 

PRÉMIOVÝ ÚČET

 

Podpořte i vy projekt, na kterém pracuje:

 

 

Na začátek

story:
Stay Active and Independent

Hands-free

The BiKube™ allows you to move around in a seated or standing position by steering with your feet. Keeping your hands free to rest on the handles or to carry your favorite book and cup of coffee. 

Adjustable seat

Once on the BiKube™, you can adjust the height of the seat to match your activity, with just a push of a button.Transferring from a low seated position at the dinner table to a higher seated position to head to the kitchen has never been so easy with the hydraulic technology.

Compact and easy to maneuver

Move in small spaces is simple (toilets, hallway, bathroom, etc.). You can swing around in tight areas or walk easily through narrow doors (2 feet).

Safe & Stable

Experience autonomy and freedom of movement thanks to the BiKube's four rotating wheels and wide base. Mounting from the rear ensures you always keep both feet firmly on the ground and maintain constant stability. 

Maintain Eye Contact

Stand straight and maintain eye contact. No more crouching forward!

Support & Good Posture

Relieve your legs and decrease muscle and joint pain in the hips, knees or ankles.

 

What Our Users Are Saying:

Marie had a foot surgery with 2 plates and 12 pins. She discovered the BiKube™ and here is what she has to say! 

Monica suffers from severe arthritis. She experienced the BiKube™ at home,

 

John is waiting for knee surgery. He could not put weight on his left leg. He is having the time of his life trying the early prototype of the BiKube™. 

 

The BiKube™ Details

The Frame

This lightweight, modern frame has been specially designed by engineers to provide users with the support and stability needed to keep their hands-free. The wide front provides a lot of stability while still being narrow enough to go through tight spaces. The bottom front bend is what makes the device tip proof. The tail end slides under chairs to facilitate the transition on and off the device. While the middle section leaves a wide empty space to allow the users to propel themselves in all directions. The seat is also conveniently located just a few inches from the front of the device to ensure easy access to counters and tables.

The Shaft

 

Developed using mountain bike technology and research, the dropper post allows the user to adjust the height of the seat and find the best height for their activity with the click of a button.

Whether in a low seated static position or higher position for walking, the device is easily adjustable for maximum comfort and functionality. 

 

 

360° Caster wheels

These wheels are non-marring and non-scratching on a hardwood floor. They allow users to stride easily and without much effort which is ideal for those who have weaker leg strength. Foot locking is included to stabilize the transition on and off the device and to provide added stability when in a static position.
These wheels also twirl in on themselves to allow users to easily maneuver in tight spaces or move laterally in front of a kitchen counter. 

The Seat


Ah ah! We found the most comfortable maker of saddles on the market.  Fitted for a 90° upright and relaxed position. The Gel padding guarantees the highest standards of comfort. Because everyone is different, the good news is that the attachment on the post is standard, Therefore, users can adapt the device to use any seat available on the market.

 

Folding


Folding the BiKube™ is easy. Turn the ring and the device will fold flat for easy storage and fit in the trunk of the car.

 

 

A Closer Look

click above to open the 3D animation in a new window

 

How It Works

 

Specifications

 

Stretch Goals

$50,000

Hooray! We are in business. Production will start.

$150,000

Stretch Goal #1
We can start the R&D for accessories

$350,000

Stretch Goal #2
R&D to increase the weight capacity

$700,000

Stretch Goal #3
R&D to develop an outdoor model 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The prototype is finalized. For the last 12 months, we have gathered a lot of feedback, comments, and suggestions from the community and our Beta testers and we are now ready to go to production. 

We need your help to mass produce the first series and bring the BiKube™ to life. Your purchase is GUARANTEED. If we do not reach our goal of $50,000, the project will stop and you will be refunded 100%. See IndieGoGo fixed crowdfunding campaign terms.  

We have designed exclusive and creative perks. There are multiple ways for you to support this project whether you need this device for yourself, a family member, a friend, or would simply like to fund the project and help us donate a few of these devices to selected associations we are partnering with.

People In Action

 

The Impact

The BiKube™ will help thousands of people with restricted mobility. There is nothing like this on the market and we believe this device will contribute to the well-being of many people and their families.

Here are some of the comments we received over the last few months on our Facebook page.

  • "Just what I've been needing" 
  • "Wow, this is so handy for people that need help, and don't have to rely on other people"
  •  "I can't wait to be able to get one for myself and I hope it's real soon
  • "Wow, I sure need one of them, awesome"

Independence, freedom, autonomy but also finally a device that is fun and that you will want to use. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you don't need a Bikube, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make a $25 or $50 donation. For every $ 500 collected, we will reserve a BiKube for donation to the Spondylitis Association of America or for people with low-income.
  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the news!

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I know if the BiKube is right for me?
If you say yes to these questions it will likely be right for you!

  • Are you looking for an indoor mobility aid that will improve your function and keep you stronger for longer?
  • Are you able to hold yourself in a sitting position unsupported?
  • Do you have a range of movement and strength in your ankles and toes to operate the two front brakes or have a support worker who can assist with this during transfers and operating the breaks?
  • Do you have the cognitive ability to learn a new skill?
  • Do you have the hip range of movement and strength to slide or swing your leg over the seat?
  • Is your home all one level (no slopes/grades, carpet/rugs, descending stairs without a gate or door)?

What is the weight limit? 
The BiKube™ has a weight limit of 250lbs

How is it hands-free?
The Bikube™ allows you to maintain a sit-standing position and is very stable.
The seat helps keep the weight off your legs but allows them to still be in use. It is your legs that are then used to maneuver you around the house. The handlebars are there for comfort but users can maneuver and feel fully balanced and supported without holding onto them, which means they can carry items with ease.

How can I dismount from the Bikube™?
You are able to dismount by lowering the seat and dismounting by stepping backward. It's designed so that you keep both feet on the ground when getting on and off. Alternatively, you can swing your leg over the seat as if riding a bike.

What are the Warranty and Return policy?
Read our policy here

story:
WHY?

Innovations made complicated tasks accessible to the general public, but this has not happened for biotech and medicine. In 2015 I got malaria in Ghana in and I was diagnosed by a microscope, while more advanced technologies exist. We all have seen that there are not enough skilled experts for testing especially in rural areas. EDUCATION IS THE KEY!

We developed an educational kit to diagnose infections as (malaria, HIV, TB, COVID, sickle cells, and more)

Warning: Several tests can be run in parallel, but each of them requires a separate probe. 

WHAT?

  • We provide videolectures focused on rural areas.
  • An accessible diagnostic kit for a series of infections.
  • Continuos education.
  • A GIS for NGOs or for our network to map all positive cases.

with each 100 EUR we will empower one selected lab in Ghana, or you can buy those things for yourself.

The diagnostic kit is based on Loop Isothermal amplification (read the original scientific paper),  which provides results in 20-30 minutes visible by the naked eye without further devices as for PCR. Pink is a negative and yellow is a positive case of whatever disease (malaria, TB, HIV, COVID...).

The geographic information system (GIS) can be used by our individual users creating a network of positive cases, or by NGOs which are using several of our devices within their clinics and they want to have an immediate look of what is happening.

 

HOW?

We aim at supporting 1000 labs in Ghana and west Africa with this initiative and other funding. 

You can donate, or buy a kit for yourself, or at least share on your social media.

If we go beyond the goal, the further funding will finance scholarship to researchers in Ghana.If we reach reasonably less than the limit we will proceed anyway with the project. 

 

FOR WHO?

If instead of just donating, you are interested in using the device. It is for:

  • Field scientists looking for easy-to-carry equipment 
  • Citizen scientists solving social problems 
  • Designers and Artists
  • Bioscience/Veterinary students taking their work home 
  • Teachers sharing hands-on practicals with their students
  • Small clinics with little equipments testing infections as (malaria, HIV, TB...)
  • Curious folk with an interest in DNA! 
  • Mycologists, foragers, brewers checking their yeast strains.

In theory, you can perform advanced tests as for COVID19, but those also require a biosafety level 2 or 3. We will advise you on the steps to achieve this, but if you do not have already those levels of security, we do not recommend this amateur use as it might represent a hazard. 

 

WHAT DO I GET?

T-shirt      -     20 CHF (19 EUR)  (donation only)

A black tshirt  with a size of your choice and stickers

(bike and girl not included)

 

Personalized video      -      20 CHF (19 EUR)  (donation only)

We will make a video with a chicken named by you, and upload it on youtube

 

Basic Kit       -     99 EUR

  • Videolectures
  • 1x Lamp heater
  • 1x Pipette 1-20 ul
  • 1x small probe with reagent for DNA extraction
  • Mobile app and access to the general GIS platform
  • Stickers

 

Full Kit       -     149 EUR

  • Videolectures
  • 1x Lamp heater
  • 1x Pipette 1-20 ul
  • 1x small probe with reagent for DNA extraction
  • Mobile app and access to the general GIS platform
  • 1x small probe with LAMP Warmstart
  • 1x small probe with DNA primer for a disease (currently planned malaria)
  • Stickers

 

Subscription plan       -     9 EUR per month (coming soon)

 

GIS solution for NGOs       -     (coming soon)

 

OPENNESS

Over the years, we have benefitted immensely from information from Open Source, Open Science, DIYbio and Biocommons community. We stand on the shoulders of giants such as Hackteria,  OpenPCR project, the iGEM community, BentoLab and many, many others. We aim at releasing all possible data and source code online at the end of the campaign. 

 

CHICKEN

No animal has been hurt during the realization of this campaign or it will. All the chickens are currently fine and taken care of. Read the full story here.

story:
Short Summary

 I am a Board Certified Advance Nurse Practitioner who specializes in dermatology and aesthetics medicine. Many patients of mine typically have the same skin concerns: Acne, uneven skin tone, Products that don't work, Fine line and wrinkles or chronic skin conditions such as rosacea and melasma. I would like to create a skincare line that actually works! 

A line to fight signs of aging without going to the plastic surgeons office for expensive treatments. Products that actually lighten and brighten the skin. I want you to feel confident without makeup and feel amazing in your own skin: Just SKIn!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $20,000 start up cost for research and development, product testing, packaging . marketing and distribution. You'll get first sample of product launching and ultimately great skin.

  • If goal is not met, we will continue to strive to create the products in lower quantities but ultimately get these products in consumers hands and homes.

The Impact

Personal appearance is essential to self confidence and self esteem. Many people battle with depression due to their self body image. I want to change that! and with your help we could!

Risks & Challenges

Potential risk and challenges are our competitors in the beauty skin industry that promises similar results. I plan to provide quality to be more competitive and aim for excellent customer experience. Real testimonials with real feedback.  Continuation of product formula remixing to meet customers goals with 100% money back guarantee. 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • IF you can contribute doesn't mean you can't help.  We ask you to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The New Generation of Cordless Blenders is Here!

Never Use A Regular Blender Again!

Bonsi combines Innovation with High-Tech and uses only the highest quality parts.  Bonsi has rigorous quality controls in place to ensure that Bonsi Blend is the best blender you will ever own.

Our 25 Volt-Bolt Bonsi Power Pack gives you the power of a traditional blender in the palm of your hand. The brushless motor makes it one of the quietest blenders ever made. Integrated safety features help keep everyone safe.

Bonsi Blend was developed purposefully without a plastic blender vessel. Let's face it; there are enough plastic cups in the world already. Instead, you blend directly in any threaded RTIC®, Yeti®, or Hydro Flask® wide-mouth bottle*. You choose the brand, the size, and the color that's right for you. From 12-64 ounce bottles, you have plenty to choose from. 

Do you deserve the best? Do you want to simplify your life? Do you want the most compact and powerful cordless blender? Ready to stop using plastic and disposable cups? Are you ready to do fewer dishes? Then You need Bonsi Blend!

It's time to experience the Bonsi difference. It's time to live the Good Life. It's time to simplify your life. It's Bonsi Blend Time! 

With your help we will move into the production phase. All contributions will be used to order the tooling, molds, and contribution fulfillment, ensuring we meet or exceed our delivery timelines as promised!

Blend Your Favorite Drink in Your RTIC®, Yeti®, Hydro Flask® wide  mouth Bottles!

Watch the entire video. See just how easy it is. 

 

Healthy Living

Want a drink packed with vitamins? Shred spinach, blend your favorite fruits, and pulverize all your favorite vegetables. Bonsi Blend let's do it all up to 30 times before needing to recharge the battery. It will change your life, no matter your personal goals and lifestyle!

 

Anytime, Anywhere

At Home

​In the Office

The Gym

Walk in the Park

Relaxing at the Beach with Family

Anywhere you are- Take Bonsi Blend with you. Enhancing your life one blend at a time! Enjoy the endless possibilities. Where would you Bonsi Blend at?

 

The Simple Life is a Good Life!

See for Yourself How Easy the Bonsi Blend Life is!

​Free Up Your Counter Space

Simplifying your life - our compact design gives you have more room in your life. Bonsi Blend frees up kitchen space. It slides easily into the desk drawer at work, requires minimal space in your gym bag, and even fits in your purse. Or just make a statement. Leave Bonsi Blend on the kitchen counter or on your desk at work, showing off the modern and sleek design.                                             Life is now that simple. Life is good.

 

Because YOU Deserve the Best

Power of a Traditional Blender in the Palm of Your Hand

 

Patent Pending Tech Combines to Give the Power Never Before Seen in a Cordless Blender!

 

Flex Rigid PCB Board-Bulletproof design means you don't have to worry about loose connections, premature failure, or short life span. Built to last! Using the USB-C port, you can update the software remotely, ensuring optimal performance at all times. Custom firmware will be available soon, letting you program your Bonsi Blend to match the way you use it.                           The Bonsi Way. 

 

25-Volt Bonsi™ Power Pack – Gives you 750 watts of peak power directly to the blades and over 20,000 peak rpm of blending power. Not to mention you get up to 30 blends per charge. From pulverizing that spinach in your morning power drink to crushing ice for your afternoon smoothie. It is there when you want it, where you want it, without the cords.

 

Brushless DC Motor -Is long-lasting, more powerful, and more compact than any traditional motor. A 85% efficiency means longer battery life and the quietest operation possible. 

 

USB-C PD 3.1 Charger – Bonsi Blend comes with a USB-C, PD 3.1 rapid charger for the fastest battery charging available. Using the USB-C port, you can update the software remotely, ensuring optimal performance at all times. Custom firmware will be available soon, letting you program your Bonsi Blend to match the way you use it.

 

Stainless Steel Blades- We use only the highest quality stainless steel blades to ensure long life, and powerful blending results every-time! 

 

High Versatility– Ensures you are blending your favorite drink in the threaded bottle of your choice that is listed above. No more excess dishes, drink transfers from a plastic container, or disposable cups needed. Less dishes means more time for You!

High Quality-Every Bonsi Blend comes with a one year replacement warranty for any failure not caused by negligence or neglect. 

 

Housing-We only use the highest quality plastic available to us. Non BPA, and food safe. 

 

Safety – Bonsi Blend includes several safety features to protect you and your blender. If there is no bottle attached, it will not power on. Keeping you safe!

 

 
 

Our Story

Bonsi, Inc was founded in April of 2020 by David and Gifty Haight to create consumer products to revolutionize their markets. The question that brought this about was remarkably simple. Gifty called David to see if he could help find a cordless blender with a stainless-steel insulated cup. Gifty wanted something she could take to the gym or work that would keep her drinks cold for hours. After days of searching, they were unable to find what they wanted. They also realized that the blender market had not changed in decades. All the cool technology now available wasn’t being used.

After careful thought and consideration, they decided to start Bonsi, Inc. to develop their version of what a blender should be. It needed to integrate all the relevant, current technology to create a powerful, compact, eco-friendly product made with high-quality parts and be easy to use. They knew this would require sacrifice, risk, and months of effort. And they would need to do all of this during a worldwide pandemic and at a time of unprecedented political turmoil. But it had to be done – people deserved a product that would help them live better and simpler lives.

After months of research, endless phone calls, design work, and putting together the best possible team, Bonsi Blend was born. Like the bonsai tree, Bonsi Blend is small, powerful, sturdy, beautiful, and made to last.

The patent-pending Bonsi Blend was developed with only the best parts available.

  • A 25-Volt Bonsi Power Pack, made from the highest quality lithium-ion batteries, delivers 750 watts of peak power. Easily as powerful as a home blender, Bonsi Blend will give you up to 30 blends per charge.
  • The best slotless, brushless motor gives it a peak efficiency of  85%, creating a quieter blender.
  • Integrated safety technology ensures that the blades won’t turn without a cup attached and stop if the blender tips over.
  • A USB-C, PD 3.0-Rapid Charger gives it the fastest possible charging speeds.
  • Data transfer options allow it to receive remote firmware updates. All you need is a cable to connect the USB-C connector to a computer.
  • A rugged, flex-rigid PCB board, built to last for years.
  • A sliding touch sensor to make operating it intuitive, easy, and simple.
  • It was purposely built without a plastic blending vessel. Let’s face it; there are enough plastic bottles in the world. Instead, Bonsi Blend attaches to cups already in the market – RTIC® Bottles, Yeti® Bottles, and Hydro Flask® wide-mouth bottles, giving people the choice of brand, color, and bottle size.

As with any new venture, there was a great deal to be endured by everyone involved. With a 3-year-old boy, plus the cost of developing Bonsi Blend, it was not an easy task. David had to travel a lot for work and the development of Bonsi Blend. Gifty worked in the medical field during Covid, picking up extra shifts when she could while raising their son, Nathan.

As with anything in life, struggle, determination, and sacrifice are part of what makes something great. Bonsi Blend is an extraordinary product, forged with determination and sacrifice, that will revolutionize how blenders are made. Bonsi shows the world that if you have the will to do something, anything is possible.

Gifty and David look forward to sharing Bonsi Blend with the world and sharing the love one blend at a time.

 

Status

Final stages- of designing the best cordless blender just for you. This video shows our first working prototypes in action. 

Timeline-As we finish the prototype phase, we are ready to order the tooling required to mass-produce the best blender on the market. That’s where you come in. Receive a deep discount for being our earlier adopter and for helping us move into production. The earlier you get in, the bigger the discount. The overall timeline is presented above. We will keep you updated as we progress. While we don't anticipate any delays or design changes, you will be the first to know if it happens. We have factored in time for unseen delays on our promise to deliver by! Don't be surprised if  your order shows up sooner than expected. 

 

Our Team

David Haight CEO, President, Chairman of the Board, and Co-Founder.

Skilled marketer with 15 years of managing and owning various businesses. A closer, able to flow with change, knowing how to optimize change as needed to benefit companies quickly as possible. He has spent the last 7 years as CEO in the transportation industry. This helped gain a strong knowledge of logistics, risk mitigation, complex problem solving. This translates well into the role of leading Bonsi Inc into a bright and profitable future. He has a solid understanding and ability to bring the thousands of pieces together into one. Driving strong  growth with a clear path to success, by committing to high customer satisfaction while developing only the best products for the market. 

Gifty Haight Vice President, and Co-Founder.

Skilled social media expert. On top of all current trends and how to reach people through those platforms. Has a strong following in social media and the fitness world. The ability to do the hard work to ensure the strict product standards are met on a daily basis. 

Mike King COO and Co-Founder.

Mr. King has 35 years of experience in engineering, production, and sales operations including full profit and loss responsibility as the General Manager of the two-site Military Business Unit at Integrated Device Technology (IDT, now part of Renesas Electric). Mr. King has also been responsible for coordinating large manufacturing operations with many domestic and overseas subcontractors.

He was the CEO of BIODE, Inc. and was directly responsible for overseeing production for Cardian, Ltd.

Dr Jeffrey Andle CTO and Co-Founder.

With 40 years of experience in the electrical engineering and computer engineering, Dr. Andle offers expertise from low-level embedded firmware and mixed signal circuit design to systems level engineering. He has worked primarily with radio frequency sensors and digital instrumentation that must be hardened for heavy industry, including use in electric power generation, transmission, and distribution.

Dr. Andle has served at VP and CTO levels in BiODE, Inc, which he and his partners sold to Vectron International in 2007.  He also served in this role at IntelliSAW.  He helped sell IntelliSAW, first to Rosemount Measurement Solutions in 2016 and then to AltaNova Group in 2019.  He has also served as Director of R&D at Vectron, Rosemount, Mnemonics, and Cardian LTD.  He became involved with Bonsi in August 2020.

Duncan Clark Director of Product Development and Co-Founder.  

Over 5 years of product testing and design. Expert in CAD design, product development, and taking ideals from conception through launch. Adds the talent and resources to develop future products in a timely and efficient manner.   Duncan has been actively involved for much of Bonsi’s existence.

Together we are able to utilize each other’s strengths, which allows us to create a dynamically fluid team, moving Bonsi Inc's products into the market in a timely manner, allowing us to create a loyal fan base, stay in touch with all current trends and apply them to marking, innovating products, and creating strong sales for Bonsi Inc. Creating the best consumer experience possible!

 

Bonsi Blend is Available in Silver and Black

This video shows our first working prototypes in action. 

Timeline-As we finish the prototype phase, we are ready to order the tooling required to mass-produce the best blender on the market. That’s where you come in. Receive a deep discount for being our earlier adopter and for helping us move into production. The earlier you get in, the bigger the discount. The overall timeline is presented above. We will keep you updated as we progress. While we don't anticipate any delays or design changes, you will be the first to know if it happens. We have factored in time for unseen delays on our promise to deliver by! Don't be surprised if  your order shows up sooner than expected. 
 Our TeamDavid Haight CEO, President, Chairman of the Board, and Co-Founder.Skilled marketer with 15 years of managing and owning various businesses. A closer, able to flow with change, knowing how to optimize change as needed to benefit companies quickly as possible. He has spent the last 7 years as CEO in the transportation industry. This helped gain a strong knowledge of logistics, risk mitigation, complex problem solving. This translates well into the role of leading Bonsi Inc into a bright and profitable future. He has a solid understanding and ability to bring the thousands of pieces together into one. Driving strong  growth with a clear path to success, by committing to high customer satisfaction while developing only the best products for the market. Gifty Haight Vice President, and Co-Founder. Skilled social media expert. On top of all current trends and how to reach people through those platforms. Has a strong following in social media and the fitness world. The ability to do the hard work to ensure the strict product standards are met on a daily basis. Mike King COO and Co-Founder. Mr. King has 35 years of experience in engineering, production, and sales operations including full profit and loss responsibility as the General Manager of the two-site Military Business Unit at Integrated Device Technology (IDT, now part of Renesas Electric). Mr. King has also been responsible for coordinating large manufacturing operations with many domestic and overseas subcontractors.He was the CEO of BIODE, Inc. and was directly responsible for overseeing production for Cardian, Ltd.Dr Jeffrey Andle CTO and Co-Founder.With 40 years of experience in the electrical engineering and computer engineering, Dr. Andle offers expertise from low-level embedded firmware and mixed signal circuit design to systems level engineering. He has worked primarily with radio frequency sensors and digital instrumentation that must be hardened for heavy industry, including use in electric power generation, transmission, and distribution.Dr. Andle has served at VP and CTO levels in BiODE, Inc, which he and his partners sold to Vectron International in 2007.  He also served in this role at IntelliSAW.  He helped sell IntelliSAW, first to Rosemount Measurement Solutions in 2016 and then to AltaNova Group in 2019.  He has also served as Director of R&D at Vectron, Rosemount, Mnemonics, and Cardian LTD.  He became involved with Bonsi in August 2020.Duncan Clark Director of Product Development and Co-Founder.  Over 5 years of product testing and design. Expert in CAD design, product development, and taking ideals from conception through launch. Adds the talent and resources to develop future products in a timely and efficient manner.   Duncan has been actively involved for much of Bonsi’s existence.Together we are able to utilize each other’s strengths, which allows us to create a dynamically fluid team, moving Bonsi Inc's products into the market in a timely manner, allowing us to create a loyal fan base, stay in touch with all current trends and apply them to marking, innovating products, and creating strong sales for Bonsi Inc. Creating the best consumer experience possible! Bonsi Blend is Available in Silver and Black

story:
If you love to dream and think out of the box then BuzzlePops is for you!  
What we love most about our little flavored alcohol balls is their ability to help people use their creative muscles.  
With all of our unique flavors and tastes there is something for everyone and every drink.  They also go perfect on top of an ice cream sundae or fruity dessert dish.  The options are endless and we cannot wait to see what you do with them when you get your hands on your own BuzzlePops.


We are here to tell you about BuzzlePops.

BuzzlePops adds a different character and dimension to your existing cocktails. But the best part of BuzzlePops is you can use them to add some fun to anything, BuzzlePops allows you to use your imagination when your in the kitchen or the bar!  As you can probably relate, cocktail hour always needs some fun conversation starters.  But a conversation starter that is filled with alcohol is twice as fun. We strongly believe your next dinner party; cocktail event or even dessert will not be complete with out BuzzlePops.

BuzzlePops are small, pop-able balls of 10-14.9% alcohol by vol. With their 9 months shelf life, you will be making your cocktails or other creations special and fun. 


After more than 18 months of working to get the product EU approved, compliant and more importantly delicious, we now have BuzzlePops ready to bring to you. We have worked tirelessly to ensure that every ingredient is naturally sourced. And every aspect complies with all the laws and regulations in Europe.

We already have a few restaurants, bars and distributors interested in bringing this NEW, FUN experience to their venues. We have tested the product and got the supply chain ready for our first orders. Through the crowdfunding campaign, we hope to introduce our creations to you, first.


WE WILL SHIP GLOBALLY. 

This is based on the jurisdiction and local excise and customs. If you order a perk, we will ensure that we will find a way to send over BuzzlePops Jars to you.
We prefer if you can make delivery parties, in the key cities we have identified in Europe. At these delivery parties, you will can pick up your BuzzlePops pre-order and get a FREE drink made with BuzzlePops.


If you can't make these parties in the period of March - July 2015 or if we do not hit minimum demand, we have optional delivery available to ship it to you in Europe. 


That’s awesome—but why am I reading this on Indiegogo?The “crowd source” website is our approach to bring BuzzlePops to our growing fanbase and welcome more into our community. We’re offering you unique sneak peak at a special price that is exclusive to this campaign. Direct from us to you. 

Your funding will help us get through the launch phase of our product. These the next steps


...but importantly to help us find and grow our community.

When you add all these factors together - compounded with the miscellaneous costs, the fact that we need to produce enough BuzzlePops in our initial run to carry us for the next 6 months (Estimated break even point). This supports us to bring this product to you and the market. 

If you are still curious or want to learn more, call us at +31 622 581501

TEAM

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched solution that’s fun and tasty for anyone to experiment with food and drinks. It is our mission to create innovative products and experiences of liquid consumption. Molecular Mixology has been a growing trend within the bartending community and among hospitality professionals. Based on what they have learned via their experimentation, we have created a unique product that will enhance their ability to serve you. 

Greg DSouza

Greg has a background in industrial engineering. Having worked in the family business for a year, he decided to pursue his own path. Moving to Europe to work at Nike, he worked with a team to devise multi-million $ strategic roadmap to transform the Nike EU supply chain. He then worked on S&OP within the Nike EU and US teams. Afterward, he pursued his own venture to start an apps company as well as an Alcohol Launch agency, Van Souza Spirits. 

Basil Babychan

A biotechnologist by education, he has over 10 years commercial experience industries ranging from IT support services, media publications, bio-materials, and pharmacology needs. He currently is the Director of a growing medical device company and has through his experience expanded sales over 33% CAGR and developed markets. He has also worked on multiple deals to liquidate assets ranging from EUR 4.5 million to EUR 18 million. 

​How old must I be to Pop ?

You must be 18 years of age in the EU & 21 years of age in the US at the time of purchase. If your country has different rules then we need to abide by the country specific age restrictions.

Can I buy BuzzlePops now if I’m not 18 but will be 18 by 2016?

Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.

Can I buy BuzzlePops now if I’m not 18 but am giving it as a gift to someone who is 18?

No.

Just how rare is BuzzlePops?

Pretty damn rare! BuzzlePops has not been launched anywhere in the world and will ONLY be sold initially during the crowd-participation campaign

Where will the pickup spots be located?

That list currently includes the yet-to-be-determined site across European Cities, but additional locations may be added between now and pickup time. 

Just send us a message when you know which city you are.

Are you shipping BuzzlePops direct in Europe?

It’s pretty much legal to ship alcohol direct to consumers in Europe, so yes. When the BuzzlePops is ready, you’ll be notified and asked if you want to pick it up or if you want it shipped to you. If you select the latter, there will be a charge to cover shipping and handling. However, we think you’ll want to come get it in person - try a BuzzlePop, feel the change and meet other BuzzlePoppers

What if I have a change of heart and no longer want the BuzzlePops I purchased?

Sorry, but all sales are final. Choose wisely and be at peace with your decision before clicking CONTRIBUTE. If you we do not hit our target, you will get your money back. When we do hit our target, we will communicate with you to co-ordinate your order.

Will any of BuzzlePops be available for retail purchase later on?

Anyone, including distributing companies and retail operations, can purchase the beers during the campaign at the same price as the general public. There is no way for us to police who purchases the BuzzlePops via this platform. However, if it should end up being resold at a retail establishment, it will have travelled from Distributor to Retailer and gotten marked up along the way, thus the Retailer will be selling it at a retail price.

How many BuzzlePops may I purchase?

First off, we LOVE your attitude and are glad to say you can purchase as many as you like. 

Risks & Challenges

We have worked really hard these past few months to make sure that everything goes smoothly. Although we don't anticipate any hurdles, they might arise, and if they do, we will be completely transparent with you. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Connecting us to distributors or bars in your city that would enjoy an experience like this.

Share this with your friends who would enjoy trying and discovering new foods and beverages. We think they would love to get in early on this.

Looking forward to seeing you in a city near you.

story:
What is the Human Immortality Project?

Now, for the first time in human history, we have the means to defeat the aging process. Even though we possess the biotechnological tools today to bring aging under scientific medical control, very little is done.

Whats more, the research that is done is almost exclusively conducted by private organisations. The world is already dominated by giant corporations who care about nothing but profits. Making the gap between rich and poor even greater. Do we really want THEM to have the power to control aging and human lifespans? 

The public and the governments don‘t notice that there is already a race happening. It doesn‘t matter if one finds living forever a good or a bad thing, the technology will come. That‘s why we set up the Human Immortality Project. We aim for a public non-profit approach, transparent, open-source, where society is involved. To make the world a better place for everyone, not just the super-rich.

Why the Human Immortality Project (HIP)?

  • Abolish the greatest drive of suffering in the world: Aging and its consequential death. The physical hardships that come with (your body decomposing) aging, and the often traumatic grief for loved ones.
  • Enable humans to explore our beautiful world without a set time-limit.
  • The HIP approach that we advocate is in public interest. Life extension / rejuvenation technology will arise sooner or later, whether one wants it to or not. In consideration of that fact, there is only one question you need to ask yourself: Who do you want to have the power to control it? As of this moment, the private sector already has a considerable head start, whereas the governments and the public don‘t even know that there is already a race for the leading position. Just one example of this is Google: around 3 years ago they founded Calicolabs, whose only goal is to »cure aging«. And guess what, they are not telling anyone which methods they are working on or what progress they‘re making.
  • Enormous economic value. When people stay young and healthy they can continue contributing wealth to society rather then consuming it. It will save literally trillions of dollar in health care expenses.

Img. Watson & Crick discovering the strucure of DNA. We've come far since then.

How shall the HIP be performed.

The approach on how the Project shall be conducted, is in form of the successful forerunner project, the Human Genome Project. An open source concept with international scientific collaboration, where the public and governments are involved.

For those who don‘t know what the Human Genome Project was:

The Human Genome Project (HGP) was one of the great scientific achievements of recent history. An international research effort to sequence and map all of the genes - together known as the genome - of members of our species, Homo sapiens. It took almost 20 years to complete and was only possible through  widespread international cooperation.
The project was performed in over twenty universities and research centers in the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Germany, France and China.

The same effort is needed now to put an end to aging, at least if desired within a reasonable amount of time. This crowdfunding campaign is intended to be the spark.


What is aging?

A chemical process in our cells, a genetically codified principle.  Aging is not an absolute, it‘s a shapeable relative. Most people wrongly assume aging as something inevitable, but visionary scientists have already proven with experimental research that this isn't the case. Several species have been found, who appear to be able to defy the aging process. Unlike humans, many of them don’t die as a result of their own metabolisms - there doesn’t seem to be a built-in life expectancy in their cells. 

In scientific terms, aging is seen as a decline of our cells ability to keep its homeostasis (cell maintenance), which leads to the accumulation of damage in our body, ultimately making us sick and die.
Do not mistaken aging with age-related diseases like Alzheimer, heart disease and most types of cancer, those are  merely the symptoms of aging.

 

Here is a great video that illustrates the subject:

 


Is this really possible?

Slowing down the aging process and thereby extending maximum lifespan has already been done to a certain extent in several model organisms. Rejuvenation has also been observed in certain experiments.

In the matter of life extension, here a few quick examples.

Scientists managed to extend the lifespan of C. elegans 10-fold, with a single gene mutation. Fore more information on it, this is the paper:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23543623

Regarding Mus musculus (common mouse), researches managed to double its lifespan. There is even a database, where you can see to which extent certain gene alterations affect its maximum lifespan:
http://genomics.senescence.info/genes/search.ph...


In the matter of rejuvenation:
Transfusing blood from young mice into old ones has a significant rejuvenation-effect, improving their memory, cognition, physical activity and tissue regeneration. And, it also works the other way around. So watch out who you get blood transfusions from!
Here two papers referring to this:
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC51...
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24793238

Or if that‘s too scientific for you, there is a nice news clip that elaborates on the subject:


Why is the science community not already focusing on it?

Having spent months reviewing the current scientific state of the field and in consideration of newly emerged evidence, we can just say »What‘s going on, is a big joke«. 

The biggest issue is, that most research is done on the symptoms of aging: Age-Related Diseases (ARD‘S) .Those conditions are called »age related diseases« for a reason, they don‘t usually occur in young individuals. Now we can conclude without doubt that the root-cause for all of them is aging.
Medical researchers still tend to tackle ARD‘s separately.  After all, the illnesses are distinct: cancer arises from mutated DNA; heart disease from clogged up blood vessels and dementia from damaged brain cells. The biological processes that underpin the pathologies vary vastly and each needs specific treatment. Previously it may have seemed like a good approach for lack of a better alternative, but it is fair to say that the greatest driver of disease in old age is old age.

Governments, universities and foundations are spending enormous sums on research against age-related diseases. Not to mention the ever increasing healthcare-system costs causing the imminent "silver tsunami".
It‘s harsh to say that all this money and effort is/has been wasted. This statement certainly would have been incorrect 10 years ago, but with recent scientific progress and discoveries, the new knowledge needs to be applied and research refocused. In the field of biological aging, this has yet to happen.


What will happen if we don‘t tackle the aging problem right now?

Apart from missing out on humanities bright future, it‘s going to have a catastrophically economic impact for generations to come. By 2020, for the first time in history, the number of people older than 65 will outnumber the number of children younger than 5 years of age.

This will have a massive impact on our health-care systems. The silver tsunami is coming and it will affect us all. It's not going to happen in the far future, but over the next few decades. Of course eventually this demographic transition will be over and population proportions balanced again. But it‘s certain that we the people alive today, will have to struggle through that phase,  rendering hundreds of thousands elderly and their families destitute.


What is the silver tsunami?

 

Why should i support this project?

Two reasons. You like living and want this upcoming medical technology to be available to everyone, not just the super-rich.

Since we are a registered public non-profit organization (HIRA Human Immortality Research Association gUG) we are constrained by law to use all raised money only for intended purposes written in our associations terms of reference, which you can read further below.

Governments are the ones who control the majority of funds going into research, so one of our main goals is to convince them to get involved in such a undertaking. Not only by showing them the enormous economic benefits, but also by pointing out the moral obligation towards it. We as a society are trying our best to fight causes of suffering, like malaria, terrorism, hunger, but the most obvious one, affecting each single one of us, is severely neglected.  To not act when we possess the tools to fight would be amoral.

This initiative aims to be a wake-up call to society and governments around the world to take action. We, the people, have to speak up for what we think is right. Once the ball gets rolling, it‘ll create a momentum all of its own. 

We set up this crowdfunding campaign to gauge the general publics interest in healthy life extension and rejuvenation. No matter the outcome, we will pursue solving the aging-problem, as it is one of the world‘s most pressing issues 

How much of a difference does your donation make?

More than 100.000 people die of aging every single day. Let‘s say that a donation of $1 accelerates the completion of the Human Immortality Project for only 1 second. With one day having 86.400 seconds that means that each Dollar donated will save 1,15 lives, so roughly one life per Dollar. Just think about it! Each Dollar you donate will save one life in the future.


What will we do with certain amounts raised.

5 million sounds like a lot? If 1 million people each give 5$ we‘re there. 5$ is very little considering what we would achieve, but reaching 2 million people is difficult, so spread the word!
Still, we have a flexible funding goal, depending on how much money we raise, will determine our next steps and how fast this movement will grow.

(Reaching a higher target will include key goals of lower targets.)

Up to USD 100.000-500.000
Convince governments in political and public debate, creation of petitions.
-Support for existing research efforts and projects of selected non-profit organisations listed here @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/the-plan/


USD  500.000 
Create a platform designated to foster collaboration where scientists can systematically work together on the different research approaches

USD 1 mio
This is enough money to dedicate our full time and lives for the next years to get the Human Immortality Project well underway. We will convince the governments of its necessity, we will persuade charitable investors to get on board, we will not rest until we become biologically immortal, or we will die trying.
Aside from that.
Looking for more genetic hints in naturally long-lived animals by appointing specific research assignments to independent researchers. The subjects of particular interest can be seen on our homepage @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/organisms

USD 3 mio
Deeper analysis of specific age related mechanisms on a cellular level by appointing specific research assignments to independent researchers. The subjects of particular interest can be seen on our homepage @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/cellul...)


USD 5 mio
will give us the opportunity to set up our own laboratory to get completely new research programs underway. Human Immortality Research Institute (in collaboration with another non-profit/university)


USD 10 mio
Independet Institute
This is still not nearly enough to do all the necessary aging-research, but it will give the movement a big momentum and signal the political leaders (who control most money spent on research), that there is a desire for this to happen.

5 billion
Congratulations. This is enough money to do all relevant aging- research for the next few decades. Even if you didn't donate, your life will still be rescued.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

This campaign is also supposed to be a wake-up call for society and for the worlds leaders, not only to communicate that this project is feasible , but a necessity. 
The research that needs to be done is too much for any sole organisation (at least within a reasonable amount of time), 

 

Associations terms of reference; 2.c)  The objects of the organization consist in:

The association pursues exclusively and directly charitable purposes as defined by section »tax-privileged purposes« of the general tax code. The purpose of the organisation is the advancement of science, particularly basic and methodological research in the natural sciences. First of all in the fields of biology and chemistry, which are associated with the aging processes of living organisms (gerontology). The biochemical background of aging and its symptoms shall be studied and decoded, to enable humans a longer life in a healthy state. The institute is in its research activity free and independent. All research findings will be promptly made accessible to the public.

 

Concerns

We understand that the subject itself raises many concerns about overpopulation, change of society, etc. There is of course some truth in all concerns, but by analyzing each one of them it turns out that they are not as worrisome as at first thought (we discuss all of them here: http://www.human-immortality-project.com/concerns/). The topic that emerges always first is the one about overpopulation. We found an excellent video that elaborates the issue:

 

As you read this you may think, no there are many good valid reasons not to pursue immortality, like overpopulation, unsuitability, dictators living forever, access only to the wealthy, unnaturalness, change of society... These are all hasty and unreflected arguments your mind produces in distress, due to the fact that one of the pillars your reality is built on is being threatened. It is an automated psychological response.  If you made it this far and are still in doubt, see the »Concerns« section on our website, where each of your concerns will be addressed.

 

Beyond money— we need your help spreading the word


At its heart, the Human Immortality Project is a grassroots movement of biologists and charitable entrepreneurs who wish to enrich the human experience and make the world a healthier place for everyone. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history. Anyone, anywhere can raise awareness about the subject


The science of aging.

If you are interested in learning more about the scientific aspects and want to know more about the science of aging, please continue reading.

Aging is seen as a progressive failure of homeodynamics–systemic preservation of homeostasis, involving genes for maintenance and repair, stochastic events leading to molecular damage and molecular heterogeneity, and chance events determining the probability of death. Since complex and interacting systems of maintenance and repair comprise the homeodynamic space of a biological system, aging is considered to be a progressive shrinkage of homeodynamic space mainly due to increased molecular heterogeneity.In 2010, a group of scientists defined nine hallmarks of aging that are common between organisms with emphasis on mammals: genomic instability, telomere attrition, epigenetic alterations, loss of proteostasis, deregulated nutrient sensing, mitochondrial dysfunction, cellular senescence, stem cell exhaustion, and altered inter-cellular communication.

 

Source: The Hallmarks of Aging
