The world is already dominated by giant corporations who care about nothing but profits. Making the gap between rich and poor even greater. Do we really want THEM to have the power to control aging and human lifespans? The public and the governments don‘t notice that there is already a race happening. It doesn‘t matter if one finds living forever a good or a bad thing, the technology will come. That‘s why we set up the Human Immortality Project. We aim for a public non-profit approach, transparent, open-source, where society is involved. To make the world a better place for everyone, not just the super-rich.Why the Human Immortality Project (HIP)?
Abolish the greatest drive of suffering in the world: Aging and its consequential death. The physical hardships that come with (your body decomposing) aging, and the often traumatic grief for loved ones.
Enable humans to explore our beautiful world without a set time-limit.
The HIP approach that we advocate is in public interest. Life extension / rejuvenation technology will arise sooner or later, whether one wants it to or not. In consideration of that fact, there is only one question you need to ask yourself: Who do you want to have the power to control it? As of this moment, the private sector already has a considerable head start, whereas the governments and the public don‘t even know that there is already a race for the leading position. Just one example of this is Google: around 3 years ago they founded Calicolabs, whose only goal is to »cure aging«. And guess what, they are not telling anyone which methods they are working on or what progress they‘re making.
Enormous economic value. When people stay young and healthy they can continue contributing wealth to society rather then consuming it. It will save literally trillions of dollar in health care expenses.
Img. Watson & Crick discovering the strucure of DNA. We've come far since then.How shall the HIP be performed.The approach on how the Project shall be conducted, is in form of the successful forerunner project, the Human Genome Project. An open source concept with international scientific collaboration, where the public and governments are involved.For those who don‘t know what the Human Genome Project was:The Human Genome Project (HGP) was one of the great scientific achievements of recent history. An international research effort to sequence and map all of the genes - together known as the genome - of members of our species, Homo sapiens. It took almost 20 years to complete and was only possible through  widespread international cooperation.The project was performed in over twenty universities and research centers in the United States, the United Kingdom, Japan, Germany, France and China.The same effort is needed now to put an end to aging, at least if desired within a reasonable amount of time. This crowdfunding campaign is intended to be the spark.
What is aging?A chemical process in our cells, a genetically codified principle.  Aging is not an absolute, it‘s a shapeable relative. Most people wrongly assume aging as something inevitable, but visionary scientists have already proven with experimental research that this isn't the case. Several species have been found, who appear to be able to defy the aging process. Unlike humans, many of them don’t die as a result of their own metabolisms - there doesn’t seem to be a built-in life expectancy in their cells. In scientific terms, aging is seen as a decline of our cells ability to keep its homeostasis (cell maintenance), which leads to the accumulation of damage in our body, ultimately making us sick and die.Do not mistaken aging with age-related diseases like Alzheimer, heart disease and most types of cancer, those are  merely the symptoms of aging. Here is a great video that illustrates the subject:

 

Is this really possible?Slowing down the aging process and thereby extending maximum lifespan has already been done to a certain extent in several model organisms. Rejuvenation has also been observed in certain experiments.In the matter of life extension, here a few quick examples.Scientists managed to extend the lifespan of C. elegans 10-fold, with a single gene mutation. Fore more information on it, this is the paper:https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23543623Regarding Mus musculus (common mouse), researches managed to double its lifespan. There is even a database, where you can see to which extent certain gene alterations affect its maximum lifespan:http://genomics.senescence.info/genes/search.ph...In the matter of rejuvenation:Transfusing blood from young mice into old ones has a significant rejuvenation-effect, improving their memory, cognition, physical activity and tissue regeneration. And, it also works the other way around. So watch out who you get blood transfusions from!Here two papers referring to this:https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC51...https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24793238Or if that‘s too scientific for you, there is a nice news clip that elaborates on the subject:
Why is the science community not already focusing on it?Having spent months reviewing the current scientific state of the field and in consideration of newly emerged evidence, we can just say »What‘s going on, is a big joke«. The biggest issue is, that most research is done on the symptoms of aging: Age-Related Diseases (ARD‘S) .Those conditions are called »age related diseases« for a reason, they don‘t usually occur in young individuals. Now we can conclude without doubt that the root-cause for all of them is aging.Medical researchers still tend to tackle ARD‘s separately.  After all, the illnesses are distinct: cancer arises from mutated DNA; heart disease from clogged up blood vessels and dementia from damaged brain cells. The biological processes that underpin the pathologies vary vastly and each needs specific treatment. Previously it may have seemed like a good approach for lack of a better alternative, but it is fair to say that the greatest driver of disease in old age is old age.Governments, universities and foundations are spending enormous sums on research against age-related diseases. Not to mention the ever increasing healthcare-system costs causing the imminent "silver tsunami".It‘s harsh to say that all this money and effort is/has been wasted. This statement certainly would have been incorrect 10 years ago, but with recent scientific progress and discoveries, the new knowledge needs to be applied and research refocused. In the field of biological aging, this has yet to happen.
What will happen if we don‘t tackle the aging problem right now?Apart from missing out on humanities bright future, it‘s going to have a catastrophically economic impact for generations to come. By 2020, for the first time in history, the number of people older than 65 will outnumber the number of children younger than 5 years of age.This will have a massive impact on our health-care systems. The silver tsunami is coming and it will affect us all. It's not going to happen in the far future, but over the next few decades. Of course eventually this demographic transition will be over and population proportions balanced again. But it‘s certain that we the people alive today, will have to struggle through that phase,  rendering hundreds of thousands elderly and their families destitute.What is the silver tsunami? Why should i support this project?Two reasons. You like living and want this upcoming medical technology to be available to everyone, not just the super-rich.Since we are a registered public non-profit organization (HIRA Human Immortality Research Association gUG) we are constrained by law to use all raised money only for intended purposes written in our associations terms of reference, which you can read further below.Governments are the ones who control the majority of funds going into research, so one of our main goals is to convince them to get involved in such a undertaking. Not only by showing them the enormous economic benefits, but also by pointing out the moral obligation towards it. We as a society are trying our best to fight causes of suffering, like malaria, terrorism, hunger, but the most obvious one, affecting each single one of us, is severely neglected.  To not act when we possess the tools to fight would be amoral.This initiative aims to be a wake-up call to society and governments around the world to take action. We, the people, have to speak up for what we think is right. Once the ball gets rolling, it‘ll create a momentum all of its own. We set up this crowdfunding campaign to gauge the general publics interest in healthy life extension and rejuvenation. No matter the outcome, we will pursue solving the aging-problem, as it is one of the world‘s most pressing issues How much of a difference does your donation make?More than 100.000 people die of aging every single day. Let‘s say that a donation of $1 accelerates the completion of the Human Immortality Project for only 1 second. With one day having 86.400 seconds that means that each Dollar donated will save 1,15 lives, so roughly one life per Dollar. Just think about it! Each Dollar you donate will save one life in the future.
What will we do with certain amounts raised.5 million sounds like a lot? If 1 million people each give 5$ we‘re there. 5$ is very little considering what we would achieve, but reaching 2 million people is difficult, so spread the word!Still, we have a flexible funding goal, depending on how much money we raise, will determine our next steps and how fast this movement will grow.(Reaching a higher target will include key goals of lower targets.)Up to USD 100.000-500.000Convince governments in political and public debate, creation of petitions.-Support for existing research efforts and projects of selected non-profit organisations listed here @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/the-plan/USD  500.000 Create a platform designated to foster collaboration where scientists can systematically work together on the different research approachesUSD 1 mioThis is enough money to dedicate our full time and lives for the next years to get the Human Immortality Project well underway. We will convince the governments of its necessity, we will persuade charitable investors to get on board, we will not rest until we become biologically immortal, or we will die trying.Aside from that.Looking for more genetic hints in naturally long-lived animals by appointing specific research assignments to independent researchers. The subjects of particular interest can be seen on our homepage @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/organismsUSD 3 mioDeeper analysis of specific age related mechanisms on a cellular level by appointing specific research assignments to independent researchers. The subjects of particular interest can be seen on our homepage @ http://www.human-immortality-project.com/cellul...)USD 5 miowill give us the opportunity to set up our own laboratory to get completely new research programs underway. Human Immortality Research Institute (in collaboration with another non-profit/university)USD 10 mioIndependet InstituteThis is still not nearly enough to do all the necessary aging-research, but it will give the movement a big momentum and signal the political leaders (who control most money spent on research), that there is a desire for this to happen.5 billionCongratulations. This is enough money to do all relevant aging- research for the next few decades. Even if you didn't donate, your life will still be rescued.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This campaign is also supposed to be a wake-up call for society and for the worlds leaders, not only to communicate that this project is feasible , but a necessity. The research that needs to be done is too much for any sole organisation (at least within a reasonable amount of time),  Associations terms of reference; 2.c)  The objects of the organization consist in:The association pursues exclusively and directly charitable purposes as defined by section »tax-privileged purposes« of the general tax code. The purpose of the organisation is the advancement of science, particularly basic and methodological research in the natural sciences. First of all in the fields of biology and chemistry, which are associated with the aging processes of living organisms (gerontology). The biochemical background of aging and its symptoms shall be studied and decoded, to enable humans a longer life in a healthy state. The institute is in its research activity free and independent. All research findings will be promptly made accessible to the public. ConcernsWe understand that the subject itself raises many concerns about overpopulation, change of society, etc. There is of course some truth in all concerns, but by analyzing each one of them it turns out that they are not as worrisome as at first thought (we discuss all of them here: http://www.human-immortality-project.com/concerns/). The topic that emerges always first is the one about overpopulation. We found an excellent video that elaborates the issue: As you read this you may think, no there are many good valid reasons not to pursue immortality, like overpopulation, unsuitability, dictators living forever, access only to the wealthy, unnaturalness, change of society... These are all hasty and unreflected arguments your mind produces in distress, due to the fact that one of the pillars your reality is built on is being threatened. It is an automated psychological response.  If you made it this far and are still in doubt, see the »Concerns« section on our website, where each of your concerns will be addressed. Beyond money— we need your help spreading the wordAt its heart, the Human Immortality Project is a grassroots movement of biologists and charitable entrepreneurs who wish to enrich the human experience and make the world a healthier place for everyone. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history. Anyone, anywhere can raise awareness about the subject
The science of aging.If you are interested in learning more about the scientific aspects and want to know more about the science of aging, please continue reading.Aging is seen as a progressive failure of homeodynamics–systemic preservation of homeostasis, involving genes for maintenance and repair, stochastic events leading to molecular damage and molecular heterogeneity, and chance events determining the probability of death. Since complex and interacting systems of maintenance and repair comprise the homeodynamic space of a biological system, aging is considered to be a progressive shrinkage of homeodynamic space mainly due to increased molecular heterogeneity.In 2010, a group of scientists defined nine hallmarks of aging that are common between organisms with emphasis on mammals: genomic instability, telomere attrition, epigenetic alterations, loss of proteostasis, deregulated nutrient sensing, mitochondrial dysfunction, cellular senescence, stem cell exhaustion, and altered inter-cellular communication. Source: The Hallmarks of Aging

story:
The Davinci Stick

The Davinci Stick is hand-held wellness tool. Its patented design and concept allows the user to improve their overall health and fitness through a series of body motions based on Leonardo Davinci's Vitruvian Man. The Davinci Stick will help people:

  • Increase strength
  • Improve flexibility and balance
  • Contribute to a health lifestyle and be part of a health positive community

What We Need & What You Get

The Davinci Stick is looking to raise $50,000 in seed funding your our small business. 

The funds raised will help us:

  • Scale our production to manufacture more Davinci Sticks
  • Do added scientific research of the Davinci Sticks' accompanying working out and wellness program
  • Help us develop and continue our contributions to the stroke rehabilitation and parkinson programs we were closely with.

The Impact

The Davinci Stick will make the world a better place by:

  • Promoting health and wellness throughout our community and beyond
  • Contributing to rehabilitation, healing and improvement in the quality of life of stroke and stroke patients through our continued partnership
  • Create a safe, simple and welcoming community for anyone who wants to embark upon a healthy and active lifestyle

Risks & Challenges

The Davinci Stick is in entering a competitive market. Here's what we're up against:

  • The market is flooded with new fitness products every day. We have to be different and unique.
  • The Davinci Stick is going to be a simple, effect and legitimate fitness tool that will create a community to support its participants. It's not disposable like other similar products; it's a lifestyle we want to help people achieve.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no sweat! Here's how you can help:

  • Share our indiegogo campaign with friends, family, strangers, enemies and everyone else you meet.
  • Contribute to Ronald McDonald House, Sick Kids Hospital in Toronto, Parkinson's Canada or Alzheimer's Society of Canada.

story:
What is the HydroBrush 1?

This all started after the creation of the HydroBrush 1, a hairbrush designed by Club Roots.  The goal of this was to create a hairbrush that dispenses hair treatments (such as minoxidil) directly to your scalp without a messy sprayer or dropper.

Where are we going with the HydroBrush 2?

 

"One of the toughest conversations doctors have with patients is that it may take some time before they see results using minoxidil 5%" says Dr. Luna, MD, the medical director of Club Roots.  "It would benefit some of these patients immensely to have accurate subclinical detection of progress."

We're building a future where this technology is easily accessable and affordable to the entire hair loss community.  The HydroBrush 2 is being built to take photos on a scalp level and show users when they start to see growth through weekly photos.

What We Need & What You Get

The technology for this is quite simple as we currently stand on the shoulders of giants.  If we can hit or exceed our funding goals, it is possible to have a high quality molded HydroBrush that has a folliscope camera.

We are going to code the app ourselves over late nights of ramen and pizza, and can guarantee that 100% of the funding of this project goes into the actual prototyping and production of the HydroBrush 2.

If we achieve our goals, we will move forward with the HydroBrush 2 prototypes.  As with any manufacturing project, there are risks that we will require more funding to complete the project. Should this happen, we will guarantee that all backers of the project will receive a HydroBrush 1 and a coupon for the HydroBrush 2 when it does launch.

The Impact

Hair loss has devastating psychological and confidence consequences for our society at large.   Many of the world's elite and wealthy, including Elon Musk, have spent thousands of dollars in expensive hair transplants.  However these options are not available to most of us.

If preventive treatment was pushed more, and there were ways to measure subclinical hair growth, people would have more personal agency over this problem.  We believe that a society with hair is a more confident society, so let's build this future together.

Other Ways You Can Help

We ask that you spread the good word about Club Roots.  Like us on facebook!  Send messages to your friends to check us out.  We're a mission driven company that gives back to those in need, and your word will help us deliver world class solutions for hair growth.

story:
If you had a chance to change the world, would you? 

That’s exactly what we are trying to do with our line of soaps, skin care, cleaning products and now with our full holistic apothecary.

We are much more than a soap company, we are building an alternative for families and individuals looking to improve their well-being with products that are crafted with passion in support of sustainable, conscious lifestyles around the world. 

 

 

We WILL be your one-stop shop for all things holistic and eco-friendly. In addition to our own products, we are partnering with other like-minded companies: EcoEnclose, Full Circle, Flip & Tumble, BioBags, Bee's Wraps and others to offer a complete collection of eco-friendly products for you and your home. We are a part of a global community dedicated to building a more sustainable world with consumable products that are earth, animal and human-friendly.

Read on to learn more about the different ways Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is contributing to our local and global communities.

             

 

Our products are more than just the label...but that is important too...

Pick up any cosmetic or cleaning product at your local store. Turn it over and read the label. How many ingredients do you recognize?

In the United States, an average person is exposed to hundreds of unregulated and untested chemicals before they leave the house every morning. These chemicals are often included as ingredients in personal care, cleaning and laundry products that have trusted brand names, even though many of them have been linked to rising rates of certain types of cancer, autism, respiratory problems, and reproductive issues. Many of the products containing these ingredients have already been banned in Europe, but not in the U.S.A. This is largely due to differences in the way policies are made in the United States versus many European nations, but may also have something to do with the lack of public awareness of the harmful effects of these chemicals and the variety of places they can be found in our homes.

 

 

Products that claim to be free of harmful additives are available in major stores. However, rules surrounding labels that claim "organic" and "natural" are vague, which makes it easy for companies to use misleading marketing or misinformation to meet their bottom line. The Federal Food and Drug Administration (FDA) does not recognize a legal definition of organic in cosmetic manufacturing, although the USDA does have stringent regulations on agricultural ingredients that use the term. The same lack of regulation of the word "natural" on a label is often a boon for major cosmetic manufacturers seeking to market new products to a health-conscious public. However, as long as a product is free of synthetics and dyes it may be labeled "natural," even if naturally occurring harmful or harsh ingredients are present. Many companies use these terms to justify higher prices to a growing demographic of environmentally savvy consumers while avoiding the cost of improving ingredients and manufacturing processes.

 

                             

It is not just the health of an individual that is affected by these harmful additives, the environment also suffers when toxic consumable products are introduced into water systems and ground soil, and non-biodegradable packing sits in landfills.

We solve this problem with superior, environmentally friendly products at affordable prices.

No longer do we accept at face value that everything in a store is safe simply because it made it past government agencies. We are starting to flip over the bottles and boxes of the foods that we consume and the things we clean our homes with, and the personal care products that we use to scrub our teeth and slather on our armpits and say "I think there's a better way to do this." The companies that are keeping up with this trend to be more conscious are thriving. Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is a total wellness company. Wellness means you stay above the line of disease by making conscious choices every day that contribute to your health and happiness.                    

                                 

 

Summer Shade products are handcrafted, natural, mainly vegan, palm-free, soy-free, GMO-free, sustainable and eco-friendly. The harvesting of palms is destroying our rainforests, contributing to global warming and killing Orangutan populations.

We do not use soy products to help limit exposure to GMOs. Every ingredient has been chosen for its quality, purity and gentle, health-giving natural properties.

      

Since we produced our first bar of soap in 2013, we've grown beyond our wildest dreams. We now not only craft soap, but also cleaning products, skin care products, healing salves and the list keeps growing as satisfied customers make suggestions for new products and we diversify our inventory. All of our products are of superior quality and most cost less than $15 because healthy alternatives should be affordable for everyone.

 

 

We want to use our small business success to bring quality not just to a person's soap dish but to his or her life. That is why we've recently rebranded our company from Summer Shade Soap Company to Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary. In addition to our skin care and cleaning products, we will give families and individuals an affordable alternative to removing toxins from their life with a variety of wellness and eco-friendly products, including tinctures, elixirs, balms, tea blends, salves, essential oils, diffusers and accessories for your home through partnerships with earth-conscious companies that manufacture superior household products.

Our vision - A healthier life, a healthier world

                                    

 

Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is dedicated to improving the community where we live, work and love, as well as contributing to sustainable living around the world. Our approach to business is as holistic as the products we sell. This means that every stage of our growth will include outreach and community involvement. We want to improve the lives of people and contribute to efforts to protect and restore the environment.

We will be donating one percent of our gross annual profits to 1% For The Planet, which supports organizations combatting global warming. Yes, our packing and products are biodegradable and most are even compostable, but it's not just about limiting waste for us, it's about leaving the world a better place by giving back.

As of July, we will be a Certified B-Corp and our legal structure will be registered as a Benefits Corporation in the Commonwealth of Kentucky. B-Corps are businesses that are committed to solving environmental and social issues around the globe. B-Corps do this in a number of ways, including supporting legislation and leading movements. We're thrilled that our performance history as a company has earned us a place on a roster of successful and well-respected socially-conscious businesses, such as Patagonia and Etsy.

       

 

We're dedicated to the Community

 

 

While we are committed to making the world a better place, we are also dedicated to the health of our own community. We will be partnering with some amazing organizations in Louisville, Kentucky to provide employment and job skill training to marginalized groups such as wounded veterans, legal refugees, women attempting to get out of the adult entertainment industry and mentally or physically challenged adults. This is one of the most exciting aspects of our business' strategic plan. We're not just helping people with our products, but we'll be providing them with unconditional love, respect, a source of income and independence.

 

Our Story

My name is Stephen Spaulding and I am the founder of Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary along with my parents. As children, my mother and her siblings spent a lot of time on my great-grandparents farm in a tiny town in Central Kentucky called Summer Shade. They played in the fields, explored the neighboring small town, visited the country store with a big, black potbelly stove in the middle of it, and enjoyed all that small farm life, family and nature had to offer. Our company's name was inspired by those memories of family, drawn from the purity and simplicity of nature.

Visit our website at www.summershade.life and use the code "Indiegogo" to save 10% on your first online order.

 

Follow us on     Facebook  |    Instagram   |    Twitter    |     Pinterest

 

We're growing fast...and so is the demand for healthier, more sustainable lifestyles.

Brands manufacturing and selling sustainable products have seen significant growth in the last decade and Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is no exception. But to meet the demands of our environmentally savvy consumers we must expand our manufacturing facilities and hire staff. To do this we need your help.

Our flexible IndieGoGo goal of $75,000 will cover Phase One of our strategic plan for our company growth. We've kept this goal flexible so that we can begin implementing our growth strategy's early stages and report to our funders on our progress in real time as the fund grows. This is how the money will be spent:

1) Hire employees - Our hiring efforts will focus on marginalized groups that tend to be overlooked in the traditional job market. This includes mentally or physically challenged adults, women attempting to get out of the adult entertainment industry, veterans and legal refugees looking to provide for their families, as well as practice a new language and acquire job skills.

2) Purchase ingredients in larger bulk quantities - This will help us meet demands for product and save money long-term because the cost per unit decreases with larger bulk orders of ingredients and packaging. This will also cut down on carbon emissions by eliminating multiples deliveries every month

3) Equipment purchases - All of our products are crafted by hand using simple tools and equipment. While we will continue to craft recipes and products by hand, some steps in the manufacturing process are unnecessarily slowed by the limitations of our existing equipment. Funding for equipment to streamline packaging, such as a label printer will help us become more efficient. It will also allow us to manufacture soaps and other products faster and more while maintaining the same level of superior quality and implementing a manufacturing standard at the highest level.

4) Acquiring a manufacturing space outside of our home, along with a storefront that customers can visit to purchase products - We need a space that can accommodate our lifestyle brand, including manufacturing, a classroom, a storefront, a small studio to film educational YouTube videos, a space for shipping and receiving, an office and storage for ingredients and inventory. This space must be located on a bus line for employees who are unable to drive. The fund would also support build out costs, including rehabbing or making changes to a neglected space or plot of land to fit our business needs.

Coming soon...

 

             

 

Phase Two of our growth strategy will be to purchase land in an underserved community in Louisville, Kentucky. Louisville has been recognized internationally as a Model Compassionate City and we at Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary will work to continue that legacy of compassion in our business and in our city. We will use this land to develop a small organic, urban farm where will grow our own herbs and other crops, as well as raise goats to produce goat milk beauty products and cheeses, yogurt and kefir. We will keep free range chickens to offer our community farm fresh, organic eggs as well as beehives from Flow Hives (Indiegogo's largest funded company to date) to offer raw, organic honey for use in our own products and for our customers to purchase. On our farm, Summer Shade Farms, we will have a community garden where participants can learn how to grow and harvest their own vegetables, as well as a classroom with a kitchen for schools and other organizations to learn about organic urban gardening and canning their harvest. We will need to raise funds for the land, farm equipment, outbuildings, housing, a barn, Flow Hives, animals and equipment for the classroom.

 

 

We craft amazing products but don't take our word for it. Read what people are saying about Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary.

"Summer Shade Soap holds up better than any other homemade soaps I have purchased and the customer service is fantastic. The Dirty Doggie soap is great and does wonders on my puppies dry skin and the Sea Salt Scrubs are amazing. Looking forward to trying the laundry soap!"

-Lauren Peterson

"My absolute favorite!...Stephen is a fantastic honest gentleman. He thoroughly answers any and all questions about each product...In the past I have purchased the Golden Grit soap and a coconut body and foot scrub. I'm in love with both of them. The soap leaves your skin feeling clean, moisturized and exfoliated in a gentle way."

-Heather Hadden

"I purchased the Baby Face soap, Herbal Detox Shampoo Bar and the Twisted Citrus Body Lotion...these products ALL are superior in quality and excellent!! My skin feels so soft and my face feels like a baby!!! The hair detox bar after only using it for 3 days has made my hair thicker, fuller and softer! I highly recommend these products..."

- Paula Bellaluza Hunter

"Stephen has such a passion for his craft and goes out of his way to make you happy and keep you coming back."

- Bruce Burger

"This company does what other natural product companies don't. They clean. They moisturize. They do this while maintaining their integrity of using non-toxic, healthy, natural ingredients. They are a staple at my home.:

-Mary Stewart

It's a great product, what could go wrong?

 

 

We understand that there are risks involved in every business venture. Some of the specific risks inherent in the natural cosmetic and cleaning product manufacturing industry involve Food and Drug Administration (FDA) guidelines. We are extremely careful to adhere to all FDA guidelines and have garnered an A+ Rating with the Commonwealth of Kentucky's Health and Family Services Food, Drug and Cosmetic Department for our manufacturing facilities.

By partnering with well-respected organizations, obtaining our B Corp Certification and building a loyal community, our brand will rise above the challenges of a young company.

Another common hurdle for a growing company is acquiring capital to keep up with demand or products while remaining true to the company's values.

With your help, the assistance of the Louisville Metro Government, the University of Louisville and Access Ventures, we believe we will thrive while providing you and your families high-quality products and supporting local and global causes.

Our diverse products and services, a well as our loyal community of customers and partners, will help us achieve stability as a company and provide sustainable solutions to suit a variety of lifestyles in every market.

The Summer Shade brand is currently developing these services:

1) We currently have an online store that offers a one-stop holistic shop, ships internationally and gives back globally and locally.

2) A brick and mortar shop in Louisville, Kentucky.

3)  An online video series that will offer free education.

4) A Summer Shade membership video series.

5) Monthly membership kits that guide customers through the process of building their own home holistic apothecary.

6) Ebooks that will be available online

We are proud members of the Louisville Independent Business Alliance, the Better Business Bureau (where we have an A+ rating), the Kentucky Proud Network as well as being cruelty-free and vegan. Plus we will be B-Corp Certified in July.

                                          

 

 

We understand that anything can happen when you run your own growing business. With our experience as small business owners and products manufacturers, we believe we will be able to tackle any unusual circumstances with confidence.

Let's get to work on building a healthier world together!

 

         

 

Customers who purchase Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary products are supporting a family-owned and -operated business and the health of a community, as well as enjoying the benefits of a toxin-free lifestyle. More than that, your support for this campaign will contribute to sustainability on a global scale.

Here are some other reasons to fund our IndieGoGo campaign:

1) You'll be supporting an independent business dedicated to craftsmanship and quality.

2) You'll be helping to build a space where the public can access affordable, toxin-free products, as well as observe the manufacturing process and learn how to develop their own recipes.

3) You'll be helping to create jobs for marginalized groups in Louisville, Kentucky.

4) You'll be contributing to neighborhood revitalization.

5) You'll be committing to a sustainable lifestyle free from harmful chemicals and toxins to improve your life and for a better world.

6) You'll be supporting products that reduce landfill waste and prevent harmful chemicals from being introduced into the environment.

Other ways you can help.

Want to help, but don't have the budget right now? We understand that's it's not always possible to support a business or charity financially. There are many other ways you can help!

  • Spread the word by sharing this campaign with your friends and family on social media or through email.
  • Recommend our products to your family, friends, and colleagues. Ask them to support this campaign. 
  • Share our story with people you know who could benefit from our products and our company's growth.
  • Contact influencers in your community and ask them to share our campaign. These could be community organizers, religious leaders, health professionals or even your favorite blogger.
  • Consider donating using the custom amount feature. Even $1 can make a difference. 
  • Purchase a product on our web store at www.summershade.life and remember to use the code Indiegogo at checkout to 10% on your first online order!

Thank you for being part of the solution with Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary.
story_txt:
If you had a chance to change the world, would you? That’s exactly what we are trying to do with our line of soaps, skin care, cleaning products and now with our full holistic apothecary.We are much more than a soap company, we are building an alternative for families and individuals looking to improve their well-being with products that are crafted with passion in support of sustainable, conscious lifestyles around the world.   We WILL be your one-stop shop for all things holistic and eco-friendly. In addition to our own products, we are partnering with other like-minded companies: EcoEnclose, Full Circle, Flip & Tumble, BioBags, Bee's Wraps and others to offer a complete collection of eco-friendly products for you and your home. We are a part of a global community dedicated to building a more sustainable world with consumable products that are earth, animal and human-friendly.Read on to learn more about the different ways Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is contributing to our local and global communities.              Our products are more than just the label...but that is important too...Pick up any cosmetic or cleaning product at your local store. Turn it over and read the label. How many ingredients do you recognize?In the United States, an average person is exposed to hundreds of unregulated and untested chemicals before they leave the house every morning. These chemicals are often included as ingredients in personal care, cleaning and laundry products that have trusted brand names, even though many of them have been linked to rising rates of certain types of cancer, autism, respiratory problems, and reproductive issues. Many of the products containing these ingredients have already been banned in Europe, but not in the U.S.A. This is largely due to differences in the way policies are made in the United States versus many European nations, but may also have something to do with the lack of public awareness of the harmful effects of these chemicals and the variety of places they can be found in our homes.  Products that claim to be free of harmful additives are available in major stores. However, rules surrounding labels that claim "organic" and "natural" are vague, which makes it easy for companies to use misleading marketing or misinformation to meet their bottom line. The Federal Food and Drug Administration (FDA) does not recognize a legal definition of organic in cosmetic manufacturing, although the USDA does have stringent regulations on agricultural ingredients that use the term. The same lack of regulation of the word "natural" on a label is often a boon for major cosmetic manufacturers seeking to market new products to a health-conscious public. However, as long as a product is free of synthetics and dyes it may be labeled "natural," even if naturally occurring harmful or harsh ingredients are present. Many companies use these terms to justify higher prices to a growing demographic of environmentally savvy consumers while avoiding the cost of improving ingredients and manufacturing processes.                              It is not just the health of an individual that is affected by these harmful additives, the environment also suffers when toxic consumable products are introduced into water systems and ground soil, and non-biodegradable packing sits in landfills.We solve this problem with superior, environmentally friendly products at affordable prices.No longer do we accept at face value that everything in a store is safe simply because it made it past government agencies. We are starting to flip over the bottles and boxes of the foods that we consume and the things we clean our homes with, and the personal care products that we use to scrub our teeth and slather on our armpits and say "I think there's a better way to do this." The companies that are keeping up with this trend to be more conscious are thriving. Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is a total wellness company. Wellness means you stay above the line of disease by making conscious choices every day that contribute to your health and happiness.                                                      Summer Shade products are handcrafted, natural, mainly vegan, palm-free, soy-free, GMO-free, sustainable and eco-friendly. The harvesting of palms is destroying our rainforests, contributing to global warming and killing Orangutan populations.We do not use soy products to help limit exposure to GMOs. Every ingredient has been chosen for its quality, purity and gentle, health-giving natural properties.      Since we produced our first bar of soap in 2013, we've grown beyond our wildest dreams. We now not only craft soap, but also cleaning products, skin care products, healing salves and the list keeps growing as satisfied customers make suggestions for new products and we diversify our inventory. All of our products are of superior quality and most cost less than $15 because healthy alternatives should be affordable for everyone.  We want to use our small business success to bring quality not just to a person's soap dish but to his or her life. That is why we've recently rebranded our company from Summer Shade Soap Company to Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary. In addition to our skin care and cleaning products, we will give families and individuals an affordable alternative to removing toxins from their life with a variety of wellness and eco-friendly products, including tinctures, elixirs, balms, tea blends, salves, essential oils, diffusers and accessories for your home through partnerships with earth-conscious companies that manufacture superior household products.Our vision - A healthier life, a healthier world                                     Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is dedicated to improving the community where we live, work and love, as well as contributing to sustainable living around the world. Our approach to business is as holistic as the products we sell. This means that every stage of our growth will include outreach and community involvement. We want to improve the lives of people and contribute to efforts to protect and restore the environment.We will be donating one percent of our gross annual profits to 1% For The Planet, which supports organizations combatting global warming. Yes, our packing and products are biodegradable and most are even compostable, but it's not just about limiting waste for us, it's about leaving the world a better place by giving back.As of July, we will be a Certified B-Corp and our legal structure will be registered as a Benefits Corporation in the Commonwealth of Kentucky. B-Corps are businesses that are committed to solving environmental and social issues around the globe. B-Corps do this in a number of ways, including supporting legislation and leading movements. We're thrilled that our performance history as a company has earned us a place on a roster of successful and well-respected socially-conscious businesses, such as Patagonia and Etsy.        We're dedicated to the Community  While we are committed to making the world a better place, we are also dedicated to the health of our own community. We will be partnering with some amazing organizations in Louisville, Kentucky to provide employment and job skill training to marginalized groups such as wounded veterans, legal refugees, women attempting to get out of the adult entertainment industry and mentally or physically challenged adults. This is one of the most exciting aspects of our business' strategic plan. We're not just helping people with our products, but we'll be providing them with unconditional love, respect, a source of income and independence. Our StoryMy name is Stephen Spaulding and I am the founder of Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary along with my parents. As children, my mother and her siblings spent a lot of time on my great-grandparents farm in a tiny town in Central Kentucky called Summer Shade. They played in the fields, explored the neighboring small town, visited the country store with a big, black potbelly stove in the middle of it, and enjoyed all that small farm life, family and nature had to offer. Our company's name was inspired by those memories of family, drawn from the purity and simplicity of nature.Visit our website at www.summershade.life and use the code "Indiegogo" to save 10% on your first online order. Follow us on     Facebook  |    Instagram   |    Twitter    |     Pinterest We're growing fast...and so is the demand for healthier, more sustainable lifestyles.Brands manufacturing and selling sustainable products have seen significant growth in the last decade and Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary is no exception. But to meet the demands of our environmentally savvy consumers we must expand our manufacturing facilities and hire staff. To do this we need your help.Our flexible IndieGoGo goal of $75,000 will cover Phase One of our strategic plan for our company growth. We've kept this goal flexible so that we can begin implementing our growth strategy's early stages and report to our funders on our progress in real time as the fund grows. This is how the money will be spent:1) Hire employees - Our hiring efforts will focus on marginalized groups that tend to be overlooked in the traditional job market. This includes mentally or physically challenged adults, women attempting to get out of the adult entertainment industry, veterans and legal refugees looking to provide for their families, as well as practice a new language and acquire job skills.2) Purchase ingredients in larger bulk quantities - This will help us meet demands for product and save money long-term because the cost per unit decreases with larger bulk orders of ingredients and packaging. This will also cut down on carbon emissions by eliminating multiples deliveries every month3) Equipment purchases - All of our products are crafted by hand using simple tools and equipment. While we will continue to craft recipes and products by hand, some steps in the manufacturing process are unnecessarily slowed by the limitations of our existing equipment. Funding for equipment to streamline packaging, such as a label printer will help us become more efficient. It will also allow us to manufacture soaps and other products faster and more while maintaining the same level of superior quality and implementing a manufacturing standard at the highest level.4) Acquiring a manufacturing space outside of our home, along with a storefront that customers can visit to purchase products - We need a space that can accommodate our lifestyle brand, including manufacturing, a classroom, a storefront, a small studio to film educational YouTube videos, a space for shipping and receiving, an office and storage for ingredients and inventory. This space must be located on a bus line for employees who are unable to drive. The fund would also support build out costs, including rehabbing or making changes to a neglected space or plot of land to fit our business needs.Coming soon...               Phase Two of our growth strategy will be to purchase land in an underserved community in Louisville, Kentucky. Louisville has been recognized internationally as a Model Compassionate City and we at Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary will work to continue that legacy of compassion in our business and in our city. We will use this land to develop a small organic, urban farm where will grow our own herbs and other crops, as well as raise goats to produce goat milk beauty products and cheeses, yogurt and kefir. We will keep free range chickens to offer our community farm fresh, organic eggs as well as beehives from Flow Hives (Indiegogo's largest funded company to date) to offer raw, organic honey for use in our own products and for our customers to purchase. On our farm, Summer Shade Farms, we will have a community garden where participants can learn how to grow and harvest their own vegetables, as well as a classroom with a kitchen for schools and other organizations to learn about organic urban gardening and canning their harvest. We will need to raise funds for the land, farm equipment, outbuildings, housing, a barn, Flow Hives, animals and equipment for the classroom.  We craft amazing products but don't take our word for it. Read what people are saying about Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary."Summer Shade Soap holds up better than any other homemade soaps I have purchased and the customer service is fantastic. The Dirty Doggie soap is great and does wonders on my puppies dry skin and the Sea Salt Scrubs are amazing. Looking forward to trying the laundry soap!"-Lauren Peterson"My absolute favorite!...Stephen is a fantastic honest gentleman. He thoroughly answers any and all questions about each product...In the past I have purchased the Golden Grit soap and a coconut body and foot scrub. I'm in love with both of them. The soap leaves your skin feeling clean, moisturized and exfoliated in a gentle way."-Heather Hadden"I purchased the Baby Face soap, Herbal Detox Shampoo Bar and the Twisted Citrus Body Lotion...these products ALL are superior in quality and excellent!! My skin feels so soft and my face feels like a baby!!! The hair detox bar after only using it for 3 days has made my hair thicker, fuller and softer! I highly recommend these products..."- Paula Bellaluza Hunter"Stephen has such a passion for his craft and goes out of his way to make you happy and keep you coming back."- Bruce Burger"This company does what other natural product companies don't. They clean. They moisturize. They do this while maintaining their integrity of using non-toxic, healthy, natural ingredients. They are a staple at my home.:-Mary StewartIt's a great product, what could go wrong?   We understand that there are risks involved in every business venture. Some of the specific risks inherent in the natural cosmetic and cleaning product manufacturing industry involve Food and Drug Administration (FDA) guidelines. We are extremely careful to adhere to all FDA guidelines and have garnered an A+ Rating with the Commonwealth of Kentucky's Health and Family Services Food, Drug and Cosmetic Department for our manufacturing facilities.By partnering with well-respected organizations, obtaining our B Corp Certification and building a loyal community, our brand will rise above the challenges of a young company.Another common hurdle for a growing company is acquiring capital to keep up with demand or products while remaining true to the company's values.With your help, the assistance of the Louisville Metro Government, the University of Louisville and Access Ventures, we believe we will thrive while providing you and your families high-quality products and supporting local and global causes.Our diverse products and services, a well as our loyal community of customers and partners, will help us achieve stability as a company and provide sustainable solutions to suit a variety of lifestyles in every market.The Summer Shade brand is currently developing these services:1) We currently have an online store that offers a one-stop holistic shop, ships internationally and gives back globally and locally.2) A brick and mortar shop in Louisville, Kentucky.3)  An online video series that will offer free education.4) A Summer Shade membership video series.5) Monthly membership kits that guide customers through the process of building their own home holistic apothecary.6) Ebooks that will be available onlineWe are proud members of the Louisville Independent Business Alliance, the Better Business Bureau (where we have an A+ rating), the Kentucky Proud Network as well as being cruelty-free and vegan. Plus we will be B-Corp Certified in July.                                            We understand that anything can happen when you run your own growing business. With our experience as small business owners and products manufacturers, we believe we will be able to tackle any unusual circumstances with confidence.Let's get to work on building a healthier world together!           Customers who purchase Summer Shade Holistic Apothecary products are supporting a family-owned and -operated business and the health of a community, as well as enjoying the benefits of a toxin-free lifestyle. story:
What is Joomla?

Joomla is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build Web sites and powerful online applications. Many aspects, including its ease-of-use and extensibility, have made Joomla the most popular Web site software available.
Currently, Joomla powers millions of websites including hundred thousands of online stores.

What is Odoo?

Odoo, formerly known as OpenERP,  is a comprehensive suite of integrated business applications that are elegantly programmed and customized to manage numerous companies and versatile businesses internationally. Currently, it has over 4000 internationally accredited business apps such as CRM, Sales Management, HR, Procurement, Warehouse Management, Accounting & Financial, Project Management, Website Builder, e-Commercial Platform among other applications developed specifically for use by every department of a business related company/organisation.
In addition to the traditional on-premise deployment, Odoo users have another choice to get Odoo deployed on the cloud with either ERPOnline.vn or Odoo.com

The problems

Hundred thousand companies prefer Joomla to power their corporate websites & online stores while Odoo to be their business management solution because of its ERP power.
Currently they have no way to make both platform to talk to each other which causes a lot of problem and difficulty to synchronize their data. For instance, when someone places an order on a Joomla-based store, the company has to manually input sales order data, invoice data, payment data, shipping information, etc into their Odoo system for sales management, warehouse management, invoice & payment control, etc. This is a really pain process with lots of human errors.

The solution

By using Joomla Odoo Connectors, which are separate sets of several Joomla extensions and Odoo apps to power the seamless communication between Joomla-based applications and the management hub Odoo over XML-RPC, companies don't have to manually export data from the Joomla(s) and manually import the data into Odoo any more. Everything will be done automatically in real-time. Odoo workflows can be activated automatically based on triggers raised by the Joomla(s). Business processes run more smoothly without any delay.
Upon release, the solution will come with several packages as described below:

1. Standard Connector

The Standard Connector package including a Joomla component and several Joomla plugins and an Odoo App to help migrate and synchronize Joomla Users and Joomla Content Articles (powered by the Joomla core com_content) and Joomla K2 Content Items between multiple Joomla-based websites and the central Odoo system.

2. Standard Online Store Connectors

The Online Store Connectors are software packages to be developed and created during the first stage of the project that synchronizes data from top 7 Joomla-based e-commerce and shopping cart solutions to Odoo.
The data to synchronize includes, but not limited to, customers data, product data, sales orders data, invoices data, payments data, inventory & stock data. Some of those solutions may support more than that (e.g. coupon system, shipping method, etc), such supported functionalities will be integrated with Odoo too.
At the first stage, the project will support Top 7 solutions as below. Later (in 2016), the project will be expanded to support others such as DigiStore, T-Download Store, PayPlan, MyMuse, etc.
VirtueMart Odoo Connector


HikaShop Odoo Connector


EShop Odoo Standard Connector


j2Store Odoo Connector


redSHOP Odoo Standard Connector


MijoShop Odoo Connector


Ecommerce WD Odoo Connector

How they work?

Odoo and Joomla will communicate securely with each others over XML-RPC.
For the first time installation, the connectors will ask the administrator to synchronize existing data between Joomla and Odoo. After such the initial synchronization, no more human interaction will be required.
When a new data is available at Joomla site, a trigger will be raised to ask Joomla to send the data into Odoo immediately. When the new data is completely imported into Odoo, the job will be marked as done. In case of any error that the import would be failed, the job will be queued for next synchronization (called by an automated task) to ensure data synchronization will never missed.
When new data available within Odoo, the similar task will be executed in the same way.
In any case of synchronization failure, email notification will be sent to the administrator.

Project Estimated Timeline

Licensing

We love open source to make growth while staying more secure, reliable and stable. Open Source model also helps keep our users away from vendor lock.
  • For Joomla extensions: GNU/GPL version 2 or later will be used.
  • For Odoo modules/apps: AGPL version 3 will be used.

Who we are & What we do

T.V.T Marine Automation (also known as TVTMA) is a Vietnam based technology company that was initially established to develop some automation solutions for marine and shipbuilding industry since 2009. During the time working in marine industry, the company got chances to develop web applications based on Joomla and business management applications based on Odoo for its oversea clients within the industry.

Starting in March 2012,  the company decided to focus on and to spend its energy in web related technologies and business management applications, mainly specialized in open-source software development and solution creation.

In May 2013, the company published its innovative and reliable Odoo cloud hosting solution ERPOnline at very reasonable price focusing on worldwide SMEs segment. Currently, more than 600 companies are involving and growing their business with ERPOnline.

For more information about the company, please visit http://ma.tvtmarine.com

Helping make Joomla Odoo Connectors a reality

We need your help in making all this happen. This crowd-funding campaign will allow our developers and UX designers to work full time on making Joomla Odoo Connectors a success.

Our first step towards making the Joomla Odoo Connectors vision a reality is creating and releasing the central core component upon which connectors and integrators and migrators will be built. That includes the engine for models mapping between Joomla and Odoo, the trigger system, the cron system, XML-RPC layer, the app API and the essential email notification functionality.

From there, we go on to add the Standard Connector and the Online Store Connectors. Other kinds of Joomla and Odoo integration will be added in the near future from there too. Then, people can benefit by the power of Joomla and Odoo integration at lower cost with no effort.

When we reach our initial goal with your help then we will start the project immediately as scheduled by the Estimated Timeline above.

Perks of Participation

You may also note that we have a few perks to be designed to let you have a great level of participation in Joomla Odoo Connectors future.

The Supporter gives our team coffee for creative and brings Odoo Joomla Connectors project a powerful voice. We can't make change to the industry and bring value to people without making a noise.

To thank you and let others know your contribution, we will glorify you by putting your name and your link in the credits list on the website as a project supporter.

The Standard Connector was designed for the end users who want to migrate between Joomla and Odoo. By claiming this perk you are the among the first to get the Standard Connector which enable you to synchronize Joomla Users, Joomla Content Articles, K2 Content Items from multiple Joomla sites to the central Odoo and vice versa.

The Online Store Connector was designed for the end users who want to migrate or synchronize between ONE of the following Joomla based Shopping Cart / Online Store solutions and Odoo:

  1. VirtueMart Odoo Connector
  2. HikaShop Odoo Connector
  3. EShop Odoo Connector
  4. j2Store Odoo Connector
  5. redSHOP Odoo Connector
  6. MijoShop Odoo Connector
  7. ECommerce WD Odoo Connector

By claiming this perk, you will receive the Standard Connector and one (only one) of the seven connectors above mentioned to enable you to either migrate between Joomla <-> Odoo or run both systems at the same time in synchronization mode. You will also get 6 months of free support from the team and access to updates.

The Professional was delicately designed for organizations that running several Joomla-based online stores and want to get the central Odoo synchronized automatically with all those stores for better management performance.

By claiming this perk, you will receive the Standard Connector and ALL the seven connectors above mentioned to enable you to synchronize all business data (e.g. customers, products, sales orders, invoices, payments, etc) from all the Joomla-based stores to the central Odoo system. In addition, you will get 6 months of free support from the team and access to updates.

The Standard Developer is the Professional perk plus another 6 months months of free support from the team and access to updates (to say 12 months in total).

Also, you will be given early access to Beta Releases as soon as they will be available. In addition, your name and your link will appear under our Silver Contributors List.

The Advanced Developer was specially designed for organizations who are the serious users of Joomla and Odoo to give you early development access to the process of creating, designing and developing the components of Joomla Odoo Connectors via an online forum and the project source code repository run and populated by the team. Get weekly updates, provide feedback, and help chart the path forward with us.

By claiming this perk, you will get all the components available now and then for your life time (but only 12 months of free support from the team).

In addition, your name and your logo (including link back to your home) will appear in our Gold Contributors list.

The Deployer is the Advanced Developer perk plus the following:

  1. Free Lifetime Supports from the team
  2. Free Lifetime of access to updates and new developed components
  3. Free Customization assistance within the first 12 months counting from the first General Availability release of the project
  4. Getting special highlighted mention in the "thank you" credits (opt-in, of course) with logo and link in a beautiful designed prominently placed location on the website.

Can’t Contribute Right Now?  You can still help!

Look, we get it. This project aims to bring huge value at lower cost to the world. Help us out by sharing our campaign on Twitter, Instagram, MySpace, or Pinterest. Do it on Facebook too, please.
If you are a part of an organization that uses both Joomla and Odoo, please send a link to the campaign to decision makers and management in your organization. Encourage them to get involved, give back and help secure the future of Joomla Odoo Connectors that million people want and need.
Anything you can do is really appreciated! We need all the help we can get.
story_txt:
What is Joomla?
Joomla is an award-winning content management system (CMS), which enables you to build Web sites and powerful online applications. Many aspects, including its ease-of-use and extensibility, have made Joomla the most popular Web site software available.
Currently, Joomla powers millions of websites including hundred thousands of online stores.
What is Odoo?
Odoo, formerly known as OpenERP,  is a comprehensive suite of integrated business applications that are elegantly programmed and customized to manage numerous companies and versatile businesses internationally. Currently, it has over 4000 internationally accredited business apps such as CRM, Sales Management, HR, Procurement, Warehouse Management, Accounting & Financial, Project Management, Website Builder, e-Commercial Platform among other applications developed specifically for use by every department of a business related company/organisation.

In addition to the traditional on-premise deployment, Odoo users have another choice to get Odoo deployed on the cloud with either ERPOnline.vn or Odoo.com
 The problems
Hundred thousand companies prefer Joomla to power their corporate websites & online stores while Odoo to be their business management solution because of its ERP power.
Currently they have no way to make both platform to talk to each other which causes a lot of problem and difficulty to synchronize their data. For instance, when someone places an order on a Joomla-based store, the company has to manually input sales order data, invoice data, payment data, shipping information, etc into their Odoo system for sales management, warehouse management, invoice & payment control, etc. This is a really pain process with lots of human errors.
The solution
By using Joomla Odoo Connectors, which are separate sets of several Joomla extensions and Odoo apps to power the seamless communication between Joomla-based applications and the management hub Odoo over XML-RPC, companies don't have to manually export data from the Joomla(s) and manually import the data into Odoo any more. Everything will be done automatically in real-time. Odoo workflows can be activated automatically based on triggers raised by the Joomla(s). Business processes run more smoothly without any delay.
Upon release, the solution will come with several packages as described below:
1. Standard Connector
The Standard Connector package including a Joomla component and several Joomla plugins and an Odoo App to help migrate and synchronize Joomla Users and Joomla Content Articles (powered by the Joomla core com_content) and Joomla K2 Content Items between multiple Joomla-based websites and the central Odoo system.

2. Standard Online Store Connectors
The Online Store Connectors are software packages to be developed and created during the first stage of the project that synchronizes data from top 7 Joomla-based e-commerce and shopping cart solutions to Odoo.
The data to synchronize includes, but not limited to, customers data, product data, sales orders data, invoices data, payments data, inventory & stock data. Some of those solutions may support more than that (e.g. coupon system, shipping method, etc), such supported functionalities will be integrated with Odoo too.
At the first stage, the project will support Top 7 solutions as below. Later (in 2016), the project will be expanded to support others such as DigiStore, T-Download Store, PayPlan, MyMuse, etc.
VirtueMart Odoo Connector






HikaShop Odoo Connector






EShop Odoo Standard Connector







j2Store Odoo Connector





redSHOP Odoo Standard Connector





MijoShop Odoo Connector





Ecommerce WD Odoo Connector




How they work?

Odoo and Joomla will communicate securely with each others over XML-RPC.
For the first time installation, the connectors will ask the administrator to synchronize existing data between Joomla and Odoo. After such the initial synchronization, no more human interaction will be required.
When a new data is available at Joomla site, a trigger will be raised to ask Joomla to send the data into Odoo immediately. When the new data is completely imported into Odoo, the job will be marked as done. In case of any error that the import would be failed, the job will be queued for next synchronization (called by an automated task) to ensure data synchronization will never missed.
When new data available within Odoo, the similar task will be executed in the same way.
In any case of synchronization failure, email notification will be sent to the administrator.
Project Estimated Timeline




Licensing
We love open source to make growth while staying more secure, reliable and stable. Open Source model also helps keep our users away from vendor lock.


For Joomla extensions: GNU/GPL version 2 or later will be used.


For Odoo modules/apps: AGPL version 3 will be used.



Who we are & What we do
T.V.T Marine Automation (also known as TVTMA) is a Vietnam based technology company that was initially established to develop some automation solutions for marine and shipbuilding industry since 2009. During the time working in marine industry, the company got chances to develop web applications based on Joomla and business management applications based on Odoo for its oversea clients within the industry.
Starting in March 2012,  the company decided to focus on and to spend its energy in web related technologies and business management applications, mainly specialized in open-source software development and solution creation.
In May 2013, the company published its innovative and reliable Odoo cloud hosting solution ERPOnline at very reasonable price focusing on worldwide SMEs segment. Currently, more than 600 companies are involving and growing their business with ERPOnline.
For more information about the company, please visit http://ma.tvtmarine.com

Helping make Joomla Odoo Connectors a reality
We need your help in making all this happen. This crowd-funding campaign will allow our developers and UX designers to work full time on making Joomla Odoo Connectors a success.
Our first step towards making the Joomla Odoo Connectors vision a reality is creating and releasing the central core component upon which connectors and integrators and migrators will be built. That includes the engine for models mapping between Joomla and Odoo, the trigger system, the cron system, XML-RPC layer, the app API and the essential email notification functionality.
From there, we go on to add the Standard Connector and the Online Store Connectors. Other kinds of Joomla and Odoo integration will be added in the near future from there too. Then, people can benefit by the power of Joomla and Odoo integration at lower cost with no effort.
When we reach our initial goal with your help then we will start the project immediately as scheduled by the Estimated Timeline above.

Perks of Participation
You may also note that we have a few perks to be designed to let you have a great level of participation in Joomla Odoo Connectors future.
The Supporter gives our team coffee for creative and brings Odoo Joomla Connectors project a powerful voice. We can't make change to the industry and bring value to people without making a noise.
To thank you and let others know your contribution, we will glorify you by putting your name and your link in the credits list on the website as a project supporter.
The Standard Connector was designed for the end users who want to migrate between Joomla and Odoo. By claiming this perk you are the among the first to get the Standard Connector which enable you to synchronize Joomla Users, Joomla Content Articles, K2 Content Items from multiple Joomla sites to the central Odoo and vice versa.
The Online Store Connector was designed for the end users who want to migrate or synchronize between ONE of the following Joomla based Shopping Cart / Online Store solutions and Odoo:



VirtueMart Odoo Connector


HikaShop Odoo Connector

EShop Odoo Connector

j2Store Odoo Connector

redSHOP Odoo Connector
MijoShop Odoo Connector
ECommerce WD Odoo Connector

By claiming this perk, you will receive the Standard Connector and one (only one) of the seven connectors above mentioned to enable you to either migrate between Joomla <-> Odoo or run both systems at the same time in synchronization mode. You will also get 6 months of free support from the team and access to updates.
The Professional was delicately designed for organizations that running several Joomla-based online stores and want to get the central Odoo synchronized automatically with all those stores for better management performance.
By claiming this perk, you will receive the Standard Connector and ALL the seven connectors above mentioned to enable you to synchronize all business data (e.g. customers, products, sales orders, invoices, payments, etc) from all the Joomla-based stores to the central Odoo system. In addition, you will get 6 months of free support from the team and access to updates.
The Standard Developer is the Professional perk plus another 6 months months of free support from the team and access to updates (to say 12 months in total).
Also, you will be given early access to Beta Releases as soon as they will be available. In addition, your name and your link will appear under our Silver Contributors List.
The Advanced Developer was specially designed for organizations who are the serious users of Joomla and Odoo to give you early development access to the process of creating, designing and developing the components of Joomla Odoo Connectors via an online forum and the project source code repository run and populated by the team. Get weekly updates, provide feedback, and help chart the path forward with us.
By claiming this perk, you will get all the components available now and then for your life time (but only 12 months of free support from the team).
In addition, your name and your logo (including link back to your home) will appear in our Gold Contributors list.
The Deployer is the Advanced Developer perk plus the following:



Free Lifetime Supports from the team


Free Lifetime of access to updates and new developed components


Free Customization assistance within the first 12 months counting from the first General Availability release of the project

Getting special highlighted mention in the "thank you" credits (opt-in, of course) with logo and link in a beautiful designed prominently placed location on the website.

Can’t Contribute Right Now?  You can still help!
Look, we get it.  This project aims to bring huge value at lower cost to the world.  Help us out by sharing our campaign on Twitter, Instagram, MySpace, or Pinterest.  Do it on Facebook too, please.If you are a part of an organization that uses both Joomla and Odoo, please send a link to the campaign to decision makers and management in your organization. Encourage them to get involved, give back and help secure the future of Joomla Odoo Connectors that million people want and need.Anything you can do is really appreciated!  We need all the help we can get.

story:
Imagine your life:

You study hard all your childhood, every weekend. Then 40+ years you work hard to provide yourself a roof, protection to your family, everything you have to your children. You have a happy life. Then your retirement comes and… you still have to work and even more harder. You are lucky if you get clean and easy job, but what if you will end up in hawker center? What if you will have to clean tables and pick up dirty dishes all day long? You can’t walk fast any more, but you go in circles to pick up that dirty plate and bring it to the cleaning counter. At night your legs hurts so bad, you barely can walk home. And next day it’s the same, weekends too…

Do you want this kind of life? Do you deserve it? Do they deserve?..

I live in Singapore almost 1.5 years and since very beginning one thing really stroked me that mostly just old people are taking care of dirty tables in the food courts. Most of them move slow and never smile. Rarely I heard people thanking them for cleaning their tables, uncommon was to see people bringing their dirty plates to the cleaning counter themselves.

Singapore is a great country! I wish to live here for many years. When my friends come to visit, I am proudly taking them around and honestly praise this country. I never complain about Singapore, but one fact I always have to share, coz I simply don’t understand it – why elderly Singaporeans are not cared off? I am so surprised that such a rich and smart country doesn’t have the system that works for all in pension age. I understand that it’s not so easy, but it’s very hard to see how these super old uncles and aunties have to suffer at the age when they should rest and felt cared off. They deserve it, because they did so all their life for others.

So my question is: can we do something about it? We all aware of it, but why do we all keep silent?

Dream here is not only to collect money and spread it through ageing community (maybe helping them to move from full time to part time job?), but most importantly there must be a clear action plan. If we will acknowledge this problem, maybe coming election could be a great way to start solving it?

If you agree to this idea, at least you could do, it’s share. If you have any suggestions – please share too! All collected money will go to elderly. The way how we will do it depends on how much we will collect, but all ideas are very welcome in the comments' area.

Would you stand up for your parents? If so, let’s stand up for your neighbour, your community, Singapore!
