story:
Split it Symmetric made us Relax,

Design the Shift Alt Ctrl as Thumb Keys

Make the Combined  Stroke Coincide with the    Relation of Thumb and Other Finger,

Make No Mouse Operation Reality

Swift and More Light Work Strength is its Extaordinary Characteristic


  • I am or almost an old man.Since Feb 1978, study the SN338 seismic instrument made in France detail in gate circuit, till quit my job from Petrol China in 1993, I had made the I/O bios program for SPERRY PC turned it into Chinese PC immediatly. This project made me go ahead of world. In 1993, I invented the Three Blocks Keyboard. For the reason of everybody know in China, I can not carry out it as an ordinary person from Xinjiang.
  • The campaign of my Three Blocks Keyboard is to make it to know to people all of the world. Split it symmetric made us relax, design the Shift Alt Ctrl as thumb keys made the combined  stroke coincide with the relation of thumb and other finger, make the no mouse operation reality. Swift and More light work strength is its extaordinary characteristic. Now more than twenty years has passed, I am nearly 60 years old.  My daughter is now study in New York University. I hope my campaign will help her complish her education and give her a business practice opportunity in New York .
  • The most career person using professional software such as programer, products designer, business or office clerk , military officer and game player etc  will get benefit from my achieve. Relax body and mind is my mind. I help you to relax, you help my achieve.

 You Get the Relaxation, I Realize my Dream

  • I need $500,000usd funding for me to start my business in New York. With the campaign, you get the relaxation, I realize my dream. Although, I am nearly 60 years old, now my daughter is in New York University, I thinck I can find some young person to help me invariably.
  • As the inventer or designer of Three Block Keyboard, I have the copyright. The copyright  is available over 70 years. I can give people the best keyboard of the world.
  • What ever the entire goal reach or not, the funds will go to build my business in New York to make my keyboard by OEM and make it to use all over the world. My daughter's education need the business. I wait the opportunity over twenty years.

A little Difference may Change your Life

  • The keyboard operation is nearly essential part of daily life for everybody. A little relaxation of keyboard operation is important to everybody. I am afraid the relaxation provided by my keyboard is great. So my project is valuable to the contributer and to the world. The contribution by people will change the world.
  • The project include thin-film switch and michanical switch keyboard. So people can make their contribution according their like.

Express Company should be my Friend

  • The risks and obstacles I may face on the way to achieving my goal is the manage problem of how to accurately and swiftly deliver the Perks the contributor. The problem can be overcome by cooperate with deliver corporation, such as DHL. The cheap copy maybe the future challenge I have to infront of. The copyright I have had twent years ago can make me to overcome these hurdles. Of course, a state with an adequate legal system is the precondition.
  • Build up my corporation in New York can make the precondition dependable.

Thanks Every Kind of  Help

  • I am an ordinary person. I gratefully hope you to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
YOU CAN USE THE MULTITASKING HA AS A HEADLAMP!

 

 

CYCLING YOUR NIGHT AWAY WITH YOUR CELLPHONE'S FLASHLIGHT AND THE MULTITASKING HA.

USE YOUR SMART WATCH AS A REMOTE DEVICE TO YOUR CELLPHONE WHILE YOU'RE FILMING WITH THE MULTITASKING HA.

 

 

HAS AN ADJUSTABLE BELT FOR ARM AND HEAD

 

MULTITASKING HOT PINK FRONT SCREEN    
 
YOU CAN WEAR IT AS A WAISTBAND

YOU CAN WEAR IT AS AN ARMBAND

YOU CAN WEAR IT AS A CELLPHONE VISOR

 
 
 
My name is Jackson Mesidor, I'm the owner and CEO of JM Electronics which I founded in 2013 . As any other smaller companies out there, it usually takes  a while before you become established. In 2013 I came up  with the smart charger PC tablet idea. The tablet includes two back up batteries for your cellular phone charging needs. I never accomplished my goal with this product because it required a substantial amount of funds to manufacture . The Smart charger PC tablet has been upgraded to Smart Charger power bank tablet . The new tablet will have two built in power bank chargers that will be able to charge two devices at a time .
 
 
In 2014 I created the Multitasking headband/armband , as I was developing this product I've noticed there was a similar product  with a very huge demand (The Cellphone Armband). I realized, "this is a winning situation here." I went to Global Sources and they were able to manufacture the Multitasking HA for us. In 2016 I came up with the flying selfie which is only a sketch product at this time . The flying selfie is a cellphone drone. The drone will be carrying  your cellphone instead of those expensive cameras that we have these days on the drones.
 
Many of you are probably saying, "Why should I invest in this product while there is one out there already?" Well, for those of  who are thinking that way; I have a little story for you. Remember when the internet first came out we only had AOL, and now we have Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, Yahoo and the list goes on, when MTV came out we only had one music channel and now we have so many. When cellphones came out we only had very few makes and models  and now we have a lot of different types of cellphones out there. If everyone were saying, "Why should I invest in something new I'm happy with what I have," we would never be that far today. Now let me tell you why you should invest in  this product and my company altogether. Most people who invest in a company at an early stage always benefits from that company after it takes off. So should you invest now? the answer is, YES! Because I will keep every name, email address, home address, and phone numbers for the ones who are going to help us now. If the company gets very successful in the future and goes public those people will get JM Electronics's stocks at a very low price if they want to purchase.
 

 The new routine program was developed to match our product, and it was designed specially for the hard working men and women who are sitting behind a desk all day long. We know its hard to loose weight by doing this type of job. This new routine program will tell you exactly which time to exercise. The new routine plan is yours today for free! You can only get it here in this indiegogo campaign. Try it for 30 days for best results . Thanks for supporting our campaign.

        

Routine Program

 

 

 

 

FIRST DETACHABLE CELLPHONE VISOR AND WAISTBAND EVER CREATED. BE THE FIRST ONE TO OWN THIS GREAT PRODUCT!

story:
Hands Free Back Wash: Stay Independent In The Shower

Taking a hot shower feels fantastic. You can’t help but feel more relaxed when you get out. But for the disabled and the elderly, getting clean in the shower can be a challenge.

I’ve seen the need for a Hands Free Back Wash throughout my 24-year career as a registered nurse. Then last year, it hit closer to home when my oldest daughter was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. She called me in a panic one morning when she wasn’t able to lift her arms.

Throughout most of our lives, a shower is a private experience. It’s easy to become depressed when we need help to do what seems so simple. The Hands Free Back Wash allows everyone to maintain their dignity, while also turning a simple shower into a spa-like experience.

How It Works

Each unit attaches to a shower with industrial-grade suction cups. The front has three rotating silicone brushes that dispense soap. It has a reservoir that holds 16 oz. or more of body wash, so you won’t need to refill it often. The brushes follow three vertical tracks that use motors to move them up and down, enhancing their therapeutic effect of reducing strains, muscle soreness and improving circulation.

And depending on your preferences, the brush heads can be switched for other styles that, for example, may be designed more for scrubbing or massaging (and different speeds such as low, medium or high).

The motors that spin the brushes are powered by a rechargeable battery unit with a sealed compartment that can easily be accessed without removing the device from the wall.

After pressing a button to start the scrubbing action and selecting the brush speed you prefer, all that’s required is to press your back against the Hands Free Back Wash so it can work its magic!

Who Needs This In Their Shower?

EVERYONE can benefit from a Hands Free Back Wash! It is extremely beneficial for anyone with upper extremity limitations, including people managing the following conditions: Multiple sclerosis, Parkinson's disease, sciatica, herniated disks, any degenerative disk disease, stroke, heart attack, tendinitis, rotator cuff injuries, severe back acne due to profuse sweating, and people with physical disabilities. Many veterans who return from war zones with injuries also want to maintain their independence, which makes the Hands Free Back Wash a good solution for them, too.

Why Not Just Use a Loofah With A Handle?

If you look at the conditions listed above, many people are not able to reach their backs and apply the pressure needed to clean them with a sponge or loofah, even when they’re attached to a handle. Another problem with these tools is they can spread bacteria. Few people disinfect them after each use, which means they are breeding grounds for germs. When you shower, the steam causes the pores in your skin to open. Rubbing a bacteria-filled loofah on your back increases your chances of getting an infection.

Why Showering Independently Matters

No matter what age you are, we all want to be independent. After a lifetime of doing things on our own, no one wants a nurse or family member assisting them in the shower. And I think we can all agree, we don’t want strangers looking at us in the shower, either. Staying independent reduces depression and keeps us from feeling helpless or like we’re a burden on others.

Never Drop The Soap Again

It seems like no shower ever made has enough shelving to hold all of our soap, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, face wash, detangler and everything else that needs a space. A lot of people rely on shower caddies that hang from the shower head, but they often slip off causing bottles to fall and even injuries. They also place stress on the show head, which can cause leaks to start. A better solution is to just pour your favorite body wash into the Hands Free Back Wash reservoir and let the scrubbers clean and massage your back.

Silicone Scrubbers Simultaneously Massage And Clean

The traditional way to clean your back in the shower relies on applying soap to a washcloth, then awkwardly reaching around your sides and shoulders to scrub your back. Even for the most flexible among us, it’s not an easy task. It’s even more annoying when you forget your washcloth and don’t remember until you’re already under the water.

Now think about this scenario: You get in the shower, then push the button on the Hands Free Back Wash to make the scrubbers start to spin. The scent of your favorite body wash immediately fills the shower as it starts being released. You then lean your back harder and softer against the bristles to get your back clean and massaged at the same time. If you have any muscle soreness, you can lean a little harder in those spots to work out the tension.

It’s a much better experience than trying to guess which fingers can reach the center of your back—and it’s the only way if you have mobility problems.

How To Install It

Each unit relies on industrial-grade suction cups to keep it attached to the wall of a shower. Before installing it, be sure to first clean where it will be placed. This ensures you get the best grip, since dried soap deposits can cause problems. Next, stand in the shower barefoot and hold the device so that the bottom is just above your belly button. That’s about the right height for most people, but it’s possible you may like yours a little higher. Then, make the suction cups damp with some water and press the device against the wall of the shower.

What’s In The Box

You’ll receive illustrated instructions for installation and usage, the complete Hands Free Back Wash device, 3 silicone scrubbers, one rechargeable battery, and my deepest gratitude for your support.

Why I Need Support Now

I started the process of making the Hands Free Back Wash in October 2018. Since then, I started the preliminary patent research and independent research to see if there were any other products like it on the market—there aren’t. I also had a design firm create full schematics for the device, including renderings of its shape, the motor design, suction cups, and the silicone brushes.

Everything is ready for the first units to be made, but I need funding to pay for manufacturing, packaging and shipping.

Based on the costs to move this from a design to customer doors, the retail price will be $199.95. I’m offering Indiegogo supporters 15% off the retail price, which is a savings of $29.99, for a total discounted price here of $169.95.

Anyone who purchases two products will get 25% off the retail price, for a savings of $49.99 on each unit.

Prototype Design

Risks and challenges

Even though a few prototypes have been created to make sure the product works as intended, I don’t have any data yet for how long it will last with different sized people using it daily. This makes Indiegogo the perfect place to bring the Hands Free Back Wash to market. The data I can collect from early adopters will help me revise the design to ensure it’s the best way to wash your back on the market.
story_txt:
Hands Free Back Wash: Stay Independent In The Shower
Taking a hot shower feels fantastic. You can’t help but feel more relaxed when you get out. But for the disabled and the elderly, getting clean in the shower can be a challenge.
I’ve seen the need for a Hands Free Back Wash throughout my 24-year career as a registered nurse. Then last year, it hit closer to home when my oldest daughter was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. She called me in a panic one morning when she wasn’t able to lift her arms.
Throughout most of our lives, a shower is a private experience. It’s easy to become depressed when we need help to do what seems so simple. The Hands Free Back Wash allows everyone to maintain their dignity, while also turning a simple shower into a spa-like experience.
How It Works

Each unit attaches to a shower with industrial-grade suction cups. The front has three rotating silicone brushes that dispense soap. It has a reservoir that holds 16 oz. or more of body wash, so you won’t need to refill it often. The brushes follow three vertical tracks that use motors to move them up and down, enhancing their therapeutic effect of reducing strains, muscle soreness and improving circulation.
And depending on your preferences, the brush heads can be switched for other styles that, for example, may be designed more for scrubbing or massaging (and different speeds such as low, medium or high).
The motors that spin the brushes are powered by a rechargeable battery unit with a sealed compartment that can easily be accessed without removing the device from the wall.
After pressing a button to start the scrubbing action and selecting the brush speed you prefer, all that’s required is to press your back against the Hands Free Back Wash so it can work its magic!
Who Needs This In Their Shower?
EVERYONE can benefit from a Hands Free Back Wash! It is extremely beneficial for anyone with upper extremity limitations, including people managing the following conditions: Multiple sclerosis, Parkinson's disease, sciatica, herniated disks, any degenerative disk disease, stroke, heart attack, tendinitis, rotator cuff injuries, severe back acne due to profuse sweating, and people with physical disabilities. Many veterans who return from war zones with injuries also want to maintain their independence, which makes the Hands Free Back Wash a good solution for them, too.
Why Not Just Use a Loofah With A Handle?
If you look at the conditions listed above, many people are not able to reach their backs and apply the pressure needed to clean them with a sponge or loofah, even when they’re attached to a handle. Another problem with these tools is they can spread bacteria. Few people disinfect them after each use, which means they are breeding grounds for germs. When you shower, the steam causes the pores in your skin to open. Rubbing a bacteria-filled loofah on your back increases your chances of getting an infection.
Why Showering Independently Matters
No matter what age you are, we all want to be independent. After a lifetime of doing things on our own, no one wants a nurse or family member assisting them in the shower. And I think we can all agree, we don’t want strangers looking at us in the shower, either. Staying independent reduces depression and keeps us from feeling helpless or like we’re a burden on others.
Never Drop The Soap Again
It seems like no shower ever made has enough shelving to hold all of our soap, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, face wash, detangler and everything else that needs a space. A lot of people rely on shower caddies that hang from the shower head, but they often slip off causing bottles to fall and even injuries. They also place stress on the show head, which can cause leaks to start. A better solution is to just pour your favorite body wash into the Hands Free Back Wash reservoir and let the scrubbers clean and massage your back.
Silicone Scrubbers Simultaneously Massage And Clean
The traditional way to clean your back in the shower relies on applying soap to a washcloth, then awkwardly reaching around your sides and shoulders to scrub your back. Even for the most flexible among us, it’s not an easy task. It’s even more annoying when you forget your washcloth and don’t remember until you’re already under the water.
Now think about this scenario: You get in the shower, then push the button on the Hands Free Back Wash to make the scrubbers start to spin. The scent of your favorite body wash immediately fills the shower as it starts being released. You then lean your back harder and softer against the bristles to get your back clean and massaged at the same time. If you have any muscle soreness, you can lean a little harder in those spots to work out the tension.
It’s a much better experience than trying to guess which fingers can reach the center of your back—and it’s the only way if you have mobility problems.
How To Install It
Each unit relies on industrial-grade suction cups to keep it attached to the wall of a shower. Before installing it, be sure to first clean where it will be placed. This ensures you get the best grip, since dried soap deposits can cause problems. Next, stand in the shower barefoot and hold the device so that the bottom is just above your belly button. That’s about the right height for most people, but it’s possible you may like yours a little higher. Then, make the suction cups damp with some water and press the device against the wall of the shower.
What’s In The Box
You’ll receive illustrated instructions for installation and usage, the complete Hands Free Back Wash device, 3 silicone scrubbers, one rechargeable battery, and my deepest gratitude for your support.
Why I Need Support Now
I started the process of making the Hands Free Back Wash in October 2018. Since then, I started the preliminary patent research and independent research to see if there were any other products like it on the market—there aren’t. I also had a design firm create full schematics for the device, including renderings of its shape, the motor design, suction cups, and the silicone brushes.
Everything is ready for the first units to be made, but I need funding to pay for manufacturing, packaging and shipping.
Based on the costs to move this from a design to customer doors, the retail price will be $199.95. I’m offering Indiegogo supporters 15% off the retail price, which is a savings of $29.99, for a total discounted price here of $169.95.
Anyone who purchases two products will get 25% off the retail price, for a savings of $49.99 on each unit.
Prototype Design





Risks and challenges
Even though a few prototypes have been created to make sure the product works as intended, I don’t have any data yet for how long it will last with different sized people using it daily. This makes Indiegogo the perfect place to bring the Hands Free Back Wash to market. The data I can collect from early adopters will help me revise the design to ensure it’s the best way to wash your back on the market.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Thomas Johnston, I need your help in getting the funds required to get this new and innovative product ordered and shipped to my business so that I can get it packaged and sent out to the market and start helping people and making money.  I do have a patent pending on the product, the prototype is already made up and I have quotes on what it takes to get the products here.  I even have a list of businesses that I have to take it to when I get the package completed so they can see it and make a decision on carrying it in their stores.  I really hope to hear from you on this, thank you for taking the time to read this.

Lets face it, in this time of COVID-19 we could all use something that will keep us from using our fingers to clean out our noses so we have the best chance at not catching it or any other nasal infection.  What if I asked you to tell me the last 5 things you touched, better yet the first 5 things you touched since washing your hands?  When was the last time you got soap under your fingernails to clean them?  This product should really cut down on the number of sinus infections and other infections that people get through their nose.  With the placement of the scented ends it will help you breathe better, sleep better, and be more productive.  Once you take the scraper end of the pick and clean out the boogers, pollen, and other materials foreign and domestic, you simply turn it around and use the scented end of the pick to breathe in the scent that you have selected. Imagine waking up in the morning and cleaning your nose out with one of the picks and then releasing a scent that helps wake you up and get that nice cold rush of air. It is such a great feeling when you can breathe better, and using these cleaning picks a little bit before bedtime will also help with breathing at night. Each package contains 10 nose picks, so it is convenient for families.

Risks & Challenges

I have made sure that I have quotes from a domestic supplier and a foreign supplier, just in case somebody has a production problem, I will have another source so we can keep moving.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help financially I would appreciate your help by sharing this with your friends and family and making them aware that there is a new product coming that is going to help everyone.

story:
THE ESSENTIAL WELLNESS SHOWER

PURIFICATION  |  CLEANSING  |  WELL-BEING

 

The MAGIC happens with the sound of 'CLICK' 

 The unique design of the showerhead can hold two DISQs at the same time to suit your needs. The strong magnets enclosed inside make it a breeze to change and snap-on the showerhead. 

 


 

TIME TO MOVE ON FROM OUR OLD WAYS...

 

HOW DO YOU SHOWER?​

 

LESS IS MORE

QOLLO ascribes to a philosophy that simplifying and organizing is the key to a serene environment. Make your shower your sanctuary starting with simplifying how you do self-care. With the combination of purification, cleansing & wellness, the shower DISQs makes a holistic approach that can replace most of the things you have in your shower.

 

 

 

Give the gift of WELLNESS this Holiday!

While QOLLO will only be available next year, every backer may opt for a Christmas postcard that can be addressed to anyone in the world as a pre-gift to them and let them know how special they are by being the first to receive QOLLO!

SPECIFICATIONS

 SHOWERHEAD

  • MATERIAL:  RECYCLED ABS PLASTIC / SILICONE NOZZLES
  • DIMENSIONS: 110 mm dia. x 285 mm length
  • INSIDE COMPONENTS: STAINLESS STEEL
  • FLOW RATE:  2.0 gpm

SHOWER DISQS

  • MATERIAL:  SILICONE + RECYCLED  ABS PLASTIC
  • DIMENSIONS:  74 mm dia. x 20 mm height
  • INSIDE COMPONENTS: NEODYGIUM MAGNET RING

MISCELLANEOUS

  • FILTER MATERIAL - PP COTTON FILTER
  • MINERAL BEADS 
  • SHOWER SHELF: RECYCLED  ABS PLASTIC
     

OUR STORY

We are busier than ever, left with little time for self-care. And amidst all the stress, the yearning for inner renewal grows stronger. We try to find balance in the middle of everything seemingly blended and blurred. It was in these instances where we fully realize that wellness & our well-being are one of the most essential things. It was in this longing to find time for rest and respite that QOLLO was born. 

 

QOLLO JOURNEY SO FAR...

From its inception, the team felt very invested in making a product that enables everyone to put wellness at the forefront once more. Each sketch, model, and design iteration had well-being considered.

Risks and challenges

We have spent over a year working on QOLLO doing everything possible to mitigate the risks for the campaign for our backers. The design of the product has gone through rounds of prototyping and and have been fully tested. 

It has been a year since the inception of QOLLO and has fully designed a functional prototype for all the components: QOLLO Showerhead, QOLLO Shelf, and all the DISQs. It has gone through a dozen rounds of prototyping and has gone been used by testers of the prototype for feedback. 

At the moment, we have been talking with potential manufacturing partners to produce all the separate components. And the biggest risks would be a disruption in the capacity of our manufacturing partners as this would entail sourcing out a new manufacturer and iron out the logistics and design with them. This would mean potential delays by months.

story:
NOTE: Worldwide shipping available!

Biomed is a German brand that creates safe, tested, dermocosmetics that are up to 100% natural, offering an effective alternative to chemical skin care. BIOMED is available in pharmacies and treats a variety of specific skin problems as well as having  a range of daily essential products.

 

We aim to promote a shift in skin care usage, ensuring a safer, healthier alternative for your health, for the animals and for the environment!

THE PROBLEM:

Our skin is the largest organ of the body and it is highly responsive to external influences. Adult skin can absorb up to 60% of what is applied on it, and through bodycare, it is exposed to over 500 chemicals every day. According to recent studies, the average woman absorbs over 2 kg of chemicals every year through dermal absorption.

Unfortunately, the market is dominated by synthetic products and most substances used in skincare have never (or only barely) been tested for safety on humans and their impact on the environment. About 1 in 5 cosmetic products contain chemicals linked to cancer and illnesses due to their accumulative effect, and the impact is not only limited to ourselves but they also affect the development of babies during pregnancy. A 2004 study found almost 300 toxic and carcinogenic chemicals in newborns´ cord blood - whatever the mom is exposed to, so is the baby.

THE SOLUTION:

Biomed products are developed to solve this synthetic/toxic skin care issue, so people no longer have to apply non-natural, possibly harmful chemical products on their skin.

Our products contain active ingredients derived from the nature, whose effectiveness in treating common skin issues is proven through clinical trials. We offer pharmacy quality products with a stylish and sophisticated look, which are good and delicate on your skin.

 

Biomed covers all aspects of skin-care, offering products that meet the dermatological and cosmetic needs of both women and men. All products are clinically and dermatologically tested, therefore suitable for sensitive skin.

OUR PRODUCTS:

Biomed currently offers 32 products. We have developed 17 new products that we would like to produce and launch in 2018 with the help of our Indiegogo backers, and then launch another 20 new products in 2019!

The ranges include complementary products providing targeted skin care issues, that satisfies the needs of even the most demanding skin types. Our offer currently includes three ranges - whose products can be easily recognized thanks to a distinctive symbol printed on the box, and a "Problem Specific" range:

These dermocosmetics are developed to adjust to your dynamic lifestyle and they make a perfect gift for friends and loved ones, that will make them feel extra special and pampered!

The products are suitable for people looking for a healthier, safer, natural alternative to their skin care routine, with proven efficacy, not tested on animals, as well as being vegan.

IN DETAIL:

 

 

We want to promote a healthier lifestyle that is also more respectful of animals and of the environment. We chose Indiegogo so we could partner up with an enthusiastic community that is supportive and care about their health, the environment and the cruelty-free cause!

Currently we are planning on manufacturing 17 new products that will be available over the next few months. Your help would support us in covering the production & packaging costs. We also plan to further develop the range of products so that we can meet all aspects and needs of your skin! We have already developed another 20 new products that would be ready for production in 2019.

Our engagement continues online...We want to raise awareness on the ingredients contained in skin care and beauty products and their possible implications for our health, so that people can make more informed choices. We are aiming to further develop our research and to spread this positive information with a broader audience though social media campaings, blog posts, and collaborations.

 

Effective, stylish and delicate on the skin...Just ask who´s tried it!

Biomed is trending and boasts an extremely high satisfaction rate: people from all over the world recommend our products and talk about them on social media, blogs and videos!  Here are some of their impressions...

The brand Biomed was launched to combine pharmacy-quality natural ingredients with a chic design to make natural skin care fashionable and reliable, so it´s easy to make a switch to a healthier and more responsible lifestyle.

Our products make you look fantastic from the outside and feel fabulous from the inside. No chemicals, no compromises!

 

Tell your friends & family... share our campaign!

      

 

Follow us on social media to keep updated on our latest products and research outcomes

                                       

 

www.biomedorganics.de

 

NOTE: in order to redeem your perk you will have to choose your desired products before October 15th, 2018. You will be able to choose the products that you wish to receive from an Excel file, a PDF document, or directly from our online platform. You will receive the link and the files in your confirmetion e-mail by September 14th, 2018.

story:
Mist: Tapping into the Clouds

Mist represents an entirely new way of collecting water directly from the clouds. Our system is clean, efficient, sustainable, environmentally friendly…and so romantic!

Read our entire story and then join us in passionately creating something innovative, valuable, practical and affordable for California and other coastal regions of the world. You are also invited to build a humanitarian project with us.



Mist has focused on expanding and improving a technology that has been used successfully to harvest fog or the tiny water droplets in low-lying clouds. Little or none of this low-lying cloud water (also known as a marine layer) ever develops into measurable precipitation.

We have improved the efficiency of fog capture techniques so that a single tower with only a 17 square-foot base can collect over 250 gallons of water per day under optimal atmospheric conditions. Imagine what a multi-tower facility could produce in your community! 




We have designed the technology to collect water from the clouds or fog without a need for measurable precipitation (i.e., rain or snow). The technique is actually one borrowed from nature and could be considered a form of biomimicry or hydromimcry. Plants and some soils can utilize fog and mist as a water source by condensing the microscopic cloud droplets into liquid water on leaves or particles in order to create their own mini-irrigation systems. 


Our towers collect water similar to plants and soils through the use of special fabrics that are arranged as a series of mesh curtains capable of transforming the tiny droplets into larger drops. These drops then move downward by gravity to the the tower's collector, which channels flowing water into pipes that lead to natural filters and a holding tank. This entire process is completed without the use of electrical energy.

The collected fog or mist can be used for just about any application that requires a high quality water. Given the drought conditions in California, where aquifers and surface waters have been overexploited, we are interested in providing the region with local opportunities for people to conserve scarce water resources.

Water from these towers has been used to produce a small batch of bottled drinking water in Spain; however, the collection and filtration systems can be tailored to many other applications such as agriculture, livestock, fire protection, and domestic use (e.g., washing, irrigating gardens). We will offer our expertise and technology to design or build Mist Water Farms for communities, municipalities or businesses.


We believe that water shouldn't be a restricted commodity. Millions of people lack reliable access to clean water for their basic needs. There are certain regions where access to water is extremely difficult, and some of these regions possess climates that are conducive to seasonal fog production. As such, Mist Water Farms could be installed to provide additional clean water.

We will proudly donate 30% of the proceeds we collect during this campaign to the Mist Water Foundation, which is a non-profit organization focused on providing high quality water (via the Mist Water Farms) to communities with limited access to other sources of fresh water. The Foundation will be created as soon as the funds are received from this campaign. 

Mist is committed to the Foundation. We will fund the Mist Water Foundation (MWF) with a regular share of our profits each year. MWF will function as an independent entity that sponsors fundraising campaigns and collaborates with other NGOs to ensure this technology works for the people who need it most.

When you support this campaign, you are also supporting a humanitarian initiative that strives to make a better world by emulating the way that nature captures water from the cloud and mists.


The water collected from the low-lying clouds never touches the ground and, in fact, remains a largely unused resource for humans if it is not captured by a technique similar to ours.

Mist water collected on California's coastal hillsides originates in the surface waters of the Pacific Ocean that are located far upwind from populated coastal areas. Unique climatic conditions created by the cold ocean and warm land produce a marine layer that moves to and from coastal areas on the prevailing winds. We catch this fog water as it moves past the coastal hills and cliffs from the ocean.


Because the evaporation of seawater leaves most of the salts behind, mist water has a lower mineral content than many surface and ground waters. In addition, cloud water has a mineral "signature" reminiscent of its oceanic origin and is softer in composition than its earthbound counterparts. As a result of its low mineral content (less than 50 parts-per-million of dissolved salts), it serves as a unique potable water when treated and as high quality non-potable water for a wide range of other uses. 


Although specific atmospheric and topographic conditions are necessary to support the efficient operation of our water collection system, its applications are diverse. Any region where fog is consistently present for all or part of the day and winds commonly blow onshore is suitable for this technology.


Mist water systems do not require a power source or a complicated installation; hence, the only major necessities are a small plot of land upon which the towers can be manually raised and lowered. The tanks, filters and piping are simply designed, require no specialized components, and operate under the force of gravity.

Optimal sites include hilltops, coastal bluffs, and similar upslope locations on either private or public lands. Fog, temperature and wind maps are also useful in selecting the most productive sites. The towers are generally located at a higher elevation than the users so there is no need to mechanically pump water to its destination. 


We will build a Mist Water Farm in California to produce clean, high quality water. The size and production of the water farm will depend on the acreage that we can secure and a number of climatic parameters that vary from year to year. The goal is to build a  200-tower water farm with a potential capacity exceeding half a million gallons of water per year. We will subcontract bottling facilities and their associated services for whatever portion of the harvested fog is used for drinking water. 

The Mist Water Farm will also serve as a demonstration of the cloud water capture technology for those who may wish to build their own collection systems based on our model. We anticipate that the funds collected will be spent on the following tasks over the next 18 months. The allocation of funds for the various tasks will be shared will all the backers of this project:

  • Identifying Final Site: June-August 2016
  • Environmental Siting/Permitting: September-December 2016
  • Constructing Initial Water Farm: January-April 2017
  • Water Testing/Permitting: May-July 2017
  • Using/Enjoying the Water: August-December 2017

Although the timing of these tasks may appear somewhat extended, we want to be realistic about our expectations and transparent with our supporters. We may face unavoidable delays in siting or constructing the towers and permitting the water because ours represents a relatively new technology and an unconventional water source. In any case, the Foundation will be active from day one.

As soon as the project is funded, we will build a website to share the progress with our supporters, thus maintaining our commitment to integrity, transparency and responsibility. 

Ask for our exclusive SECRET perks should you want to have access to influence Mist.

You might be wondering about the identity of these cloud-catching guys and about why you would back this project. We have the answer to both questions.

INTRODUCING THE TEAM (from left to right):

  • Joan Porquer, Sales and Marketing Specialist. Joan has an undergraduate degree in Publicity Photography from IEFC Barcelona and formal training in Marketing and Sales. He speaks 5 languages and founded his first company at the age of 24. Joan has gathered experience in developing projects within industrial environments from their startup phases through the launch and initial marketing. After working more than 10 years in industrial sales and marketing (5 years in company management positions), Joan is now taking the lead on the Mist project. (LinkedIn: https://es.linkedin.com/in/joanporquer)

  • Ricardo Gil, Water Capture Expert and Designer. Ricardo is an Architectural Technologist who earned his undergraduate degree from La Laguna University, He also has Masters degrees in Environmental Auditing & Management and in Enology & Viticulture. Over the last decade, Ricardo methodically investigated the dynamics of mists and clouds in the Canary Islands, Spain. He has published articles in several journals and scientific news magazines on cloud water capture techniques and has researched the optimization of cloud water harvesting systems for more than 5 years. (LinkedIn: https://es.linkedin.com/in/ricardo-gil-casanova-39a13345/en)

  • D.L. 'West' Marrin, Ph.D. Scientist and Water Researcher. West is an applied scientist in the fields of biogeochemistry, pollutant dynamics, water resources, and aquatic ecology. His lectures focus on global water quality threats, water forensics, hydromimicry practices, and the water-energy-food nexus. He has established a multi-faceted water forum and served as an Adjunct Professor at San Diego State University. He currently works as an R&D advisor and scientific consultant to clients focused on water chemistry issues, potable water options and resource sustainability. (Website: www.dlmarrin.com)


REASONS TO SUPPORT THIS PROJECT

We are aware that some crowd-funded projects have ultimately failed in their execution. Whereas we cannot guarantee success, the team has years of experience in corporate and project management, market analysis, scheduling, subcontracting, purchasing, problem solving, technical troubleshooting, scientific data analysis, regulatory compliance and other skills that will be instrumental in making this project a success. 

Let's review some of the reasons that we are so enthusiastic about transforming clouds into usable water and that we look forward to your support:

  • Social Responsibility. Thinking globally, we want to make this technology available to people living in coastal arid regions who have limited access to affordable clean water. Whereas seawater desalination and conventional air-to-water technologies have been proposed as supplementary water sources, the costs of constructing, maintaining and powering these systems are often prohibitive. As such, these other technologies are often restricted to affluent populations living in industrialized nations. 
  • Resource Responsibility. Surface and groundwater resources in arid regions are often overexploited to the point that yearly variations in precipitation create catastrophic shortfalls in water availability. Our technology does not deplete the existing blue or green water supplies (using the terminology of water footprints) because water collected from coastal fog or mist rarely produces any measurable precipitation that would otherwise contribute to local water resources. Even the water used to rinse the towers and filters is collected from the clouds. 
  • Environmental Responsibility. Because our technology is powered largely by wind and gravity, its energy footprint is very small and related predominantly to the manufacture of its component materials. In addition, its environmental footprint is minimal because the installation occupies a relatively small area and produces no wastes. The height of the towers and area of the base can be adjusted to conform to diverse landscapes or settings. 
  • Fiscal Responsibility. Although we are in business to make a profit, our primary commitment is to expand the utilization of a potential water resource in arid coastal regions of the world. In doing so, we are committed to preserving the local environment and water resources, as well as the integrity of the land and communities within which our technology is implemented. A substantial portion of our profits will be directed toward R&D efforts to further advance this technology and to fund our Foundation.

Our contingency plan includes the consideration of risks, as well as appropriate preventative actions (P.A.) to minimize or avoid the risks and contingency actions (C.A.) to either deal with the risks or identify alternatives. 

  • Risks
  • Preventive actions (P.A.)
  • Contingency actions (C.A.)

The primary risks that we anticipate include the following:

  • Natural disasters: Storms, wildfires, earthquakes.

P.A. While we cannot predict or prevent natural disasters, the Mist towers can be easily raised and lowered by a single person. Hence, we can minimize damage from high winds or earthquakes when towers are in their non-operational position.

C.A. Should we need to rebuild our towers, the major damage is likely to be replacing the fabric mesh and, perhaps, sections of the aluminum frame. These materials are readily available and the towers can be rebuilt relatively quickly.

  • Financial issues: Insufficient capital.

P.A. We have used our technical experience in Spain and practical experience in California to estimate the costs associated with completing this project, and we believe that we have presented a realistic budget.

C.A. In the event that we encounter financial difficulties, we have the option of supplementing our crowdsourced funds with investments from venture capitalists. We have already spoken with several interested investors; however, we prefer to remain independent if it is feasible to do so.

  • Securing a suitable location.

P.A. We have already studied wind, temperature, humidity, topographic and other maps to narrow our selection of suitable sites. What we don't know yet is whether we can secure access to those sites (situated on private or public lands) through rentals, grants, or cooperative agreements.

C.A. There are many potential locations for siting the the Mist Water Farms, and one of our contingency actions is simply to select alternative sites. If we find there are financial issues with property owners, there are options for sharing the water or, if the water is sold, for sharing revenues from the water. 

  • Permitting a novel land use.

P.A. Upon finding a suitable site(s) and successfully negotiating an agreement with the property owners, the use of the land for harvesting cloud water will need to be permitted. This may include conventional land use disclosures as well as any environmental assessment reports that may be required. 

C.A. If the required permits or reports cannot be obtained within a reasonable timeframe or at an affordable cost, other sites (e.g., private land in lieu of public lands) or more easily permitted uses will be considered. 

  • Permitting an unconventional water use.

P.A. Whether the water is used for non-potable purposes or is treated and bottled as a drinking water, there will be a need to chemically characterize the water and permit it according to the existing regulations. The harvested cloud water will likely constitute a new category, which may delay the permitting processes.

C.A. Permits to use the water for non-potable uses (if required) will be obtained initially. Drinking water permits will subsequently be pursued. Provided that the water does not contain pollutants, permitting issues should not halt the project

FINAL CONTINGENCY

Given the worst case scenario that we are unable to produce water from California, we would still be able to provide our contributors bottled water from Mist's pilot water farm in the Canary Islands. Approximately 6 months would be required to approve the exportation of this water from Spain; however, we would uphold our commitment to the people who backed this campaign.

Mist: Tapping into the Clouds

Mist represents an entirely new way of collecting water directly from the clouds. Our system is clean, efficient, sustainable, environmentally friendly…and so romantic!
Read our entire story and then join us in passionately creating something innovative, valuable, practical and affordable for California and other coastal regions of the world. You are also invited to build a humanitarian project with us.




Mist has focused on expanding and improving a technology that has been used successfully to harvest fog or the tiny water droplets in low-lying clouds. Little or none of this low-lying cloud water (also known as a marine layer) ever develops into measurable precipitation.
We have improved the efficiency of fog capture techniques so that a single tower with only a 17 square-foot base can collect over 250 gallons of water per day under optimal atmospheric conditions. Imagine what a multi-tower facility could produce in your community! 





We have designed the technology to collect water from the clouds or fog without a need for measurable precipitation (i.e., rain or snow). The technique is actually one borrowed from nature and could be considered a form of biomimicry or hydromimcry. Plants and some soils can utilize fog and mist as a water source by condensing the microscopic cloud droplets into liquid water on leaves or particles in order to create their own mini-irrigation systems. 


Our towers collect water similar to plants and soils through the use of special fabrics that are arranged as a series of mesh curtains capable of transforming the tiny droplets into larger drops. These drops then move downward by gravity to the the tower's collector, which channels flowing water into pipes that lead to natural filters and a holding tank. This entire process is completed without the use of electrical energy.





The collected fog or mist can be used for just about any application that requires a high quality water. Given the drought conditions in California, where aquifers and surface waters have been overexploited, we are interested in providing the region with local opportunities for people to conserve scarce water resources.
Water from these towers has been used to produce a small batch of bottled drinking water in Spain; however, the collection and filtration systems can be tailored to many other applications such as agriculture, livestock, fire protection, and domestic use (e.g., washing, irrigating gardens). We will offer our expertise and technology to design or build Mist Water Farms for communities, municipalities or businesses.



We believe that water shouldn't be a restricted commodity. Millions of people lack reliable access to clean water for their basic needs. There are certain regions where access to water is extremely difficult, and some of these regions possess climates that are conducive to seasonal fog production. As such, Mist Water Farms could be installed to provide additional clean water.

When you support this campaign, you are also supporting a humanitarian initiative that strives to make a better world by emulating the way that nature captures water from the cloud and mists.



The water collected from the low-lying clouds never touches the ground and, in fact, remains a largely unused resource for humans if it is not captured by a technique similar to ours.

In addition, cloud water has a mineral "signature" reminiscent of its oceanic origin and is softer in composition than its earthbound counterparts. As a result of its low mineral content (less than 50 parts-per-million of dissolved salts), it serves as a unique potable water when treated and as high quality non-potable water for a wide range of other uses.

Any region where fog is consistently present for all or part of the day and winds commonly blow onshore is suitable for this technology.

The tanks, filters and piping are simply designed, require no specialized components, and operate under the force of gravity.

Constructing Initial Water Farm: January-April 2017

Water Testing/Permitting: May-July 2017

Using/Enjoying the Water: August-December 2017


Although the timing of these tasks may appear somewhat extended, we want to be realistic about our expectations and transparent with our supporters. We may face unavoidable delays in siting or constructing the towers and permitting the water because ours represents a relatively new technology and an unconventional water source. In any case, the Foundation will be active from day one.

Risks
Preventive actions (P.A.)

Contingency actions (C.A.)


The primary risks that we anticipate include the following:

P.A. While we cannot predict or prevent natural disasters, the Mist towers can be easily raised and lowered by a single person. Hence, we can minimize damage from high winds or earthquakes when towers are in their non-operational position.

story:
Resumen

?
    Con este producto innovador llamado pro-pill , lo que pretendemos es hacer la vida de las personas mayores más fácil, mediante la distribución automática de los medicamentos. Nuestro producto tiene un fácil manejo para que les resulte fácil su uso. A la hora programada la pastilla prevista será dispensada, hora que podrá ser vista en el display del producto. Pro-pill tiene que estar conectado a la corriente en todo momento, haciéndolo un producto familiar y habitual al cabo de los días. Cuando el número de fármacos vaya descendiendo y queden pocos, el producto emitirá una notificación para que el usuario proceda a su compra en la farmacia.?

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

?

Necesitamos toda la ayuda posible para comenzar a fabricar los prototipos y a la vez comprar los materiales y herramientas necesarios.

Sabemos que estas cantidades son elevadas, pero aceptamos con gran gusto donaciones más pequeñas.?

El impacto

Nuestro proyecto  es diferencial a los demás ya que estará fabricado con materiales de nueva disposición, de diseño sencillo, ligero, de fácil uso y fabricado con un código programable.??

Riesgos y desafíos

Nuestro desafío es fabricar un dispositivo que ayude a organizar la toma de farmacos a todo aquel que lo necesite, está diriguido principalmente a las personas de mayor edad y también a aquellas que sufren alzehimer.
El riesgo principal al que nos enfretamos es al desuso de las nuevas tecnologías por las personas mayores. 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

?

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no podaís ayudar

    ?
  • Pídele a la gente que difunda tu campaña y que genere eco.
    • ?
  • Recuérdales que usen las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

    Retwitear nuestros tweets de  https://twitter.com/

story:
Why We Made iSpin Turbo

Last year, the fidget spinner has been very popular, and iSpin with its quality and innovative spinners is well known by the world. But now the fidget spinner trend is gone. And customers are asking for new toys with innovative design. We have keep on developing new toys that can meet the customer needs. With half year research and development, now we are ready to introduce the iSpin Turbo to all the customers. 

 

Media

 

What is iSpin Turbo

iSpin Turbo is a new toy for everyone, especially children will have the most fun to play with it. It is made of quality plastic with 2 top class bearings built in side. You can start the spin with a string come with the product. 

 

The iSpin Turbo can spin on both sides, once the engine is on, you can pick it up and flip it over, the spin will continue. You can flip it over and over again, even throw it in the air, the spin will go on and on. 

 

You can play with the iSpin Turbo almost everywhere you can imagine. No matter it is on the desk, ground, or even on your hands, it will spin like a beast. 

 

Play tricks with the iSpin Turbo is a lot of fun, it can stand and spin on the top of your finger. Once you practice a little bit, you can throw it from one hand to the other, and the spin will never stop. 

 

Please Help Us Sharing iSpin Turbo

With half year research and development, now iSpin Turbo is ready for mass production. Please help us to share iSpin Turbo and Facebook, Twitter and other social media you have. Every little help!! 

                          

 

Why Support iSpin

iSpin was founded by a group of like-minded professionals who have experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based in Shenzhen and Hong Kong China. We are confidence with the Indiegogo project as we got a lot experience in our project iSpin fidget spinner,Below is the link for our previous Indiegogo campaign: 

https://goo.gl/wcafkp

 

Contact iSpin

If you have any questions or want to distribute iSpin Turbo, please send an email to: marketing@ispin.cc 

 

FAQs

1, When the iSpin Turbo will ship out? 

If our campaign is success, we will ship out the products around 20th March 2018. 

2, What are the iSpin Turbo is made of? 

The iSpin Turbo is made of good quality plastic with top class bearing built inside. 

3, Which type of the bearing the iSpin Turbo use? 

We use 2 high quality stainless steel R188 bearings inside iSpin Turbo. 

4, I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute the iSpin? 

You can simply send an email to marketing@ispin.cc, we will take care of it. 

 

Please Help Us Sharing iSpin Turbo

With half year research and development, now iSpin Turbo is ready for mass production. Please help us to share iSpin Turbo and Facebook, Twitter and other social media you have. Every little help!!
story_txt:
Why We Made iSpin TurboLast year, the fidget spinner has been very popular, and iSpin with its quality and innovative spinners is well known by the world. But now the fidget spinner trend is gone. And customers are asking for new toys with innovative design. We have keep on developing new toys that can meet the customer needs. With half year research and development, now we are ready to introduce the iSpin Turbo to all the customers.  Media What is iSpin TurboiSpin Turbo is a new toy for everyone, especially children will have the most fun to play with it. It is made of quality plastic with 2 top class bearings built in side. You can start the spin with a string come with the product.  The iSpin Turbo can spin on both sides, once the engine is on, you can pick it up and flip it over, the spin will continue. You can flip it over and over again, even throw it in the air, the spin will go on and on.  You can play with the iSpin Turbo almost everywhere you can imagine. No matter it is on the desk, ground, or even on your hands, it will spin like a beast.  Play tricks with the iSpin Turbo is a lot of fun, it can stand and spin on the top of your finger. Once you practice a little bit, you can throw it from one hand to the other, and the spin will never stop.  Please Help Us Sharing iSpin TurboWith half year research and development, now iSpin Turbo is ready for mass production. Please help us to share iSpin Turbo and Facebook, Twitter and other social media you have. Every little help!!                            Why Support iSpiniSpin was founded by a group of like-minded professionals who have experiences collectively from all over the world. The company is currently based in Shenzhen and Hong Kong China. We are confidence with the Indiegogo project as we got a lot experience in our project iSpin fidget spinner,Below is the link for our previous Indiegogo campaign: https://goo.gl/wcafkp Contact iSpinIf you have any questions or want to distribute iSpin Turbo, please send an email to: marketing@ispin.cc  FAQs
1, When the iSpin Turbo will ship out? 
If our campaign is success, we will ship out the products around 20th March 2018. 
2, What are the iSpin Turbo is made of? 
The iSpin Turbo is made of good quality plastic with top class bearing built inside. 
3, Which type of the bearing the iSpin Turbo use? 
We use 2 high quality stainless steel R188 bearings inside iSpin Turbo. 
4, I am a wholesaler, who should I speak to if we want to distribute the iSpin? 
You can simply send an email to marketing@ispin.cc, we will take care of it.

With half year research and development, now iSpin Turbo is ready for mass production. Please help us to share iSpin Turbo and Facebook, Twitter and other social media you have. Every little help!!

story:
Imagine what it would feel like to be able to reach your entire back easily. To apply soaps, moisturizers, medicinal creams and suntan lotion effectively. To reach all areas of your body effortlessly.
How would you feel having healthy youthful skin?

 

People cannot reach their own back...it is actually impossible!

 

We have the perfect solution within one product that can solve all these needs.

Ergonomically designed to contour to the spine, 24” fold-able wand handle reaches all body parts effortlessly. Use to apply lotions & cleanse in bath. Organic hypo-allergenic head pieces include: natural cotton terry cloth, soft medicinal cloth & a natural sisal cloth (for exfoliating & using in the bath). A rubber grip form fits to fingers perfectly, maneuvers wand in any direction. Quality made in USA. A separate pommel piece fits all head pieces. Removable cloths are sanitary and easy to use.

Quality made natural sisal with pommel (hand held) attachment, exfoliating skin cells. The sisal is made from the fibers of the aloe plant.

Can use folded or extended.

Fingers fit perfectly to rubber grip – to maneuver wand in all directions easily

Organic hypo-allergenic

Quality made cotton terry, soft cloth and natural sisal (tightly woven sisal, made from aloe plant fibers).

Includes separate pommel piece, interchangeable with all cloth head attachments.

 

I HAD AN IDEA...

                                                    

 

 

 

 

Our manufacturing team is located in beautiful Colorado!!!!

 

This is Bill...head of operations. In our state of the art manufacturing site.

 

                                                     
 

 

Head of Team Marketing & Business Adviser 

Darrell Walker's professional life as a successful business owner and coach has provided him with a wealth of knowledge to share with his clients.  He is always willing to share his extensive life experience to help lead others to their goals. His greatest attribute is his ability to add balance and focus to entrepreneurs by helping them achieve laser like focus on their business while, reminding them that the success they achieve in business, must also transfer to their personal life. He has the keen ability to listen to his clients and provide honest and real feedback that helps them see the best path forward.

Darrell is a board-certified coach and is certified in performance and relationship coaching. Having coached business professionals for over 10 years, Darrell has received recognition and accolades from his peers and clients. Since joining our company, Darrell currently travels the United States providing clients with coaching and one on one mentoring to develop customized business plans to maximize sales, profits, and attract potential investors.

Darrell attended Louisiana State University. He has also had the privilege to learn from great business minds like Keith Cunningham, Robert Kiyosaki, Bill Gates and Tony Robbins.

Favorite quote: “Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.” – Henry Ford.

 

The Timeline...

Why is Soothe Your Skin different from anything else on the market?

 

We saw a real need in the marketplace to create a quality made Bath & Lotion applicator system. Our product is unique and ergonomically designed to contour perfectly to the spine. The 24" wand handle can reach all body parts easily. 
Our product is not just a lotion applicator nor just a bath product...it is BOTH!
Plus it has a quality made sisal piece to exfoliate and remove dead skin cells.
It truly is a healthy skin system!

 

A Quick Comparison

 

  Other Types
Synthetic cheaper materials
Not organic or hypo-allergenic
Not a bath AND lotion applicator system
Made overseas

Not made to be sanitary
No ergonomic - body contour design
Cannot fold to use differently
No rubber grip to form fit to fingers
or maneuver in any direction
No pommel piece
No scalp massage or bristle brush
No storage and carrying bag
No color choices

 

How to use the applicator and pommel attachment

                                                                                                   
                                                   
                                                        
                                                     

 

 
 
 

Testimonials

 Soothe~Your~Skin lotion applicator system is the ideal solution for healthy skin. It works perfectly for applying medical creams…I recommend this product to all my clients.
 – Donald A Parish Jr. MD, Dermatologist

“Love the organic hypo-allergenic variety of cloth head attachments. The quality sisal is awesome!! This system is perfect for maintaining healthy skin. It is easy to use and is much needed in dry climate areas, too. I can transport product and more in the very handy zippered bag that is included. 
– Kelly Franco, RN. San Diego, CA

I love using the quality sisal attachment in the shower with the wand handle, especially to reach my back. So easy to use!!!
~ Babs Oliver, Realtor. Castle Rock, CO

 

Dr. Will Feldman...Testimonial

                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                       

                                                                                              

 

 

 

 

 
About the creator of
 
 

 

  How far our team has come to this point and why your contribution is so important and  
what it will accomplish in the marketplace!            

                                                       
 

          For your contribution today we are offering great perks!

Other ways YOU can also help promote my campaign and show others how they too can have healthy skin...

Please get the word out and share my campaign with your friends using this
Indiegogo link!! Simply copy and paste, send to your friends via Facebook, twitter or email.   https://bit.ly/2NnY4ON

story:
Man does not live by food alone . . . he also lives on light.

"One third of the energy your body consumes comes from the food you eat. The vast majority of the energy your body needs to maintain systemic equilibrium comes from environmental infrared light exposure."

—Dr. Alexander Wunsch, MD, PhD,

World Class Expert on Photobiology

~ ~ ~

The true full-spectrum of natural light energy —balanced with both visible and invisible light— is essential for the development, growth and maintenance of a healthy body and mind.

Natural light stimulates the metabolic activity of cells to create a process similar to plant photosynthesis whereby plants use chlorophyll to convert sunlight into cellular building blocks.The light is absorbed by the cells and produces an amazing cascade of events...

  • Every metabolic process, enzyme reaction, muscular movement, the digestion of food and the burning of fat are augmented by sunlight energy.
  • A reduction of natural light energy causes a slowdown in these processes that leads to decreased metabolism, reduced burning of fat, reduced vitality & compromised immunity.

Enlighten Someone You Love!

Health care costs are out of control, obesity is epidemic and depression is the leading cause of ill health and disability worldwide. Depression alone affects an estimated 350 million people globally, including more than 16 million Americans, 6 million of whom are seniors.

We're on a mission to raise awareness of mal-illumination, a contemporary syndrome that impacts obesity, depression, fatigue, sleep and many other serious health conditions.

Our mandate is to provide leading edge technology that reduces the risk of this silent epidemic.

  • Mal-illumination is unwittingly affecting millions of people that are truly in the dark about their health!
  • Not enough balanced, natural light and too much artificial light disrupts brain chemistry, metabolism and vital circadian rhythms that control appetite, energy, mood, sleep, libido and more.

“Mal-illumination is to Light as Malnutrition is to Food ”  

— Dr. John Ott
~ ~ ~

We're raising awareness and remedying mal-illumination by designing and providing the . . .

 'Fullest' —Spectrum Therapeutic Light

We originally founded Ott Light Systems, Santa Barbara, California in 1987 with the approval and support of the father of full-spectrum light (FSL) technology, Dr. John Ott.

Repurposed as Science of Light (SOL), we are now a 501(c)(3) non-profit on a mission to enlighten humanity. SOL is pleased to have a patent pending that builds on and improves Dr. Ott's original FSL technology.

"We have finally learned that light is a nutrient much like food, and like food, the wrong kind can make us ill and the right kind can help keep us well."

— Dr. John Ott
HEALTH AND LIGHT

3,000,000+ copies sold

SOLshine Photo-Nutrition™ —light activated health

Patent pending SOLshine provides both 'visible & invisible' light akin to balanced, natural sunshine.

 

 

  • 'Fullest' -Spectrum LED
  • 97 CRI (Minimum)
  • 5000 Kelvin
  • Near Infrared (NIR)
  • Trace UV
  • PAR 38
  • 25 Watt
  • Remote control

Essential NIR is missing in other lights.

Sunlight is loaded with red and NIR light. LED light exposure that’s not balanced like the sun  — can be damaging  to human biology... especially your eyes.

  • NIR helps prime the cells in your retina for ‘repair and regeneration’ and helps reduce the risk of macular degeneration.
  • NIR is also vital to the production of ATP (adenosine triphosphate) in your mitochondria.
  • Mitochondria may be considered the power generators of the cell, converting oxygen and nutrients into energy.
  • ATP is the fuel cells need for all of their varied functions including metabolism.
  • Molecules that absorb infrared light are found in your mitochondria and assist with the production of ATP.

Not all full-spectrum light is created equal.

SOLshine emits light (combined) from several different leading-edge LED chip sources. The Spectral Power Distribution (SPD) graph below, primarily represents SOLshine’s visible spectrum LED component. SOLshine’s proprietary near infrared LEDs are not displayed.

SOLshine Purple LED vs. Common Blue LED

SOLshine Photo-Nutrition utilizes leading edge 'purple' LED technology vs. potentially hazardous blue LED technology.

SOLshine Photo-Nutrition advances FSL technology with critical, invisible wavelengths for optimal health benefits: 

  • A trace of the ultraviolet (UV) light you actually need!
  • Essential near infrared light (NIR)

97 CRI (color rendering index) average

 

Like no other biologically beneficial light bulb.

Partial list of associated light research:

  • Reduces the risk of EMF radiation
  • Reduces stress/burnout
  • Benefits cognitive function
  • Enhances vitamin absorption
  • Reduces unhealthy sleep cycles
  • Reduces the risk of retinal inflammation
  • Increases testosterone/enhances libido
  1. Index A-L
  2. Index M-Z

USER GUIDE: 

Most any floor task light, like the example depicted below, is recommended as a convenient light therapy 'delivery system' for SOLshine Photo-Nutrition.

"A good light box shines down at your eyes from above and provides a broad field of illumination allowing for flexible activities.”

—Michael Terman, PhD

Director of the Center for Light Treatment and Biological Rhythms, Columbia University Medical Center

Backed by Science

Use daily to counter mal-illumination & reduce your risk of disease.

  • Sun Up — Lights On
  • Sun Down — Lights Dim/Off
  • Position SOLshine 18-36" from user. Aim down toward the face & eyes. 
  • Bathe in morning' light (20-30 min.) to sync circadian rhythms to nature.
  • When eating, reading, exercising or relaxing.
  • Especially while working at a computer or using a cell phone.
  • May also be used as desired for an energy boost much like a cup of coffee.

Founders:

  • Ott Light Systems, Inc. 1987
  • Science of Light 501(c)(3) 2012

What We Need

  • Engineering is basically complete.
  • Manufacturing is primed.
  • $50,000 is required to launch.

What You Get

  • SOLshine Photo-Nutrition™   —Light Activated Health

 

Risk and Assurance

If we do not reach our fixed goal, funds raised will be returned.

Biologically beneficial light pioneers since 1987, we've developed and/or distributed three full-spectrum brands: Ott Light System, Winter Bright and Natural Bright bioLight Systems.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't join us!

  • Help us get the the word out.
  • Make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Did I mention share, share, share any way you can?

ENLIGHTEN SOMEONE YOU LOVE!

. . . Thank You
