story:
[Origin Story]

In January of 2016, at 22 years old, an unplanned trip to the emergency room followed by a 36-hour stint in the ICU resulted in my diagnosis of Type 1 Diabetes.

Receiving this diagnosis during what was supposed to be my last semester as an undergraduate Pre-Medicine student acquiring a degree in Biology with a minor in Chemistry was not easy. Over the last few months I have been learning about and adjusting to life as a diabetic.

This diagnosis revealed a desire within me to learn as much as I can about my disease for the improvement in the quality of my life as well as the lives of others and ultimately led me to further my education at Kent State in pursuit of a Master's Degree in Human Biology.

After graduating with my Master's in May of 2018, I will matriculate to Kent State University's College of Podiatric Medicine class of 2022 where I hope my personal experiences and acquired knowledge will uplift and empower those that need support living with diabetes while pursuing higher education as well as highly demanding careers.

 

[Assimilate Success through your Diet]

 

[What are Nootropics?]

 

[Diabetics Rely on the Maintenance of Blood Glucose via Diet]

 

[Competitors Products Lack Nootropic Ingredients and Lack Medicinal CBD]

 

[Our Solution - Easily Portable Nootropic CBD Enhanced TwiceToastedTreats]

 

[What is CBD?]

 

[CBD Receptors are Located in Various Tissues from the Brain to the Bones]

 

[Receptor Locations Allow CBD to Function as Medication for Numerous Ailments]

Although TwiceToastedTreats will be formulated to benefit Diabetics, due to CBD's extensive list of medicinal properties the treats pain relieving and symptom reversing qualities are applicable to a medley of disorders.

[Where will we get our CBD from?]

The best products come from the highest quality ingredients, "Not All Hemp is Created Equal" and Folium Biosciences remains a leader in the industry of CBD rich hemp cultivation and distribution.

[How will we get our product to our customers?]

Utilizing e-commerce services such as Fulfilment by Amazon, Shopify, Wix and/or Volusion in conjunction with our already purchased domain "www.TwiceToastedTreats.com" will provide our customers with the convenient online storefront necessary to easily browse, purchase, rate and review our products.

[Company Vision: A Treat for the World]

We believe more than enough money can be generated via Cannabis Sales, Cultivation and Education such that no single individual has to pay full price for Insulin via our ICLP CashBack Program.

Non-profit efforts would go towards funding the Insulin Cashback Loyalty Program as well as the eventual decentralization of Insulin Production and Redistribution.

“Practical, world-shifting change occurs at the intersection of physical limitation and mental determination. Our goal is to work for the sick and cultivate an ecosystem of limbic communication - a collective consciousness evicting unfair healthcare business practices.”  - CEO Tanaka Mupinga

 

[Financial Projection and Target Demographic]

1) People Living with Diabetes

In 2012, the global diabetes market yielded $28.1 billion in sales. Currently, 29.1 Million Americans have been diagnosed with Diabetes with the predicted increase in disease prevalence, global sales are expected to grow to $67.7 billion in 2022.

 

2) Knowledge Seeking Society

“Knowledge is Power and Nootropics make Learning easier.”

Students and Individuals aiming to achieve success in highly competitive fields will be able to supplement their efforts with an easily portable, storable, healthy and hunger quenching food-bar.

 

3) Retirement trends and the Baby Boomer Generation

Aging is unavoidable and Pain Management substances infused with TwiceToastedTreats can be provided without a prescription, and are available without insurance in the form of great tasting lozenges that can be easily consumed by the Elderly (Geriatrics).

 

4) Patient Preferred Pain Relief for most Chronic illnesses

"40% of Americans have difficulty swallowing pills."

Medication in the form of food and/or candy allows patients to feel like everyone else instead of constantly carrying around and/or swallowing pills.

In addition, alternative non-addictive means of Pain Management such as CBD have the potential to impact the so-called Opioid Epidemic affecting the United States.

 

 

[Startup Costs]

 

[Contact Information]

 

[Prototype]

"At 24 years old - I have a degree in Biology with minor in Chemistry (2016)  and recently earned a Master's Degree with a concentration in Human Biology (2018). When they ask me how I did it...my answer will be "TwiceToastedTreats". - CEO Tanaka Mupinga

Nootropic CBD Granola bars are easily portable with a shelf life of 6 to 8 months.

Nootropic CBD Lozenges have a shelf life of 14 months.

[Logo]

For me, aesthetics are a large part of this company. I wanted a symbol that incorporated everything my brand stands for.
.
The Flower - CBD (Cannabidiol) extracted from the Cannabis plant will forever have a place in my medical toolbox as the main, multipurpose, active ingredient of the treats.
.
The Ankh - The center Leaf of the flower and central "T" form an Ankh - an ancient Egyptian hieroglyphic ideograph symbolizing "life". Doing it for the culture!
.
The Rod of Asclepius/Caduceus/DNA Helix - Intertwined with the Flower, the Ankh and the central T, the Caduceus, and DNA inspired helix is also meant to resemble plant roots.
.
Three T's - the writer in me will always be a fan of alliteration

 

 

---------------------------------------------

Future Objectives

--------------------------------------------------------

 

[Pain Management Garden (Teach a Man to Fish)]

Tertiary Objective (2025-Onward)

A "Pain Management Garden" is where the misfortune of the genetic lottery meets the good fortune of an organization where the means to successful pain management is its end. For many years, organizations have been profiting from diabetics and other patients whose disorders are genetic in nature.

Now - the chronically ill have an opportunity to profit from their circumstance - to profit from their pain. Patients who are able would be given resources to grow their own medication via hemp cultivation – the opportunity to become “Pain Management Tenders."

“Our agricultural methods, with a focus on sustainability, will be openly shared in a digestible and easily repeatable fashion – the way we cultivate our plants and produce our treats will be shared with our customers so that they may generate profit as a means to fund their monthly medical expenses – Teach a Man to Successfully cultivate CBD hemp and the side effect revenue can be used to purchase insulin...

...I imagine a world where people can have a Genetic Predisposition to a stream of income – Biological Royalty – where Diabetes is the bequeathed Bloodline.” - CEO Tanaka Mupinga

 

[Operation Johnny Appleseed (Self-Expanding Philosophy)]

Quaternary Objective (2030 - Onward)

“The Johnny Appleseed of CBD Hemp”

It is our belief that misinformation and ignorance have led to a number of drug-related epidemics across the world. Operation “Johnny Appleseed” aims to provide Pain Management Garden “Tenders” access to an insightful and revolutionary application - the Quora/LinkedIn of local CBD Hemp cultivation.

With the potential to create community building opportunities - Groups of 3 to 5 “Tenders” can network, brainstorm new agricultural techniques and most importantly get armed with the vocabulary and personal experience to facilitate healthy dialogue as it relates to Addiction, Cannabis, Pain Management, and Responsible Drug use.

 

“Ultimately, I hope people use our app to set up  'Hemp Lemonade Stands' all around their communities. Spread Love, Laughter, Positivity and Accurate Information as it relates to one of the most underrated medicinal plants known to man.” - CEO Tanaka Mupinga

 

[Free Seeds]

Quinary Objective (2030 – Onward)

Where applicable and legal, an additional rewards program for loyal customers in the form of free seeds will be available.

A decision made with sustainability in mind – this policy will ensure no plant materials go to waste and reduce the number of plants grown from stockpile/old seed.

“We believe it is our responsibility not to hoard any money or resources - our specialty will be starting new life while successfully managing the pain in our own lives.” – CEO Tanaka Mupinga
story_txt: [Origin Story]In January of 2016, at 22 years old, an unplanned trip to the emergency room followed by a 36-hour stint in the ICU resulted in my diagnosis of Type 1 Diabetes.Receiving this diagnosis during what was supposed to be my last semester as an undergraduate Pre-Medicine student acquiring a degree in Biology with a minor in Chemistry was not easy. Over the last few months I have been learning about and adjusting to life as a diabetic.This diagnosis revealed a desire within me to learn as much as I can about my disease for the improvement in the quality of my life as well as the lives of others and ultimately led me to further my education at Kent State in pursuit of a Master's Degree in Human Biology.After graduating with my Master's in May of 2018, I will matriculate to Kent State University's College of Podiatric Medicine class of 2022 where I hope my personal experiences and acquired knowledge will uplift and empower those that need support living with diabetes while pursuing higher education as well as highly demanding careers. [Assimilate Success through your Diet] [What are Nootropics?] [Diabetics Rely on the Maintenance of Blood Glucose via Diet] [Competitors Products Lack Nootropic Ingredients and Lack Medicinal CBD] [Our Solution - Easily Portable Nootropic CBD Enhanced TwiceToastedTreats] [What is CBD?] [CBD Receptors are Located in Various Tissues from the Brain to the Bones] [Receptor Locations Allow CBD to Function as Medication for Numerous Ailments]Although TwiceToastedTreats will be formulated to benefit Diabetics, due to CBD's extensive list of medicinal properties the treats pain relieving and symptom reversing qualities are applicable to a medley of disorders.[Where will we get our CBD from?]The best products come from the highest quality ingredients, "Not All Hemp is Created Equal" and Folium Biosciences remains a leader in the industry of CBD rich hemp cultivation and distribution.[How will we get our product to our customers?]Utilizing e-commerce services such as Fulfilment by Amazon, Shopify, Wix and/or Volusion in conjunction with our already purchased domain "www.TwiceToastedTreats.com" will provide our customers with the convenient online storefront necessary to easily browse, purchase, rate and review our products.[Company Vision: A Treat for the World]We believe more than enough money can be generated via Cannabis Sales, Cultivation and Education such that no single individual has to pay full price for Insulin via our ICLP CashBack Program.Non-profit efforts would go towards funding the Insulin Cashback Loyalty Program as well as the eventual decentralization of Insulin Production and Redistribution.“Practical, world-shifting change occurs at the intersection of physical limitation and mental determination. Our goal is to work for the sick and cultivate an ecosystem of limbic communication - a collective consciousness evicting unfair healthcare business practices.”  - CEO Tanaka Mupinga [Financial Projection and Target Demographic]1) People Living with DiabetesIn 2012, the global diabetes market yielded $28.1 billion in sales. Currently, 29.1 Million Americans have been diagnosed with Diabetes with the predicted increase in disease prevalence, global sales are expected to grow to $67.7 billion in 2022. 2) Knowledge Seeking Society“Knowledge is Power and Nootropics make Learning easier.”Students and Individuals aiming to achieve success in highly competitive fields will be able to supplement their efforts with an easily portable, storable, healthy and hunger quenching food-bar. 3) Retirement trends and the Baby Boomer GenerationAging is unavoidable and Pain Management substances infused with TwiceToastedTreats can be provided without a prescription, and are available without insurance in the form of great tasting lozenges that can be easily consumed by the Elderly (Geriatrics). 4) Patient Preferred Pain Relief for most Chronic illnesses"40% of Americans have difficulty swallowing pills."Medication in the form of food and/or candy allows patients to feel like everyone else instead of constantly carrying around and/or swallowing pills.In addition, alternative non-addictive means of Pain Management such as CBD have the potential to impact the so-called Opioid Epidemic affecting the United States.  [Startup Costs] [Contact Information] [Prototype]"At 24 years old - I have a degree in Biology with minor in Chemistry (2016)  and recently earned a Master's Degree with a concentration in Human Biology (2018). When they ask me how I did it...my answer will be "TwiceToastedTreats". - CEO Tanaka MupingaNootropic CBD Granola bars are easily portable with a shelf life of 6 to 8 months.Nootropic CBD Lozenges have a shelf life of 14 months.[Logo]For me, aesthetics are a large part of this company. I wanted a symbol that incorporated everything my brand stands for..The Flower - CBD (Cannabidiol) extracted from the Cannabis plant will forever have a place in my medical toolbox as the main, multipurpose, active ingredient of the treats..The Ankh - The center Leaf of the flower and central "T" form an Ankh - an ancient Egyptian hieroglyphic ideograph symbolizing "life". Doing it for the culture!.The Rod of Asclepius/Caduceus/DNA Helix - Intertwined with the Flower, the Ankh and the central T, the Caduceus, and DNA inspired helix is also meant to resemble plant roots..Three T's - the writer in me will always be a fan of alliteration  ---------------------------------------------Future Objectives-------------------------------------------------------- [Pain Management Garden (Teach a Man to Fish)]Tertiary Objective (2025-Onward)A "Pain Management Garden" is where the misfortune of the genetic lottery meets the good fortune of an organization where the means to successful pain management is its end. story:
Runtopia advocates you to run with real BONUS！You can easily get coins by your steps and exchange for sports equipment on Runtopia App.

Based on the workout habits of over 15 million Runtopians, the S1 watch is designed and engineered to bring you a new lifestyle of sports. With the S1 Watch on your wrist, you can monitor your heart rate data, track your workouts of many kinds and stay connected without holding a phone. There are many things else you can do with it. Stay healthy, active, and connected with Runtopia S1 GPS Smart Sports Watch.

The Runtopia Sports XOS system and the 9-axis motion sensor on board allow you to receive real-time voice reminders to correct your fitness motions as if you are working out next to a professional coach. In addition, the Runtopia App offers you the freedom to stream live courses online, so you can workout with famous coaches and encouraging peers from the comfort of your living room, your office, or anywhere else.

With over 15,000,000 worldwide Runtopia users whom you can interact with, you will never get bored from working out.

Pair your S1 Watch with your mobile to achieve extended capabilities. Even if you exercise without your mobile aside, your workout data can be automatically uploaded onto the Runtopia app on your mobile.

To provide you with better coverage and heightened tracking accuracy of fine movements in challenging environments, our dual-positioning system combines both GPS and GLONASS satellite networks.

Whether you are in the city or in the outdoors, the S1 Watch can precisely record your trajectory, mileage, altitude, stride rate, running pace, and other professional motion data.

The S1 Watch is serious about your wellbeing. Our onboard real-time display of heart rate data and heart rate interval analysis enable you to scientifically analyze and regulate training intensity to achieve your training objectives more effectively. The Watch also tracks your blood pressure and blood oxygen saturation. The incorporated sedentary reminder adds a function to remind you to move and stretch when it detects you have been sitting long. 

With an expanded exercise library database, the S1 Watch offers tracking over six sports modes, including running, cycling, fitness walking, and even swimming. The multi-sports modes cover most exercises from recreational workout to professional triathlon. The four modes， swimming, fitness walking, cycling, walking can be tracked after an upgrade.

One charge of the S1 Watch lasts for up of 25 days. The Watch can track and record your exercises for 15 consecutive hours with the GPS mode turned on, which is long enough to complete 4 full marathon races.

The feature of magnetic charging reduces plug-in and out times so as to prolong the service life of the charging cable as well as the watch. 

If you are a surfer, a swimmer, or just someone who likes to get wet, the waterproof S1 Watch is a good solution to your workout. With a water pressure score of 30 meters, the watch can track your swimming and diving as well as it tracks other exercises on the ground.

Having passed a 48-hour salt spray test of high temperature and high corrosion, the S1 watch works well in extreme weather conditions from -10°C to 50°C.

You can also access real-time mobile notifications, call, and message alerts.  Runtopia S1 has also the functions of the weather forecast, compass, stopwatch, timer, alarm clock. With the extra layer of functionality added to your S1 Watch, you no longer need to store a phone in your pocket during the workout, when you already have all that you need on your wrist.

The delicate design of Runtopia S1  makes it suitable for all circumstances. 

The watch strap, made out of medical-grade rubber, is lightweight, soft, and can be washed free of any sand, salt water, and sweat. The watchstrap drapes smoothly across your wrist and comes in comfortable contact with your skin. The compression-molded perforations add breathability to the skin around the watch during sweaty workouts. 

The Exclusive Offer $79 (MSRP $169)
We are giving out great deals to our Indiegogo backers. The more you buy, the more you save.


Runtopia creates a new lifestyle in sports. We bring smart sports to the world by providing our users with a complete smart sports experience, which enables our users to track their runs at any occasion, and combines professional audio coaches with customized training plans for races, weight loss, general fitness, and another high-level coaching. We aim to provide global users with more refined sports services.

crowdfunding@runtopia.net

story:
WE HAVE ALREADY FUNDED 100+ ON OUR OWN SITE'S PRE-SALE!!!

Global Shave Clubs has succesfully completed replicas of the 1965 Gillette Tech and the 1949 Gillette Super Speed. But now, we have turned our attention to the much sought after Gillette Model 195 Fat Boy.

Founded in 2016, Golbal Shave Clubs prides itself on the 14 different razors that we have introduced, mostly original designs, and of course the replica razors that we also produce. We also have over 1,000 happy customers. We are proud of what we have accomplished, and prouder still of the accomplishments we have yet to achieve.

OUR GOAL IS TO FUND ANOTHER 200 IN THIS CAMPAIGN.

We leaked to a few of our YouTube Reviewers that we were going to go live with this campaign in March and much to our surprise, the cat got let out of the bag eaarly. We were innondated with emails begging us to create a pre-sale on our website. Much to our delight, 100+ Fat Boy Replicas were sold in just a few days.

  • In order to achieve our goal we only need to receive funding for another 200 razors. The production sample is already made and we are in the middle of finishing the tooling required to create our first production run of 200 razors.
  • For those who support this campaign, we will include 20 Canadian Shaverboy razor blades and a beautiful faux leather case.
  • Funds will go to finish the development of the required tooling and to begin manufacture. In the unlikely event that the campaign does not reach at least 60% of its goal, we will send you a Repli Speed razor, our Tobacco Road Shave Soap, and our Model 850 22 inch Synthetic Shave Brush, a $100 value.

 

Your contribution will help ressurect on of the most desired adjustable safety razors of all time.

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

We have assumed most of the risk ourselves by funding the creation of a preproduction model, and tooling for making the handle and base plate. You are backing the completion of the remaining tooling and the integration of the components into a production line. The chances of us being able to deliver in mid-August are excellent, and we expect to do just that.

  • We have an agreement with India's largest and most famous safety razor manufacturers to produce the Fat Boy.
  • We have developed many successful products with this company, including the replica razors that we have already made.

Together We Can Make This Happen Even if You Cannot Contribute.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Also please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! Send the campaign to wet-shavers that you already know.

story:
Finally

Finally someone came up with a healthy and easy way to shed unwanted pounds. 

Living Strong Supplements developed a safe and natural product to help someone shed unwanted pounds by helping their body do what it already dose only better.  

  • Easy to Use: Simply take one capsule two times per day with water and watch the pounds disappear
  • Health Benefits: Our balanced formula is completely natural and provides numerous health benefits besides weight loss (see ingredients)
  • Motivation:  Not only does our supplement include natural substances to help elevate motivational and mood levels, our educational platform includes motivational articles and information
  • Education: One of the reasons so many people are overweight is they may not understand the relationship between their bodies and what they eat. That's why we offer educational resources
  • Guarantee: We are so confident our customers will succeed, we offer an unconditional money-back guarantee
  • Giving Back: We are committed to giving back to our communities by providing educational opportunities to young people about the relationship between healthy eating and a better quality of life
  • Join Us: together we can save the health and lives of potentially millions of people

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $25,000 to fund this product launch. This will help pay the costs of our initial order, out-reach campaign, and fund our educational platform.  

  • Maybe you know someone who would like to safely lose some weight, look and be healthy
  • A $25 contribution - full year access to our educational platform EP
  • A $49 contribution - 30-day supply of Optimal Weight Quick Start - Plus 1 year access to EP
  • A $125 contribution - 90-day supply of Optimal Weight Quick Start - Plus 3 year access to EP
  • A $499 contribution - business start up kit to earn part or full time income - Plus Distrabution rights for the EP

If we do not raise the entire $25,000 we will scale back the out-reach campaign and proceed as planned,    

The Impact

The impact of this all natural supplement is very clear. We can change the the quality of life for millions of people.

  • Think of all the people you know who go on dangerous diets only to regain the lost weight within just a few months. 
  • If you have ever been overweight and suffered the ridicule, dirty looks, snide comments, and rude behavior, you understand why this has the potential to change lives.
  • The lack of self esteem people feel when they are called names like fat, chubby, portly, lard butt, piggy, and others is only understood by someone who has experienced it. 

Our Mission

Our mission is simple, we are here for people who want to live their best life.

We stand behind our products with an unconditional money-back guarantee so the only thing our customers have to lose is unwanted pounds.  

Join Us

Join us, get the word out, and improve a lot of lives!

  • If you know someone who needs to shed some pounds, gift them with a 30 day supply
  • If you want to drop a few pounds yourself, get your own 30 or 90 day supply then tell others how well it works 
  • Subscribe to our educational platform and learn about nutrition and your body

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are not able to contribute cash, pass this along to someone who wants to safely shed those unwanted pounds
  • Help us get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo tools and make some noise about Optimal Weight and Living Strong Supplements! You will may be saving someone's life. 
  • Go to www.LivingStrongSupplements.com and sign up for the free newsletter and product reviews. 

Or become a reseller, make some money, and help your friends live their best lives by introducing them to Living Strong Supplements. (We are NOT a multi-level marketing company.)

Standard Warnings for Supplements

If you are under the care of a health care provider, taking medications, pregnant, nursing, check with your health care provider before starting any supplement. 

THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION.  THESE PRODUCTS ARE NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE, OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE

story:
Larry DeAngelis (Founder and Managing Partner) from Level25. The #1 Rated Sleep Shot for 2019.

This Campaign is about helping our customers with insomnia, stress and sleep issues during an unprecedented time. It is also about the reality of being a small business startup who falls between the cracks of the Federal Stimulus Program. 

We have real customers, multiple re-orders, great reviews, rated #1 Sleep shot for 2019, $100,000 of retail inventory (all paid for). But unfortunately, we were not the Lakers of Ruth Chris. We are simply a start up company providing a necessary product to help people get the rest they need now and in the future.

We had $25,000 in new orders cancel and the online sales flattened as well when Covid 19 struck. Our expenses are low and our liabilities are minimal.

We are looking to raise $75,000 – $150,000 to build on online sales channels and move into new verticals with the introduction of "The Sleeping Bag" which makes a great corporate gift. We are offering a Royalty Pool for those who believe in the direction Level25 is going and would like to participate in that growth.

I have built two $15 million  consumer product companies in Revolution Tea (Founder)  and Biomedic Clinical Care (CFO). I truly believe Level25 is a much greater opportunity than either of those companies. The goal build a platform which treats stress and anxiety and sleep issues naturally. 

Sleep is one of the most important parts of our life and without the proper rest it is very difficult to perform at our best. Throw Covid-19 on top of that and a product like Level25 becomes even more "Essential"

So, I ask all of you to contribute what you can and at least get some product and buy a "Sleeping Bag" for a friend and see how well the product works. For those of you interested in being part of our growth, we are offering a Level25 Royalty Pool perk. 

Let's work together to get the word out there about Level25. We greatly appreciate all your support and you can contact me  lvd@drinklevel25.com or visit our site: www.drinklevel25.com/indiegogo

Be safe and Sleep Well!

 

The Sleeping Bag

The Sleeping Bag is the perfect gift for yourself, a friend, relative or spouse! Lightweight and ideal for travel it’s the perfect addition to your get-ready-for-bed staples.

Made from plush microfiber, The Sleeping Bag includes 3-2.5 ounce bottles and is available in two colors — Navy and Rose Quartz. Shipping Now

 

Level25 is Rest Assured

Level25 is a natural sleep supplement that helps you to quickly feel relaxed and fall asleep.

  • Works in 25 minutes
  • Safe for daily use
  • Non-addictive
  • Made with high-quality natural ingredients
  • Only 5 calories
  • Tastes great

 

Why We Created Level25?

Level25 was born out of my role as a parent. As a father, watching my children experience high amounts of stress and anxiety in their 20’s was heartbreaking. For me, my 20’s were a time of fun and friends and I wanted the same for my children. So, I began hunting for a solution.

Our society has grown accustomed to medicating and escaping from stress through alcohol and prescription drugs. But these intoxicants fail to break the negative cycle of stress and, eventually, can lead to increased anxiety, depression, and addiction.

How could we break the cycle? There has to be a natural solution that can “take the edge off” and allow our body and mind to get the proper rest it needs.

That’s when Level25 was born. After extensive research and many failed attempts, I, along with the help of my team (Jeff, Josh, Chuck, Theresa and Bill), crafted a formula that was the perfect combination of natural ingredients, all known for their relaxation properties and ability to promote increase sleep quality and rest. Level25 is a premium product that delivers the best natural ingredients in 25 minutes or less.

We are all part of a time I like to call “Generation Stress”. Maybe this is because of the proliferation of smartphones and social media that demand our constant attention. Maybe, we are just simply living too fast. At Level25, we believe it is important to slow down and make time for the body and mind to relax, rest and recharge.

 

What People Are Saying

Great sleep & no snoring! This product puts me to sleep very fast! My husband really liked the taste, which says a lot because he’s very picky. We both took the supplement before bed & I never heard him snore. So either this product really does keep him from snoring, or I was sleeping so soundly I never heard a peep! I recommend giving this a try if you struggle falling asleep and staying asleep. Or if your significant other snores and keeps you up at night.

AMAZING...allows me to sleep next to my man! Lifesaver. Several reasons why I LOVE this product. 1. I prefer not to take medication as I respond poorly from side effects. When I have tried sleep aids, I feel horrible in the morning or they just don’t work. I do not want to take habit forming medications. The ingredients in this product are none of the above, and tastes great 2. Stress. We all have it. Sometimes more times then others. I can take this anytime I need it without worry and KNOW it works. I can sleep which in itself, helps decrease my stress. 3. I can travel and take it with me and sleep better in hotels, with jet lag, etc AND 4. For the ladies.... sick if your spouse’s snoring? Well good night! I can sleep through it! I’ve recommended this simple solution to so many of my friends and have only heard success stories. Give it a try, turn off your mind and go to sleep! (And skip the “hang over” in the morning!) 

Great Product!!!! Love this stuff!! It stops my husband from snoring!!! WOW!! He sleeps deeper and doesn't make a peep!!! Highly recommend, relaxes you and makes it easier to fall asleep as it mellows you out. 

Calm sleep, great taste. Level 25 really helps ease me into a pleasant sleep. After my day it’s hard to settle down, but after drinking this sleep aid, I am able to get calm and quiet sleep. It also tastes amazing! 

 

The Power of Our Proprietary Ingredients

GABA – Enables the body and mind to relax, fall asleep, and sleep soundly throughout the night.

Kava Kava Extract – A herb commonly used for its calming properties.

Lavender Extract – While lavender is a popular choice in aromatherapy for sleep and relaxation, ingesting its extract also has calming qualities on the body and mind.

L-Theanine – An amino acid that promotes relaxation.
Valerian Root Extract – A root commonly used for sleep disorders.

5-HTP – A naturally-occurring amino acid used to produce serotonin that can be converted to melatonin, which helps you sleep.

Melatonin – While melatonin is found naturally in the body, sometimes we need a little extra help producing enough to get us to sleep!

story:
I have wanted children my whole life but I waited, wanting to do it within a relationship, but that just hasn't worked out. I have just turned 40 and I can't keep waiting, I have some money saved, but if I spend it all on donor sperm I won't have it to spend on the baby when it comes, which seems risky given how expensive children can be.

What I Need & What You Get

Donor sperm from the cryos.dk sperm bank will cost me £450 per month (including VAT and shipping), and it can take up to 2 years to get pregnant (though I certainly hope it won't take that long!). Check further down if you're interested in more information on the statistics. I am setting my goal at enough money to cover 1 cycle, but I hope to get enough for at least 3 cycles. I have no known fertility problems and in fact my family has generally been pretty fertile, my paternal grandmother and my maternal aunt both had children in their 40's.

What do you get in return for your money?

  • A warm sense of accomplishment at helping another human being
  • Baby photos and updates (should you be interested)
  • For larger donations input into naming and other little things (see perks)

The Impact

Having a child has been the thing I have always most wanted to do, but being brought up to be quite responsible has let me down on this front. I've never been careless with birth control and so never accidentally got pregnant, and I've never got to the stage of a relationship where kids were on the cards. Having a child would mean the world to me and to my family and there are lot's of people besides me waiting to love and support it. I have two sisters, three brothers and two nephews.

Risks & Challenges

Some people might feel that 40 is old to be having a child, and it does make it harder. The likelihood of you getting pregnant on any given cycle/month are lower. At age 40, 44% of women will have a conception ending in a live birth within one year and 64% will have a conception ending in a live birth within four years. Along with only just having turned 40 (last week) I think my family background will make that even more favourable. Youth runs in my family, the side I take after all look 10 years younger than they actually are and as mentioned before there is precedent in my family for late children. Two of my close female relatives conceived 2 healthy children each (4 total) while in their 40's.

I understand that some people might think it inappropriate to ask for help for this sort of thing, but we are all in this world together and nobody has to help unless they want to. I am confident I would be a good mother and I think one of the important traits in any parent is being able to ask for help should they need it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please do spread the word about this campaign. I don't need to raise very much and any funding over what I'm seeking will go either to further cycles of donor sperm or to baby related expenses like nappies etc should I get pregnancy before the money is used up! I'll happily keep people informed about where the money is going.

And please do consider donating sperm to your local sperm bank, there is often a shortage of donors and lots of woman are looking for help.

story:
About Me

Hello! My name is Julia! My ultimate goal is to bring the innovative solution to the veterinary field and prevent the animals from pain and suffering.

Biomaterials have always been a topic of my interest. In 2012, I was honoured with an opportunity to perform PhD studies at the Orthopaedic Research Unit, University of Turku, Finland. I defended my PhD degree in February 2015. The thesis was focused on composite orthopaedic bone implants with special reference to staphylococcal infections. I was involved in several successfully completed large scale research projects. These included studies conceived in the framework of a large-scale EU-funded project and a screening study performed in cooperation with the leading Finnish pharmaceutical company Orion Ltd. My PhD project gave me an excellent opportunity of working in an international environment with academic and medical professionals.

My research activities continued after the PhD defence. Since March 2015, I have been volunteering as a post-doctoral trainee at the University of Turku. My post-doctoral research project is focused on the treatment of long bone fractures in veterinary patients. In April 2015, I co-founded TraceRay Oy, a young innovative company and made a patent application related to the topic of my research to exploit my innovations aimed at the treatment of veterinary patients. Currently, the resources of the start-up company are being stretched to the limit. TraceRay is striving to get pre-seed investment. Therefore, we greatly appreciate any help!

About the Problem We Are Trying to Solve

Small dogs have a much higher propensity to fractures of the long bones compared to other breeds. In small dogs, these fractures may occur as a result of even minimal trauma such as falling from the owners` arms or sofa. The causative mechanisms for this type of fractures are related to the low body weight (< 5 kg), reduced intraosseous blood supply and breed related changes in bones. Therefore, the mechanical strength of long bones in small dogs is much lower than that in other breed species, which significantly affect the mechanical behavior of these bones.

The use of a cast or splint alone in the majority of the cases does not provide adequate stability; therefore, there is an increased risk of fibrous non-union formation. Preferably, the fracture segments should be anatomically stabilized with a plate and screws. Metals are currently in use for veterinary orthopaedic implants. However, metallic implants have intrinsic drawbacks. The stiffness of the metals is much higher than that of bone. Therefore, when metallic implants are introduced, an unfavorable load distribution known as “stress-shielding” may occur. Stress-shielding, debris formation from multi-component implants and metallosis may result in peri-prosthetic bone loss and aseptic loosening of the implant. Due to the bone loss, revision surgery could be significantly more complex with increased risk of complications.

Although the fracture pattern is simple, in small dogs even an ideal surgical intervention protocol may lead to postoperative complications. A delayed union and non-union as well as refracture after plate removal are severe complications which are more distinctive in small dogs. In addition, it is highly important to note, that all implants are to some extent prone to bacterial colonization. Clinical observations have shown that the presence of skeletal implants promotes immediate and delayed infections which may challenge the success of implantation. Overall, the fractures of long bones have a high intensity of welfare impact as they are extremely painful and stress-causing injuries. The prognosis for small dogs with these types of fractures where initial veterinary intervention has failed is unpredictable. Unfortunately, the majority of the cases are not amenable to salvage, particularly individuals with advanced osteoporosis. In certain circumstances, limb amputation is the only alternative.

Currant Status of the Project

The Business Development of TraceRay

Milestones Achieved So Far

What We Need & What You Get

What We Need

We are asking you for $102,000 to take the innovative technology forward and get us to the next stage.  The planned spending breaks down as follows:

What You Get

We are very happy to offer special perks to each of our supporters and have come up with some very personal items for you to claim. Our team members are very creative and enthusiastic people with a wide range of hobbies. We strongly hope you enjoy.

The Impact

Fractures of long bones in small dogs cause functional problems, pain and distress. The innovative non-metallic plates developed in this project by TraceRay will have the greatest impact on the quality of life of the treated animals. Due to the enhanced biocompatibility of the device, the number of delayed and non-union fractures will decrease. The plates will boost the remodeling processes in bone; and thus the healing time will be shorter to compare with that of metallic plates. This will allow early and complete return of function. Currently, roughly 90-95% of the bone grafts in veterinary orthopaedics are autografts. However, the use of autografts requires additional surgery on another part of the body, which may cause complications.  In fact, in small dogs, the complications are even more severe, as the amount of bone at the donor site is limited. The innovative non-metallic plates represent a unique concept, which allow less invasive surgical procedures than currently in use. The structure and design of the innovative non-metallic plate are versatile and carry a possibility to modify the surface bioactivity by incorporation of drugs and other bioactive components to boost the healing process.

What If the Final Goal Is Not Achieved?

All the money raised through this campaign will go towards helping the project even if the final goal would not be achieved.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t help us financially but still wish to take part in this project – please help us to promote the campaign in other ways – anything you can do will be greatly appreciated.

Please remember about the Indiegogo share tools and help get us noticed in other ways.

FAQ

1. Who are you?

TraceRay Oy – established in April 2015 as a spin-off from the research activities at the University of Turku, currently focuses on designing and manufacturing of the novel intelligent bioactive implantable system for fracture treatment in small and large animals.

2. What is your mission?

Our mission is to aid small and large animals suffering from fractures.

3. What is so unique about you?

TraceRay is the first Finnish company to develop veterinary implants and GLOBALLY the first metal free in veterinary orthopaedics!

4. What is your product?

Our first product will be a flexible fixation device for the treatment of long bones fractures in small dogs. The proposed technology is novel and groundbreaking. We expect it to be a breakthrough invention in veterinary orthopaedics.The company's technology allows the creation of a flexible fixation device, which allow bone growing and protect it from infection. The targeted implant is multifunctional and can be tailored to meet the specific clinical needs.

5. Why do you need the Indiegogo Campaign?

TraceRay will use campaign money to accelerate the execution of our R&D plan. We will be able to overcome the critical points in order to be able to build a working prototype of our innovative device, which we can then test. The more we raise, the more resources we can deploy to accelerate this technology.

story:
Help us to raise the $51.000

Total Funding of the project - $173.000

 Funding Sources

  • Genesis Philanthropy Group - $97.500
  • City Council of Haifa - $15.500 
  • Strong Trust Ltd. - $1.000  
  • Participation fees - $8.000 based on $650

story:
Running is a gift many of us have lost or are losing. Running can be a form of moving meditation, of expression, or of rigorous challenge. Ultimately, running is about moving swiftly on your own two feet. We want to provide you with the resources, techniques, and guidance needed to reach your running and dynamic movement capabilities. Beyond that, we want to demonstrate and articulate how to use the tools and environments that are around you so you can feel comfortable and confident while achieving your daily fitness goals.

Who is TruRun for?  TruRun is for those who are stuck in a rut with their workouts, for those who want to run, jump, and challenge themselves and for those who don't want to just run miles and miles on the cement or on a treadmill. Rather than pounding the pavement, you can set up some cones for agility drills, run the bleachers, and get back into nature to use your natural landscape as a part of your workout. Don't worry, we will also include indoor strength and conditioning exercises that will compliment your movement and running prowess! The beauty of TruRun is that you can do these exercises, movements, and restorative practices wherever and whenever you want.  

How is TruRun different?  First and foremost, TruRun is a non-aggressive, humanistic approach to your fitness, health, and movement potential. This is not about punishing your body or proving your pain threshold. This is about the art of dynamic movement and getting back to the way we used to run and play when we were kids. For some of you, this means getting back to the way you used to practice for team sports or individual sports like soccer, tennis, lacrosse, basketball. The bottom line is that many of us have traded our outdoor resources and mindsets in exchange for limiting and repetitive exercises.

What are you getting? A suite of video tutorials that are mobile ready, suggested schedules to keep up with that are easily accessible, advice on how to be more active, and motivation from a trainer and coach that has your best interests in mind. We want you to feel like this program was built just for you, and that you are a part of a greater movement to free thinking about exercise and health.    

The Nuts and Bolts - These videos will be both indoors and outdoors. Most videos will utilize minimal equipment and terrain you can find anywhere, making the most from the obstacles nature provides you. Whether you're at the local gym, community park, or are traveling, you will have access to videos that are clean, clear, and detailed.  

Traditional Athletic Workouts

  • Build Strength with workout selections that carry over to running health and quality movement.
  • Develop Power through exercises that let you harness the forces of gravity
  • Regain your Balance with routines that test your equilibrium
  • Promote Flexibility with stretches and dynamic movement patterns
  • Increase your Mobility through exercises and sequences that promote your joint health and integrity

Circuit & Drill Workouts

  • Get out on the turf, grass, and track for Speed, Agility, Quickness workout sequences that challenge coordination, timing and promote and enhance athletic function and movement.  
  • Join us for dynamic warm-up exercise sequences that amateur, recreational and professional athletes use to gently yet highly effectively prepare their bodies and minds for dynamic range of motion and increased level of play,
  • Conditioning sequences and circuits that promote fat loss, stress release and natural production of human growth hormone.  
  • Think Lean and Vibrant! (Both running based and utilizing simple and highly effective resistance tools)

Nature & Urban Workouts

  • Let's get outside and enjoy our environment!
  • Use the resources Mother Nature has given us. Run a hill, jump on a log, climb a mountain- just move in your environment!
  • Get dirty, get sweaty, and get some sun!

Interviews 

We believe that you should have access to nutritionists, physical therapists, and other knowledgeable health and fitness professionals. Along with our experienced fitness and creative backgrounds, we will connect you with specialists so that you can get the answers you need for your own personal health and well-being. 

Those are the basics. And that's what we believe in. That's what has been lost in all the fluff, confusion, gimmicks and fads. This isn't about thinking outside the box; this is about living outside the box. No limitations. No boundaries.

This is TruRun: A back-to-basics, fun, and supportive movement that is driven by creativity, vitality, and exploration.

A Message

Welcome to TruRun,

My name is Oscar Roa, and I am a National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM) Certified Personal Trainer (CPT). I am a lifetime athlete and believer that movement is a beautiful combination of art and science.  What I know for sure is that we all have a unique physiological and psychological makeup, and should live and work within that mindset.

Strength, power, speed, quickness, and endurance are all components of my practice and lifestyle. It is the stability, flexibility, mobility, and restorative methods that we will incorporate that will separate ourselves from the rest. Moreover, by combining continual education, common sense, awareness, and a positive outlook, we can create an agile mind and body.

I’ve trained thousands of hours one-on-one with athletes, Emmy Award winners, Grammy Award winners, medical doctors, and countless other men and women who are serious about results and their safety. It is not only who I’ve worked with, but also what I have worked with that has allowed me to grow tremendously in my field. I’ve had the task of navigating my workouts around issues such as spinal stenosis, degenerative disk disorder, scoliosis, sciatica, and other by-products of everyday stress- including my own.

My fitness journey, pursuits and passions have led me here to TruRun. I am intrigued and driven by the endless discovery and pursuit of human performance; both mentally and physically. I believe in trying to do the things that bring forth our best today and prepare us to deliver our best tomorrow.

I truly wish you all the greatest of health and well-being, not only because I genuinely care, but also because I selfishly wish to share the sidewalks with souls, minds, hearts, and bodies that are free to explore and move gracefully.

Whether you're new to fitness training, looking for tips and advice, or a seasoned athlete looking to advance your technical skillset you’ve found humble, experienced and passionate professionals.  Please join us in changing the fitness landscape.

Best of health,

Oscar Roa

story:
Duothirst is a new versatile way to stay hydrated like never before. The innovative design allows you to maintain convenience during your workout also. 

Duothirst is the world's first single nozzled sports bottle that can hold two drinks simultaneously. It is suitable for anyone who is trying to achieve a healthier lifestyle or participate in sport at any level.

"Bringing versatility and convenience to everybody's workout"


A full 3D interactive model of the Duothirst bottle design can be viewed by clicking on the below link:

duothirst bottle


For the past 2-3 years we have been developing a solution to a common problem experienced by many people whilst exercising; the need to carry multiple bottles with different liquids such as water, energy drinks and supplement drinks to both replenish and rehydrate. Having to carry several bottles around with you every time you workout or do any kind of exercise is inconvenient and can become a continuous hassle.

We were tired of having to put up with this whilst exercising and wanted something that presented an element of convenience to our workouts. 

Duothirst is the solution to this problem.




The Best Sports Bottle Ever?

We designed Duothirst to be more than just a water bottle. We wanted it to seamlessly fit into your fitness lifestyle and give you the flexibility and choice of what you want to drink and when you want to drink it.

Convenience is one of the core principles we designed Duothirst around. Its elegant design gives you practicality, flexibility and choice every time you use it. We truly believe that Duothirst delivers this like no other sports bottle out there. 

We wanted the user to experience a new versatile way to stay hydrated like never before. 

Duothirst is comprised of 3 main components, the lid, the identical bottle halves and the base component that holds them together. The great thing about Duothirst, and one of the bottles main features is the lid mechanism. We spent a long time designing and engineering this so that it was possible to select either of the two bottle halves through just one mouthpiece.

But we didn't stop there; we also designed the lid mechanism so that it could access both of the bottle halves at the same time. This means that Duothirst can be used like any conventional sports bottle to drink just one liquid, but also offer the choice of a mixture of two drinks.

Duothirst holds a total capacity of 800ml (27 US fluid oz) we believe this is the perfect amount to ensure that Duothirst is not too bulky or heavy. Each bottle half therefore holds 400ml (13.5 US fluid oz). 

Duothirst is a UK designed product and will also be manufactured and assembled in the UK to ensure that quality won't be compromised and that a premium end product will be produced. 


Bringing an element of convenience to everybody's workout 

Duothirst allows you to stay hydrated whilst maintaining convenience. No longer do you have to carry several bottles around with you for your different drinks whilst exercising. Carry them both in your elegantly designed sleek Duothirst bottle.  

Access either compartment or both at the same time through just one mouthpiece

One of our first design requirements for Duothirst was to ensure that the bottle only had  one mouthpiece to access either of the bottle halves. We have managed this through our uniquely designed lid mechanism. We spent a long time designing and engineering the mechanism and the great thing is it's so simple to use.

Change between drinks in seconds 
We wanted to ensure that changing between drinks was effortless, enhancing the user experience. It's so easy to change between drinks, all you have to do is twist the top part of the lid and select which drink you want.  

Access two drinks from a single bike bottle holder
The design of Duothirst allows it to fit into all regular bike bottle holders. This then gives you the ability to access two drinks from the same bottle rack. 

We wanted to make sure that changing between drinks whilst cycling was still possible. To allow this we have designed the top of the lid so that you can bite down on the ridge and then turn the bottle with one hand to select which position you want.  

Have one, two, or a mixture of two drinks

One of the great things the lid mechanism allows you to do is access either bottle half or both at the same time. 

If you choose to have two drinks in your bottle then you can select either of those two drinks or you can choose to have a mixture of the two drinks. 
If you choose to only have one drink in both bottle halves then Duothirst will act like any other sports bottle out there letting you drink just one liquid simply turn it to the position that access both bottle halves. 

So wether you want to have one, two, or a mixture of two drinks Duothirst lets you decide. 

Lightweight, Durable and Reusable 

We have designed Duothirst so that it is a lightweight and durable product. Duothirst is also reusable and will help you to break the habit of using disposable plastic bottles which just end up being disposed of in landfill sites. 


Duothirst is a BPA (Bisphenol A) free sports bottle. We made sure this was the case to protect the health of the end user from the very beginning. What this basically means is that the materials and plastics Duothirst is made out of do not contain any of the harmful BPA chemicals. 

When designing Duothirst we had to ensure the product was leakproof. All of the Duothirst bottles will be 100% tested to ensure they are leakproof. How can we expect you to use such an amazing product if it can't function properly!

Duothirst is easy to clean and it is dishwasher safe also. The lid has been designed so that it can be taken apart for ease of cleaning and it is really easy to put back together. 

Duothirst is a joy to hold due to the ergonomic shape and size of the bottle. It fits great in your hand and can easily be held at any point. 




Using Duothirst couldn't be easier.

Simply fill the bottle halves with the drinks of your choice, then twist the top part of the lid to click into one of four possible positions. The first and third positions select the individual bottle halves, whilst the second and fourth positions allow access to both bottle halves at the same time.

So whether you want to have one, two, or a mixture of two drinks Duothirst lets you decide.


You can choose the Duothirst that is perfect for your taste and style. 








There are many hurdles to overcome when bringing a new innovative product to market.  We have taken every step possible, from product design through to manufacturing, to deliver a superior product without compromise. 

Our team of experienced designers know what it takes to get a product to market and, as a result, we are very confident in exactly what it is we need to do to get Duothirst into your hands as soon as we can. 

While there are always risks and challenges when introducing a new product, we have done our due diligence to perform the steps necessary to reduce and mitigate any risks.

We know we have an incredible opportunity to deliver a superior bottle which brings a new versatile way to stay hydrated like never before and we are so pleased we can include you to help us achieve this. 



Q: What is the total capacity of the Duothirst bottle? 

A: Duothirst holds a total capacity of 800ml (27 US fluid oz) we believe this is the perfect amount to ensure that Duothirst is not too bulky or heavy. Each bottle half therefore holds 400ml (13.5 US fluid oz). 

Q: How do I use my Duothirst Bottle?

A: This is fully explained in the "How Does Duothirst Work?" section of this page. Simply twist the top part of the lid to click into one of four positions. There are two positions allowing access to either bottle half, then two other positions allowing access to both bottle halves at the same time. This means you can access either side of the bottle as well as being able to access both at the same time. So whether you want to have one, two, or  mixture of two drinks Duothirst lets you decide. 

Q: Is Duothirst patented?

A: Yes, Duothirst is a patent pending product. 

Q: Is Duothirst BPA free?

A: Yes, Duothirst is a BPA free product we made sure this was the case to protect the health of the end user. 

Q: What is BPA?

A: BPA (bisphenol A) is an industrial chemical used in plastic water bottles and many other plastic products. It has been used since the 1960’s to make certain plastics and resins. BPA has been found to cause your oestrogen levels to rise regardless of whether you are a male or female. Often plastic products which contain BPA have been found to leach when exposed to certain stresses, things like being exposed to temperatures as low as 15°C can cause this leaching to happen. Being exposed to this chemical and consuming it can lead to adverse health effects it has been associated with health problems such as; altered growth rates, early puberty in girls, reduced sperm count in males, altered functions in reproductive organs in both sexes, altered behaviour, obesity and higher rates of some cancers. Growing fears about the long term effects BPA plastics can have has prompted the EU, United States and Canada into banning the use of BPA in baby bottles.

Q: Is Duothirst dishwasher safe?

A: Yes, all parts of the Duothirst bottle are dishwasher safe. We recommend you clean your Duothirst using the dishwasher or by hand using some warm and soapy water. 

Q: Is Duothirst available in a range of colours? 

A: Yes, there is a selection of colours you can choose from allowing you to choose the Duothirst that is perfect for your taste and style.

story:
OoshEars are the hearing aids we wish existed so we could buy them for ourselves. If you try to buy hearing aids today, your choices would be either very expensive full featured ones (average price of hearing aids is $4600), or bare bones cheap ones.

Where are the hearing aids for the rest of us? Hearing aids that work well in noisy places, that are comfortable to wear, that can stream phone calls and music, that look good? And hopefully priced less than a car!

 

OoshEars design prototype

 

OoshEars are our answer. OoshEars are affordable full featured hearing aids. How is this possible?

The answer is in our Self Fit technology. OoshEars are made for mild & moderate hearing loss. Majority of hearing loss cases are straightforward and uncomplicated. Fitting hearing aids can be done with technology. OoshEars use our custom Self Fit technology for precise fitting. This saves thousands of dollars in cost that we pass on to you as savings.

 

OoshEars design prototype with a bundled smartphone app

 

OoshEars are packed with premium features usually found only in very expensive hearing aids: custom fitting, Bluetooth 5 dual-mode, aptX streaming, extended hearing range, rechargeable batteries, 16 WDRC, omni & directional microphones, noise reduction, feedback cancellation, on-device controls, smartphone app control, unlimited custom programs.

 

Self Fit

The key feature of OoshEars hearing aids is Self Fit technology. Here is how it works:

The first time you put OoshEars in your ears, the bundled smartphone app will ask you to go to a quiet place to take a quick hearing test (a pure tone audiometry test, similar to what is used in commercial audiometers).

 

Taking a hearing test with the OoshEars mobile app

 

The test will configure OoshEars to your unique hearing (using 16 WDRC - wide dynamic range channels). But that's not all. For an even better fit, you will also have full access to adjust the settings* at each frequency.

So for example, you might visit a noisy restaurant where the sound of clanking plates is unbearably loud. You would simply open the app, lower the 8 kHz slider until everything sounds great, and save the new config as a stored program for future use in noisy restaurants.

Or you might be in a meeting room with acoustics that dampens high frequencies making it hard for you to understand speech. You would simply open the app, and increase the 4 - 8 kHz sliders until you hear well again.

Any time you feel your hearing has changed, you can quickly re-fit OoshEars. For example, someone with Meniere's disease whose hearing loss changes daily, can re-fit his OoshEars each morning in 5 minutes.

 

 

Our smartphone app will remind you at certain intervals to re-fit your hearing aids. It's quick, easy and convenient.

* You have full access to manually adjust each WDRC channel. WDRC channels are what makes hearing aids so helpful. Unlike simpler EQ controls that one may find in some personal sound amplification products (PSAPs), WDRC channels don't just make the sounds louder, but also help intelligibility.

 

Comfortable Stylish Design

Final design, - what OoshEars will look like after manufacturing

 

OoshEars are designed to be comfortable to wear the whole day. Comfortable if you fall asleep in them, or wear a helmet over them. We make sure OoshEars stay in place when you run, or jump, or do yoga handstands.

OoshEars are designed to look stylish. From color, to shape, to materials, OoshEars enhance your looks.

 

Bluetooth Streaming Music and Voice

OoshEars support dual mode Bluetooth 5 (Classic and Low Energy). That means you can connect directly to your iPhone, Android, TV or car.

OoshEars also support AptX Adaptive, a modern codec for HD music streaming. AptX Adaptive is an evolution of AptX and AptX HD supporting up to 420 kbps.

 

 

Rechargeable Swappable Batteries

Let's face it, rechargeable batteries are much better than single use batteries. They are more convenient, cheaper in the long run, and better for the environment. There is only one problem with using them in hearing aids, - once they run out, you are stuck without a working hearing aid.

So we invented swappable rechargeable batteries for OoshEars. Rechargeable batteries are held in a housing that attaches with magnets to the main case. It took a lot of tries to get the magnets working well. Here is our first attempt, not so great:

 

OoshEars first prototype with magnets

 

Magnets seem like a simple thing to do. But they need to be strong enough to hold together the whole day year after year, yet gentle enough so you can change the batteries easily. Our later attempt, working much better:

 

OoshEars second prototype with magnets

 

To make sure that you always have a working hearing aid, each OoshEars package includes two spare swappable batteries. The charging case has special sockets for charging these spare batteries, so you always have a pair of batteries ready to go.

We estimate that each battery will last for 3 hours while streaming music, and the whole day in the hearing aids mode.

 

Extended Frequency Range

A healthy hearing range is from 20 Hz to 20,000 Hz. But most hearing aids augment hearing only up to 6 or 8 kHz. Why? Because that's the range of speech. Which is fine if all you care about is understanding speech. 

We care a lot about understanding speech. That's why we have noise reduction, feedback cancellation and other advanced algorithms. But we also care greatly about hearing music, animals, birds and the rest of the world! So we designed OoshEars to augment hearing up to at least 10 kHz. And we really hope we can go even higher, up to 12 or even 14 kHz (we are still testing the highest range that's feasible).

 

Noise Reduction

Hearing well in noisy environments such as restaurants or busy streets is one of the key challenges for hard of hearing individuals. OoshEars comes with several technologies to help you hear better in the presence of noise:

Digital Noise Reduction - each hearing aid comes with two microphones, an omnidirectional one and a front facing one. This enables OoshEars to detect and differentiate speech from background noise, and to amplify only the speech.

Active Noise Cancellation - when your OoshEars are streaming music or phone calls, the background noises are cancelled out. This requires that you use a closed dome.

 

Domes

OoshEars come with 2 types of domes: open and closed. You can choose which ones you prefer, each have their own advantages.

Open domes let sound through so they feel a bit more natural. Closed domes block sound, so they protect your ears from loud sounds, allow better noise reduction, but they may make your own voice sound a bit weird. You can swap domes at any time.

 

Who are OoshEars for

OoshEars are for mentally able adults with a mild to moderate (up to 55 db HL) hearing loss. Configuring and controlling OoshEars requires an iPhone or an Android smartphone.

 

Are OoshEars safe?

Yes. There are many safety features built in to OoshEars:

  1. When you first put in your OoshEars, the app will ask you several questions to make sure that your hearing loss is simple and straightforward. For example, it will ask if you have any pain in your ears, or if your hearing loss is sudden or unilateral. In suspect cases the app will recommend that you see an audiologist.
  2. If OoshEars hearing test detects that your hearing loss is larger than supported, it will recommend that your see an audiologist.
  3. OoshEars have peak output (maximum loudness) same as common earbuds (around 110 db SPL).
  4. OoshEars hearing test includes testing for your loudness discomfort level (LDL) and adjusting the settings to make sure you are always comfortable.
  5. OoshEars uses WDRC channels for sound amplification that intelligently shift all sounds into your hearing range without being too loud.
  6. OoshEars tracks duration and loudness of sounds, and if the sound environment is too loud for too long it will show a warning.
  7. OoshEars are built with premium reliable components.
  8. OoshEars are first tested in our lab during each design iteration. Then they are worn and tested by our own team members with hearing loss (we eat our own dog food). Then each manufacturing stage has to pass Quality Assurance stage. Then OoshEars have to pass strict certification and testing by an independent lab.

 

Components

OoshEars are build with premium components: DSPs from Qualcomm, balanced armature drivers and MEMS microphones from Knowles, sensors from Azoteq.

 

Prototyping with Ezairo DSP development board

 

What's Inside your OoshEars package

  • left ear hearing aid
  • right ear hearing aid
  • 2 additional rechargeable batteries
  • charging case with USB-C cable
  • 6 open domes (2 each of Small, Medium, Large)
  • 6 closed domes (2 each of Small, Medium, Large)
  • iPhone or Android app (installed via Apple Store or Play Store)


Where we are now

We spent the last two years researching and prototyping OoshEars, building our team, selecting suppliers, testing components, forming partnerships. We are now ready to go ahead with the final design and production.

 

Team

OoshEars was founded in 2019 by Dr. Karen Arman Pivazyan and Eugene Zhebko. Arman is an experienced IT entrepreneur (Official Human), with engineering and math degrees from Stanford University and MIT. Eugene is an experienced EE entrepreneur (Mammoth eBike) and a professional musician (Pur:Pur).

Besides our two founders, OoshEars team includes experts in electrical & software engineering, audiology, manufacturing, design.

We are also supported by our development partners AREG and ArtKB. 

 

AREG - our development partners

 

Project Timeline

Thank You

Many people helped us bring OoshEars to life. We would like to take this opportunity to thank everyone who supported us throughout these two years making OoshEars a reality.

 

Final design, - what OoshEars charger will look like after manufacturing

 

More Info

Follow us on Facebook:

https://facebook.com/ooshears

Or on our website:

https://ooshears.com

story:
The Story Behind MASKOMFY

I am Peter Wong. I have been working as a technician since 30 years ago. Throughout the years, I have invented many gadgets, bringing convenience to me and my family. In 2019, the epidemic had cause a huge impact all over the world. The lifestyle of many people have been forced to change due to the epidemic. Everyone starts to wear masks all the time but it leads to many problems. 

Sweating is one of the major problems we face while wearing surgical masks. You may feel breathless when wearing a mask. Many mask support frames may help but still make you uncomfortable. That is the reason why I started this project. 

Overview

About 3 grams only

Suitable for 160-180 mm surgical masks

Capable of holding tightly on surgical masks

Emergency help with detached ear loop of masks

How It Works

story:
About Ruth...

Ruth and I have known each other about 7 years, been married for nearly 3. We have a 2 year old son, Mukisa. We are lucky to have more resources than many in Uganda, but we don't have anything close to what the cataract surgery will cost. All contributions are welcome. This surgery will restore Ruth's failing eyesight and let her see her son grow up...and her husband grow old.

What We Need & What You Get

We need adequate funds for the surgery and aftercare -- $2500. All contributors will get one of my books, either The Glass Cake, for those who contribute $15 or more, or Somehow: Living on Uganda Time, for those who contribute $50 or more.

The Impact

Obviously, this surgery will have an enormous positive impact on Ruth, her son, me, and her family and friends.

Risks & Challenges

This is a fairly safe, brief procedure. There is always a risk with surgery, but the likelihood for success is great.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out about this campaign using social media. Send your positive wishes our way.

story:
Faustina Lives in Ashanti Province Ghana Africa she is looking to improve her life and make things better for all, by bringing simple to manufacture products and economics to her part of Africa . She went to college to become a Nurse so she could learn, Nursing was a way for her to go to school so she could increase her knowledge of  Math, Science and the Basics of Business and Economics . 

 Hello I am Rick Leister a, Middle Aged, Disabled, Widowed, Sad and despondent with reoccurring illnesses, from Leukemia and after effects of Chemotherapy Treatment american male , I am a Former Industrial Mechanic and Lead Manufacturing Electronics Technician at a Large Medical Device Manufacture in Elkton MD . I also had my own Repair Restoration and Removal Business, based out of Cecil County MD., before the ravages of Chemotherapy made it near impossible for me to maintain a career anymore. 

In 2001 when I was going thru Chemotherapy 2 I developed a fever over 104 deg. F for several days and had to be packed in Ice, Chemotherapy and Cold do Not go well together . I developed a nerve disorder that severely affected my hands making it hard for me to manipulate simple things sometimes like tying shoelaces, I thought of a way to clip the string in a clam shell type case and hook the cases together with a series of hooks . Then I overcame my illnesses some what, and returned to work. Years have gone by and the hands are worse now.

This is a process the first step was seeing the need for improvement and coming up with the idea for the improvement product. The second step developing the working drawings, Dimensional Drawings of the string case and system, String Restraint Case. Calculating best metals to use for the hook and finding best material to make the case from.  We will have to hire qualified people and / or organizations for fiscal planning  cost and Marketing requirements as well as  prototyping services . We know that this product would be of benefit to society we know it could actually even save lives people have accidents from untied shoe laces all the time we know his product will make it easier on the Elderly and disabled we are and it does make it easier .

Their are other Products to eliminate tying your shoe Rubberized shoelace,s Special shoelaces with rings and clips on them, Shoe laces with adjustable string stops . But WyTy is designed to go on your Existing shoelaces almost any shoelaces .Old young disabled will all be able to benefit from WyTy. 

WyTy will have many versions I am sure before the final best production version is made, one of the things We want to do to keep our Investors and supporters involved is Reward our best contributors with a Lottery, the winner will get the current prototype version . That means the 1st version, the ones I wear included , I am even making a second set of them with my feeble hands like the 1st set for our 1st Lottery winner.

 

There are many obstacles in developing a new product , but luckily this is a simple to design and not very difficult to manufacture product. We do Not want this product mass produced by automation, I could do that I could design and build a manufacturing center, automation is what I did , 4- 5 people could spit them out by the thousands a day. We want to hire Individuals in Faustina's area of Africa we want to put her country men to work .  The cost of labor and Basic Materials is so low and the task so simple it would be a perfect fit to Grow an Economy In Kumasi, Ghana, AFRICA . 

Yes We Are Looking for Contributors 

But we need resources that people can donate in their time also notice the crappy video could use the help of production personal, design and CAD drawing we need you too . People familiar with doing business in Ghana boy do we need your help, I been able to find a few resources in Ghana but Not many.Lawyers and accountants are always welcome . I Don't know if anyone has requested campaign assistance in this way before but we are Not your normal requester s and we are not  beyond accepting what ever form of Contribution or Help the crowd wants to give us to make, WyTy a reality on store Shelves and Internet web sites.  

If you like the Idea ? If You like the Campaign, please Share with All Your Friends !

If You Think it Stinks send it to all your unlikes, and unfriended and Enemies and Those that Scorned You and You Get The Idea ?...
