story:
Introducing Alma Retreat

Alma means “nourishing" or "kind” in Latin and “soul” in Portuguese and Spanish, and that captures the essence of our purpose: we want to provide retreats and solutions that nourish the soul and inspire our guests and members to positively change their lives.

Our franchise boutique concept is aimed at adding value and purpose to the usual standard hospitality offering of accommodation and food by providing rich and inspirational content for the Heart, Mind and Body. 

All our products and supplies are carefully handpicked and responsibly sourced to support sustainability and fair trade. Furthermore, we are committed to donate 10% of our future profits to help educate and feed children around the world. 

We are also developing an app and digital platform making sure people around the world can benefit from the knowledge we harvest. The app is also aimed to support our retreat guests sticking to new found resolutions and making their own vision a reality.

 

Our Vision

Our vision is to help our guests and members on their journey towards achieving goals, by creating distinct places where they can escape daily routines to find peace and inspiration, and accompanying them with an innovative digital platform to keep improving everyday life.

By choosing to support our vision, you will help creating a platform and unique places where people come together, get inspired, find motivation, have fun, develop and grow whilst helping other people around the world. 

You are essential to make our vision a reality - thank you for your contribution.

 

Our Concept

Imagine escaping the stress and rush of the city to a beautiful boutique place rooted in nature to relax and de-stress. Imagine there you will not just meet new friends and build new networks but also learn new things you have never done before or always wanted to but never had the time or willpower to do so. A place that will help you to be more motivated for a healthier lifestyle, to potentially lose some weight and increase your energy levels. Imagine leaving happier and with a more peaceful mindset - equipped with tools and knowledge to keep you on track in your day-to-day life. And what if you had a digital application helping you to continuously improve? 

Imagine you would have an escape like this near your city…today we are optimizing the operations in our first location. In a year from now, the next Alma Retreat might be opening near you. Alma is not about geography – by building a boutique concept that could be taken to many places and made be available everywhere and to everyone – also to you.

We aim to create fully sustainable locations, operated with renewable energies, using reclaimed and natural materials as well as simple yet artistic interiors supporting art and craft communities. All our products and supplies are handpicked, responsibly sourced and aim to support communities and causes we are passionate about, worldwide.

Our food is focused on healthy, organic farm-to-table approach in partnership with local producers. The vision is to develop small farms inside or adjacent to some of our locations to harvest knowledge and share the experience with our guests and partnering organizations around the world.

Our goal is to mature Alma in the United Arab Emirates, Germany and United Kingdom over the next two years. We want to have a positive impact and keep growing into new markets thereafter.

 

The Story: Once upon a time or where did it all start?

Our story began in 2010 – after living two years in Dubai our founder, Sarah, felt almost burned out and knew if she didn’t escape the city and ground herself she would probably collapse.

Her work as sales executive included regular flights to Africa or the Middle East, late night meetings and calls and 60-70 hours of work a week with quarterly targets pressure.

Being stressed she started searching for escapes and found one in Sri Lanka: a 20-hut nature retreat with no warm water or electricity, but organic locally farmed food, bespoke Ayurveda treatments and excellent teachers. After one week, she felt like a new person and had not just much higher energy levels but also increased the motivation for her job.

That’s when the first idea of Alma was born:

  • Nature Escapes near major cities so people can switch off from their daily and stressful routines
  • Inspiration for the Mind through diverse methods including our own library, knowledgeable people and activities like meditation and courses
  • Fitness and healthy food options to nourish and detox our Body
  • Art classes, music, and community environment to open our Heart

Basically, a retreat rather than a resort designed to “escape” from our daily routines and feel inspired to search and find new possibilities.

 

The Story: Where we are now?

The Alma story started with the idea of one person, but Alma would not be what it is today if it was not for the friends and supporters along the way. We opened our first location in February 2017 and used the first season as a proof of concept to gain feedback and improve.

"Definitely a first of its kind in the UAE", read more on FoodeMag

 

"I can’t think of a more productive and restful way to spend a weekend", read more on Gulf News

 

"It’s your retreat, and you can make it what you want", read more on Hayley Jacqueline

Alma is built from the people for the people – and if everybody gives a little bit, the future vision will be a reality, thanks to you!

Today Alma is led by a passionate team representing unity by diversity and all geared towards the one objective: motivate and inspire our guests while we continually improve. Unity by diversity is not just a phrase – inspired by Sivandana Yoga – we truly believe in equality of people and respect anyone and everyone’s believes and cultures. We are proud to say that even in our short time of operation our place provided a home away from home for spiritual groups, art and dance workshops, healthy and sustainable living retreats and eight fully booked signature weekend retreats including some corporate ones. See some of our guest reviews on our Facebook and TripAdvisor pages.

This beautiful place here is just the start – we are currently working on more locations so that our guests and members can explore different experiences. Complementing our retreat, the digital app (IamAlma) being developed is designed to motivate our guests to continue the good deeds.

 

WE ARE ALMA

The united colors of Alma: 10 countries, 5 continents, ages ranging from 25 to 55, each individual with unique experiences and skills – one team, one passion: making a difference!

 

From right to left:

Flor: Our Flor is the silent force behind keeping our place nice and tidy. She is shy on the outside but you know what they say about silent waters – she is very passionate about family, helping others and personal development.

Sergio (Member of the Leadership Team): The Alma Director of Development and Operations comes with over 15 years’ experience in hospitality across the world. With a pure Spanish pedigree, Sergio is passionate and fiery by nature and Alma helps him to use those qualities for good and understand the best way to control and learn through different techniques. Sergio strongly believes one's overall health and wellness isn't just physical but also mental.  “Alma's lifestyle is an idea that will help people to feel better about themselves in many ways. Alma is niche with huge potential for growth and making a difference in people’s lives.”

Salma (Member of the Leadership Team): Professionally, Salma has spent the last 11 years of her career with Microsoft helping government-related entities and enterprises realize their maximum potential by leveraging innovation & technology. Realizing that people are the core of any transformation be it personal, organizational or political, she became interested in psychology. Having studied psychology from Harvard Extension School, she is now deeply involved in spiritual psychology, healing and philanthropy with a passion for the betterment of the society and human experience. She's involved in multiple charities and is equally passionate about bringing Alma home to the less privileged “so that we can bring mindfulness, conscious living and healing to all - the promise of Alma!”

Sarah (Founder & CEO): The Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Alma Retreat spent her last 17 years working in large IT organizations and developing strategies for emerging markets. In her travels to Africa she became passionate about making a difference and driving with impact. Though German her key strength is a “crazy creative mind” always hungry to learn and explore new things and committed to create impactful experiences for Alma members and guests. The Alma Heart, Mind and Body 360 focus is her brainchild and aims to support every person on their individual journey to achieve their goals. “I got tired of places that spoke about body and mind only, with an instruction letter on what I have to do and can’t do – I want to find my own way and explore new possibilities for my own lifestyle choices – Alma is built to help with that.”

Kisso (Member of the Leadership Team): The Alma Director of Finance and Fitness comes with a solid background of 15 years plus in the financial industry. He is personally obsessed with fitness, chicken and chicks and brings a lot of balance to the team. Kisso’s “no bullshit and getting things done” attitude is one of the major reasons Alma is where it’s today. The Portuguese with Russian and African roots is a strong believer of keeping things simple and to the point. Though not very spiritual he grounds himself with being mindful in any moment and living after a non-judgemental philosophy. Tough from the outside he has a soft heart aiding people in need at any point in time – his motto is: “stop talking, start doing!”

Nancy: The Argentina born Australian Alma Host & Ambassador has over 20 years of experience in Hospitality and Event Management. She is a natural care taker and passionate about making people feel at home. Despite being the host in some of our retreats, she is also managing the Bali supply chain and development of Alma at Australia’s sunshine cost.

Nikolina: The Alma Well-being Manager spent her last year’s supporting Wellclub in bringing wellness to the people of the United Arab Emirates. Born in Serbia but having lived across the globe she has a mindset of “live and let live” and loves inspiring people with mindful practices. She is developing the Alma Spa Services, bringing wellness and unique experiences to our members and guests. "Alma has and will always have a very special place in my heart. It is there where I learned the most important thing in my life: how to Forgive and let go. Alma is not only about self-improvement but about self-acceptance. I’m immensely passionate about the entire Alma Portfolio! And truly blessed to be a part of this Journey."  

Khalid (Member of the Leadership Team): Khalid, the Alma Director of Outdoor Adventures & Active Lifestyle is very passionate about healthy lifestyle, sports and travel. He is made in United Arab Emirates but raised in many countries, a world traveler with an explorer mindset and always curious to learn new things. His biggest asset are his social skills and welcoming attitude. He started his work carrier as an aircraft engineer, and started racing Formula 4 for the United Arab Emirates in France and brought his experience back to manage a local racing academy. His journey didn't stop there and he went from racing to finance to aviation and is today head Quality Assurance and Corporate Development on special government projects. "Alma is a place with no boarders, no limitations, no restrictions, no judgments. It’s a place to be who you want to be and a place to say yes to everything that you want to happen. Alma is a family home.”  

Nenita: Nenita is the good soul of the house, our “queen of the desert” enjoys serving our guests while being served by the rest of the team. She is passionate about organizing things and has an incredible attention to detail. Her green thumb lets every flower in the desert bloom and her happy mood and singing brings joy to all of us.

Dima (Member of the Leadership Team): Although not based with us in the United Arab Emirates, Dima has over 20 years of IT experience in small and large software companies, across developed and emerging markets. Dima will lead the Alma digital strategy development. Being personally excited about innovation and knowledge, Dima brings a well of inspiration to the team. His strong focus on methods and systems to get things done adds tremendous value to the Alma leadership team. His motto is: "one for all and all for one."

Gaby (Advisor to the Leadership Team): Though not with us in the United Arab Emirates, Gaby is a key pillar of our team. From day one her positivity and strength helped bring the vision to fruition.  Gaby has 20 years of experience in psychology of learning and hypnotherapy as well as entrepreneurship in running an own practice.  She also comes with 10 years of hands on experience in hospitality management. She is also a learning strategy advisor for major German educational institutions and is passionate about quality and helping people unlock their potential. She is personally interested in all of Alma portfolio.

 

YOU ARE ALMA

You can make the world a better place

Alma will grow into a global community organization uniting people and changing lives for the better. You can be part of this – we can leave a legacy of impact, purpose and charity. Our team will implement – but you will be our engine, our backbone and life-force.

Our philosophy is to make a change in other people’s lives and mostly on those less fortunate with a brighter future ahead if help reach to them: 10% of our profits will be donated to vetted orphanages and support the most beautiful souls on this planet: our children. We are making sure our suppliers are of highest standards and with similar philosophies – ensuring an end-to-end value chain for impact.

The Alma team has traveled the world and seen the good and the bad of aid – we are committed to build a mechanism to make sure organizations with integrity are supported and fair chances are given to any child in our network.

Maybe you will never find the time to visit our partnering aid organizations or even visit our Alma Retreats – still you will be part of this and with our digital platform we will make sure you can follow us and see all your impact even if you never leave your country.

The Plan

Help us meet and exceed our goal to build a strong foundation for transforming our vision into reality. Our funding needs for the next 12 to 18 months exceed US$ 1.5M – however any contribution counts. This campaign is the first stepping stone in our journey.

At Alma, we are committed to building a long-term team and concept that can benefit everyone involved.  Please note that 3% of the proceeds from most perks in this Indiegogo campaign will be donated to the Kasisi Orphanage in Zambia. The balance will be used to support our development plan and operations and will not be donated directly to aid.

We are excited to deliver better services to you and to the world, and your contributions are an essential part of it.

We will:

  • Enhance and maximize the on-the-ground operations in our first location in Ras Al Khaimah, whilst also improve the guest cabins and the community hall
  • Replace our generator with a solar plant and increase overall sustainability
  • Diversify our workout area, build a dune gym and develop daily inspirational videos
  • Finalize the site development plan for our German and UK locations
  • Franchise our concept
  • Develop our mobile app to help guests and members stick to newly found methods and resolutions even when away from the retreats
  • Invest in research and development to bring the latest knowledge to you
  • Translate our German meditations and audio hypnosis into English and Arabic

 

 

The Road Ahead

We are committed to work as hard as we humanly can to execute our idea successfully. Many, many hours and very long days, weeks and months have been invested in bringing our vision to this stage. And the hard work doesn’t stop here!

Just our short months of operation have been very rewarding, nothing is more satisfying than helping others and leave positive imprints. We will continue to innovate and excite our members and guests with differentiated offering and solutions that inspire and motivate. We look forward to support as much as we can to help overcome your challenges:

Throughout our journey, we have been advised by highly experienced professionals and had the privilege to meet and collaborate with very talented people from all sorts of backgrounds. We are blessed with everything we learned in the process so far, in particular from our own mistakes, and surely a few more will be made as we move forward. There’s no way around it! However, we are confident that the diversity, talent, experience and, above all, the passion of our leadership team, the dream team, puts us in a privileged position to execute our development plan strongly.

Many challenges lie ahead, some known and others unsighted at this stage. The first hurdle we need to overcome is the funding required to drive the concept forward. This is a fact, and we cannot simply look away or brush it under the carpet.

Alma Retreat was founded with a great vision and idealistic goals, all of us have invested our savings to bring something to life that is more focused on people than power, on impact rather  than money, on knowledge rather than dull entertainment ,and on health rather than self-destruction.

That is why your help is of paramount importance: will help us continue our journey and the more we can raise without selling equity stakes in the business, the more we remain independent from purely financially driven backers, and better placed to protect the core values and ethos of our vision.

It has been a challenge so far to find the right long-term location in the United Arab Emirates as we seek to transport a feeling rooted in nature, however some options have arise and we are confident with your help the next version of Alma in the United Arab Emirates will be even better. In parallel, we have already identified an ideal plot for our first location in Germany and are actively negotiating the land lease and planning permission with the relevant local authorities.

The planning of and the physical construction of the properties is always a challenge, but nothing we dread about taking on. We are confident the lessons learned during the development of our first property in Ras Al Khaimah coupled with the breadth and depth of construction experience Sergio brings to the leadership team, will keep this aspect of the project on rails.

The implementation of our vision is a multi-year project and will require intensive capital expenditure and investments in the first few years, so we are unlikely to be cash-flow positive before three years into the plan. As a result, giving back through direct charitable donations from our profits may take a while but will start happening as soon as we turn the corner in terms of profitability. In the meantime, we will continuously and actively work with our partners and suppliers to ensure we are having a positive impact on communities and causes we are passionate about.

Developing ground-breaking software solutions are often complex processes, requiring very talented teams supported by meticulous functional requirements planning and architectural design, as well as skillful project management. Our leadership team has multiple decades of combined IT strategy and software development expertise, enviably positioning us to successfully lead the development of the digital platform and application we envision.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any financial contribution, no matter how small, adds momentum and brings us closer to our goal. Help us make Alma Retreat a reality by clicking the "BACK IT” button at the top of the page.

Even if you don’t have the means to back our project financially, you can still support us by spreading the word and make some noise about this Inidegogo campaign. You can do this by sharing with your friends, family and professional network offline or online by:

  • Copying our campaign URL and paste it into an email or social media update
  • Click on the Facebook or Twitter icons to share through your social media networks
  • Add a widget to your blog or personal website. Click on the Embed icon and then copy and paste the widget code
  • Send a direct email from Indiegogo

 

THANK YOU for believing and supporting our vision! We can’t wait to welcome you in one of our retreats near you!
story_txt:
Introducing Alma Retreat
Alma means “nourishing" or "kind” in Latin and “soul” in Portuguese and Spanish, and that captures the essence of our purpose: we want to provide retreats and solutions that nourish the soul and inspire our guests and members to positively change their lives.
Our franchise boutique concept is aimed at adding value and purpose to the usual standard hospitality offering of accommodation and food by providing rich and inspirational content for the Heart, Mind and Body. 


All our products and supplies are carefully handpicked and responsibly sourced to support sustainability and fair trade. Furthermore, we are committed to donate 10% of our future profits to help educate and feed children around the world. 
We are also developing an app and digital platform making sure people around the world can benefit from the knowledge we harvest. The app is also aimed to support our retreat guests sticking to new found resolutions and making their own vision a reality.

 
Our Vision
Our vision is to help our guests and members on their journey towards achieving goals, by creating distinct places where they can escape daily routines to find peace and inspiration, and accompanying them with an innovative digital platform to keep improving everyday life.
By choosing to support our vision, you will help creating a platform and unique places where people come together, get inspired, find motivation, have fun, develop and grow whilst helping other people around the world. 
You are essential to make our vision a reality - thank you for your contribution.
 
Our Concept
Imagine escaping the stress and rush of the city to a beautiful boutique place rooted in nature to relax and de-stress. Imagine there you will not just meet new friends and build new networks but also learn new things you have never done before or always wanted to but never had the time or willpower to do so. A place that will help you to be more motivated for a healthier lifestyle, to potentially lose some weight and increase your energy levels. Imagine leaving happier and with a more peaceful mindset - equipped with tools and knowledge to keep you on track in your day-to-day life. And what if you had a digital application helping you to continuously improve? 
Imagine you would have an escape like this near your city…today we are optimizing the operations in our first location. In a year from now, the next Alma Retreat might be opening near you. Alma is not about geography – by building a boutique concept that could be taken to many places and made be available everywhere and to everyone – also to you.
We aim to create fully sustainable locations, operated with renewable energies, using reclaimed and natural materials as well as simple yet artistic interiors supporting art and craft communities. All our products and supplies are handpicked, responsibly sourced and aim to support communities and causes we are passionate about, worldwide.

Our food is focused on healthy, organic farm-to-table approach in partnership with local producers. The vision is to develop small farms inside or adjacent to some of our locations to harvest knowledge and share the experience with our guests and partnering organizations around the world.

Our goal is to mature Alma in the United Arab Emirates, Germany and United Kingdom over the next two years. We want to have a positive impact and keep growing into new markets thereafter.

As a result, giving back through direct charitable donations from our profits may take a while but will start happening as soon as we turn the corner in terms of profitability. In the meantime, we will continuously and actively work with our partners and suppliers to ensure we are having a positive impact on communities and causes we are passionate about.
Developing ground-breaking software solutions are often complex processes, requiring very talented teams supported by meticulous functional requirements planning and architectural design, as well as skillful project management. Our leadership team has multiple decades of combined IT strategy and software development expertise, enviably positioning us to successfully lead the development of the digital platform and application we envision.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Any financial contribution, no matter how small, adds momentum and brings us closer to our goal. Help us make Alma Retreat a reality by clicking the "BACK IT” button at the top of the page.
Even if you don’t have the means to back our project financially, you can still support us by spreading the word and make some noise about this Inidegogo campaign. You can do this by sharing with your friends, family and professional network offline or online by:

Copying our campaign URL and paste it into an email or social media update
Click on the Facebook or Twitter icons to share through your social media networks
Add a widget to your blog or personal website. Click on the Embed icon and then copy and paste the widget code
Send a direct email from Indiegogo

 
THANK YOU for believing and supporting our vision! We can’t wait to welcome you in one of our retreats near you!

story:
Introducing Dualhead toothbrush

​

A toothbrush that will change your daily teeth cleaning ...

How does the Dualhead toothbrush work?

The toothbrush heads surround each tooth, and with flexibile movements removes more dental plaque than a manual toothbrush. The round toothbrush heads adapts to your teeth and they will be cleaned perfectly.

 

  • Regular teeth cleaning ensures the prevention of dental caries, periodontal disease and gingivitis.
  • The teeth are recommended to be cleaned for two minutes, if you use Dualhead toothbrush, it will be only 40-60 seconds.
  • If you don´t clean your teeth regularly, you can cause health complications.

How to clean your teeth with this toothbrush ?

It´s easy ...

  1. Watch the video: 
  2. Each quadrant should be cleaned as low as 15 seconds, and whole mouth should be cleaned as low as 60 second. 

It massages your gums

  • Rotating motion massages the gums to protect before paradentosis. 
  • The bristles on the toothbrush outmost side are stated for this purpose.
  • Two rotating heads remove plaque from interdental spaces
  • Cleans plaque between teeth and gums - with careful rotary movements removes plaque from the entire tooth
  • Prevents abrasion of teeth - If you clean your teeth with a manual brush, your teeth will become thinner
  • It also cleans in subsector places of your teeth

 

Cool design and spare heads

Two colours (Black and White) with cool design, which will enhance look of your bathroom.

Head (heads) are removable and easily replaceable.

Do you like Black or White ? 

All current and future backers will be able to choose between these colors Black, White, and maybe Blue, Red and Yellow.

Each color is original and will inspire the look of your bathroom.

Charging Dualhead toothbrush

Charging your Dualhead toothbrush is very easy, the same as with others electric toothbrushes.

You will receive the connectors by delivery location (EU or US conectors).

Waterproof

  • Dualhead toothbrush is completely waterproof
  • You can wash it in the water without trouble

What do you will get ?

If you contribute at least $ 99, you will receive Dualhead toothbrush with head for Dualhead toothbrush. 

How do I put spare head ?

It´s easiest then with other toothbrush !  

 

Watch --->>>

 

Spare head

Dualhead toothbrush spare heads are small, economical and they are easy to use.

 

Stretch goals

- LOCKED  

- LOCKED

- LOCKED

Why fixed funding ? 

  • Because, If we don´t get $5,000, your money be sent back to you. 
  • This is an exploratory campaign, if we receive $5,000, we'll do the second campaign to fill orders
  • Benefits: Quickly delivering and Lower prices than in the second campaign

Timeline:

July 2016 - First idea

November 2016 - Beginning work on technical details

January 2017 - Finishing last technical details

March 2017 - 3D Vizualization and animation

May 2017 – Pre-launch for Indiegogo campaign

June 2017 – Indiegogo launch

July 2017 – Manufacturer selected

August 2017 – Send out surveys about colour

September 2017  - Start of production

November 2017 -  Delivery

Thank you for reading.

If you like it, please Share it because everyone wants to have cleaned teeth per minute.

Don´t forget to tell your friends !

story:
What is CuPure?

CuPure is a simple yet high tech way of face masks. Many studies have proven that coronavirus can live on surfaces like plastic, steel, wood, etc., for 3 to 9 days. Copper is a material which doesn't allow the bacteria/ virus to live and stay active for more than 4 hours. Find the study here - https://mbio.asm.org/content/6/6/e01697-15.full

 

Copper has natural antifungal, antimicrobial, antibacterial and antiviral properties. See Wikipedia link here -  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antimicrobial_properties_of_copper

Copper doesn't kill these pathogens; it destroys them right down to their structures which help it reproduce. Professor Bill Keevil, University of Southampton article here - https://www.fastcompany.com/90476550/copper-kills-coronavirus-why-arent-our-surfaces-covered-in-it

 

           This is what copper does.

After learning from all these studies, we've come up with CuPure. CuPure is an N95 mask with the exterior shell made of copper blended fabric which allows the mask to remain pathogen-free always. This copper layer is the outermost part of this face mask. It is comfortable to wear and easy to breathe through. The inside of the mask will have the user's bacterial or viral ecosystem and is harmless. It is the outside of the mask that has foreign bacteria or viruses from which the user needs to be protected from. The outer copper layer will render the mask harmless to touch and avoid recontamination. Further, the user can expose the mask to a daily dose of a few hours of sunlight to decontaminate the mask for reuse. Please read the instructions on how to use CuPure very carefully. Since CuPure has a copper mesh exterior it has 5 times the surface area of a flat layer of the mask. Disposable masks pollute the environment, and in the circumstances in which everyone needs a mask, imagine millions of masks getting disposed. CuPure can be reused and will last longer and pollute less. CuPure is also more durable than the regular masks out there due to its strong copper fabric structure. If you use masks often, then we recommend using 2 CuPure masks alternatively so that each one gets enough time to work its magic. 

 

 

Why CuPure?

  • Useful for the current outbreak of Coronavirus.
  • Can be used for indoor and outdoor activities.
  • Easy to use, one size fits all
  • Protects from dust, germs, particles, allergens
  • Washable and reusable
  • Inexpensive yet effective
  • Copper layer which destroys all germs on its surface on its own

 

Layers of CuPure

  

 

On regular surfaces

On metallic surfaces

 

 

WHO recommends the usage of masks like N95 or N99 during the outbreaks of viruses like Coronavirus, Flu, SARS, MERS, etc., Every country is promoting the use of face masks to protect its healthy population hence avoiding the spread of these viruses. CuPure is different because when you use a regular mask all the bacteria, germs, fungus, etc., builds up on the exterior of the mask and lives on that surface for a very long time (3-9 days) hence helping the virus spread everywhere. CuPure will not let that happen as the copper shell will react with the bacteria and kill all the bacteria, virus, fungus. Please read the WHO guidelines on how to wear and remove masks and how to protect yourself from COVID19. All your doubts can be resolved here and do read the WHO guidelines here -  https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public/when-and-how-to-use-masks

 

Features :

  • N95
  • One Size Fit All
  • 6 layer design
  • The Copper exterior which sanitises itself
  • Washable
  • Comfortable design
  • Wide double strap securing system
  • Reusable
  • Foldable flat design

CuPure is inexpensive and effective. CuPure is the new definition of the face mask. CuPure is a revolutionary idea, and its cost makes it even more affordable to all people of the world. We want to deliver CuPure to everyone.

Care Instructions :

  • Machine Wash Cold Delicate Cycle with Colours.
  • Tumble Dry on Low Heat.
  • DO NOT IRON. DO NOT BLEACH
  • Can be hand washed
  • Soak in water before washing
  • Pass water from inside several times before soaking

 

Handling face masks is not easy; here are some images that would help you understand the way of using masks. (Courtesy of WHO)

 

How to ensure the mask fits?

  • Positive pressure check - Hold the edges of the face mask firmly and blow from inside. If you feel any leaks then readjust the strap or the metal clip
  • Negative pressure check - Again hold the edges then suck, if you feel any gaps you know what to do.

 

Why are masks important? Here's an article of masks for all and what governments want the citizens to do. https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/news-perspective/2020/04/commentary-masks-all-covid-19-not-based-sound-data

Read this WHO report to know about how to live in a situation like the Coronavirus and what to remember. Find the report here - https://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/handle/10665/331693/WHO-2019-nCov-IPC_Masks-2020.3-eng.pdf?sequence=1&isAllowed=y

This article tells us about all the types of face masks available and what their particular purpose is. To protect yourself, you need to wear a tight-fitting mask. The exterior of the mask gets exposed to the outside hence making them one time use. Know the differences here -  https://www.healthline.com/health/coronavirus-mask

To know about COVID19 go through this CDC webpage - https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html

Read these guidelines to know how to protect yourself from this outbreak here - https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prevent-getting-sick/prevention.html

Here's what to do if you're sick due to the Coronavirus - https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/if-you-are-sick/steps-when-sick.html

 

We need your help to deliver our concept to the world and help the environment with our sustainable solution. We've chosen a manufacturer who is CDC and NIOSH approved so that we're able to deliver a high-quality product to our customers. And right after manufacturing/ delivery, CuPure will be sent for approval. Our manufacturer is Taiwan based and is a 40 year old company with more than 500 employees and is world renowned and has these certificates of quality:

  • ISO-9001 .ISO-14001 .
  • European EN 149:2001+A1:2009
  • U.S. NIOSH/CDC.
  • Australia AS1716.
  • CE

Please help us reach our goal by spreading the word about CuPure to bring it to the world. We have come up with many perks and ways for you to contribute. We're trying to reach the delivery stage in the next 30 days. All the early backers get a great discount on an already inexpensive CuPure mask. More offers and updates on your project coming soon.

 

For Bulk orders contact us.

Disclaimer: Please read the CDC guidelines on the mask reuse for healthcare settings. https://www.cdc.gov/niosh/topics/hcwcontrols/recommendedguidanceextuse.html 

This is not a surgical mask for frontline health workers and is only meant for the usage by general public.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Make our campaign famous
  • If you have the infrastructure for handling distribution let us know
  • Share our Indiegogo page on your social media groups
  • Get free samples from us for promotion

story:
Hi, I'm Bryan Osuna, founder of Committed HP! Can I share my story with you? 

I have to admit, I didn't originally design the Moball Roller to sell to you. I created it in a time of my life when I truly needed a better tool for of my own healing, recovery and performance. The friends and clients that I shared this tool with loved it so much that they urged me to bring it to the world.  Since then, I have committed to creating a more versatile version 2 of the Moball Roller. This new and improved tool has more resilient materials, trigger point release end caps, and will offer balls in various strengths, sizes and colors! I am so excited to get this amazing tool to you. You deserve it!

Why do we need YOU? I have been successfully hand-crafting and using the original version of the Moball Roller for years now. I have poured my heart, soul and resources into getting this project to the manufacturing phase and now I need your help! We have begun manufacturing and are ready to meet the challenge of getting this amazing tool out into the world. Funds will go towards production of the new customizable components, finishing manufacturing, and financing the shipping & handling phase. Will you help me get this game-changing tool out to you and the rest of the world?

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

- Bryan Osuna - Founder of Committed HP 

 

What specifically makes the Moball Roller so Amazing?

✓  Innovative Dual-Ball Technology 

✓  Adjusts to Your Needs 

✓  Ridiculously Easy to Use

✓  Precise for Addressing Key Areas

✓  Versatile Shapes, Features & Uses

✓  Lightweight & Comes in a Travel Size 

✓  Customizable Options

 

You Deserve to Feel & Function Better!

  •  Relieve tension in muscles & fascia through trigger point release
  •  Decrease pain & discomfort via improved soft tissue health
  •  Improve circulation through reduced fascial restriction
  •  Enhance muscle performance via improved kinesthetic awareness
  •  Optimize the relationship between soft tissues (muscle to fascia)
  •  Improve sleep through reduced stress and discomfort
  •  Relieve headaches by reducing tension in the neck & back

 

"I Love My Back Pain!" Said No One Ever.

Back Pain is a growing epidemic. Studies have named it the leading cause of inactivity and work disability worldwide. Statistically, you or someone you love will likely experience back pain this year. Poor myofascial health and posture can be directly linked to back pain. The Moball Roller is not only perfect for improving tissue health through self myofascial release, but also for facilitating mobility and postural correction drills. 

The myofascial system is an intricate and interactive network of tissue that runs throughout the body to support the musculoskeletal system. Fascia plays an important role in many aspects of health, longevity and performance. Unhealthy fascia can lead to pain and dysfunction in addition to impaired strength, mobility, balance, coordination, circulation and even organ function. The Moball Roller is uniquely designed to help you optimize the health of this system.

story:
I am...

Patricia Bogan owner and teacher currently of The Practice. I received my certification in personal fitness training from International Sports and Sciences Association (ISSA) in 2010.  I am also certified in Reflexology, TRX and Yin Yoga.  

You can read about our studio on Yelp and in DNA Info below:

The Practice on Yelp

The Practice on DNA Info

Our Campaign...

I am writing to you with an opportunity for all of us.

The time has come for us to find a new home to accommodate our expanding neighborhood, It has been my goal when looking for a new space to continue to serve the community I love, and we think we've found our dream home right here in Washington Heights!

This campaign is our opportunity to raise enough funds to acquire, renovate and equip the space. This means that the volume of the classes and their variety will increase. 

Your contribution, however big or small, can help us help you get to Great Heights!

Your Contribution...

We will break it down for you in more detail:

  • We're trying to raise 20,000 dollars. All funds will go to rent and renovation of the new space - including putting in a new floor, air conditioning and installing new bathrooms.
  • Take the opportunity to choose any Vinyasa, flow or Yin Yoga classes, TRX classes, Indoor Cycling, Tabata/HIIT, Kettlebell classes, or Teen/Tween fitness classes.
  • Give more! Get reflexology sessions, massages, and personal training sessions. 
  • Please note that class perks are priced only slightly higher than normal sell value so that you can get something great and we can build our studio!
  • And that's not all! The list of offerings grows all the time! Have something you're interested in ? Let us know. We're happy to discuss an alternative to your gift for giving. 
  • If we don't reach our goal, all funds will be returned to you directly. (But we hope to reach our goal with your help!)

The Impact...

I found this quote and it says it all: Exercise not only changes your body. It changes your mind, your attitude and your mood. - Anonymous

 - I would add that as these changes take place, our affect on those we love improves- and so on!

Timeline...

Below is what we anticipate. All timing is approximate (but close) depending on negotiations with landlords and general contractors. 

  • May 1: We move out of our current space
  • June 1 (approx): Renovations begin to new studio
  • May - July: Holding classes in Fort Tryon Park (Tabata/Hiit, Bootcamp and Yoga)
  • Aug/Sept 2015: Target Grand Opening of Great Heights Wellness & Fitness
We hope to see you in the park beginning May 1! Watch for e-newsletters for more information on location, timing and how to sign up. 

Can't donate dollars...

You can still help out!

  • Get the word out! Make some noise about our campaign! Mention us on Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest. Or just tell a friend!
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much!

For those of you that already know us and love us and want us to stick around, we love you too! Please give what you can and tell all your friends!
story_txt:
I am...
 Patricia Bogan owner and teacher currently of The Practice. I received my certification in personal fitness training from International Sports and Sciences Association (ISSA) in 2010.  I am also certified in Reflexology, TRX and Yin Yoga.  
You can read about our studio on Yelp and in DNA Info below:
The Practice on Yelp 
The Practice on DNA Info 

Our Campaign...I am writing to you with an opportunity for all of us.
The time has come for us to find a new home to accommodate our expanding neighborhood, It has been my goal when looking for a new space to continue to serve the community I love, and we think we've found our dream home right here in Washington Heights!
This campaign is our opportunity to raise enough funds to acquire, renovate and equip the space. This means that the volume of the classes and their variety will increase. 
Your contribution, however big or small, can help us help you get to Great Heights!

Your Contribution... We will break it down for you in more detail: 
We're trying to raise 20,000 dollars. All funds will go to rent and renovation of the new space - including putting in a new floor, air conditioning and installing new bathrooms.
Take the opportunity to choose any Vinyasa, flow or Yin Yoga classes, TRX classes, Indoor Cycling, Tabata/HIIT, Kettlebell classes, or Teen/Tween fitness classes.
Give more! Get reflexology sessions, massages, and personal training sessions. 
Please note that class perks are priced only slightly higher than normal sell value so that you can get something great and we can build our studio!
And that's not all! The list of offerings grows all the time! Have something you're interested in ? Let us know. We're happy to discuss an alternative to your gift for giving.  If we don't reach our goal, all funds will be returned to you directly. (But we hope to reach our goal with your help!) 
  The Impact... I found this quote and it says it all: Exercise not only changes your body. It changes your mind, your attitude and your mood. - Anonymous
 - I would add that as these changes take place, our affect on those we love improves- and so on!
 
  Timeline... Below is what we anticipate. All timing is approximate (but close) depending on negotiations with landlords and general contractors.  
May 1: We move out of our current space
June 1 (approx): Renovations begin to new studio
May - July: Holding classes in Fort Tryon Park (Tabata/Hiit, Bootcamp and Yoga)
Aug/Sept 2015: Target Grand Opening of Great Heights Wellness & Fitness
 
We hope to see you in the park beginning May 1! Watch for e-newsletters for more information on location, timing and how to sign up. 

  Can't donate dollars... You can still help out! 
Get the word out! Make some noise about our campaign! Mention us on Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest. Or just tell a friend! You can also use the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you so much!

For those of you that already know us and love us and want us to stick around, we love you too! Please give what you can and tell all your friends!

story:
The Ability Sport Off-Road Mobility chair will let you take that beach vacation and get into the water. Go for a ride into the woods and smell the trees. Extend your travel range and get refreshed by the natural world.

If you need physical assistance to move through your home, your neighborhood, and to your appointments; maybe your leisure time can be turned up a notch.

We need to sell 100 chairs in the next 30 days. Help us deliver this product. Purchase yours now to reserve this low introductory price for 2015.

We have designed this transport with two sets of wheels so that your adventures are no longer limited to the sidewalk. Balloon tires exchange quickly with the BMX wheels so the Off-Road Mobility chair your is all-season alternative.


We have been making medical durable equipment for the past 10 years. When we looked at the cumbersome units known as “beach wheelchairs”; we realized that we could make significant improvements in function and flexibility.

The Accessible Recreation world extends from the beach to the mountains. Where ever you want to play next; surf, trail, marsh or desert. We even took our sample to the snow covered slopes around Lake Tahoe to see how the balloon wheel float on the snow! This Off-Road Mobility chair will take you there.


When we bring a product to market: the buck stops with me. This is why I work long-term with trusted suppliers. I get to know every nook and cranny (i.e. every bent and punched tube, every surface of the injection molded parts, all of the sliding tolerances) of the products we produce. 

We manufacture and test this trail chair like every other FDA medical transport chair; so that you can be sure of getting the quality and durability you expect.


This IndieGoGo campaign allows us to find an audience for our product. Pre-sales are discounted from MSRP because you are the first movers and will enjoy the Off-Road Mobility chair before it goes to the retail market. We can offer these great prices because we are direct; factory to you.


Did I mention accessories? (included!)


Thank You Perks

25$ DIP YOUR TOES IN: microfiber sports bandanna/wrap


50$ RAVING FAN: one shoulder sling pack


100$ SOLID CITIZEN: donate 1 Off-Road chair to someone you know!

489$ EARLY ADOPTER; reserve yours today (Limited Quantity)

699$ TAKE THE PLUNGE: discounted Off-Road Mobility Chair


FAQ Frequently Asked Questions

How small does it pack?

The main carry bag (including the two balloon wheels) is about 48 x 22 x 20 inches (122 x 56 x 51 cm) and fits nicely in an SUV. I did pack the wheels separately when I rented a Camry, and that works just fine. In order to check the Trail Chair as regular-sized luggage for the airlines, we provide a separate carry bag for the balloon tires.

How much does it weigh?

The frame weighs 30 Lbs. (13.6 Kg). The balloon wheels with axel plates weigh 15 Lbs.  (6.8 Kg). The BMX wheels with axel plates weigh 7 Lbs. lbs (3.2 Kg). So all together in the carry bag, the trail chair weighs 52 Lbs.  (23.6 Kg).

How big is it when completely open?

Overall width is 38.5 in (98 cm) with balloon wheels and 25.5 in (65 cm) with BMX wheels. The turning radius is 56 in (142 cm). The distance from the front bumper to the backrest in the upright position is 70 in (178 cm). When the backrest is in the relaxed position the overall length is 88 in (224 cm).

What is the warranty?

First of all, your trail chair will arrive defect free. If you have any problems with the components or with shipping damage, please contact us right away. Since this is a “rough use” outdoor product: under normal circumstances you will get dings and smudges. Please do not over fill the tires; they need to be soft for the trail and to provide a smooth ride. We warranty the manufactured parts of the trail chair from 1 year of receipt. We will carry replacement parts; please let us know how we can help.

When can I get one?

We are planning to ship within 90 days from the IndieGoGo campaign. Our prototype (the one used in the videos) proves the functionality and the tooling requirements. We will post regular production updates on this site at on our web page www.abilitysport.net .

How can I maintain the trail chair?

Salt, sand, and grit are not good for moving parts. We recommend that you hose off the chair after heavy use. The wheel bearings are sealed industry standard stainless steel and should not be a problem. If the front wheel assembly is sticky, try some soap (it worked for me).

Who do I call if I have a problem?

We like email, a lot. And prefer that you email your question and comment (and a good time to call you). Please contact info@abilitysport.net . However, you may also reach us at (800) 345-1645 during West Coast business hours.

Can you ship this overseas?

Yes. But it is difficult to quote you a price until we know if you want both sets of wheels and where you live. Please send us an email with your order information and mailing address to info@abilitysport.net and we will get you the best shipping price we can find.
